font-size: large;\"><b>DOES HE UNDERSTAND THE MEANING OF A TRAITOR DOUBLE AGENT , WHOM YOU TRUST.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>THE KORAN DOES NOT COMMAND TO KILL SOMEONE <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WHO\nSAYS OPENLY</span>, &nbsp; I AM LEAVING ISLAM .</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: x-large;\"><b>Quran (4:89) \u2013 ( &nbsp;APOSTASY VERSE &nbsp;)</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>If they wish that you\nshould disbelieve as they disbelieve, as they themselves are . <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>Do not take them as\nyour allies unless they have forsaken their homes for the cause of Allah.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>After that if they turn\nrenegades, (<span style=\"color: red;\"> DOUBLE AGENTS</span> ) seize them and slay them wherever ye find them.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Take not to yourselves\nany one of them as friend or helper</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: x-large;\"><b>IT REQUIRES NO GREAT INTELLIGENCE TO FIGURE OUT A SIMPLE VERSE ABOVE.</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I have a Koran in my library and I have read\nit. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Koran does NOT come out and state explicitly\nthat apostates should be killed. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Hadith was poison injected by extremist\nmullahs who want to hold power.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The word apostate in Arabic is murtadd and\none who apostatizes is called man artadd 'an dinihi, i.e. \"Who turns his\nback on religion.\" &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Two words are\nused for apostasy in Moslem law: irtidad and ridda. The latter term relates to\napostasy from Islam into unbelief, kufr; the former, from Islam to some other\nreligion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Koran : verse 2:217:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">QUOTE :They ask thee concerning fighting in\nthe Prohibited Month. Say: \u201cFighting therein is a grave (offence); but graver\nis it in the sight of Allah to prevent access to the path of Allah, to deny\nHim, to prevent access to the Sacred Mosque, and drive out its members.\u201d Tumult\nand oppression are worse than slaughter. Nor will they cease fighting you until\nthey turn you back from your faith if they can. And if any of you turn back\nfrom their faith and die in unbelief, their works will bear no fruit in this\nlife and in the Hereafter; they will be companions of the Fire and will abide\ntherein.UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">If they want to live in peace with the Muslims,\nthey are to be left in peace and if they assume a hostile attitude, then they\nare to be treated accordingly. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">HOSTILE ATTITUDE in those days was being a\nenemy from within the camp ( A POISONOUS SNAKE DOUBLE AGENT ) - not someone who\nopenly declared ,\u201d I am done\u201d &nbsp;left the\ncamp and went away.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">RENEGADE IS A TRAITOR - OR A DOUBLE AGENT .\nIT WAS APPLICABLE TO THOSE DAYS WHEN MOHAMMAD WAS ALIVE \u2013 A CASE OF SURVIVAL OF\nHIS ENDANGERED PAGAN CLAN.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">IT HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH OPEN CONVERSIONS. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;IF A MUSLIM GIRL MARRIES A CHRISTIAN BOY AND\nGOES TO CHURCH, &nbsp;&nbsp;KORAN DOES NOT ALLOW\nKILLING HER. </b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">BUT IF SHE CONTINUES WEARING BURKA , PRETENDS\nTO BE MUSLIM , AND POISONS ISLAM -&nbsp; YES \u2013\nTHEN SHE IS A RENEGADE \u2013 &nbsp;AN ENEMY FROM WITHIN. </b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">THIS VERSE &nbsp;WAS APPLICABLE IN THE DAYS WHEN MOHAMMAD WAS\nALIVE , FOR SHEER SURVIVAL. &nbsp; &nbsp; A ENEMY DOUBLE AGENT SPY WHO DESTROYS AND SUBVERTS\nFROM WITHIN , &nbsp;&nbsp;IS UNWELCOME, RIGHT ?</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">CRYPTO JEWS WHO PREACH FALSE ISLAM ARE THE\nRENEGADES- THE WOLVES IN SHEEPS CLOTHING.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WHEN JEW ROTHSCHILD TOOK SEVERAL INDIAN\nMUSLIMS TO FIRST AND SECOND ROUND TABLE CONFERENCES IN LONDON BEFORE 1947, I\nKNOW THE MUSLIMS WHO WERE CRYPTO JEWS. &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;JINNAH\nOPENLY ATE PIG HAM SANDWICHES AND DRANK NEAT WHISKY.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Mullahs claim that circumcision is mandatory\nas per Koran. If you challenge them to show the verse in Koran\u2014they slip away\nand say \u201cMuslims would immediately say, The Koran does not tell us everything.\nWe need to go to the Hadith to find guidance on matters not touched by the\nKoran\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">HADITHS ARE POSION INJECTED BY THE WAHABBI/\nSALAFI BRANCHES IN ROTHSCHILD INSTALLED ROYAL BLOODLINE AL SAUD RULED DESERT\nNATION. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WHY DO THESE AL SAUD PRINCES DRINK, MARRY\nDOZENS OF WOMEN AND GAMBLE IN CASINOS ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Immediately after Muhammad's death, several\ntribes wanted to leave Islam and return to their preferred PAGAN religion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Any religion that invites you in but then\nwill not let you out , in peace , is no longer a religion\u2014 it becomes like a\nEVIL COLUMBIAN DRUG CARTEL \u2013 ONCE IN, NO WAY OUT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">One of the world's most respected Sunni\nscholars, Yusuf al-Qaradawi, admitted in 2012 that if Muslims had \"gotten\nrid of the apostasy punishment, Islam wouldn't exist today\".\n(Astonishingly enough, he was not apologizing for the beheading, torture,\nburning and murder of millions but rather trying to rationalize it).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In Calicut one of my Muslim shopkeeper\nfriends was busy shutting down his shutters , for Friday noon prayers. He was\nNOT going to the mosque, he was going home. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">See there was hardly a protest even from\nMuslim leaders in India , when millions of innocent Muslims women / children\nwere killed in Sudan, Palestine, Iraq, Libya, Syria, Yemen etc</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">PUJARIS WHO SAY THEY WILL DO EXPENSIVE PUJAS\nAND GIVE YOU FORGIVENESS FROM GOD, ARE JUST FLEECING YOU .</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Hinduism, karma is\nthe force of retributive justice that compels believers to behave righteously\naccording to Dharma\u2014the moral order of the universe.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hindu knows, that he Karma is in his own\nhands . This is why a Hindu is the same outside doors and within doors.&nbsp; He does NOT even hold an evil or slimy\nthought within his head.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma is the Hindu view\nof causality in which good deeds, words, thoughts, and commands lead to\nbeneficial effects for a person, and bad deeds, words, thoughts, and commands\nlead to harmful effects<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the reason why\nI can walk with my wife ( loaded with jewelry ) at midnight after a wedding receptions\non the deserted beach at midnight. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">A poor beggar sleeping on the street , would\nnot entertain a though of attacking her because even such a thought is bad\nkarma.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He knows that he will be re-born\nafter death ,and he wants a better life in his next birth . </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SAME WAY MAHAVIRA WAS\nBORN IN 4500 BC ( 24<sup>TH</sup> THIRTANKARA ) AND NOT 563 BC AS WRITTEN BY\nTHE ROTHSCHILD HISTORIAN TO BE A CONTEMPORARY OF BUDDHA <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AFTER ALL CHRISTIANITY\nSAYS THE BIG BANG HAPPENED IN 4004 BC .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HOW\nCAN MAHAVIRA BE BORN BEFORE THE BIG BANG ? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>PRAY ?<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>PRITHEE ?</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The shallow minded\nwhite invader tried to give a spin to Karma. He wrote that since Karma affects only\nyou , you can do whatever you want in life \u2013 after all it is all about you. Consequently,\nit would promote self-centeredness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only a morbid and petty\nmind can even think this way.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hindu teaching of\nkarma is meant to help us overcome.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We should not accept an\nunderstanding of karma that promotes the it\u2019s-all-your-own-fault mindset just\nto satisfy our demand of fairness based on the crude conception that all is\nfair if everyone gets what he deserves. Good karma or bad karma affects the\nwhole society.</span> &nbsp;&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nSanatana Dharma\nhas never allowed a Hindu to be selfish and leave out society or even\nflora/fauna from the equation.&nbsp; &nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The questions of \u201cWhy me?\u201d and \u201cWhy\nnot me?\u201d arise in the minds of JOHN GALT type of ego driven selfish individuals.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/back-swing-of-john-galt-capt-ajit.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/back-swing-of-john-galt-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Hindu knows , it is\nimpossible to be selfish and happy \u2013as he is programmed to use his conscience.\nA Hindu family is happier as relationships have never been hinged on selfish\nreasons.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No Hindu woman will divorce her\nLOSER husband because he lost his job . LOSER concept is not a Hindu concept. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Caring is what made a Hindu a vegan.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Communism\nwas designed by Rothschild for selfish atheists \u2013and this is why wherever Communism\nwent bloodbath and corruption followed. &nbsp;&nbsp;In Sanatana Dharma we do NOT run after\nhappiness like the white man, rather we allow happiness to overtake us and alight\non us \u2013we know it happens when we deserve it.</span>&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Happiness is\nFREE. It is about filling up the space deep inside, or gratification of the\nsoul.</span> &nbsp;&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Freedom from unnecessary want ( to\nkeep up with the Joneses ) is the greatest liberator.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Such liberated people are\nNOT found in PAGE 3 parties \u2013 they will NOT curtsy to kosher Prince Williams\nand his wife Kate at the Taj.</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All things of great value are\nabsolutely free, given an received in silence without an audience<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: yellow;\">Below: &nbsp;APUN DHANNYA HO GAYA &nbsp;-- PATHETIC !</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: yellow;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-QH7w414BFuc/VzA4QOQ2WiI/AAAAAAABIKg/8sKctLUTFtgPCQiIIES-xn3zUAM3wz1EQCLcB/s1600/B_Id_437830_dShobhaa_De.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Contrary &nbsp;what the white man thinks , karma helps a\nHindus to live his life by design\u2014 and never by &nbsp;default.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;A petty western mind with a\nclosed heart will never understand this.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Hindu sleeps well at\nnight, because he has a clean conscience \u2013 for he has never stitched up anybody\nand that includes flora/ fauna. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Sanatana Dharma is clear with conscience powered\nguidelines ( not rules \u2013 there is NO need for a Hindus to over analyze and then\ndeclutter his mind or tonsure the past with booze and drugs.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Hindu has the\nunique abilty to play a bad hand well. This is why a poor Hindu is happy. &nbsp;Have you seen how rip-roaring our festivals\nare . &nbsp;Check out the zest and enthusiasm for\nsimple things of life . Have you seen an Indian crowd during a cricket game ? &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kindness, generosity,\npatience, tolerance, humility, fairness , helping others to grow and reach\ntheir potential -- all create happiness. &nbsp;A Hindu does NOT allow beautiful things to own\nhim. &nbsp;Happiness is NOT in the mundane,\nbut in the deep ocean of happiness that lies beneath. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I would rather go to\nbuy veggies and fruits with my wife or play a game &nbsp;with my son , rather than go to Taj and meet\nPrince Charles , hoping that my mug will come in the next days newspaper.&nbsp; &nbsp;Dignity\nconsists not in possessing honors, but in the consciousness that we deserve\nthem.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All seasons are\nbeautiful for the person whose happiness comes from within. The happiness of a\nman in this life lies in the mastery of his passion<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AFTER THE GAME OF LIFE\n, THE KING AND THE PAWN GOES INTO THE SAME BOX--&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; WHAT IS ALL THIS BULLSHIT&nbsp; ONE-UP-MANSHIP WHILE ALIVE ?&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALL OF US ARE IN RAFTS\nON A RAPID RIVER HEADING FOR THAT PLUNGE DOWN THE WATER FALL OF DEATH&nbsp; --&nbsp; THE\nONLY THING&nbsp; 100% SURE !!<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">In an\nancient Gurukul at the age of 25, the student completes his education. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">He now\nenters the GRIHASTA stage and&nbsp; must\nproceed home to his parents , to get married , raise a family, be creative and\ndo good to society.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; <o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; <o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-aCqfa1IBnaA/VzBPFHTNBFI/AAAAAAABIK4/g8ih2njmT1oDTRE65-dhm4HXbQPR4Mh2QCLcB/s1600/imrrrrtEages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>These\ntwo words remind the student of the LAWS OF KARMA.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>That\nhis soul ( a tiny ball of energy ) within him is who is really is.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>That\nthis ball of energy is part of mother energy field brahmAn\u2014the morphonegetic\nconsciousness field&nbsp;( GOD ) &nbsp;, which cannot be\ndetected by the 5 human senses.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only when you are\nre-inducted back on earth in another body form ( as human ) do you regain your\npower over Karma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma names the\nuniversal principle of cause and effect, action and reaction, which Hindus\nbelieve governs all consciousness.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\nKarma is not fate, for we act with what can be described as a\nconditioned free will creating our own destinies.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-qInb7Fbntd8/VzBjVSOvcvI/AAAAAAABIME/M9LTaYQQLpwcJonW5fxTakTfEXrHy1B-gCLcB/s1600/imsages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Human beings can lessen\n/ increase the accumulated karmic baggage ( SANCHITA ) in four ways:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Through thoughts&nbsp; ( a pujari who ogles at a woman\u2019s cleavage\nwhen she bows down to receive prasadam , accumulates bad karma even as he sits\non his mangy ass in the temple ) <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Through right attitude\nwords <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Through actions that we\nperform ourselves&nbsp; ( it hardly matters if\nyou hide and do it )<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Through actions others\nperform under our instructions or influence<o:p></o:p></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-pzF2yZni4Wc/VzBg6j6DMpI/AAAAAAABILw/IPJbHdOV_60dHHM-qZTl9TbL4EPoWQ8dACLcB/s1600/C0637991-F554-4E2fE-8180-8E8AC092F1AF.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-pzF2yZni4Wc/VzBg6j6DMpI/AAAAAAABILw/IPJbHdOV_60dHHM-qZTl9TbL4EPoWQ8dACLcB/s640/C0637991-F554-4E2fE-8180-8E8AC092F1AF.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Everything that we have\never thought, spoken, done or caused is karma.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nKarma ( literally means deed ) refers to the totality of our actions and\ntheir concomitant reactions in this and previous lives, all of which determine\nour future.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The lessening of karmic\nbaggage lies in intelligent action and dispassionate reaction. Not all karmas\nrebound immediately. Some accumulate and return unexpectedly in this or other\nlifetimes. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-XYDm_vrZF0c/VzBgSqASWpI/AAAAAAABILo/pLSMvH-TaJkRfJb1tikHCfCsQ9xoXL1TACLcB/s1600/downeload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-XYDm_vrZF0c/VzBgSqASWpI/AAAAAAABILo/pLSMvH-TaJkRfJb1tikHCfCsQ9xoXL1TACLcB/s400/downeload.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Karma refers to the totality of our actions\nand their concomitant reactions in this and previous lives, all of which\ndetermine our future.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Small children who has\nNOT developed an ego , do NOT accumulate bad karma. These small children less\nthan 27 months of age , are buried \u2013NOT cremated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<i><br /></i>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/AdmCdMO_XNQ/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/AdmCdMO_XNQ?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<i><br /></i>\n<i><br /></i>\n<i>Below: Bhagawat Gita talks about &nbsp;Karma</i><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Ku31271cmg0/VzBelWFFzQI/AAAAAAABILc/jdEmbKN_GigNeBjhpR7-fxHQ5imeZN9hACLcB/s1600/the-bhagavad-gitea-15-728.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Ku31271cmg0/VzBelWFFzQI/AAAAAAABILc/jdEmbKN_GigNeBjhpR7-fxHQ5imeZN9hACLcB/s640/the-bhagavad-gitea-15-728.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<i style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></i>\n<i style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Below: &nbsp;Wisdom 6000 years ago in the middle of the battlefield of Kurukshetra , when the white man did GRUNT GRUNT for language -- &nbsp;these people invaded India and then called us savages.&nbsp;</i><br />\n<i style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></i>\n<i style=\"background-color: cyan;\">They claimed that they are ARYANS who invented Sanskrit and wrote all our ancient books. &nbsp; In this DNA age , this foul lie is nailed .</i><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Qbaa2HxFkDk/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/Qbaa2HxFkDk?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Y9I0g9kyvqc/VzBlxHKmjgI/AAAAAAABIMY/nfU5DRDmw2QY6SbtDB-kvAKcz0EySZvugCLcB/s1600/Cycle-of-Kargma.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Y9I0g9kyvqc/VzBlxHKmjgI/AAAAAAABIMY/nfU5DRDmw2QY6SbtDB-kvAKcz0EySZvugCLcB/s400/Cycle-of-Kargma.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-G5INRhliM0k/VzBmPCB8ZrI/AAAAAAABIMc/vGk56m52UWY9qbOMsNL3U8psOhCpjVsBQCLcB/s1600/thoeughts.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-G5INRhliM0k/VzBmPCB8ZrI/AAAAAAABIMc/vGk56m52UWY9qbOMsNL3U8psOhCpjVsBQCLcB/s640/thoeughts.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Samkaras are subtle\nimprints (impressions) that are made in the mind-stuff (chitta) whenever we do\nactions (consciously).&nbsp; Impressions are\nnot memories.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;Memories are formed from impressions just\nlike a photograph is developed from a negative.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;&nbsp;Generally, we only retain\nmemories from recent impressions. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Yet, we have countless impressions (samskaras)\nfrom many, many lives.&nbsp; Most of these\nimpressions no longer have memories associated with them. &nbsp;&nbsp;In\nother words, the impressions (samskaras) from many, many lifetimes are\naffecting us but we do not generally know how or why they affect us because we\nhave no recollection of the actions that caused the impressions. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A conscious\naction-whether cognitive, affective or conative-assumes a potential and hidden\n(Sukshma and Avyakta) form just below the threshold of consciousness. This is\ntermed a Samskara. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Samskaras (impressions)\nare embedded in the subconscious mind or Chitta. You can recall the past\nexperiences from the storehouse of Samskaras in the subconscious mind. The past\nis preserved even to the minutest detail. Even a bit is never lost. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the fine Samskaras\ncome up to the surface of the conscious mind back again as a big wave, when the\npast Vritti comes back to the surface of the conscious mind again by\nrecollection, it is called memory or Smriti. No memory is possible without the\nhelp of Samskara. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is no gap between\nthe present experience and the formation of a Samskara in the subconscious\nmind. A specific experience leaves a specific Samskara. The memory of this\nspecific experience springs from that particular Samskara only, which was\nformed out of that particular experience. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When all Vrittis or\nthoughts die away, the frame of the mind remains with the Samskaras. This is\ntermed the Potential Mind. In Vedantic parlance, it is called Antahkarana\nMatra. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All Samskaras co-exist\nin the mind. The Vrittis slowly subside and leave traces in the mind. These\ntraces are the Samskaras. From these Samskaras springs memory.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The subconscious mind\ndoes not think\u2014it is only a store house of our experience. It has no sense of\ntime. It cannot differentiate between positive and negative input. It cannot\ntell the difference between real and imagines experience.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The conscious mind can\nbe engaged 100% in talking or deep thinking while the subconscious keeps the\ncar on the road. The conscious and subconscious minds are connected through a\nfilter. So we cant read the contents of our subconscious mind<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many people ask me \u2014 HOW\nDO YOU KNOW ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To avoid an elaborate\nanswer , I say \u2014FROM Me GENOME<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/mind-over-matter-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/mind-over-matter-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brain is not capable of\ndistinguishing between reality and memory\u2014the same neurons are sparked when we\nsee something as when we merely remember it. Brain cannot distinguish between\nan image of experience and one of vivid imagination. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The subconscious mind\ncannot tell the difference between a real experience and one that you vividly\nimagine. You can fool it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You can participate in\nan orgy or think of an orgy, your wee willie winkie will give the same standing\novation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Any passing comment or\ntrivial statements can have a devastating effect on our subconscious mind\nbecause it is not argumentative or analytical. It accepts all statements\ndirectly on the face value. Even prayers and beliefs are positive signals which\nwe give to our subconscious mind as something acceptable and true.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Subconscious, mental\nactivities within an individual proceed without his awareness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The conscious mind has\nlimited memory. The subconscious mind has unlimited memory.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Subconscious mind never\nsleeps even in a coma. The Subconscious has a tendency to accept what it\nimagines as real. &nbsp;&nbsp;Just to say , what it\ntakes to lessen your Karmic baggage .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thinking is not an\naction of the mind , but an action of our entire body. Tell your subconscious\nwhat you want repeatedly and it will produce it. You can call this\nvisualization or intention.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The subconscious has a\nperfect memory. Every thing you have experienced using your 5 senses is part of\nthe permanent memory of the subconscious mind, which never sleeps The\nsubconscious mind acts on old beliefs stored over a lifetime. Many of those\nbeliefs you may have accepted without thinking. Or you may have absorbed them\nwhen you were too young to exercise choice.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ancient Maharishis\nknew the workings of the mind<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Persons who can do self\nhypnosis has discovered the secret of successful living. All hypnosis is self\nhypnosis.\u2014no one can hypnotise you against your will. There is no loss of\nconsciousness in hypnosis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hypnosis is an altered\nstate of consciousness, during which the conscious critical mind is relaxed and\nrelatively inactive, and the doorway to the subconscious, inner mind is opened\nwith a person\u2019s permission. A hypnotist talks directly to the subconscious\nmind, without interference from reasoning .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Truth serums are also used in\npsychiatry to help patients speak more freely during psychoanalysis because\nthey help the patient release many thoughts locked in the subconscious.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The subconscious mind\nis protective. Hypnotized people will accept suggestions that are acceptable,\nand reject suggestions that are not acceptable. a person is in Hypnosis, he is\nnot asleep. He or she is very much aware of all that is going on. In actuality,\nin Hypnosis, one\u2019s senses become heightened and more acute. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hypnosis is not a truth\nserum. Subjects in Hypnosis reveal no secrets in the Hypnotic State that they\nwould not reveal (because they want to) in the Waking State. Hypnosis is a\ncooperative and collaborative relationship. The subject retains full control\nand responsibility for his or her actions at all times.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The hypnotized subject\nor patient is NOT asleep. He is relaxed, comfortable, focused, and in a state\nof daydream type thinking. His analyzing thinking mind (Conscious mind) is\nturned off and his feeling and intuitive and creative mind (Subconscious) is\naware of everything that is going on. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A hypnotized subject\ncannot be made to do anything he is not willing to do. If a person is not\nwilling to cooperate, he cannot be hypnotized. Hypnosis is NOT about the\nhypnotist controlling the patient. It is about the patient gaining more control\nover himself.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IF YOU CAN DO SELF\nHYPNOSIS YOU CAN BE A SUPER ACHIEVER<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once the hpnotic State\nis induced and the doorway to the subconscious mind is opened, with your\npermission, the competent hypnotist can provide information, in a language and\nform that the subconscious can accept, to help you change the behaviors,\nfeelings and thoughts that you want to change.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We utilize the fact that the subconscious mind has the ability (actually the tendency) to accept what it\nimagines as real.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Subconscious mind has a\nmemory of 100 trillion images, all our experiences, emotions and feelings are\nstored as an image or a sound in a digitised manner . Data that cannot be\nrecalled are retained in the subconscious. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A person may be\nunconscious of ever having been locked in a closet as a child, yet under\nhypnosis he may recall the experience vividly.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/fd7e1fXYIuM/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/fd7e1fXYIuM?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Negative suggestions\nwith growing children gets rooted in their subconscious mind and is reflected\nlater in their behavior. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During hypnosis \u2013our\nconscious mind goes into a trance and suggestions are given directly to the\nsubconscious mind, which cannot argue but accepts the suggestion at its face\nvalue.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We do self hypnosis\nunknowingly several times an a day while doing our day to day activities. This\nis how our body learns to relax otherwise we would die of stress at a very\nearly age. Any monotonous sequence of events make it boring for the brain and\neventually it starts producing a hormone called Serotin which induces a drowsy\nstate of mind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When one Samskara or\nvirtuous action comes into play, another Samskara of dissimilar nature may\nemerge out and come in the way of its fulfilment. This is fight between a\nvirtuous and a vicious Samskara.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you try to fix\nyour mind on God and think of purity, just at that moment, all evil thoughts\nand Samskaras burst forth with violence and vengeance to fight against you.\nThis is termed 'crowding of Samskaras'. Good Samskaras also crowd together and\nhelp you to drive out evil Samskaras<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you are born, the\nmind is not a blank sheet of white paper. It is a storehouse of Samskaras,\npredispositions, predilections, etc. A child is born with his Samskaras.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A child is born with\nhis past experiences transmuted into mental and moral tendencies and powers. By\nexperiences, pleasant and painful, man gathers materials and builds them into\nmental and moral faculties. The earthly experiences are worked up into\nintellectual faculty<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mind evolves\nthrough the impressions received from the universe through the senses. It will\ntake many bodies till it gathers the complete experience of the world. Every\nman is born with his inborn or inherent Samskaras and these Samskaras are embedded,\nlodged or imprinted in the Chitta which is the seat for Prarabdha.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In earthly\nlife, he gains many more Samskaras or experiences through actions and these are\nadded to the original store and become the future Sanchita Karmas (accumulated\nactions).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All Samskaras lie\ndormant in the Chitta as latent activities, not only of this life but of all\nprevious innumerable lives from Anadi Kala (beginningless time).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The gross body and the\nmind have, on account of your past Karmas, a tendency to act in a certain way\nand you act just in accordance with that tendency like a machine. Most of your\nactions are done more or less automatically.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your next life will depend very\nlargely upon the Karma you perform in this birth. From Samskaras emanate\nVasanas like swarms of locusts. From Vasana flows the stream of desire and from\nenjoyment of objects of desires arises Trishna or internal craving (intense\nlonging).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Trishna is very powerful. The Samskaras are imbedded in the mind, in\nthe Karana Sarira. Who is your real enemy? It is your own evil Samskaras.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Try\nto acquire some good spiritual Samskaras in this birth at least. Do some kind\nof meditation for a short time daily. New, healthy Samskaras can be implanted\nby new, healthy suggestions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The physical body may\ndie. But, the thoughts and Samskaras of actions, enjoyments and thinking follow\nyou after death till you attain Moksha.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Flattery makes you feel\nall puffed up and great about yourself.&nbsp;\nYou feel like the cat\u2019s whiskers . But this is a set up so you\u2019ll agree\nmore easily to whatever corny request or proposal which will comes next.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You are more likely to\nmake a bad decision when you are sort of feelin\u2019 overconfident.&nbsp; Flattery is one sure way to build your\nconfidence.&nbsp; Old women are more\nvulnerable to this.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A con man will build up\na need in you. And the funny part is you would have never felt this need till\nthen.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A compliment is normal,\nbut flattery is not.&nbsp; Flattery is\nnormally a prelude to an unusual or out-of-the-ordinary request. The con man\nknows that he can get into the dark alley of your basest desires. The main\nthing that really makes people susceptible to con artists is the idea that\nwe're going to get something for nothing.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A con man works on the principle that\nmost humans want to have an unfair edge over other people.&nbsp; He now forces you to judge the book , he has\nworked his ass off in bringing to you,&nbsp;\nby its cover.&nbsp; Your needs and\ndesires make you vulnerable.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once hustlers know what you need, they can easily\nmanipulate you. If you don\u2019t have a need they will force your greed and\nperceived scarcity,&nbsp; to give instant\nillegitimate birth to a need.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They thrive on the\nsimple fact that people tend to believe only what they want to believe.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALMOST ALL EVANGELISTS\nARE CONMEN<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The missionaries who\ncome to convert you are con men of the first order too.&nbsp; He will exploit your need for salvation and\nto live forever in divine luxury in heaven . He will pretend to be God\u2019s\npersonal agent with the right to lock and unlock the gates to heaven.&nbsp; Basically a con man is a psychopath.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Psychopaths do NOT possess the ability to show\nempathy for others and they have no feeling of guilt in scamming a harmless\nblind lady .&nbsp;&nbsp; The con man is always on\nthe prowl for blind spots and shadow sectors to exploit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The con man is good in\nmaking the victim feel bad and guilty for questioning , after all the \u201ctrust\u201d\nthat has been built up.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They are mean and\nself-absorbed and believe that anything they do justifies a positive outcome\nfor themselves. They can\u2019t imagine or don\u2019t care about the consequences their\nactions have for the people they may hurt.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They rationalize away\nany concern that they are harming other people . What\u2019s good for them is, by\ntheir definition, what\u2019s good\u2026 period--end of story.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The con man is an\nexpert in pushing the victim headlong into a \u201cguilt trap \u201c for asking any\nskeptic questions , after all ze \u201ctrust\u201d that has been built up. A con artist\nwill identify your needs and expectations, then pretend that he is the only\nagent capable of producing the satisfaction you need.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE SHOW MUST GO ON (\nsic!\u2014puke! ) IS&nbsp; A&nbsp;ROTHSCHILD CLICH\u00c9<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A con man is the\nnon-violent version of an intelligent&nbsp;\npsychopath.&nbsp; Unlike his physically\nviolent cousin the conman hurts mentally terribly in the end by misleading\nsweetly before.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We cannot control our\npast samskaras because they have been automatically created as a result of our\npast actions.&nbsp;&nbsp; So how do we &nbsp;stop our past samskaras from controlling us?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The answer is found in\nthe practice of YOGA which reveals that the way to break the karmic cycle is to\ninterrupt the cycle at the VRITTI level. &nbsp;&nbsp;Patanjali defines Yoga as thus:&nbsp; &nbsp;Yoga\nis the restriction (control) of the modifications of the mind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the &nbsp;opening verse of the Yoga Sutras, CHITTAVRITTI\nrefers to the various thoughts (or thought-forms) of the mind, which are\nclassified into five types:&nbsp;
