<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(1) thoughts about\ntruth, i.e., analysis of wisdom; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(2) thoughts based on\nincorrect perception; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(3) thoughts which have\nno basis in reality, for example, \u2018day-dreaming\u2019, verbal delusion (talking to\noneself in one\u2019s mind or vocally, but making no sense, i.e., having no basis in\nfact), and uncontrolled imagination; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(4) the dream-sleep\nstate of mind; and <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(5) memories.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By practicing the\neight-fold (Astanga) YOGA, comprised of YAMA, NIYAMA, ASANA, PRANAYAMA,\nPRATYAHARA, DHARANA, DHYANA, and SAMADHI, one attains the highest state of\nconsciousness and is freed from ignorance and egocentricity (which are the\ncause of one\u2019s pain and suffering).&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One\ngains complete mastery of the mind and is absolutely no longer controlled\n(motivated or moved) by one\u2019s samskaras (past impressions).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/08/ashtanga-vinyasa-yoga-vagus-nerve.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/08/ashtanga-vinyasa-yoga-vagus-nerve.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">VASANA IS THE SENSE OF\nTHE SUB-CONSCIOUS MIND OR LATENT TENDENCIES OF ONEs NATURE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Samskaras, experiential\nimpressions, combine in the subconscious to form vasanas, which thereafter\ncontribute to mental fluctuations, called vritti. The most complex and\nemotionally charged vasanas are found in the dimension of mind called vasana\nchitta (the subsubconscious).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When your sould has\nleft your cadaver behind after death, it will be parled on on of the bottom 6\nastral layers.&nbsp; &nbsp;YOU ( soul ) retains Vasanas or subtle\nimpressions which you will take with you into your next live body on earth<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vedanta operates from\nthe level of the vasanas as well as from levels that are even more subtler than\nvasanas. The white man has tried to do past life regressions with very little\nsuccess .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vasanas govern the\nactions of the physical body through the process of becoming thoughts; thoughts\nbecoming desires and desires manifesting as actions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The latent impressions\nor vasanas will start functioning when the soul enters a new body on its next induction\non earth . &nbsp;It is like a seed which has\nthe potential of a huge tree stored within the seed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SABARIMALA PILGRIMAGE\nHAS BEEN SUCCESSFUL IN AMPUTATING VASANA&nbsp;\n. THIS IS WHY IT IS THIS PLANETS NO 1 PILGRIMAGE.&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE JEALOUS WHITE MAN\nIS TRYING HIS BEST TO DECIMATE THIS PILGRIMAGE USING HIS TROJAN HORSE NGOs<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/sabarimala-makaravilakku-three-light.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/sabarimala-makaravilakku-three-light.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sama is peace of mind\nproduced by the eradication of the Vasanas. If you have Sama, you will get the\ncompany of the other three friends, viz., Santosha (contentment), Vichara\n(enquiry into Atman) and Satsanga (association with the wise and saintly).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mind is nothing but\na cluster of Vasanas or past impressions and subtle desires that persistently\nlurk within the sub-conscience. A man who is about to get moksha after death\nhas NIL vasanas.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the Vasanas are burnt with their seeds the mind vanishes\ninto the Immortal Seat of Brahman.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 7000 year old Upanishad\nsays, \"when the senses do not work and stand together with the mind, and\nwhen the intellect is still, that, they say is the Highest State\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The daily selfish\nactions of the Jiva add to the stock of these Vasanas and thus the embodied\nexistence becomes unbroken, and the wheel of birth and death rolls on\nceaselessly. The emptying of these Vasanas demands a twofold counter-activity\nby the Jiva. The first one is to stop the adding of newer Vasanas and the\nsecond is the destruction of the existing ones.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The first purpose is\nserved by beholding the Self in all beings, by rendering selfless service to\nother fellow beings, by devotion to the Deity and by severe concentration of\nthe mind. The second one is effected when the mind is completely thinned out\nand when the Self is realised.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vasana is the cause of\nrestlessness of mind and ego. It is the Vasana in the mind that causes\nattraction towards objects and brings about bondage; with the disappearance of\nVasanas, bondage naturally vanishes. It is the Vasana that is at the bottom of\nall your miseries and troubles and your desire to attend PAGE 3 parties <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you destroy egoism\n(Ahankara, this false little 'I') and control the Indriyas (the senses), the\nVasanas will die by themselves.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Samadhi or blissful\ndivine experience arises when the ego and the mind are dissolved. It is a state\nto be attained by one's own effort. It is limitless, divisionless and infinite,\nan experience of being and of pure consciousness.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;When this experience is\nrealised, the mind, desires, actions and feelings of joy and sorrow vanish into\na void. Complete annihilation of the Vasanas takes place only in Nirvikalpa\nSamadhi. Only Nirvikalpa Samadhi can completely fry up the seeds of impure\nVasanas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With the extinction of\nall Vasanas, the undaunted mind will get quiescence like a gheeless lamp.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the threads , the\nwarp and weft of Vasanas are destroyed the canvas of the mind also disappears\nfrom existence. The soul is drowned in bliss nay-the ocean of joy- Satchidananda\nis attained.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In this state supreme silence alone is. The mind becomes quiescent\ndue to the exhaustion of Prarabdhas even as a lamp unfed by oil gets naturally\nextinguished. The zenith of being is the cessation of thought, change and\naction. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you are\nestablished in the highest Nirvikalpa Samadhi you have nothing to see, nothing\nto hear, nothing to smell and nothing to feel<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is a getting of\neverything at once, the living of the infinite life, the highest freedom, the most\nsupreme blessing, the greatest happiness and limitlessness of Knowledge<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TURIYA means \u201cconsciousness\nminus thinking\u201d . It represents consciousness free from material influence or\nsupreme consciousness . In Turiya there is the absolute awareness . It is the\nexperience of ultimate reality and truth.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Turiya, the self does not think, feel, or do, but rather observes\nthought, emotion, and action capable of truly understanding the totality of the\nuniverse.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Turiya has no limits and no endpoint. It is infinitely transcendent,\nwhich means its potential is forever expanding.&nbsp;\nYou are now a unique individual and you are a vital part of a larger\nuniversal life force that transcends everything on earth..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reality and truth\nbecome more clearly defined, allowing you to perceive that which lies above,\nbelow, and beyond the human experience.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This utterly quiet,\npeaceful and blissful state is the ultimate aim of all spiritual activity this\nhighest state is not affected by Maya The Waker, The Dreamer, The Deep Sleeper\nand The Observer<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You experience\ndetachment and joy .&nbsp; Turiya\nConsciousness&nbsp; is the ultimate goal of\nspirituality for here you know what freedom is all about.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The dot, point, or\nbindu of OM symbol represents the fourth state, the absolute consciousness,\nwhich encompasses, permeates, and is the other three\u2014this is Turiya. (Silence\nafter A, U, and M of OM Mantra)&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A saint is a very ordinary guy.. A sage is the\nextraordinary being. A sage does not dream, because he has no polarity. He\u2019s\njust a witness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">OM is the four states of\nconsciousness, as per Patanjali Yoga.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>OM is the waking state\nor jagrat. Beta brain wave<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>OM is the dreaming\nstate or svapna.&nbsp; REM sleep state<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>OM is the deep sleep\nstate or sushupti. (dream-less deep sleep state , the delta brain wave)<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Om is the\ntranscendental state or turiya. (beyond all the states) , the fourth has been\ncalled nirvana.</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Four stages:\nconsciousness plus thinking is waking, consciousness minus thinking is turiya,\nunconsciousness plus thinking is dreaming, unconsciousness minus thinking is\nsleep.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-YYfR_EOxjFQ/VzB6TnCID8I/AAAAAAABIMw/hMujyGNOoBQfjLqV0igZ-pNPmuStJ_OwwCLcB/s1600/imagesCAWLf6LND.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-YYfR_EOxjFQ/VzB6TnCID8I/AAAAAAABIMw/hMujyGNOoBQfjLqV0igZ-pNPmuStJ_OwwCLcB/s400/imagesCAWLf6LND.jpg\" width=\"309\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Finally, the\nsemi-circle symbolizes Maya and separates the dot from the other three curves.\nIt is the illusion of Maya that prevents us from the realization of this\nhighest state of bliss. The semi-circle is open at the top and does not touch\nthe dot. This means that this highest state is not affected by Maya. Maya only\naffects the manifested phenomenon.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Turiya thoughts\nsubside and one becomes increasingly more awake; the mind settles down and\nconsciousness itself becomes primary. Mediators describe this as pure\nconsciousness or unbounded awareness. One sees the entire world and all things\nwithin it as part of oneself, and oneself part of all.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Turiya&nbsp;\nis a state of transcendence, the result of arduous meditation.&nbsp; There can be no consciousness without passage\nthrough intense pain. The Upanishads equates this experience with\nenlightenment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We ordinary people lack\ncontact with our fourth state of consciousness, and so we fail to live up to\nour potential as human beings. Turiya is the totality of everything, and the\nheadwaters from which all consciousness flow. It is said in the Mandukya\nUpanishad. It is \u201cunseen, transcendent, the sole essence of the consciousness\nof self, the completion of the world.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yogis attempt to fully\nrealize the state of Turiya through practice, engaging in sound resonance,\nbreathing exercises, and body forms. Turiya yoga emphasizes a complete freedom,\nrejecting force and power, and instead embracing the ideal of a universal\nharmony.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Turiya is the Reality\neternal, beyond all phenomena. Turiya is Satchidananda \u2014Existence,\nConsciousness, and Delight.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is here, that a\nhighly advanced seer or a spiritual Grand Master can actually hear the\nsoundless sound, 7.83 hertz ,&nbsp; \u2018 AUM \u2019,\nthe supreme secret of the Creator .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Turiya there is\ntotal mental clarity, and complete inner peace one recognizes the Self in every\nshining atom of existence The fourth state (turiya) corresponds closely to\ntheta state of brain function.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Turiya is beyond\nSamadhi. Samadhi is sleepless sleep.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is not considered a\nstate in Vedic&nbsp; Indian texts, rather it\nis an absence of states (dualistic or otherwise), and in Turiya; the\npractitioner is able to transcend into advaitya-- Into universal oneness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ancient Vedic\nMaharishis wanted to go beyond nature and realize the transcendental nature of\nman. They dared to take up this challenge and the Upanishads are the unique\nrecord of the methods they adopted, the struggles they undertook and the\nvictory they achieved in this astonishing adventure of human spirit .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The sages who\ndiscovered them had depersonalized themselves in the search for truth. Unlike\nmodern Western philosophers who lift ideas without any understanding and patent\nit in their names.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They had the choice to\nutilize the leisure either to conquer the pleasures outer world or the painful\npassage to the inner.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With their mental\ngifts, they had turned their mental energies to the conquest of the inner world\nrather than of the world of matter and life at the sensate level.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the 7000\nyear old Upanishads we get a glimpse into the workings of the minds of the\ngreat ancient Indian thinkers who were unhampered by the tyranny of religious\ndogma of men who became brokers of Gods or Gods themselves , burnings at the\nstake, political authority, pressure of public opinion, seeking truth with\nsingle-minded devotion, rare in the history of thought.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These Indian sages were\nnot satisfied with their intellectual speculations. They discovered that the\nuniverse remained a mystery and the mystery only deepened with the advance of\nsuch knowledge, and one of the important components of that deepening mystery\nis the mystery of man and consciousness.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Upanishads became aware of this\ntruth, which modern science now emphasizes.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ancient Maharshis\nunderstood the staggering scale of the human mind.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"As flowing rivers\ndisappear into the sea, losing their name and form, thus a wise man, freed from\nname and form, goes to the divine person who is beyond all.\" -<b> Mundaka\nUpanishad iii 2. 5000 BC</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"<span style=\"color: blue;\">The Upanishads\ncontain such godlike fullness of wisdom on all things that I feel the authors\nmust have looked with calm remembrance back through a thousand passionate\nlives, full of feverish strife for and with shadows, ere they could have\nwritten with such certainty of things which the soul feels to be\nsure.</span>\"--<b>A. E. George Russell -Poet, mystic.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<b><br /></b>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild used his\nFAKE and backdated creation Madhavacharya to create the concept of heaven and\nhell in Hinduism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">FAKE Madhvacharya &nbsp;of the FAKE Udipi Mutt divides souls into\nthree classes: one class of souls which qualify for liberation (Mukti-yogyas),\nanother subject to eternal rebirth or eternal transmigration (Nitya-samsarins),\nand a third class that is eventually condemned to eternal hell or Andhatamas\n(Tamo-yogyas).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/05/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_7.html?showComment=1462884069133#c7677403280682068810\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">May 10, 2016 at 6:11 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_120MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi sd,<br />\n<br />\n\" Chitragupta , the deity of kayasthas has the task of deciding heaven or the hell for the humans, depending on their actions on the earth \" wrote the white invader.<br />\n<br />\nTHERE IS NO HEAVEN OR HELL CONCEPT IN HINDUISM<br />\n<br />\nTHE GARUDA PURANA WHICH CONTAINS INFORMATION ABOUT CHITRAGUPTA IS FAKE AND POISON INJECTED.<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILD USED HIS FAKE MUTTS TO PROPAGATE THE FAKE CHITRAGUPTA .<br />\n<br />\nWE IN KERALA NEVER HEARD OF CHITRAGUPTA AND THE KAYASTHAS BEFORE THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA<br />\n<br />\nThe Rig Veda has been INJECTED WITH POISON about sacrifice to be made to Chitragupta.<br />\n<br />\nChitragupta is touted by Rothschild as the first man to give the scrip-it is bullshit !<br />\n<br />\nlet me quote BULL from wikipedia-<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE: Lord Brahma gave the land of the dead over to the god Yama, also known as Dharamraj or Yamraj. Yama would become confused sometimes when dead souls would come to him, and would occasionally send the wrong souls to either heaven or hell. Lord Brahma commanded him to keep better track of everyone, and Yama declared that he could not reasonably be expected to keep track of the many people born of the eighty-four different life forms in the three worlds.<br />\n<br />\nLord Brahma, determined to solve this problem for Yama, sat in meditation for many thousands of years. Finally he opened his eyes, and a man stood before him with a pen and paper. As Chitragupta was born of Lord Brahma\u2019s body, or kaya in Sanskrit, Brahma declared that his children would forever be known as Kayasthas. As he was first conceived in Brahma\u2019s mind, or chitra, and then made whole in secrecy, or gupta, away from the other gods, he was named Chitragupta. UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chitragupta<br />\n<br />\nkayasthas opoortunistically converted to Islam during the moghul rule-- and they were BABUS WHO KEPT RECORDS OF LAND and ACOUNTANTS .<br />\n<br />\nwhen the moghul rule was terminated --some opportunistically converted back to hinduism ( 20 % ) - calling themselves PIR ALI BRAHMINS / KULIN BRAHMINS .<br />\n<br />\nthe rest went to pakistan in 1947 ( 80% ) -- MUSLIM KAYASTHAS ( sunnis ).<br />\n<br />\nrothschild USED these turn coat Hindu opportunists and elevated them to KAYASTHA rank -- which never existed.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Muslim_Kayasths</span><br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD CREATED AND SPONSORED THESE KAYASTHAS<br />\n<br />\nTODAY TRAITORS ARE HEROES , AND THEY ALL ARE IN OUR NCERT BOOKS<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_121b+seed5eQD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_121b+seed5eQD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/04/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_27.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/04/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_27.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">In Sanatana Dharma a man must compulsorily go\nthrough GRIHASTA stage \u2013where he has a wife and children. &nbsp;&nbsp;It refers to the second phase of an man\u2019s\nlife in a four age-based stages of the Hindu ashram system.&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">It follows Brahmacharya (bachelor student)\nlife stage, and embodies a happy married life, with the duties of maintaining a stable home, raising a loving family, &nbsp;educating\none's children to do good to nation and society , and leading a family-centred\nand a dharmic social life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">IN SANATANA DHARMA NO MAN CAN DO A HOMAM (\nYAJNA ) WHEN HE IS IN THE BRAHMACHARYA STAGE .&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">ONLY A MAN WHO IS MARRIED AND HAS CHILDREN CAN DO A YAJNA.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">&nbsp;THIS\nHAS BEEN SUBVERTED BY THE WHITE INVADER AND TODAY WE FIND FAKE GURUS ( MOSTLY HOMOSEXUALS\n) &nbsp;GIVING BULL THAT SAGES MUST BE\nUNMARRIED .&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">THERE IS NO HEAVEN/ HELL CONCEPT IN HINDUISM.\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SINCE I HAVE WRITTEN THIS , EVERY FAKE HINDU\nGURU HAVE CORRECTED THEIR LITERATURE, &nbsp;AND WITHDRAWN THEIR IGNORANT YOUTUBE VIDEOS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">ALL OUR ANCIENT MAHARISHIS WERE MARRIED WITH\nCHILDREN. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;IF YOU FIND ANY LITERATURE THAT A MAHARISHI\nWAS UNMARRIED , &nbsp;IT&nbsp;IS POISON INJECTED.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">THERE IS NO PLACE FOR HOMOSEXUALS IN THE\nSPIRITUAL LIFE OF SANATANA DHARMA . &nbsp; IN ANCIENT INDIAN &nbsp;LITERATURE YOU DO NOT FIND ANY MENTION OF HOMOSEXUALS , DUE TO OUR GOTRA SYSTEM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">SAME WAY IN ANCIENT SANATANA DHARMA KINGS IF\nTHEY DID NOT HAVE CHILDREN, &nbsp;ADOPTED CHILDREN.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">BARREN WOMEN AND UNMARRIED CHILDLESS &nbsp;MEN DO NOT MAKE GOOD RULERS OR SPIRITUAL LEADERS \u2014AS PER SANATANA\nDHARMA.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">\u2014REMEMBER THE WHITE INVADER CONVERTED THIS \u201cBARREN\nWOMB\u201d OR \u201cUNMARRIED / CHILDLESS OLD MAN\u201d HANDICAP TO A FEATHER IN THE CAP.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">Sanatana Dharma gives utmost importance to\nGRIHASTA stage .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Sanatana Dharma has recognized the\npsychological problems associated with barren women/ unmarried men ruling a\nkingdom or being spiritual leaders. &nbsp;&nbsp;It\nis about a personal stake in the future.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A major portion of DHARMA is carried out in the Grihasta stage -- where you are creative and do your DUTY for good of society and nation &nbsp;( age 25 to age 50 ). This is the period when a man demonstrates SELF RESTRAINT &nbsp;.</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>When the scriptural\nstudies appropriate to the student have been completed, and he has received\nblessings of his Guru, let him enter into the order of the Grihastha\n(householder). Let him pursue and obtain, by ethical ways, home, wife, children\nand wealth, discharge to the best of his ability the duties of his life's\nstage. </i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2014<b>\u2009Vishnu Purana, 3.IX.1\n- 3.IX.31 5000 BC</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">IT IS\nTHE LYING WHITE INVADER WHO MADE PRESERVATION OF SEMEN , &nbsp;AND BEING UNMARRIED AS A GREAT QUALIFICATION IN\nHINDUISM \u2013 &nbsp; SANATANA DHARMA BANS IT . .&nbsp;</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">--LIKE\nHOW CHITPAVAN JEWS IMPALE A KALASHA KUMBHAM &nbsp;UPSIDE DOWN DURING GUDI PADWA , AS A GREAT\nTHING &nbsp;( JEW DARLING &nbsp;PM MODI&nbsp;\nHAS MADE THIS FOUL SABOTAGE&nbsp; BY\nJEW ROTHSCHILD , &nbsp;AN EXEMPLARY THING IN\nHIS TWEET ) .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">SORRY PRESERVATION\nOF SEMEN &nbsp;IS ALLOWED ONLY IN THE VANAPRASTA\n( 50 TO 75 AGE \u2013 OPTIONAL &nbsp;, &nbsp;DEPENDS IF HIS WIFE IS WITH HIM ) AND SANYASA\nASHRAM ( 75 TILL DEATH \u2013COMPULSORY &nbsp;).&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">IN\nGRIHASTA STAGE THE MAN IS NOT ALLOWED TO HAVE SEX WITH ANY WOMAN WHO COMES HIS\nWAY , LIKE HOW THE NAMBOODIRIS DID IN KERALA ( SAMBANDHAM ) . &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">HE\nCAN HAVE SEX ONLY WITH HIS WIFE AND CONTINUING HIS LINEAGE IS PART OF HIS\nDHARMA .&nbsp; </b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Our ancient seers and maharishis saw rights\nand responsibilities as two sides of the same coin and decided to emphasize\nresponsibilities and duty over rights,&nbsp;\nwhereas other civilizations emphasized rights.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">They knew that when responsibilities and\nduties are fulfilled, people receive their rights. For example, when parents\nfulfill their duties and responsibilities for their children--their children\nreceive their rights. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The same principle applies for a nation and\nits citizens. Where people live in conformity with their dharma, the individual\nrights of all others are naturally granted.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">IN HINDUISM NOT BEING CREATIVE , NOT DEVELOPING EMPATHY , NOT DOING GOOD\nFOR SOCIETY DURING GRIHASTA STAGE ( AGE 25 TO 50 ) IS BAD KARMA.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;&nbsp;</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">YOU CANNOT SLEEP FROM THE AGE OF 25 TO 50 (\nDOING NOTHING &nbsp;BUT MEDITATE OR TRAVEL ) AND\nLESSEN YOUR KARMIC BAGGAGE .</b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-aM0ZtuNKJDE/VyloFNYbz4I/AAAAAAABIDg/GzZ9-L0zQzohfJVdVACBxSg97XB-_uWoACLcB/s1600/imagres.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; HIS CALLED THIS FAKE CHARACTER MUNDAN MISRA<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE: The debate spanned many days and ranged across many different subjects within the Vedas, and the arguments of both competitors were compelling and forceful. Sankara finally emerged victorious. But Ma\u1e47\u1e0dana's wife, who was the judge, would not accept an ascetic as having complete knowledge since he did not have any knowledge about kama sastras (rules about marital life). &nbsp; <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Sankara was then given a month to research certain aspects of sex-love sciences and then resume the debate.&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">According to legend, he entered into the body of a king who had just died to learn these sciences. (ANAL SEX / ORAL SEX etc )</span></b><br />\nLater, after obtaining the necessary knowledge, the debate resumed. After a long debate, Ma\u1e47\u1e0dana accepted defeat.UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ma%E1%B9%87%E1%B8%8Dana_Mi%C5%9Bra<br />\n<br />\nNARENDRA MODI KEEPS REGULARISING ALL ROTHSCHILDs FAKE STORIES ABOUT HINDUISM -- HE HAS A SPECIAL TALENT AND PENCHANT FOR THIS .<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadaayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_34b+seedETjkD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_34b+seedETjkD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7866133938411337687\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_36M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/18068694220850184230\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Prakash</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/05/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html?showComment=1462349534988#c7866133938411337687\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">May 4, 2016 at 1:42 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_36MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCaptain<br />\n<br />\nIs the Original Kamasutra completely destroyed by the Immoral White Man? , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The King of Panthala\nRajashekaran had found Ayyappa as a handsome baby with a golden chain with a mani\n( bell shaped diamond ) on his neck in the forest, while hunting. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">His queen initially\nadored him, but, when she got a child of her own later, was very worried that\nAyyappa would be the next king, as her husband loved Ayyappa. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">She pretended to be\nsick and told small boy Ayyappa than only the milk of a tiger could cure here.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Ayyappa came back riding\non a mother tiger, with cubs following. <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Noble Ayyappa became\nsad at this obvious conspiracy to kill him , and sacrificed himself to keep his\nfoster mother happy. He disappeared into the forest and swore not to continue\nhis lineage by marrying.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">His Guru had revealed\nto him at a young age that he had divine powers ( which both kept as secret\nwhile he lived in the palace.). &nbsp;He could\nride tigers.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Distraught King\nRajashekara who loved Ayyappa , constructed the Sabarimala temple.&nbsp; Parashurama installed the deity on Jan 14th\nsunset. <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The Makara vilakku is\nan indicator to the Makara Sankranti day pilgrims that their visit is indeed\nacknowledged by Ayyappa , as a visible distant signal of mass blessing ( 3\ntimes ).<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Ayyappa disappeared\nfrom Kerala but resurfaced in Egypt as a man more respected and powerful that\nEgyptian Phaorah .<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/imhotep-patron-saint-of-freemasons-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/imhotep-patron-saint-of-freemasons-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-kVD_ff2gNKw/VynWeCX892I/AAAAAAABIEA/uy6aUjHGwwUTouPbh1R8MmHMsXflq1UGACLcB/s1600/ayyappaa.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-kVD_ff2gNKw/VynWeCX892I/AAAAAAABIEA/uy6aUjHGwwUTouPbh1R8MmHMsXflq1UGACLcB/s400/ayyappaa.jpg\" width=\"302\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Marriage is not merely a\nmatter of social contract entered into for mutual convenience, as is most often\nthe case in the West. It is on the contrary, a religious sacrament.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Its\npurpose, accordingly, is not to allow mere physical pleasure to the individuals\nbut to ensure his spiritual growth. For one , the milk of compassion sprouts as\nsoon as a couple has a baby. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatana\nDharma associates three important aims with vivaha namely, Dharma , Praja and\nRati. Of these, Dharma is given the prime of place. Vivaha is primarily meant\nfor the discharge of one\u2019s Dharma.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Marriage was desired\nnot so much for sex or for progeny as for obtaining a partner for the\nfulfillment of one\u2019s spiritual duties.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is compulsory for a Hindu Grihastha\nto perform the five great sacrifices or Pancha Maha Jajnas in order to repay\nhis debts to the Rishis, the Gods, the names, the spirits and one\u2019s fellowmen.\nSince these can be performed only in the company of a wife, marriage is deemed\na religious obligation.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the reason behind a man being allowed to marry\na second wife on the death of the first during the grihasta stage <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Hinduism son alone\nthat is competent to offer \u2018Pinda\u2019 .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Pinda Daan is done\nthe right way , the deceased soul gets elevated one astral layer\u2014almost like\nhow a army Major becomes a Lt Col on the day he retires ( for better pension )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/11/pitru-paksha-shraadh-pitru-tharpanam.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'times new roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/11/pitru-paksha-shraadh-pitru-tharpanam.html</a><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">RATI or sexual\nfulfillment is assigned a relatively minor place, showing the Hindu\u2019s serious\nconcern with the higher values of the precious human life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Hindu marriage cannot\nbe done in a COMMIE party office or a Govt registrar\u2019s office by swearing an\noath. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AGNI must be sakshi to the seven pheras\n( accompanies by Sanskrit mantras ) &nbsp;with\nparents of the couple, wellwishers and blood relatives throwing flowers and unbroken\nrice ( akshat ) on the couple.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If not so performed,\nthe legal validity of the marriage itself may be called into question.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN PANINIs SANSKRIT DICTIONARY\nTHERE WAS NO WORD FOR DIVORCE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3230942669421177283\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_42M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-size: x-large;\"><b>19.25 %</b></span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_42b+seedEvrDD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_42b+seedEvrDD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE PURPOSE OF SUN IS\nTO SUSTAIN LIFE ON EARTH\u2014BUT IF YOU ASK A RETARD, HE WILL SAY IT IS TO PLAY\nSNAKE AND MONKEY SHADOW GAMES<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Marriage in Sanatana\nDharma is NOT for sexual pleasure.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every Hindus man is compulsorily\nexpected to undergo the \u201cvivaha samskara\u201d and run a family (kutumba). Never\nmind what FREEMASON Vivekananda said .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vedas ordain that\ndharma must be practiced by man together with his wife.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Sanatana Dharma,\nmarriage is a religious duty, and not a civil contract. &nbsp;It is regarded as one of the most sacred of\nthe sacraments symbolizing the holy and indissoluble union of a couple who\nthereafter are mutually dependent and indispensable in the performance of\nreligious duties.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Progeny instrumental to\ncementing a relationship and for bliss.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manu Smriti clearly\nstates that \u201che is a perfect man, who consists of his wife, himself and his\noffspring.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vedas have enjoined\nthat dharma must be observed by man together with his wife. &nbsp;No yagna performed or pilgrimages undertaken\nwill have any effect, if the wife is not a partner in those holy duties during\nthe grihasta and vanaprasta ashramas. &nbsp;During\nSanyasa the man can go for pilgrimage on his own.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mahabharata states that\nonly&nbsp; those that have wives can lead a\nfull life [sriyanvitc]. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The early shastras\npermit unmarried girls to take the whole responsibility upon themselves of\nchoosing their life-mates and enter into wedlock with them. They need to wait\nfor three years only after puberty for some responsible elder to arrange for\ntheir marriage, but no more. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Sanatana Dharma marriages\nare made in heaven , NOT by LIVING IN TOGETHER ( like in the west ) &nbsp;and examining if the wife can indeed give him a\ngood blow job &nbsp;whenever he wants it\u2014</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; The\nonly way was to fuse the vagina by jumping into a fire and getting cremated at the\nsame time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Did Kunti shave her\nhead in Mahabharata? Do we have any reference from scriptures where Tara (wife\nof deceased Vali), &nbsp;Mandodari (the wife\nof deceased Ravana), Uttara (the wife of deceased Abhimanyu) shaving their\nheads , &nbsp;wearing white sarees &nbsp;and living in seculsion? <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Bhishma\u2019s &nbsp;head was hanging, he needed to rest it, and\ntold Arjuna to make some provision. Arjuna immediately stuck 3 arrows beneath\nhis head to support it.&nbsp; &nbsp;Bhishma remarked joyfully - \"What a\nfitting pillow for a warrior like me - a pillow to match the bed !\". Next\nhe asked for water, since he was thirsty.&nbsp;\nDuryodhana in tears , hastened and asked his men to bring water.&nbsp; &nbsp;Bhishma smiled even in his pain and said to\nhim, \"My son, the water I seek is not the water you offer.\"&nbsp;&nbsp; He then looked at Arjuna. &nbsp;&nbsp;Arjuna unleashed a mighty arrow which pierced\ndeep into the ground - and Ganga maiya surged up to pour cool water in the\nparched mouth of her beloved son</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our scriptures have\nadvocated the unmarried brother to marry the wife of a slain warrior . &nbsp;&nbsp;Before the death of the man the brother would\nnot even look at her face in respect. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
