This description\nenables us to discriminate between the things denoted by the name from all\nother things and consequently apply the name to just that class of things.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-YUa7To_AeWw/VyJlblLz_qI/AAAAAAABH9g/wvJQOn-lh3E1Djp_Gq-qneu0gQEnpsLWACLcB/s1600/imaFges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"187\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-YUa7To_AeWw/VyJlblLz_qI/AAAAAAABH9g/wvJQOn-lh3E1Djp_Gq-qneu0gQEnpsLWACLcB/s400/imaFges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One thing common to all\ncases of upamana is the knowledge of the denotative relations, between a word\nand a certain class of objects. Thus upamana is a process of reasoning by which\nwe know that a&nbsp; word denotes a certain\nclass of objects on the basis of some authoritative statement. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-4HqVw99q2Uk/VyJlHZnCIFI/AAAAAAABH9Y/kJTsfg8gb7MuR0bRQ763VZ-QrhfmJV1MQCLcB/s1600/imageBs.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-4HqVw99q2Uk/VyJlHZnCIFI/AAAAAAABH9Y/kJTsfg8gb7MuR0bRQ763VZ-QrhfmJV1MQCLcB/s1600/imageBs.png\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Upamana is the source\nof our knowledge of the relation between a name and things so named or between\na word and its denotation (sanjnasanjnisambandha).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Epistemology is the\nbranch of philosophy concerned with the origins, structure, methods, and\nvalidity of knowledge. In order to theorize about the nature of knowledge,\nepistemologists have often used analogies</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-PatJ4Gzp8ps/VyJk3nekdXI/AAAAAAABH9Q/nROpMgflUAAFSzTgh7F3V0rEZZnSwOEIgCLcB/s1600/imaVges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-PatJ4Gzp8ps/VyJk3nekdXI/AAAAAAABH9Q/nROpMgflUAAFSzTgh7F3V0rEZZnSwOEIgCLcB/s1600/imaVges.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Epistemological\ntheories can be classified as either foundational or coherentist. Foundational\ntheories attempt to ground knowledge in a solid base such as sense experience\n(empiricism) or a priori reasoning (rationalism). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wYGz3zB47_M/VyJkg1mnBrI/AAAAAAABH9I/6LDIjv_-MBArecX-ucHlabin7auw-tQgwCLcB/s1600/imaDges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wYGz3zB47_M/VyJkg1mnBrI/AAAAAAABH9I/6LDIjv_-MBArecX-ucHlabin7auw-tQgwCLcB/s1600/imaDges.jpg\" /></a></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In contrast,\ncoherentists argue that there are no foundations for our beliefs, whose\njustification derives from how well they fit together with each other. Many of\nthe most influential foundationalists and coherentists have expounded and\ndefended their theories using suggestive metaphors and analogies. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-JWVRFUvTtNo/VyJkURBQoVI/AAAAAAABH9E/fns9KzIzeK8RLeEQ9gI9IWXvCKGgRzCdQCLcB/s1600/im88ages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-JWVRFUvTtNo/VyJkURBQoVI/AAAAAAABH9E/fns9KzIzeK8RLeEQ9gI9IWXvCKGgRzCdQCLcB/s400/im88ages.jpg\" width=\"397\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In sum, the uses of\nmetaphor and analogy in epistemology and philosophy in general are much the\nsame as their uses in science. Analogy is a powerful mode of thought that is\nindispensable in the formation, development, evaluation, and exposition of\ntheories, in philosophy as well as science. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 200%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-x8t1axKUTos/VyJhRPQOVgI/AAAAAAABH8s/StuhIs9AvpEwFNGAZKpE3gpgdTzRzNOUACLcB/s1600/d44ownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-x8t1axKUTos/VyJhRPQOVgI/AAAAAAABH8s/StuhIs9AvpEwFNGAZKpE3gpgdTzRzNOUACLcB/s400/d44ownload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Like science,\nphilosophy is primarily theory development, not poetry or rhetoric, even though\nrhetoric and even poetry can sometimes be displayed in both fields.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-GlbO126TMNg/VyJkHbioI_I/AAAAAAABH88/kAP3n1aBJ1MAfvKyInJlORIugFMjINt5gCLcB/s1600/848cd57291a26e74e645405ee6HHb7ec3e.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-GlbO126TMNg/VyJkHbioI_I/AAAAAAABH88/kAP3n1aBJ1MAfvKyInJlORIugFMjINt5gCLcB/s400/848cd57291a26e74e645405ee6HHb7ec3e.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Philosophy\nis not the queen, handmaiden, or under-laborer of the sciences, but rather a\npartner in a collaborative endeavor to understand and improve the world.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">Below: A popular question for orals exams --ASSUMPTIONS SHALL NOT BE BASED ON SCANTY INFORMATION</span></b></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 200%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-GrR5EyMhA-o/VyJjjA12Y1I/AAAAAAABH84/WQHCfgzvhS4O7d3jgE1QKmkHlzG1ePiDgCLcB/s1600/rotr-1-lrge-7-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-GrR5EyMhA-o/VyJjjA12Y1I/AAAAAAABH84/WQHCfgzvhS4O7d3jgE1QKmkHlzG1ePiDgCLcB/s640/rotr-1-lrge-7-638.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 200%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-JSd9rIanjSQ/VyLgARM7kiI/AAAAAAABH90/LQjcO5LfWyIbjWHG2qwJjozMhDK3DmWAACLcB/s1600/downloa99d.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-JSd9rIanjSQ/VyLgARM7kiI/AAAAAAABH90/LQjcO5LfWyIbjWHG2qwJjozMhDK3DmWAACLcB/s400/downloa99d.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">Arthapatti</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"> means\n</span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>postulation.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">THE COLLEGIUM JUDGES OF INDIA MUST BE TRAINED IN VEDIC ARTHAPATTI -- &nbsp;</b></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">THEY RELY TOO MUCH ON \" OBJECTIVE &nbsp;EVIDENCE \" GIVEN IN COURT BY SOLD OUT FAKE WITNESSES &nbsp;, PICKED OUT OF THIN AIR . &nbsp;</b></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">FOREIGN FUNDED TROJAN HORSE NGOs HAVE ALLOWED NAXALS AND CRIMINALS TO GET AWAY . </b></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">TODAY A WHORE CAN COMPLAIN THAT YOU WINKED AT HER AND PUT YOU IN JAIL</b></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 200%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-hDZ3Tkdj-YI/VyLj9u3L3WI/AAAAAAABH-A/SLSQkL2HmVcQrSKk_WoAcPN_2kCEDeaAgCLcB/s1600/e84662538b766217bcd6498dcD77752af.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"298\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-hDZ3Tkdj-YI/VyLj9u3L3WI/AAAAAAABH-A/SLSQkL2HmVcQrSKk_WoAcPN_2kCEDeaAgCLcB/s400/e84662538b766217bcd6498dcD77752af.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Arthapatti is knowledge\narrived at by circumstantial implication. Proof of facts offered as evidence\nfrom which other facts are to be inferred (contrasted with direct evidence ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is about derivation\nfrom circumstances - indirect evidence that tends to establish a conclusion by\ninference.&nbsp; It is statement that is\nagreed by everyone to self evident and hence be correct. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is useful for\ncreating proofs in mathematics and science, and postulates are often the basic\ntruth of a much larger theory or law.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Arthapatti is a\nfundamental principle, a&nbsp;\nprerequisite,&nbsp; a basic principle.\nfrom which a further idea is formed or developed example of a postulate.&nbsp; A line can be drawn between two points.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By the way Euclid ( 300\nBC ).of Alexandria is called the father of Geometry studied in the Kerala\nschool of Math.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>Whatever Euclid has written , 100% is stolen from India&nbsp; and patented in his\nname . </b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I ask \u2013&nbsp; is there a geometry more complicated on this\nplanet than the Sri Yantra which is found in our ancient temples ?&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mind you\nthis geometry is in 2D for idiots and 3D for the cerebral.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/03/theory-of-everything-consciousness-and.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/03/theory-of-everything-consciousness-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 200%; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/DzQ-r2A1G_w/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/DzQ-r2A1G_w?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 200%; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/KLxPUoaBjQ8/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/KLxPUoaBjQ8?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Long ago a tuft named\nVinod Dua told Ram Jethmalani on TV \u2014 all you have is circumstantial evidence. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This\nis NOT enough for courts. &nbsp;&nbsp;We know you have been to Zurich, and this can\nmean that you have a bank account there. We the media will NOT accept your\narguments. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I am a trained journalist like\nyou are a trained lawyer. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ram Jethmalani just\nshut him up with one sentence \u201c If you are my judge I will never win any case!\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In criminal cases,\n\"eyewitness\" (\"I saw Poonam Pandey JI&nbsp; shoot Sunny Leone JI\") type evidence is\noften lacking and may be unreliable, so circumstantial evidence becomes\nessential. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prior threats to the\nvictim, fingerprints found at the scene of the crime, ownership of the murder\nweapon, and the accused being seen in the neighborhood, certainly point to the\nsuspect as being the killer, but each bit of evidence is circumstantial.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In criminal law, the\ninference is made by the trier of fact in order to support the truth of an\nassertion (of guilt or absence of guilt). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Circumstantial evidence\nis used in civil courts to establish or refute liability.. Forensic analysis of\nskid marks can frequently allow a reconstruction of the accident.&nbsp;&nbsp; By measuring the length of such marks and\nusing dynamic analysis of the car and road conditions at the time of the\naccident, it may be found that a driver underestimated his or her speed.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Circumstantial evidence\nis used in criminal courts to establish guilt or innocence through reasoning.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most criminals try to\navoid generating direct evidence.&nbsp; No\ncriminal admits&nbsp; to a guilt.&nbsp;&nbsp; Hence the prosecution usually must resort to\ncircumstantial evidence to prove guilt and that the crime was deliberate , NOT\nan accident.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;One example of circumstantial evidence is the\nbehavior of a person around the time of an alleged offense. If someone was\ncharged with theft of money and was then seen in a shopping spree purchasing\nexpensive items, the shopping spree might be circumstantial evidence of the\nindividual's guilt.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Say. you go&nbsp; to a slum hovel and you find 30 broken gold\nchains and 40 empty expensive mens wallets hidden under a pot.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Other examples of\ncircumstantial evidence are fingerprint, blood analysis or DNA analysis of the\nevidence found at the scene of a crime..&nbsp;&nbsp;\n&nbsp;Owing to developments in forensic\nmethods, old undecided cases (or cold cases) are frequently resolved.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Indian judiciary is\nNOT yet mature enough to understand that live witnesses can lie or be\nbought.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DURING GUJARAT RIOTS\nPAID WITNESS ( BROUGHT OUT OF THIN AIR ) TESTIFIED THAT THEY SAW WITH THEIR OWN\nEYES , A CURVED KNIFE PUT INTO A PREGNANT MUSLIM WOMANs VAGINA AND HER UTERUS WITH\nFETUS WAS REMOVED .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NONE OF THEM COULD EVEN\nDESCRIBE THE PLACE WHERE THE CRIME WAS DONE OR WHAT THE WOMAN LOOKED LIKE OR\nWHAT SHE WORE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A popular misconception\nis that circumstantial evidence is less valid or less important than direct\nevidence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Direct evidence is\npopularly, but mistakenly, considered more powerful. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many successful\ncriminal prosecutions rely largely or entirely on circumstantial evidence, and\ncivil charges are frequently based on circumstantial or indirect evidence.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Circumstantial evidence\ncan be, and often is much more powerful than direct evidence.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Indeed, the common metaphor for the\nstrongest possible evidence in any case\u2014the \"smoking gun\"\u2014is an\nexample of proof based on circumstantial evidence. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Similarly, fingerprint\nevidence, videotapes, sound recordings, photographs, hidden video cams . and\nmany other examples of physical evidence that support the drawing of an\ninference, i.e., circumstantial evidence, are considered very strong possible\nevidence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In practice,\ncircumstantial evidence can have an advantage over direct evidence in that it\ncan come from multiple sources that check and reinforce each other.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Eyewitness testimony can be inaccurate or\nfalse&nbsp; at times,&nbsp; strong circumstantial evidence can provide a\nmore reliable basis for a verdict.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In cases where one\nconclusion implies a defendant's guilt and another his innocence, the\n\"benefit of the doubt\" principle would apply. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Circumstantial Evidence is &nbsp;indirect evidence.. The party offering\ncircumstantial evidence argues that this series of facts, by reason and\nexperience, is so closely associated with the fact to be proved that the fact\nto be proved may be inferred simply from the existence of the circumstantial\nevidence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The following examples\nillustrate the difference between direct and circumstantial evidence:--</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">If &nbsp;Dick testifies that he saw Prick raise a gun\nand fire it at Mary and that Mary then fell to the ground, &nbsp;Dick\u2019s testimony is direct evidence that Prick\nshot Mary. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">If, however, Dick\ntestifies that he saw Prick and Mary go into another room and that he heard Prick\nsay to Mary that he was going to shoot her, heard a shot, and saw Prick leave\nthe room with a smoking gun, then Dick\u2019s testimony is circumstantial evidence\nfrom which it can be inferred that Prick shot Mary.&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The judge must determine\nwhether John's testimony is credible.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Circumstantial evidence\nis most often employed in criminal trials. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Books, movies, and\ntelevision often perpetuate the belief that circumstantial evidence may not be\nused to convict a criminal of a crime. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">But\nthis view is incorrect. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In most cases,\ncircumstantial evidence is the only evidence linking an accused to a crime;\ndirect evidence may simply not exist.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">INDIA IS THE ONLY NATION\nWHERE A WHORE CAN SAY A MAN WINKED AT HER AND CALL THE NCW TO PUNISH THE MAN.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">The U.S. Supreme Court\nhas stated that \"circumstantial evidence is intrinsically no different\nfrom direct evidence \". &nbsp;</b></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If a witness\ntestifies that he saw a defendant fire a bullet into the body of a person who\nthen died, this is direct testimony of material facts in murder, and the only\nquestion is whether the witness is telling the truth ( he could not have been\npresent at the scene and might have agreed to be a witness on a monetary payoff\n) .&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If, however, the\nwitness is able to testify only that he heard the shot and that he arrived on\nthe scene seconds later to see the accused standing over the corpse with a\nsmoking pistol in his hand, the evidence is circumstantial; the accused may\nhave been shooting at the escaping killer or merely have been a bystander who\npicked up the weapon after the killer had dropped it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most criminal\nconvictions are based on circumstantial evidence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a case of a theft,\nexamples of circumstantial evidence include:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Evidence of the\ndefendant's fingerprints at the scene of the crime</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The fact that the\ndefendant was found with a large amount of money without being able to give any\nreason<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the case of a\nmurder, examples of circumstantial evidence include:---<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The fact that the\naccused had an intense dislike of the victim<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The fact that the accused\nbehaved in a bizarre and suspicious way after the offence<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The fact that he or she\nlied about his or her alibi<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The fact that he or she\nwas in the area at the time that the offence was committed<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The fact that the\ndefendant's blood or DNA corresponds to blood or DNA found on the victim's\nbody.</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A court would be very\nslow to convict a defendant on the basis of one piece of circumstantial\nevidence alone, for example, the fact that his or her fingerprints were found\nat the scene of the crime.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For example, in a theft\ncase, if the defendant was seen in the area at the time of the theft, his or\nher fingerprints were found at the scene of the crime and if he or she was\nlater found with a large sum of money that he or she could not explain, then the\ncourt would be more likely to convict the accused.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Generally, evidence can\nbe classified into two categories: direct and circumstantial,. Classic examples\nof direct evidence are eyewitness testimony,&nbsp;\nor hidden cam &nbsp;video of the\ndefendant in the act of committing a crime, and incriminating statements made\nby the defendant, victim, or witness. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unlike direct evidence,\nwhich relies on personal &nbsp;observation and\nyields a definite conclusion, circumstantial evidence is based largely on\ninference and uses inductive reasoning ( arthapatti ) . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indirect or\ncircumstantial evidence implies that the defendant was involved in the crime,\nand is typically sufficient to convict a defendant if the evidence and\ninferences drawn from the evidence can be used to establish that the defendant\nis guilty beyond a reasonable doubt. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the standard of\nevidence used in criminal trials to overcome the presumption that a person is\ninnocent until proven guilty. Thus, evidence need not prove that the defendant\nis absolutely guilty or guilty beyond any question, but rather that there are\nno other logical explanations resulting from the case facts that anyone other\nthan the defendant could have committed the crime. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Guilt can be easily be proven\nusing a process of arthapatti or logical deduction.&nbsp; &nbsp;The\nburden of establishing proof beyond a reasonable doubt is the responsibility of\nthe prosecutor.&nbsp; &nbsp;Real, direct, or physical evidence must be\npresented in court through testimonial evidence to establish a foundation for\nadmissibility.</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Forensic evidence\ngenerated by the wide variety of forensic specialty areas including fingerprint\nidentification and DNA analysis, fall under the category of circumstantial\nevidence &nbsp;.. Scientific evidence is often\nsufficient to resolve a criminal matter. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An exception to\nphysical evidence that does not fall into the category of circumstantial\nevidence includes illicit drugs, which simply by their presence violates a law.\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Consequently, there is no need for a\njudge to make assumptions or inferences to reach a conclusion that the\ndefendant is guilty of a crime. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unlike the incorrect\nexamples perpetuated by television shows, movies, and novels, a majority of\nconvictions are based solely on circumstantial evidence if for no other reason\nthan this type of evidence is more commonly encountered at crime scenes than\ndirect evidence. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In USA they have done\nstatistics and have come to the conclusion that eyewitness identification has\nproven to be mostly unreliable. There is NO system in India to give harsh punishment\nto false witnesses who have taken bribes and appeared out of thin air.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The confession of an\naccused is direct evidence. But the judge must be careful to find out if the\nconfession is under duress.&nbsp; -- that man\u2019s\nchild could have been kidnapped.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">THE JUDICIARY IN INDIA ,\nARE SO POORLY TRAINED ( OR- &nbsp;collegium BRIBED\n) THAT THEY FALL PREY TO HEGELIAN DIALECTIC AND FALSE FLAG ATTACKS 90 % OF THE\nTIME.</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/10/hegelian-dialectic-cancer-on-this.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/10/hegelian-dialectic-cancer-on-this.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">A BIG CHUNK OF\nUNDERTRIALS LANGUISHING IN INDIAN JAILS HAVE BROUGHT PROMOTIONS AND MEDALS TO\nUNIFORMED POLICE.</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/undertrial-prisoners-in-indian-remand.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/undertrial-prisoners-in-indian-remand.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2018Arth\u0101patti\u2019is\ndescribed as the necessary supposition of an unperceived fact which alone can\nexplain a phenomenon that demands an explanation. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">For example it is also observed that a man\ngoes on an indefinite fast and after 10 days he has put on weight .</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">It means he is eating while in the toilet\nwhere the camera is NOT on him. It is impossible to reconcile these two facts,\nfatness and fasting\u2014such </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">postulation is\n\u2018arth\u0101patti.\u2019</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On chemical tankers if\nthere is an accident, the Captain has to take alcometer readings ( drug test if\nCaptain feels it is warranted ) of the crew or officer involved.&nbsp; These alcometers have electronic log records\nwhich cant be deleted. &nbsp;They have to be\ncalibrated every month\u2014we have span gases for this .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The purpose for obtaining\nand developing all this evidence, and trying to ensure its admissibility, is\nfundamental.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 16pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>NEVER ALLOW A MAD MAN LIKE CHARLES DARWIN TO\nENGAGE IN ARTHAPATTI&nbsp; .&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">HE HAD A BAG FULL OF GOODIES --&nbsp;FINCHES , BEAKS AND WHAT NOT!</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>Anupalabdi</b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"> means </span><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">negative-cognitive proof.</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anupalabdhi pramana\nsuggests that knowing a negative, such as \" there is no duster at the blackboard\u201c\nis a form of valid knowledge. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If something can be\nobserved or inferred or proven as non-existent or impossible, then one knows\nmore than what one did without such means.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anupalabdhi as\nepistemically valid \u2013it can be either sadrupa (positive) or asadrupa (negative)\nrelation - both correct and valuable. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vedic sages refined\nAnupalabdi to four types: <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>non-perception of the\ncause, &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></i></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">karana-anupalabdhi</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>non-perception of the\neffect, &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></i></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">vyapaka-anupalabdhi</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>non-perception of\nobject, &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></i></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">svabhava-anupalabdhi</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>non-perception of\ncontradiction. &nbsp;</i><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">viruddha-anupalabdhi</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anupalabdi literally\nmeans non-apprehension. Non-existence of a thing is apprehended by its\nnon-perception.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On automated ships we\nrely on negative affirmation for emergency shut down of machinery.&nbsp; For example zero sump luboil pressure causes\ninterlocks to operate or the engine will seize and cause a fire.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When I hold management\nmeeting on board my ship, I look for negative feedback. I can make instant risk\nassessment and decisions based on this. &nbsp;During emergency drills my senior most and\nbest qualified officers are put as ROVING SQUAD for such negative feedback.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When my company told\nthat this system is NOT part of their blue book and safety policy , I told them\nto FUCK OFF . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When they threatened to\nscrew me for insubordination I unleashed the SWORD OF CAPTAINs AUTHORITY .&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This\nwas later regularized by IMO ( ISM code ) . &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Not many people know how much I worked for this\ntoo happen.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/04/dynamic-risk-assessment-on-chemical.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/04/dynamic-risk-assessment-on-chemical.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-UYsdkla0Pi0/VySwy3SUtqI/AAAAAAABH-0/gB3T85-_SHg2F3LGnjW89E83qs2juaeFACLcB/s1600/dowffnload.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-UYsdkla0Pi0/VySwy3SUtqI/AAAAAAABH-0/gB3T85-_SHg2F3LGnjW89E83qs2juaeFACLcB/s400/dowffnload.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The use of this method of\nknowledge is crucial&nbsp; : &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><b>\u2018 </b><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Pressure guage shows 7 kilos\npressure but there is NO sound of liquid flow in the pipeline - &nbsp;looks like the shore valve is shut</span></i><b> \u201d. &nbsp; &nbsp;</b></span></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-weight: bold; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><b><o:p></o:p></b></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-weight: bold; line-height: 150%;\">Absence of a thing\nestablished by the absence of another is</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-weight: bold; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-weight: bold; line-height: 150%;\">anupalabdi.</span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It may seem paradoxical\nthat non-apprehension of a thing is a means to the apprehension of its\nnon-existence (abhava). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But in fact both\nnon-perception as well as perception serve as a means to get various knowledge,\nfor the simple reason that the knower is conscious of both.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">THERE IS </span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">NO</span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"> WATER IN &nbsp;JEW DARLING MODIs KALASHA KUMBHAM &nbsp;-- &nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>HOW DO YOU KNOW ?</b></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><i>Puurnnashya Puurnnam-Aadaaya\nPuurnnam-Eva-Avashissyate ||<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; text-decoration: none;\">April 30, 2016 at 11:38 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_113MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nDear Sir<br />\n<br />\nIs there any reference to menstruation in the vedas or other hindu scriptures? Why do hindus consider menstruation, child birth, etc as \"Ashuddhi\"?<br />\n<br />\nI'm not a highly spiritual or learned person. I have gone to Sabarimala only thrice. But i find the arguments put up by devaswom layer not very convincing.<br />\n<br />\nAs a common man and a hindu, what i understand is<br />\n1. Lord Ayyappa is a celibate and even his consort is waiting outside the temple. How can the women activist challenge these beliefs.<br />\n<br />\n2. All the pilgrims visiting the shrine are following celibacy or brahmacharya for 41 days by abstaining from sex or sexual thoughts or masturbation. They focus their thoughts only on lord ayyappa and abstain from any influence of sexual thoughts like tv, films, close contact of females, even abstaining from their wife during menstruation.<br />\n<br />\n3. The concept of \"tatvamasi\" means that all the pilgrims are Lord Ayyappan himself. Thats why all the pilgrims who have put mala are considered to be Lord Ayyappan and called Swami. So all the pilgrims are celibate and should not be distracted.<br />\n<br />\n4. Now are women impure during menstruation? I dont have an answer to that because i understand that mentrual blood, child birth, are considered \"Asshudhi\". But on logical thought, sabarimala bans all women who may be sexually active so that the pilgrims who become Swami Ayyappan after putting mala are not distracted.<br />\n<br />\n5. Women activist are saying they will take 42 days vratham and visit sabarimala. I doubt that they can do that. Men can avoid sexual thoughts, sexual acts and prevent release of semen/sperm consciously. Nightfalls during sleep cannot be compared as they are unconscious occurence.But women cannot prevent ovulation and menstruation, which is a normal reproductive cycle. It is medically recognised that during ovulation there are lots of harmones getting released by which there is sexual drive in women to conceive. This biological phenomenon cannot be controlled, moreover the male pilgrims who are normal human beings and not a real God, cannot control his normal sex drive when women come in close contact. All the vratham and brahmacharya will be lost if women are allowed by SC judgement.<br />\n<br />\n6. The women activist are comparing this as bad tradition like Sati. I really dont understand why men like Rahul Easwar cannot tell them that Sati, Dowry death, female infanticide, child marriage, rape, forced polygamy, forced prostitution are atrocities against women. Going to Sabarimala is a choice, women can go to other temples, there is no life threatening force used by males.<br />\n<br />\n7. The women are considering this as discrimination against them. Then reservation is an official discrimination, why do they fight for women reservation bill? Why do they want separate toilets, hostels, coaches, seats in buses, separate teams for men and women, let Sania mirza play against Nadal, let Mary Kom fight with Mike tyson.<br />\n<br />\nSir, i may be wrong by saying all this. But i dont find any Hindu organisation or Ayyappa Seva Sangam coming out with justification and protest against this attempted judicial over reach. I really feel that it is judicial overeach, has the SC judges read all the vedas, upanishads, smrithis and have understood all the diverse customs and traditions followed in hindu way of life.<br />\n<br />\nSir, my humble request to provide more clarity with your great knowledge and wisdom. Also please ask all the right minded hindus to come out and make peaceful protest in their own way to tell the world and SC judges that we are concerned by such indirect attacks on our basic beliefs and to protect Sabarimala.<br />\n<br />\nRegards<br />\nShashi AG<br />\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_113BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; line-height: 22.4px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nDO NOT ALLOW ENEMIES FROM WITHIN DESTROY SANATAN DHARMA.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">DURING 800 YEARS OF SLAVERY OUR ANCESTORS HELD ON TO THE FAITH</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTHEY HELD STEADY DESPITE FEAR OF SWORD AND GREED OF SOPS<br />\n<br />\nPOISON INJECTED INTO OUR SCRIPTURES COULD NOT SHAKE THE FAITH<br />\n<br />\nOUR FAITH SHALL SURVIVE , BE ASSURED WE WILL SURVIVE !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</span><br />\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Long ago we had a cadet\njumping overboard from the ship off Durban.&nbsp;\nHis shoes were laid out neatly at the ships railing.&nbsp; It showed suicide .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The absence of the MDs\ncar in his parking slot means that he has left office .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The absence of the car\nis&nbsp; 'hetu' and conclusion of his absence\nin the office is ' saadhya'.&nbsp; This\nfollows a concomitant relation between the hetu and saadhya -<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anupalabdhi is a way to\napprehend an absence<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All things exist in\nplaces either in a positive (sadrupa) or in a negative (asadrupa) relation, and\nit is only in the former case that they come into contact with the senses,\nwhile in the latter case the perception of the negative existence can only be had\nby a separate mode of movement of the mind, a separate pramana \u2013 anupalabdhi. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The lack of perceptible\n(yogya) adjuncts (upadhi) is known through non-perception of what is\nperceptible (yogya-anupalabdhi) and the lack of imperceptible adjuncts is known\nby showing that which is thought to be an adjunct. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Abhava&nbsp; means non-existence. Abhava-pramana has been\ndiscussed in ancient Hindu texts in the context of Padartha .&nbsp; &nbsp;A\nPadartha is defined as that which is simultaneously Astitva (existent),\nJneyatva (knowable) and Abhidheyatva (nameable).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Specific examples of padartha, &nbsp;include dravya (substance), guna (quality),\nkarma (activity/motion), samanya/jati (universal/class property), samavaya\n(inherence) and vishesha (individuality). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Abhava is explained as\n\"referents of negative expression\" in contrast to \"referents of\npositive expression\" in Padartha.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Abhava was further\nrefined in four types, by the schools of Hinduism that accepted it as a useful\nmethod of epistemology: dhvamsa (termination of what existed), atyanta-abhava\n(impossibility, absolute non-existence, contradiction), anyonya-abhava (mutual\nnegation, reciprocal absence) and pragavasa (prior, antecedent non-existence).<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>Shabda </b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">means </span><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">reliable\nexpert testimony .</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">- he needs NO introduction or production of\nbonafides. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
