, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The yellow ROTHSCHILD Press made the <b><span style=\"color: red;\">TATTU</span></b> Naval Commander a\nknight in shining armour.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/11/altamas-kabir-worst-chief-justice-of.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/11/altamas-kabir-worst-chief-justice-of.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vedic Nyaya school's\nepistemology accepts Shabda<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Authoritative verbal\ntestimony &nbsp;is the statement of a\ntrustworthy person (aptavakya) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A sentence is &nbsp;a collection of words and a word is defined as\nthat which is potent to convey its meaning. The power in a word to convey its\nmeaning comes, according to ancient Nyaya, from long established convention.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Verbal Testimony is of\ntwo kinds:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Vaidika and secular\n(laukika). The Vaidika testimony is perfect and infallible because the Vedas\nare spoken by God; <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Laukika &nbsp;testimony, being the words of human beings who\nare liable to error, is not infalliable.</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A sentence in order to\nbe intelligible must conform to certain conditions. These conditions are four:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. Akanksa: It is\nmutual implication or expectancy. It is the capacity of the words to become\nobjects of enquiry. When we hear a word describing or signifying a course of\naction something of that course of action becomes our object of enquiry. The\nwords of a sentence are interrelated and stand in need of one another in order\nto express a complete sense. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Yogyata: the words should possess the\nfitness to convey the sense and should not contradict the meaning. It is the\ncondition of consistency.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Sannidhi:. The words must be spoken in\nquick secession without any long intervals. If the words \u2018take \u2019, \u2018this, \u2018gift\u2019\nare uttered at long intervals they would not make a logical sentence. &nbsp;It is defined as contiguity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Tatparya: The valid of a sentence depends\non it purport not on its literal meaning. It is the condition of the intention\nof the speaker if the words are ambiguous. &nbsp;In English the same word has different\nmeanings \u2013unlike Sanskrit. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tatparya is\nused to indicate the original intention of the author in putting down a certain\nstatement. Nyaya is a Sanskrit word which means a&nbsp; universal rule which includes natural justice,\nthe science of rational, coherent inquiry and pursuit of real knowledge.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In philosophical\ncontext, Nyaya encompasses propriety, logic and method. Nyaya is related to\nseveral other concepts :--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Hetu-vidya (science of\ncauses), <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Anviksiki (science of\ninquiry, systematic philosophy), <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Pramana-sastra\n(epistemology, science of correct knowledge), <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Tattva-sastra (science\nof categories), <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Tarka-vidya (science of\nreasoning, innovation, synthesis), <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Vadartha (science of\ndiscussion) and <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Phakkika-sastra\n(science of uncovering sophism, fraud, error, finding fakes</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Nyaya metaphysics\nrecognizes sixteen padarthas or categories and includes all six (or seven)\ncategories of the Vaisheshika in the second one of them, called prameya.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These sixteen categories are pram\u0101\u1e47a (valid means of knowledge), prameya\n(objects of valid knowledge), sa\u1e41\u015baya (doubt), prayojana (aim), d\u1e5b\u1e63\u1e6d\u0101nta\n(example), siddh\u0101nta (conclusion), avayava (members of syllogism), tarka\n(hypothetical reasoning), nir\u1e47aya (settlement), v\u0101da (discussion), jalpa\n(wrangling), vita\u1e47\u1e0d\u0101 (cavilling), hetv\u0101bh\u0101sa (fallacy), chala (quibbling), j\u0101ti\n(sophisticated refutation) and nigrahasth\u0101na (point of defeat)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The focus of Pramana (\nof which SHABA is a part ) is how correct knowledge can be acquired, how one knows,\nhow one doesn't, and to what extent knowledge pertinent about someone or\nsomething can be acquired. Pramana, a Sanskrit/ Malayalam word, literally is\n\"means of knowledge\".&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The focus of Pramana is how correct knowledge\ncan be acquired, how one knows, how one doesn't, and to what extent knowledge\npertinent about someone or something can be acquired .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nyaya scholars, along with those from other\nschools of Hinduism, also developed a theory of error, to methodically\nestablish means to identify errors and the process by which errors are made in\nhuman pursuit of knowledge.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These include Sa\u1e41\u015baya ( problems, inconsistencies,\ndoubts) and Viparyaya ( contrariness, errors) which can be corrected or\nresolved by a systematic process of Tarka ( &nbsp;reasoning, technique).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A cause is defined as\nan unconditional and invariable antecedent of an effect and an effect as an\nunconditional and invariable consequent of a cause.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The same cause produces the\nsame effect; and the same effect is produced by the same cause. The cause is\nnot present in any hidden form whatsoever in its effect.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The following Nyaya conditions\nshould be met:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The cause must be\nantecedent [Purvavrtti]<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Invariability\n[Niyatapurvavrtti]<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Unconditionality\n[Ananyathasiddha]</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nyaya recognizes five\nkinds of accidental antecedents [Anyathasiddha]:--</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Mere accidental\nantecedent.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Remote cause is not a\ncause because it is not unconditional..<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The co-effects of a\ncause are not causally related.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Eternal substances, or\neternal conditions are not unconditional antecedents,.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Unnecessary superfluous things,.</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nyaya recognizes three\nkinds of cause:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Samavayi, material\ncause, e.g. thread of a cloth.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Asamavayi, colour of\nthe thread which gives the colour of the cloth.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Nimitta, efficient\ncause, e.g. the weaver of the cloth.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">THE\nENTIRE WESTERN PHILOSOPY IS LIFTED FROM ANCIENT INDIAN PHILOSOPHY, &nbsp;WHICH WAS MOSTLY\nPENNED DOWN 7000 YEARS AGO,&nbsp; WHEN THE\nWHITE MAN WAS DOING GRUNT GRUNT FOR LANGUAGE.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">BECAUSE\nTHE NON-SPIRITUAL WESTERN PHILOSOPHERS HAD NOTHING ORIGINAL TO OFFER ( EXCEPT\nCOMMIE THEORIES AND SIGMUND FREUDs RIDICULOUS SEX THEORIES ) THEIR SHALLOW PHILOSOPHY\nIS A FUNNY CARPET IN TATTERS , &nbsp;FULL OF HOLES-\nHAVING NO REGULAR WARP AND WEFT.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nyaya distinction\nbetween qualificative and non-qualificative perceptual cognition will further\nilluminate Bertrand Russell\u2019s distinction between knowledge by acquaintance and\nknowledge by description. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">CHOOT Russell</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">\u2019s concept of\nacquaintance leads to overbearing </span></span><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">CHOOT John Galt</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"> type solipsism. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-2jfHEi2BezE/Vyb9UCATHCI/AAAAAAABIAc/ss0bhnZu-PAFdQBXH1tvdgDJGQ-GFTiagCLcB/s1600/dowsnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-2jfHEi2BezE/Vyb9UCATHCI/AAAAAAABIAc/ss0bhnZu-PAFdQBXH1tvdgDJGQ-GFTiagCLcB/s1600/dowsnload.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In epistemology,\nsolipsism contends that knowledge of anything outside one's own mind is unsure\nand unreliable . As a metaphysical position, solipsism concludes that the world\nand other minds do not exist. There is never a sense of gratitude .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Ny\u0101ya concept of\nnon-qualificative perceptual cognition does not lead to solipsism, it is\nsuperior to shallow minded Bertrand Russell\u2019s concept of knowledge by acquaintance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Indian philosophy ,\nthe cognition of words, the memory \u2013 cognition of objects, the cognition of the\nrelation between a word and its referent, the syntactic expectancy between the\nwords (akaikua), semantic compatibility (yogyata), contiguity of words (asatti)\nand the intention of the speaker (tatparya) are treated as causal conditions\nfor understanding the meaning of a sentence. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nyaya philosophers have\nexplained both the atomistic and the holistic understanding of a molecular\nsentence. &nbsp;Shallow minded and\nnon-spiritual western philosophers have not&nbsp;\ndeveloped a logic or mechanism for holistic understanding.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nyaya philosophers have\n&nbsp;described the phenomenological\nproperties of perceptual, inferential and verbal cognitions- the difference\nbetween them in terms of the ways cognitions are related to the same object. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The difference between\nthem is explained in terms of the following pairs of the Nyaya philosophy:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>1. anuyoga- pratiyoga (\nfirst term- second term)<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>2. adhara- adheya\n(substratum- supersratum )<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>3. visheshya- visheshuana\n(qualificand- qualifier)<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>4. visheshya \u2013 prakara\n( qualificand- relation qualifier)<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>5. uddesha- vidheya (\nsubject- predicate)<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>6. paksa - sadhya ( the\nlocus of inference- probandum )<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>7. hetu- sadhya\n(probans- probandum )</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Note: \u201cfactum\nprobandum\", means &nbsp;\u201cthe fact to be\nproved\u201d<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Like: \u201chermigas\npantalunas\u201d means \u201cants in pants \u201c&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b>The western philosophers have sprinkled Latin\nwords in their works to show that their thoughts are original\u2014NOT stolen.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>ANYBODY WHO HAS READ INDIAN PHILOSOPHY , AND THEN READS ITS LIFTED WESTERN EQUIVALENT, &nbsp;WILL ROLL IN LAUGHTER .</b></span></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Perceptual cognition\ninvolves four pairs,&nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>verbal cognition three pairs, but&nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>inferential cognition\ninvolves all the seven pairs.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 200%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-wK4z0drLde8/VydI9ZKf5rI/AAAAAAABIAw/y4XF-qDVYIEo5mTpO1tMMIvIYgAQnKHGQCLcB/s1600/downEload.jpg56kwvds.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">QUOTE:&nbsp; In November 2010, Setalvad was accused of\npressuring Zaheera Sheikh, the key witness in the Best Bakery case, to make\ncertain statements, leading to the unprecedented transferral of the case\noutside Gujarat. In August 2005, the Supreme Court of India committee absolved\nher of the charges of inducement levelled against her by Zaheera and awarded a\none-year jail sentence to Zaheera for perjury.[41] In 2013 Tehelka in an\nundercover investigation discovered that Zaheera had been paid to alter her\ntestimony. Teesta Setalvad's former aide Rais Khan Pathan has filed an\naffidavit in the Supreme Court alleging manipulation of evidence, which were in\nthe form of statements of witnesses, by her in five sensitive post-Godhra riot\ncases.[43] In April 2009, the Times of India ran a story claiming that the\nSpecial Investigation Team (SIT) set up by the Supreme Court of India to\ninvestigate and expedite the Gujarat riot cases had submitted before the Court\nthat Teesta Setalvad had cooked up cases of violence to spice up the incidents.\nThe SIT which is headed by former CBI director, R K Raghavan has said that\nfalse witnesses were tutored to give evidence about imaginary incidents by\nTeesta Setalvad and other NGOs.[44] The SIT charged her of \"cooking up\nmacabre tales of killings\".[45] The court was told that 22 witnesses, who\nhad submitted identical affidavits before various courts relating to riot\nincidents, were questioned by SIT and it was found that the witnesses had not\nactually witnessed the incidents and they were tutored and the affidavits were\nhanded over to them by Setalvad.[45] The report which was brought to the notice\nof the bench consisting of Justices Arijit Pasayat, P Sathasivam and Aftab\nAlam, noted that the much publicised case of a pregnant Muslim woman Kausar\nBano being gangraped by a mob and foetus being removed with sharp weapons, was\nalso fabricated, and false.[44][46] eesta's Sabrang Communications and\nPublishing (not registered under FCRA) had between 2004 and 2014 accepted\n$290,000 from the US-based Ford Foundation without the government approval .The\nFord Foundation, one of the largest international donors, was put on the\nwatch-list following a Gujarat government complaint that it was interfering in\nIndia's \"internal affairs\" and encouraging Teesta's NGOs to promote\n\"communal disharmony\".[72] Ford Foundation has been accused of such\nallegations in another country 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">False verbal\ninformation can integrate with original memory.&nbsp;&nbsp; In experiments , when participants were\npresented with either truthful information or misleading information, and\noverall it showed that even the false information verbally presented became\npart of the memory after the participant was asked to recall details.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Facial recognition is a\ngood indicator of how easily memories can be manipulated.&nbsp;&nbsp; In this specific experiment, if a misleading\nfeature was presented, more than a third of the participants recalled that\ndetail. With a specific detail, almost 70% of people claimed that it had been\nthere, when it had not been present.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mistaken or flawed\nidentification has assumed a newfound prominence in recent years.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In USA more than 80% of\nconvictions were later overturned by DNA testing, according to the New\nYork-based Innocence Project, which works to free the wrongly convicted.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Innocence Project has led to the freeing of\n337 wrongfully convicted people, including 20 who spent time on death row.\nAlmost all (99%) of the convictions proven to be false were of males with\nblacks getting the short end of the stick.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Police and Judges must\nnore the confidence levels of eyewitnesses when they select a suspect. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In India police wrangle\npromotions and medals when they arrest innocent people and keep them as\nundertrials without being charged .&nbsp; A\nlot of high ranking police officers are such characterless people.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/undertrial-prisoners-in-indian-remand.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/undertrial-prisoners-in-indian-remand.html</a><span style=\"background: yellow; mso-highlight: yellow;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>The nature of erroneous\nperception are termed Khyatis. &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are six important Khyatis in Indian\nphilosophy. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They are: <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. Satkhyati, ( what is\nexperienced is real , non-existent cannot be perceived )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. Akhyati, ( memory\nmistaken for perception,&nbsp; &nbsp;lack of right discrimination vis-\u00e0-vis memory )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. Anyathakhyati, (misapprehension,&nbsp; one reality is mistaken for another,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4. Atmakhyati, (subjective\nexistence and objective non-existence, error not in the object but in the\nsubject)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5. Asatkhyati, ( error\nconsists in the apprehension of the unreal or in the perception of non-existent\nentities )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6. Anirvachaniyakhyati.\n(&nbsp; indeterminate judgement ,&nbsp;&nbsp; apprehension of the indescribable&nbsp; )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">VEDIC PHILOSOPHY IS\nBEYOND THE SCOPE OF THIS POST \u2013&nbsp; JUST GIVING\nA WHIFF . &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL\nSAYS, WESTERN PHILOSOPHY IS 100% LIFTED FROM VEDIC PHILOSOPHY (&nbsp; &nbsp;THE NON-SPIRITUAL\nWHITE MAN HAS MURDERED IT ) &nbsp;. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PHILOSOPHERS MUST BE GRACEFUL\nAND SPIRITUAL.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;AGGRESSIVE, BEEF EATING, DEBAUCHED WHITE MEN\nCAN NEVER BE DEEP THINKERS. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Schizophrenics\nconstruct their own fantasy world.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Morbid minds hallucinate and create wars<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stereo typing ( a Jew\nis intelligent ) ,&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">similar to me effect ( hum bhi French tum bhi French\nRinchet-majja hai ) , &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">self serving bias\n( I did this, I did that, but alas WE ran aground ), &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">self fulfilling prophecy ( dont fuck it up\nthis time , &nbsp;negative expectations \u2013\nnegative results ) , &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">horn effect ( just\nbecause he drinks, he is bad ),&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">halo effect ( just because he prays in church,\nhe is good ),&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">recency effect (&nbsp; Ronaldo\ndid not hit a goal is the last 3 matches\u2014he is useless ),&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">primary effect (\nfirst impression- he is so polite ),&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">selective perception ( mindset ),&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">skewing\nerrors ( partiality ),&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">fundamental attribution bias ( my shit does not smell- I\nam the best &nbsp;),&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">lucky bastard ( success\nis luck, failure is because he is incompetent ),&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">perception error ( ours is\nbetter ),&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">collecting irrelevant evidence ( I prayed to Basava at river Thames \u2013now all Veerashaiva\nLingayaths will vote for me )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>THIS POST IS NOW CONTINUED TO PART 23 , BELOW-</b></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/05/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html\">h<span style=\"background-color: lime;\">ttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/05/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html</span></a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/melting-ego-meditation-via-back-door.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/melting-ego-meditation-via-back-door.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SANATANA DHARMA\nINTRODUCED MEDITATION TO THIS PLANET<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prayer is NOT\nmeditation. &nbsp;&nbsp;The former is a petition\nto&nbsp; God, and the other is a detached\nobservation of one's own mind, &nbsp;&nbsp;and its\nprocesses, after squelching the 5 human senses .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ancient Vedic&nbsp; Indian psychology has a&nbsp; fourfold scale, which represents the degrees\nof the ladder of being by which man climbs back to the source, the absolute\ndivine. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The change, from \u201chere\u201d\nto \u201cthere,\u201d ( ITHE to UTHE ) &nbsp;aint no\nuneventful process at all. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There come dry periods,\ndeviations, violent alterations, and temptations. &nbsp;&nbsp;If there are raptures and azure heavens,\nthere are anaconda agonies and absolute abandonments, howling hot deserts and\n\u201cdark cold nights of the soul\u201d to go through. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Streaming tears of joy,\nhorripilation (bristling of the hair), stigmata (bodily marks or pains), and\nparapsychological phenomena have been known to develop.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The first stage of\nmeditation&nbsp; achieves detachment from\nsensual desires and impure states of mind through analysis and reflection and\nthereby attains an emotional state of satisfaction and joy. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the second stage,\nintellectual activities are abated to a complete inner serenity; the mind is in\na state of \u201cone-pointedness\u201d or concentration, joy, and pleasantness. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the third stage,\nevery emotion, including joy, has disappeared, leaving the meditator\nindifferent to everything while remaining completely conscious. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fourth stage is the\nabandoning of any sense of satisfaction, pain, or serenity because any\ninclination to a good or bad state of mind has disappeared. &nbsp;The meditator thus enters a state of supreme\npurity, indifference to everything, and pure consciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE ANCIENT VEDIC MAHARISHI\nIS THE GUY WHO CAN ENTER THE 4TH STATE AT HIS OWN SWEET WILL BY TOUCHING TWO\nFINGERS , &nbsp;THE TIPS OF THUMB AND FOREFINGER\nWHILE SITTING UPRIGHT ( &nbsp;GYAN MUDRA )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-HM26ES3XTF8/Vx2yCMxsoiI/AAAAAAABH0U/nyUQs_AX8lgtSsRFtNAJGBXmKeX6ejxOwCLcB/s1600/hsgyanfmudra2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"240\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-HM26ES3XTF8/Vx2yCMxsoiI/AAAAAAABH0U/nyUQs_AX8lgtSsRFtNAJGBXmKeX6ejxOwCLcB/s320/hsgyanfmudra2.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HE ENTERS THE STATE OF\nSUPREME INNER SILENCE,&nbsp; VAST EXPANSION ,\nNIL EMOTIONS AND PROFOUND KNOWINGNESS&nbsp; ..\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He offered certain\nmolecules to his brain receptor sites --&nbsp;\nmore satisfying than LSD or Soma. His DNA remembers all the things that\nhas ever happened to human beings.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meditation is done to\npurify the mind and gain insight. &nbsp;&nbsp;It abstracts the self from conscious thought,\nand frees the mind from feelings that cause stress and suffering.&nbsp;&nbsp; It fosters creative intelligence, raise\nconsciousness, and enables fuller use to be made of mental potential.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the modern world,\nmeditation is used as a non-religious technique for relaxation and stress\nreduction for long-term psychological improvements. Meditation is done to\npurify the mind and gain insight<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The spiritual aims are\npeace of mind, wisdom, and, ultimately, a state of enlightenment or\nself-realization.&nbsp; It is a form of\nnatural healing, and helps people cope with&nbsp;\nanxiety, depression, and drug dependence.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-GiNg5ag-N2c/Vx28ITALfhI/AAAAAAABH1g/Hm4loAD5ci4JKimq1yo6NPT44tGkclCiwCLcB/s1600/imafges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"365\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-GiNg5ag-N2c/Vx28ITALfhI/AAAAAAABH1g/Hm4loAD5ci4JKimq1yo6NPT44tGkclCiwCLcB/s400/imafges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The attention is\nfocused on monitoring the breath, and noting thoughts crossing the mind,\nwithout any judgment or attempt at control, but as a silent and detached\nwitness.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the mind throws up\ndistractions, the meditator returns to simply observing the breath each time\nthe distraction happens.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A relaxed and unhurried\nattitude is important, since slowing down and observing the mind to see how it\nworks is central to the philosophy behind meditation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Using the mantra\ntechnique, the meditator concentrates on a mantra&nbsp; to banish intrusive thoughts and thus achieve\nprogressively quieter levels of thinking until thought itself is transcended.\nThe subtle vitalizing frequencies of mantras activate psychic energies and\nawaken our intuitive faculties. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meditation brings peace\nand allows us to raise our vibrational level.&nbsp;\nDigestion grounds us. Hence eat only after&nbsp; the meditation session.&nbsp; Eating engages the body\u2019s digestive system ,\nthus returning the body\u2019s vibrational level back to normal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During meditation\nthinking is separated from perceiving, so that the individual can stand apart\nfrom the emotional self.&nbsp; The reason why\npeople remain mired in negativity is because of the beliefs they have inherited\nover time. Beliefs are subconscious. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-6P3EQbgnDbs/Vx28eFGYBTI/AAAAAAABH1o/9EDg3_JnRcg_IQ8drIJ1tLHoTGJ7ONrkACLcB/s1600/imagevs.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-6P3EQbgnDbs/Vx28eFGYBTI/AAAAAAABH1o/9EDg3_JnRcg_IQ8drIJ1tLHoTGJ7ONrkACLcB/s400/imagevs.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We act in the way we do\nbecause we are not aware of our beliefs and the feelings that these beliefs\ngenerate. That is why it is important to observe yourself and look within. We\ncan do it. That is why we are different from animals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We can use our&nbsp; conscious mind to observe ,to introspect and\ndip into the&nbsp; subconscious where our\nbeliefs are embedded , in order to eliminate it.&nbsp; You can meditate to rewrite these negative\nprogrammes&nbsp; that cause you misery.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To be a mystic or a\nseer is not the same thing as being a spectator on the fence.&nbsp; Mysticism provides an escape from a life of\nuninspired existence. It magnifies man and gives him a hope and destiny to\nfulfill.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the modern era the\nroad to holiness necessarily passes through the world of action. &nbsp;&nbsp;A Mystic who is not of supreme service to the\nsociety -- &nbsp;AINT NO MYSTIC AT ALL.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What physical exercise\nis to the body, meditation is to the mind. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Silencing the body is easy, but silencing\nthe mind is difficult in this modern age. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Silencing is about\ngrace, harmony and tranquility. &nbsp;&nbsp;Exhaustion\nis NOT tranquility. &nbsp;&nbsp;In the modern age\npeople get stressed, and they need to still the mind--the chattering monkey,\nwhich remains entangled in the past and the imagined future, but never in the\npresent.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-b1aj89-_W9E/Vx28tgDGyRI/AAAAAAABH1w/YbmYFi0enS4GhVurJr9NnaMQ2K__At0ywCLcB/s1600/im888ages.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-b1aj89-_W9E/Vx28tgDGyRI/AAAAAAABH1w/YbmYFi0enS4GhVurJr9NnaMQ2K__At0ywCLcB/s400/im888ages.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meditation is about\nholding your mind to the present. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">6000 years ago, Krishna\ntold Arjuna to do Surya Namaskar before start of daily battle to<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"> hold his mind to the present\nmoment.&nbsp; </b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-jZDntDayCkk/Vx27MC-v6YI/AAAAAAABH1I/Z1yKpepLai4yn-_OPN_dE6uIrIOyHRorQCLcB/s1600/db4b3da700862bfeb28bcd49fcb650548.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"240\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-jZDntDayCkk/Vx27MC-v6YI/AAAAAAABH1I/Z1yKpepLai4yn-_OPN_dE6uIrIOyHRorQCLcB/s400/db4b3da700862bfeb28bcd49fcb650548.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pretty soon all caught\non and it was a terrific sight to the see the entire battle field doing Suryanamaskar\nbefore Krishna would blow his Panchajanya conch, &nbsp;at low key, &nbsp;to start the days battle till sunset.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Krishna blew his\nPanchajanya conch on the first day &nbsp;to\nsignal the start of the war, the whole world heard it .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the evening after\nsunset both camps would mourn each other .&nbsp;\nSuch were the ethics of battle.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is the search for\ninner strength.&nbsp; &nbsp;It is NOT a drill. It has to be done with\ngrace. &nbsp;Your mind cant keep going round\nand round in circles, etching a deep groove and make the subject deep rooted. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-jk13WUy7eMk/Vx27cHY5SUI/AAAAAAABH1Q/R8oENkLBs-8Wk9nRmB-7Poh43e2UmSudwCLcB/s1600/still-minmd.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"368\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-jk13WUy7eMk/Vx27cHY5SUI/AAAAAAABH1Q/R8oENkLBs-8Wk9nRmB-7Poh43e2UmSudwCLcB/s400/still-minmd.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Beware of the\nspiritually arrogant, and ego laden -- such persons who want to set faalthu GUINESS\nBOOK OF WORLD RECORDS and COME ON TV GHADI GHADI , cant be proper Gurus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A person stops thinking\neither when he is dead or when he has realised. &nbsp;&nbsp;When your ego powered mind is chattering like\na monkey or the angry sea, you miss the truth. &nbsp;&nbsp;Truth can be communicated only in silence.\nFor this deep silence you need to have harmony between the mind, body and soul.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The aim of every form\nof meditation is to still the mind, or you cant purify it and get rid of deep\nrooted negativities , which affect your health and even give you severe\nmigraines. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meditation&nbsp; is a surgical operation of your subconscious\nmind to remove and discard negativity / ego and improve tolerance, grace and\nkindness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For a layman-- you are\nstressed when your hands feel cold, your heart rate, breathing, and muscle\ntension increases. The result is that your immune system goes for a toss and\nyou get depressed or burnt out.. Depression is a weird feeling of loss .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meditation teaches you\nto look inwards, with awareness , withing yourself and know the true nature of\nall sensations, and loosen the stranglehold of habits and vices.. he scans his\nown body and sees where the stress and tension is. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He just witnesses , he\ndoes not react. His mind does not control him, rather he controls his mind. It\nis a universal remedy for all universal ills. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Healing is NOT a\nphysical process, rather it is mental. &nbsp;Mind can wipe mistakes off the DNA blueprint\nand destroy any disease that has disturbed the design. &nbsp;DNA's ability to repair itself is affected\nadversely when a person is in depression. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meditation experiences\nsilence, and is devoid of drives, wishes, fears , thoughts and emotions.\nAfterwards when the mind returns to its usual level of consciousness, it has\nacquired some freedom to move.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Grace and peace are the\nhallmarks of a healthy non-delusional mind in a healthy body.. Lord Shiva unable to tolerate this foul play immediately appeared\nand gave Shukracharya the mantra as a boon.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; He takes several re-births\ntill he gets final moksha \u2013 and short term success by cheating was NOT an\noption.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hinduism is a religion\nof TOTAL freedom. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatana Dharma does\nnot force anybody to accept particular dogmas or forms of worship. It allows\neverybody to reflect, investigate, enquire and cogitate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Hence, all sorts of religious faiths, various\nforms of worship or Sadhana, and diverse kinds of rituals and customs, have\nfound their honourable places side by side within Hinduism and are cultured and\ndeveloped in harmonious relationship with one another.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Hinduism pays respects to all religions. It\ndoes not revile any other religion. It accepts and honours truth\u2014wherever it\nmay come from and whatever garb it may put on. Hindus have never tried to\nconvert.&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;
