font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga asanas help to\nshift lymph fluids around your body in ways that you would not ordinarily be\nable to achieve in daily life .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because the lymphatic\nsystem is a closed pressure system and has one-way valves that keep lymph\nmoving towards the heart, when one turns upside down like in Shirshasan&nbsp; ( head stand ) , the entire lymphatic system\nis stimulated, thus strengthening your immune system. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lymph nodes are the\nfilters along the lymphatic system.&nbsp;\nTheir job is to filter out and trap bacteria, viruses, cancer cells, and\nother unwanted substances, and to make sure they are safely eliminated from the\nbody. Human lymph nodes are bean-shaped and range in size from a few\nmillimeters to about 1\u20132 cm in their normal state.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/0axaUxtljNc/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/0axaUxtljNc?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><br /></i></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Approximately 70% are\nsuperficial lymphatic capillaries located&nbsp;\njust under, the skin. The remaining 30%, which are known as deep\nlymphatic capillaries, surround most of the body\u2019s organs. The deep ones can be\nstimulated only by Yoga. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Like veins, the\nlymphatic vessels, which are known as lymphangions, have one-way valves to\nprevent any backward flow. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Like body inversions\nand head stand exercises, twists offer your body new ways to remove toxins and\nflush important lymph around the entire torso. Yogic asanas to aid lymph flow\nincludes neck rotation, shoulder shrugs, ankle pumps, leg slides, shoulder blade\nsqueezes etc.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><br /></i></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><br /></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/TQuaVEaHm4Q/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/TQuaVEaHm4Q?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga diaphragmatic\nbreathing and many yoga positions open up the chest cavity, while poses like\nshoulder stands, enlist gravity to help lymph fluid get where it is supposed to\ngo.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since there is no pump,\nthe lymph movement relies on contraction of smooth muscle tissue lining the\nwalls of lymph vessels.&nbsp; Movement of\nskeletal muscles is also important for driving lymph along the systems network\nof vessels to lymph nodes and from these to lymph ducts where the lymph tissue\njoins cardiovascular circulation. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is what the\nscientifically formulated Yoga positions do. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The human arteries are\nlike a two-lane highway bringing nutrients, oxygen and fluid to the body part.\nThe vein is a one-lane highway taking away the used blood, and the lymphatic\nchannels are the other one-lane highway draining away the lymph fluid.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n</i></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/J16x57fdhMU/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/J16x57fdhMU?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Two lanes in together,\nbut two out lanes separate out. Blood is responsible for collecting and\ndistributing oxygen, nutrients and hormones to the entire body where lymph is responsible\nfor collecting and removing waste products left behind in the tissues. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Plasma leaks out of the\ncapillaries to surround and bathe the body tissues. This then drains into the\nlymph vessels. At the cellular level, the lymphatic system is a pathway through\nwhich fluid flows from the intercellular spaces into the blood. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lymph nodes are the\nfilters along the lymphatic system.&nbsp;\nTheir job is to filter out and trap bacteria, viruses, cancer cells, and\nother unwanted substances, and to make sure they are safely eliminated from the\nbody. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6000 years ago,\nAyurveda and Yoga&nbsp; realized that many\nlymph nodes are situated near the region around the joints. Humans have\napproximately 500-700 lymph nodes distributed throughout the body, with\nclusters found in the underarms, groin, neck, chest, and abdomen.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All lymph vessels lead\nto lymph nodes. Lymph nodes can be as small as the head of a pin, or as big as\nan olive . Half of the lymph nodes in the body, are&nbsp; located in the abdomen, and many are in the\nneck. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The movements of the\nlimbs help to act as a pump to move the lymph through the system. They are\nlocated in clusters around the knee, groin, elbows, shoulders and neck. Lymph\nnodes are also found in the central abdominal and chest area to assist with\nlymph drainage around the vital organs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every Yoga movement\ntake this into account Because the lymph doesn't have a heart to pump it so\ngood circulation of the lymphatic system depends on getting proper stretching\nexercise and yogic inverted postures which use gravity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A simple yogasana like\nSurya namaskar can increase lymph flow 20 fold.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; />\nOnce you have replied to one of my comments in a Post regarding 'Astabakra' now you have cleared my doubts.<br />\nThanks for your narration.<br />\nWith good wishes,<br />\nSushanta Das</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_48MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1336140557\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_48BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_48B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_49b+seedVT8rD\" kind=\"d\">\n<div class=\"continue\" id=\"bc_0_47I\" kind=\"ci\" style=\"border-top-color: rgb(153, 153, 153); border-top-style: /></a></div>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_49b+seedVT8rD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-thread\" id=\"bc_0_47T_box\" style=\"margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_49b+seedVT8rD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_49b+seedVT8rD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_49B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_53B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c978746674096565982\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_53M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/01/lymph-nodes-vs-endocrine-exocrine.html?showComment=1452519826468#c978746674096565982\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">January 11, 2016 at 7:13 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_53MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nMurali Meleth<br />\nJanuary 11, 2016 at 3:39 PM<br />\nThank you Captain, for the reply to my query on Ashtavakra Gita. I could not reply to that(link failed) hence posting a new comment just to point out a few things in this regard.<br />\n<br />\nYou said: [There are no other statements anywhere in Ashtavakra Gita brimming with transcendental wisdom like the Bhagawad Gita coming out of a superior being of DNA exceeding 13 strands -- beyond time and space.]<br />\n<br />\nYou are correct, but that is how it is supposed to be!<br />\n<br />\nAshtavakra Gita is not a text book meant for gaining some kind of wisdom, transcendental or otherwise. There is nothing in Ashtavakra Gita which you need to intellectually understand and remember. You just read it, and in the reading the walls of ignorance should shatter. With consistent and pin pointed hammering, it brings your attention back to your Real Nature again and again and again. And at some stage, something might click in. Then the self reference goes for a toss.<br />\n<br />\nSo my point is, Bhagwad Gita is like the medical text. Where as Ashtavakra Gita is a pill. Reading Ashtavakra Gita is equivalent to doing 'Atma Vichara' (Self Enquiry).<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nYou said: [This is why nobody will ever talk about a mundane Ashtavakra's Gita, which offers a common man NO solace]<br />\n<br />\nYou are correct, but that is how it is supposed to be!<br />\n<br />\nAshtavakra Gita does not offer any solace for any of your problems. It just tries to wake you up to know that there was no problem, ever.<br />\nOnce awake, do you want any solace from last night's nightmare?<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nYou said: [Ashtavakra Gita is like a POTTED PLANT --no room for expansion\u2014while bhagawad Gita is VAST LIKE THE COSMOS which has space for you , and offers you immense solace.]<br />\n<br />\nYou are correct, but it doesn't matter!<br />\n<br />\nThere is no need to expand or explore. When you are one step away from the tip of the summit, all you need is \"one step\". This is why it was said that Ashtavakra Gita is not meant for public at large.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nYou said: [These are suitable for the western mind\u2014NOT the Indian mind.]<br />\n<br />\nThese are suitable for any mind which has understood the futility of mind in realizing the Truth and thoroughly felt the helplessness thus ready to surrender.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nYou said: [The difference between Bhagwad Gita and a single holy book of newly sprouted religions( Ashtavakra Gita ) included\u2014 is that these single holy books do NOT allow you to add or take anything from it, like modern zionist multinational company manuals.]<br />\n<br />\nAgain, Ashtavakra Gita is a direct and precise pointer to Truth. There is no need to add or take out from that. Just turn your attention towards what it points to.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nYou said: [This is the difference between a book uttered by a Vishnu avatar and a book uttered by a mortal]<br />\n<br />\nAbsolutely... But, my guess is that whoever had authored Ashtavakra Gita must have done that while Lord Vishnu is awakened in him/her.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nReplyDelete<br />\nReplies</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_53BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; In a nutshell, in the sight of the seer nothing exists at all.\u096518-80\u0965<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILD SCREWED HIMSELF WITH ASHTAVAKRA GITA, BY TALKING ABOUT HEAVEN AND HELL IN HINDUISM.<br />\n<br />\nWHERE IS THE WISDOM INHERENT ?<br />\n<br />\nThere are no states as dreams or sleep or waking. There is no fourth state 'Turiya' beyond these, and no fear for me , who is established in Self.\u096519-5\u0965<br />\n<br />\nThere is no existence or non-existence, no non-duality or duality. What more is there to say? Nothing arises out of me.\u096520-14\u0965<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE READ ALL THE DASA VERSES --<br />\n<br />\nI DO NOT DWELL ON FOOLISH VERSES OF THE ROTHSCHILD CREATED , FAKE WORKS<br />\n<br />\nHINDUISM IS A PROFOUND RELIGION --IT CANNOT BE HIJACKED BY SOME MUNDANE STUFF.<br />\n<br />\n#############<br />\ni once went to a restaurant in mumbai in 1977. a man was eating \"TANDOORI CHICKEN \" by my side .<br />\n<br />\ni told him \" WHAT YOU ARE EATING IS NOT TANDOORI CHICKEN, AS I KNOW THE BONE AND FLESH STRUCTURE \"<br />\n<br />\nhe replied \" NAHI--YEH CHICKEN HI HAI \"<br />\n<br />\nthen i called the man at the counter and asked him if the bird on the plate is chicken .<br />\n<br />\nhe went on the threatening offensive--SAAALA GAANDU PHUUTT IDHAR SE , NAHI TO UKHADKE GHAAD DOONGA type.<br />\n<br />\ni whispered--- in one hour time , i will have this restaurant closed down and you will be in jail for several years .<br />\n<br />\ni had the clout to do this having friends in right places.<br />\n<br />\nimmediately the man apologised and gave a REAL tandoori chicken to the confused guy sitting by my side.<br />\n<br />\nSO-- TO YOU I WILL SAY THIS--<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUE EATING YOUR WELL DESERVED FAALTHU BIRD .<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_53b+seedVT8tD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_53b+seedVT8tD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cI take this pledge as\na personal Declaration of Independence.&nbsp;\nAs a sovereign individual, I assert the exclusive right to my life, my\nliberty and my property, as guaranteed in the U.S. Constitution. As government\nis properly instituted to protect my rights, I oppose, and declare as\nunconstitutional, all actions taken by government that violate the very rights\nit is charged with defending.&nbsp; I support\na return to the principle of individualism upon which this country was\nfounded.&nbsp; And rejecting any initiation of\nthe use of force as being wholly inappropriate, I support a society based\nstrictly upon voluntary association and free trade among its people\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you have a bigot with a curved staff\nholding a hot line between you and your god, then I suggest you must fear\nvirtue more than vice.&nbsp; &nbsp;Because the, its excesses are not subject to\nthe regulation of conscience.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The right of conscience\ndoes not allow a Christian or a Muslim to arbitrarily disagree with gospel\nteaching and claim that one is acting in accordance with conscience.&nbsp; &nbsp;Some\nCatholics and Muslims appeal to conscience in order to justify dissent. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Catholic Church and\nthe Koran has warned that \"rejection of the authority and gospel\nteaching...can be at the source of errors in judgment in moral\nconduct\".&nbsp; When Christianity and\nIslam says that theirs is the only true path which other religions have missed\n, what it is all about?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Hinduism it is your\nconscience, which arose out of awakened consciousness which connects you to the\ngreater metaphysical unity.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-qmlZS9I_eMs/Vx891gFbt9I/AAAAAAABH4g/AwkCKXQk_P80jWLIevOUaKwQRTXQyMNsgCLcB/s1600/imag0oes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"203\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-qmlZS9I_eMs/Vx891gFbt9I/AAAAAAABH4g/AwkCKXQk_P80jWLIevOUaKwQRTXQyMNsgCLcB/s400/imag0oes.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the literary\ntraditions of the Upanishads, Brahma Sutras and the Bhagavad Gita, conscience\nis the label given to attributes composing knowledge about virtues and vices\nbut also good and evil, that a soul acquires from the completion of acts and\nconsequent accretion of karma over many lifetimes.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to Adi\nShankara in his Vivekachudamani morally right action (characterized as humbly\nand compassionately performing the primary duty of good to others without\nexpectation of material or spiritual reward), helps \"purify the\nheart\" and provide mental tranquility but it alone does not give us\n\"direct perception of the Reality\". <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This knowledge requires\ndiscrimination between the eternal and non-eternal and eventually a realization\nin contemplation that the true self merges in a universe of pure consciousness.\nHence, the awareness of vice and virtue is inherent in the soul, allowing it to\nbe tested fairly in the life of this world and tried. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-XSCZgLmHFGE/Vx8-F3KLgYI/AAAAAAABH4o/I_B5DnGSFHwU_TGJY9-pTyZz8WhMYIm1wCLcB/s1600/imag5jes.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-XSCZgLmHFGE/Vx8-F3KLgYI/AAAAAAABH4o/I_B5DnGSFHwU_TGJY9-pTyZz8WhMYIm1wCLcB/s1600/imag5jes.png\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatana Dharma &nbsp;is a religion without fundamentals or lack of\ncompulsions. You cannot get ex-communicated for NOT toeing the rigid line. &nbsp;&nbsp;You are allowed to use your conscience, which\nis fairly fluid. &nbsp;&nbsp;Gratitude is inherent\nand woven into Hinduism , which makes this religion noble.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Divorce rate within\nHindus is the lowest in the world. &nbsp;The\nsacred fire serves as a witness to the vows exchanged between the bride and the\nbridegroom. &nbsp;A true Hindu will not\nexploit vulnerability. &nbsp;This is why India\nhas never attacked any other country in the past history, but has been invaded\nagain and again and again.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hinduism does not allow\nyou to breach a trust.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatana as \u201ceternal\nmoral order\u201d encourages Hindus to seek&nbsp;\nmoral truth wherever it might be found, each individual must realize\nthis truth through his or her own systematic effort.&nbsp;&nbsp; Sanatana means \" that which holds\neternal Vedic knowledge\"-- encompassing everything from microcosm to\nmacrocosm. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dharma means \"\nrighteousness\".&nbsp; &nbsp;Dharma leads to eternal bliss, both in this\nworld and the next. It is your sole and soul companion after death. &nbsp;&nbsp;Human\nacts without conscience which creates conflict is called Adharma. &nbsp;Dharma leads you on the path of self\nrealisation. &nbsp;Dharma includes adhara or\nregulation of daily life as per your conscience and written Vedic laws.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An idiot by the name of\nCharles Darwin thought that any animal endowed with well-marked social\ninstincts would inevitably acquire a moral sense or conscience, as its\nintellectual powers approximated man's.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Enough of religion-- now\nlet me get to the nitty gritty.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You conscience is that\nspark of celestial fire. God resides in your DNA. &nbsp;&nbsp;Never do anything against conscience even if\nthe state , your society or your religion demands it. &nbsp;You sin, if you go against your conscience.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A computer does NOT\nhave a conscience. &nbsp;This is why Modern\nEconomics which is hijacked by empirical formulas or Quadratic Equations ,\nwhich can be tweaked to suit a selfish Central banker, has wreaked terrible\ndamage to society.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Majority is NOT right\nhere. &nbsp;A man of conscience does NOT jump\ninto the bandwagon, rather he will stand a fight all alone, against the howling\nmob.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A government cannot\nhave a conscience. &nbsp;Yes, they can have a\npolicy book.&nbsp; &nbsp;How many Policy statements by the topmost MD\nor President allows you to exercise your conscience? &nbsp;While in command I used my powers as ship\ncaptain, to exhort my crew to use their conscience .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At sea as a leader I\nhave given top priority to courage of convictions of my Junior Officers , and\nin my standing orders which overrides company policy, as Captain\u2019s authority, I\nexhort them to use it. &nbsp;I assure them\nthat they will NOT be dismissed from service if I am convinced of evoking\nnatural law and natural justice. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And mind you, sometimes\nthis pisses of my bosses ashore\u2014so who&nbsp;\ncares? &nbsp;&nbsp;One who breaks an unjust\nlaw that conscience tells him is unjust, and who willingly accepts the penalty\nto arouse the conscience of the community over its injustice, is in reality\nexpressing the highest respect for written law.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is indeed a\nhigher court than courts of justice or courts of honour, and that is the court\nof conscience. &nbsp;It supersedes all other\ncourts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How many judges in a\ncourt of law exercise their conscience&nbsp;\nor even&nbsp; listen to the voice of\nconscience-- and these guys say they take care of&nbsp; humanity and society, right? &nbsp;&nbsp;There can be no accuser as powerful as your own\nconscience.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Have you ever seen a\nlawyer with conscience?&nbsp; These Judges\nwere all lawyers before.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nowadays successful\nhot-shot lawyers , who own Rolls Royce cars and yachts use \" where does\nthis manual say when to have breakfast?\" type CHICANERY to sway the judge\nand jury, whose conscience is in hibernation, due to poor perception and\nconsciousness..&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today if you engage a lawyer, the only thing\nwhich is 100% sure ( like death ) is the expense.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Do you see a doctor\nwith conscience, now-a-days?&nbsp; They are\ntoo busy making money at the expense of the patient. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Have you ever noticed\nthat it is your conscience which tell you, enough is enough.&nbsp; Any person of honor chooses rather to lose\nhis honor than to lose his conscience.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reason , objective\nevidence , leave alone circumstantial evidence -- often makes mistakes, but\nconscience never does. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What is the worth of\nall our music competitions where brute majority chooses the best singer\u2014often\nbased on narrow considerations like religion and mother tongue of the singer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nobel peace prize\nwinners striking and killing unarmed civilians with drones to preserve their\nway of life, talk about \u201cthis years fashion in conscience\u201d in Presidential\ndebates. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And they go around with\ntheir work happily , with an audience clapping and cheering them on. What\nirony! <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once your conscience,\nwhich is the window to your spirit,&nbsp; is\noffended it shows on your face --as it is good bye tranquil mind. Such evil\npeople mistake short memory for a clear conscience.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Conscience is your\ninner antenna.&nbsp; Human dignity requires an\nupright conscience. Deep within his conscience every man discovers a celestial\nlaw which he has not laid upon himself,&nbsp;\neven society or his upbringing -- which he must obey. It is his most\nsecret core, and his sanctuary, where he is alone with God, to have a silent\nand short dialogue . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To youngsters who are\nabout to take up a career , I will tell them this\u2014\u201cNever take up a job in which\nyou cannot apply your own conscience\u201d&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is in case you\nwant to happy , when your work is a continuous festival of joy. Then you can\nhave&nbsp; a face without lines , like yours\ntruly- at the age of &nbsp;60. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A comfortable house and\nwealth is a great source of happiness. It ranks only after good health which\nsprings out of happiness anchored by good conscience.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-A4McrLwGFI4/Vx8_cghX3tI/AAAAAAABH5A/ZRsFAjyzKnAYI5PHQ-mbXKbH508oVY5MwCLcB/s1600/imx4ages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-A4McrLwGFI4/Vx8_cghX3tI/AAAAAAABH5A/ZRsFAjyzKnAYI5PHQ-mbXKbH508oVY5MwCLcB/s1600/imx4ages.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Betrayal of trust and\ningratitude is&nbsp; common for men with no\nconscience.&nbsp; A guilty conscience needs no\naccuser. There is pillow as hard as a guilty conscience.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Conscience is what makes you behave well\nbehind closed doors or when nobody is looking...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Numerous case studies\nof brain damage have shown that damage to areas of the brain (such as the\nanterior prefrontal cortex) results in the reduction or elimination of\ninhibitions, with a corresponding radical change in behaviour. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;When the damage occurs to adults, they may\nstill be able to perform moral reasoning.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Conscience an aspect of\nextended consciousness beyond survival-related dispositions . Conscience is a\ngift of crisis--- It tells you the right thing to do when you don't have time\nto figure it all out.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-VFbQ_JLKO_g/Vx8_AgmQI7I/AAAAAAABH44/xK-bFBgO6HARbsRKq3AM_erEFF3AY9QTwCLcB/s1600/image5ds.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-VFbQ_JLKO_g/Vx8_AgmQI7I/AAAAAAABH44/xK-bFBgO6HARbsRKq3AM_erEFF3AY9QTwCLcB/s1600/image5ds.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Conscience thinks in a\nflash, in terms of metaphor, feelings, pictures, and the spatial whole and\ndoesn't fit neatly into the cause-and-effect model. Your conscience will not\nforce you to do things that are truly wrong for yourself or other people in\ncontradiction with the laws of the universe. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We cannot command our\nconscience to use it at will. It just surfaces spontaneously when certain\ncircumstances are present\u2014it suddenly appears as a feeling.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Conscience extrapolates\nlarger truths . &nbsp;&nbsp;Use it as a guide\nalways, never ignore it.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: &nbsp; This is the reason why white Christians have rejected Christianity, stopped going to churches, have strated embracing spirituality , and &nbsp;are writing in their wills that they want to be cremated .</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-2Ft-GAQ3L00/Vx8-dLFVAfI/AAAAAAABH4w/BXnDVyT94w8jXaYlazf2PnIx_Eq2ZmW0wCLcB/s1600/irmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"425\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-2Ft-GAQ3L00/Vx8-dLFVAfI/AAAAAAABH4w/BXnDVyT94w8jXaYlazf2PnIx_Eq2ZmW0wCLcB/s640/irmages.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We in India know the\nmeaning of conscience -- in 4300 BC, when Lord Sri-Ram was sent away to the\nforest for 14 years in exile ( cheated in a dice game wager ) his step-brother\nBharat , whose mother Kaikeyi did the foul spadework ,&nbsp; kept Rama's shoes on the throne , till the\nexile period was over.&nbsp; Prince Bharat ran\nto the forest to seek out King Sri Ram and apologize on behalf of his mother.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is in contrast to\nthe Mughal invaders, where brothers gouged each other eyes and killed their own\nfathers and sons to usurp the throne. &nbsp;And mind the, these were MOST devout Muslims .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wmwaF99jIMw/Vx884sxMXQI/AAAAAAABH4I/e-zvaDUIEVULreTSfkun3wcTSI87MBTcwCLcB/s1600/doewnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wmwaF99jIMw/Vx884sxMXQI/AAAAAAABH4I/e-zvaDUIEVULreTSfkun3wcTSI87MBTcwCLcB/s1600/doewnload.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Somebody asked me \u2013what is the big deal about\nKUDA MATTAM ( changing parasols ) at Thrissur pooram.<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Large numbers of people engulfed in an ocean\nof consciousness \u2013 when they focus their consciousness on a single event , it can\neven affect &nbsp;artificial intelligence\nwithin its vicinity.<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">This will take another 200 years to be proved\nby scientists ( electrogaiagram )<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Our brains are electric in nature.<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Sabarimala is about intense focus . &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Thrissur pooram is about swing focus.<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Well, well what do you know !<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">the singers have sung\ntheir songs to Indra,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">the musicians have\nresounded to Indra.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2014\u2009Rigveda 1.7.1 5000 BC\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rig Veda\u2019s Tristubh\nmeter has 44 syllables;&nbsp;&nbsp; 4 verses of 11\nsyllables, mapped sequence 11x4<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">s\u00e1middho agn\u00edr n\u00edhita\u1e25\np\u1e5bthivy\u00e2m<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">praty\u00e1\u1e45 v\u00ed\u015bv\u0101ni\nbh\u00favan\u0101niy asth\u0101t<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">h\u00f3t\u0101 p\u0101vak\u00e1\u1e25 prad\u00edva\u1e25\nsumedh\u00e2<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">dev\u00f3 dev\u00e2n yajatuv\nagn\u00edr \u00e1rhan<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rig Veda 2.3.1: 5000 BC<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Agni is set upon the\nearth well kindled <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">he standeth in the\npresence of all beings.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wise, ancient, God, the\nPriest and Purifier<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">let Agni serve the Gods\nfor he is worthy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Bhagavad Gita,\nwhile mostly composed in shloka (developed from the Vedic Anustubh ) is\ninterspersed with Tristubhs<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An anu\u1e63\u1e6dubh stanza is a\nquatrain of four lines. Each line, called a p\u0101da , has eight syllables.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">( Anushtubh, 32\nsyllables; 4 verses of 8 syllables,&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 8x4)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An example of an anu\u1e63\u1e6dubh\nstanza which fails the classical requirements of a shloka is from the\nShatapatha Brahmana<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0101sand\u012bvati dh\u0101ny\u0101da\u1e43\nrukmi\u1e47a\u1e43 haritasrajam<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">abadhn\u0101da\u015bva\u1e43 s\u0101ra\u0144ga\u1e43\ndevebhyo janamejaya\u1e25<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"In \u0100sand\u00eevat,\nJanamejaya bound for the gods a black-spotted, grain-eating<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">horse, adorned with a\ngolden ornament and with yellow garlands.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In classical Sanskrit\nthe anu\u1e63\u1e6dubh developed into its specific epic form known as shloka<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Mahabharata and\nRamayana, &nbsp;are written almost exclusively\nin shlokas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The shloka is treated\nas a couplet. Each hemistich (half-verse) of 16 syllables, composed of two\nP\u0101das of eight syllables<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Panini's treatise on\nSanskrit grammar distinguishes Chandas as verses that compose the Vedas, and\nBhasya to be the speech language used for learned discourse and scholastic\ndiscussion of the Vedas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A stanza (p\u0101da) is\ndefined in Sanskrit prosody as a group of four verses, also called as four\nquarters.&nbsp;&nbsp; Indian prosody studies\ndeveloped two types of stanzas. Vritta stanza are those that are crafted with\nprecise number syllables, while Jati stanza are those that are designed based\non syllabic instants (morae, matra).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The metres found in\nclassical Sanskrit poetry are sometimes alternatively classified into three kinds.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Syllabic verse (ak\u1e63arav\u1e5btta\nor aksharavritta): meters depend on the number of syllables in a verse, with\nrelative freedom in the distribution of light and heavy syllables. This style\nis derived from older Vedic forms, and found in the great epics, the\nMahabharata and the Ramayana.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Syllabo-quantitative\nverse (var\u1e47av\u1e5btta or varnavritta): meters depend on syllable count, but the\nlight-heavy patterns are fixed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Quantitative verse\n(m\u0101tr\u0101v\u1e5btta or matravritta): meters depend on duration, where each verse-line\nhas a fixed number of morae, usually grouped in sets of four.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">A SANSKRIT SCHOLAR CAN\nVERY EASILY DETECT \u201c</b><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">POISON INJECTED AREAS</b><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">\u201d OF VEDAS , UPANISHADS OR ANY PURANA\n.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HOW DO I KNOW GREEKS ARE THIEVES , &nbsp;WHO LIFTED WHOLESALE AND PATENTED ?</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<table align=\"center\" class=\"wikitable\" style=\"background-attachment: initial; background-clip: initial; background-image: initial; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"background-color: white; font-family: sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 22.4px; margin-bottom: 0.5em; margin-top: 0.5em;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: white; font-family: sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 22.4px; margin-bottom: 0.5em; margin-top: 0.5em;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">IT IS THE STORY OF ANCIENT GREEKS LIVES --STEAL AND PATENT ! &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">I SHALL NOT REVEAL EVERYTHING -- &nbsp;JUST 1%&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">I CAN CHEW THE BALLS OF ANY LYING INDOPHILE &nbsp;--&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">HULLLOOOOOO SHELDON POLLOCK !!</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: white; color: #252525; font-family: sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 22.4px; margin-bottom: 0.5em; margin-top: 0.5em;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; Earlier, cotton would be soft and cool, making it an ideal summer fabric. These days, even pure cotton pants give a burning feeling when exposed to direct heat. And this is aggravated in the case of denims - try standing for 15 minutes in 40 degrees with your jeans on and you will realize what I am saying. Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nApril 27, 2016 at 12:01 PM<br />\nhi rv,<br />\n<br />\nThe fibre / lint quality of GMO cotton is very poor.<br />\n<br />\nWhen a BT Cotton pod breaks the flying SHORTER LENGTH LINT gives lung problems.<br />\n<br />\nMonsanto SHOUTS cotton yields are up,-- BALLS , YOU LIARS !<br />\n<br />\nHey Monsanto cunts\u2014understand the meaning of the word SHORT LENGTH OF LINT ?<br />\n<br />\nThe amount machines are able to extract from the picked cotton has diminished.<br />\n<br />\nIn other words, Bt cotton produces both less cotton lint, and lint of an inferior quality.<br />\n<br />\nCotton fiber quality is defined by the physical properties that relate to its spin ability into yarn and contribute to textile performance and quality.<br />\n<br />\nThe most important of these properties are those associated with the length, strength and fineness (micronaire) of the fiber. One of the most important aspects of cotton fiber quality is fiber or staple length.<br />\n<br />\nFiber length is the normal length of a typical portion of the fibers of a cotton sample. Longer fibers can be processed at greater efficiencies and produce finer and stronger yarns by allowing fibers to twist around each other more times, while shorter fiber require increased twisting during spinning, causing low-strength and poor-quality yarns.<br />\n<br />\nFiber fineness is another important component of fiber quality because of its direct impact on processing performance and the quality of end product.<br />\n<br />\nFiber strength is important because the inherent breaking strength of individual cotton fiber is considered to be the most important factor in determining the strength of the yarn spun from those fibers.<br />\n<br />\nJEW DARLING APCO MODI AND HIS PMO WILL SAY ALL ABOVE IS FICTION.<br />\n<br />\nThey have just focused on a single single trait \u2013 pest resistance ( SIC )\u2013 compromising on cotton quality.<br />\n<br />\nMy hometown Calicut produced the best cotton fabric ( CALICO ) on this planet\u2014today with BT Cotton all this is history.<br />\n<br />\nAPCO MODI LOVES HUMPLESS COW MILK TOO !<br />\n<br />\nHE TRUSTS ONLY JEWS !!<br />\n<br />\nMODI WOULD HAVE US INDIANS DRINK ONE BAALTI OF USELESS TOXIC A1 MILK, RATHER THAN A GLASS OF NUTRITIOUS A2 MILK OF HUMPED VEDIC COWS.
