font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">KALI THE WIFE OF SHIVA IS DARK ENERGY OF THE COSMOS --SHE REPRESENTS THE BLACK HOLE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">In Dvaita Hinduism opposite poles Tamas and Rajas are conscious of each other. Tamas creates Rajas, and Rajas activates/ excites Tamas. Sattva preserves and mediates .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">7000 year old Vedas say that the only constant in the cosmos is change, everything is in a state of flux, nothing is static-- everything is vibratory. This is what guarantees growth and evolution. It is a cosmic spiraling dance of separate opposing forces, which sustains this universe<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">One cannot exist without the other and they are dependant . No phenomenon in this universe is completely devoid of its opposite. They consume each other yet support each other.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">CONTINUED TO 2-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">If the restraining balance or equilibrium is lost by the mediator ( Vishnu ) , the universe will spiral out of control and end. This is why Lord Vishnu is called the PRESERVER god. And only Vishnu can have mortal avatars.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">As for the opposing forces TAMAS/ RAJAS ( Brahma/ Shiva ) it really does NOT matter as who is who, like in AC electricity-where you can plug into the socket both ways.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">These two opposing forces are natural and transform each other , in perfect harmony. Harmony can never be stagnant . Lessening of Tamas always results in increase of Rajas and vice versa.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Balance can never be permanent\u2014 Tamas and Rajas continiously devour each other \u2013 and life flows on. This universe cannot exist without vibrations between two poles.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">THE THIRD TEMPLATE IS SAMKHYA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">This is about the male and female joint TEAM effort. This is NOT a dance of opposites. In Hinduism we call the MALE- purusha and FEMALE- prakriti.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">In the Tantric cosmology, the whole universe is perceived as being created, penetrated and sustained by two fundamental forces, which are permanently in a perfect, indestructible UNION. These forces or universal aspects are called Shiva ( Purusha ) and Shakti (Prakriti ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Each of the trinity gods are powerless without their consorts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Purusha and Pragati is expressed as Shiva and Shakti in the same body 50:50 \u2013 this is NOT a she boy or a transgender . It is a mindboggling, intelligent concept.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Both Shiva and Shakti are Consciousness---- Shiva is the changeless static aspect of Consciousness, and Shakti is the kinetic, active aspect of the same Consciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Through uniting with Purusha , Pragati gave form to his spirit and created the universe.(we are talking about CREATION OF THE COSMOS here- not street side sex as figured out by small minds)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">When the insentient Prakriti comes in contact with the sentient Purusha , the universe evolves.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Purusha symbolizes consciousness, the masculine principle. Pragati symbolizes the feminine principle, the activating energy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The cosmos in all its manifestations, as an act of love. The relationship between say- Shakti and Shiva is the dance of consciousness and energy<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Prakriti cannot be perceived, not because of its non-existence, but because of its subtlety. It is perceived in its effects.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The eternal and indestructible union between Shiva and Shakti gives birth to the whole Macrocosm, in its stable, static aspect as well as in its dynamic one. Not only is Shakti responsible for creation, it is also the agent of all change<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Shakti is manifested by Shiva only during creation and is withdrawn into himself at the end of creation. This is for the perceptive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Modern science repeats from our Vedas that matter and energy are interchangeable. So does consciousness and energy .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Samkhya as you can see was a masterpiece of modeling the ways of the inner universe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The union of Shakti with Shiva by Kundalini rise is the liberation of seeker from the cycle of endless birth and death.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; text-decoration-line: none;\">December 10, 2017 at 9:07 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_158MC\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttp://www.timesnownews.com/india/article/banaras-hindu-university-triple-talaq-nikkah-halala-alauddin-khilji-political-science-question-paper-ma-students-master-of-arts-degree/143420<br />\n<br />\nNOBODY IN INDIA HEARD OF CHAITANYA MAHAPRABHU AND THE BHAKTI MOVEMENT TILL THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA..'<br />\n<br />\nCHAITANYA MAHAPRABHU AND BHAKTI MOVEMENT ARE JEW ROTHSCHILDs FAKE AND BACKDATED CREATIONS.<br />\n<br />\nSANATANA DHARMA ALLOWS ONLY SHRADDHA --NEVER BHAKTI....<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nAll the BHAKTI MOVEMENT HEROES are FAKE and backdated creations of Jew Rothschild who ruled India \u2014the most famous being the DASA characters .<br />\n<br />\nJew Rothschild\u2019s historians LIED that Bhakti movement was a revival, reworking and recontextualisation of ancient Vedic traditions..<br />\n<br />\nIn Sanatana Dharma the six virtues are Sama, dama, uparati, titiksha, SHRADDHA and samadhana..<br />\n<br />\nLord Krishna also gives importance to Shraddha and says in the Bhagavad Gita:--<br />\n<br />\nOne who has Shraddha ( not BHAKTI ) gains knowledge.<br />\n<br />\nShraddha hrudayya yakutyaa shradhayaa vindate vasu. --(Rig Veda 10/151/4) 5000 BC.<br />\nMeaning: Shraddha (faith) is the symbol of the high sentiment of the heart.<br />\n<br />\nShraddha cannot be aptly translated into English. Loosely put, it may be be called faith / trust.<br />\n<br />\nYour willingness to know the unknown is shraddha...shraddha is not blind faith, but enlightened faith based on verification.<br />\n<br />\nIf your mind is fixed, and says \u201cThat\u2019s it. I know it all\u201d, that is ego. The more you know, the more will be the feeling that you don\u2019t know. Recognition of the unknown is Shraddha....<br />\n<br />\nShraddha means unwavering faith in the sacred scriptures or shastras and in the moral codes they contain as well as in the atma ( soul )...<br />\n<br />\nThe shastras are designed to ensure the peace and prosperity of the world and the spiritual perfection of mankind..<br />\n<br />\nThis is not blind faith like is SINGLE MESSIAH, SINGLE HOLY BO RELIGIONS...<br />\n<br />\nIt is based on accurate reasoning, evidence and experience. Then only it can be lasting faith. Then only it can be perfect, unshakeable faith....<br />\n<br />\nSuperstitious beliefs, beliefs in mere religious traditions ( like AGAMA ) or social customs cannot help one in spiritual advancement......<br />\n<br />\nNo spiritual progress is possible without shraddha. ..From shraddha comes nistha or one-pointed devotion and from nistha comes self-realization. If the faith is flickering, it will die soon and the aspirant will be drifted aimlessly hither and thither...<br />\n<br />\nAncient maharishis talked about the quality of \u201cshraddha\u201d which is a positive energy that comes from within. ..<br />\n<br />\nShraddha should not be translated as a \u201csimple\u201d faith / trust, --it also conveys mental and intellectual firmness...<br />\n<br />\nSINGING BHAJANS LIKE ASSHOLES ( BHAKTI MOVEMENT OF JEW ROTHSCHILD ) BEATING DHOLAKS AND SHAKING ASS , HAS NEVER BEEN PART OF HINDUISM.<br />\n<br />\nBHAJANS IN VERNACULAR ARE NOT MANTRAS IN SANSKRIT..<br />\n<br />\nIn the opening verses of the 17th chapter OF Bhagwad Gita , Krishna says that faith results from our most steadfast convictions.<br />\n<br />\nWhen our mind is pure, he says, we find faith in benevolence, having little attachment to what we ourselves can gain.<br />\n<br />\nAt such times, faith leads us to value yoga as a means for curtailing sorrow and suffering, and for directing our mind toward transcendental truths.<br />\n<br />\nYoga itself is an act of faith arising from the heart, and by having faith in the fundamental aims of yoga, \u201ca faithful person obtains knowledge.\u201d (Bhagawad Gita 4.39- 4000 BC)<br />\n<br />\nA Hindu free of BHAKTI dogma ( like in other single holy book religions ) is skeptical when this question of trust / faith arises because faith is always understood to be blind faith.<br />\n<br />\nShraddha is more than mere faith. It also implies self\u2013reliance, an independent sense of right and wrong, reliance on conscience and the courage of one\u2019s own conviction<br />\n<br />\nSHRADDA WAS REPLACED BY BHAKTI (BLIND DEVOTION ) AND SANATANA DHARMA WAS HIJACKED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD ..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_158BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_175M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/blockchain-bitcoin-big-brother-will.html?showComment=1513185259860#c4671100578196233665\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">December 13, 2017 at 10:44 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_175MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nPhysicists in China and the US have built a 10-qubit superconducting quantum processor that could be scaled up to tackle problems not solvable by classical computers.<br />\n<br />\nQubits are the building blocks of quantum computing, capable of superposition \u2013 being in two states at the same time, rather than the computer bits of today, which are either a 1 or a 0 at any given moment.<br />\n<br />\nEntanglement is where quantum states can't be described independently, but only in relation to the others, making for a more solid system. The team used a measurement technique called quantum tomography to prove that they had indeed entangled their qubits<br />\n<br />\nThe phenomenon of entanglement in quantum physics, which has been observed in many experiments, implies that objects that are far removed in space (even across billions of miles) remain connected even though there is no mediating agency.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/quantum-entanglement-video-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nVedic philosophy tells us about the existence of another type of particle called the atma, the soul, the self, having different properties from those of ordinary particles.This is not unusual in physics, as is the case with antimatter particles.<br />\n<br />\nThe atma does not come into or out of existence, it is always present. It does not decay or degrade, it maintains its individuality always, it\u2019s infinitesimally small and it\u2019s not composed of more elementary particles. It\u2019s unchangeable, which along with the individuality property implies that it does not unite with other particles to create more complex structures, nor does it merge with others.<br />\n<br />\nThe atma does not interact directly with matter, but given that the atma is the source of consciousness and the life force in a living entity, any entity displaying them reveals the presence of an atma in it\u2014whether human, animal, plant, etc.<br />\n<br />\nVedanta wrote 7000 years ago-- The living entities are not made up of atmas; rather, they are these particles and are animating the material bodies that encase them. As soon as the atma leaves one body for another, the old body no longer exhibits consciousness or life symptoms, and begins to degrade.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/daltons-atomic-theory-sage-kashyapa-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nMaharishi Kashyapa is also known as Kanada Muni. He called the atom Anu. He wrote that there are 108 such elements ...<br />\n<br />\nThe basic Vaisheshika concepts of matter, action, attribute, time and space are described. The 8500 year old Nyaya-Vaiseshika Sutra of Kanada Muni consists of 373 Sutras and is composed of 12 chapters.<br />\n<br />\nIt\u2019s main postulates are:--<br />\n<br />\nAll of the universe is composed of the 5 mahabhuttas and the 4 non physicals: that is Fluid, Atomic elements, fields/force, energy, ether and space, time, mind and soul.<br />\n<br />\nExcept ether, all of the physical elements are made of discreet and distinct paramanus or atoms<br />\n<br />\nSpace-time is a frame in which the physical universe exists<br />\n<br />\nThere are seven categories of experience, which are substance, quality, activity, generality, particularity, inherence, and nonexistence.<br />\n<br />\nEnergy and mass are equivalent.<br />\n<br />\nHere are some of the Sutras: ---<br />\n<br />\nForce is that which displaces, holds together or moves things apart.V.S 1.1.20<br />\nIn the absence of a force, a particle of matter experiences no change. V.S 1.1.6<br />\nThe forces to be considered are an external force, gravity, that with causes attraction of particles, that which causes repulsion of particles and the internal movements of them in matter.<br />\n<br />\nV.S 1.1.13 Action is opposed by an equivalent opposite reaction<br />\nV.S 5.1.1618 The diversities of the movement of an arrow are due to the consecutive changes in the components of the acting forces. The stored energy provides the propulsion to the arrow and this causes it move further to a high point. This component keeps reducing while that of gravity increases resulting in its fall.Once the work against gravity ceases then the body reaches an energyless state falling under gravity.<br />\nV.S 1.1.27 The force on a body is the resultant of gravity and the work done against it.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_175BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBBVAD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_173T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBBVAD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_173TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_173TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_173TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBBVAD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBBVAD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_173TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_173TN\"></span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_173TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBBVAD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_173B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5923840167230626705\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_173M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_173MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nV.S 5.1.13 In the absence of all other forces (saMyogabindings) gravity exists.<br />\nV.S 5.1.7 The \u201cguna\u201d of forces (direction) prevents a magnitude from being obtained<br />\nV.S.1.1.20a The nature of physical changes in matter is the terms of work being done on the basic particles that constitute matter.<br />\nV.S 2.1.14 The particular nature of air is suggested by the mixing of gases that occurs on their collision. Despite of being made of atoms and occupying space air fails show orderly movement so its form cannot be perceived<br />\nV.S 4.1.8 Solids occupy space and assume form due to conglomeration of the constituent particles.<br />\nV.S 4.1.6 The (fluid\u2019s) particles possess energy. This causes them to possess the property of fluidity. The heat bearing rays provide the particles with energy to form a gas and rise. The heated particles of air impact the vapor and with this energy it mixes with it. Freezing and melting of a liquid as being a result of heat being taken up or given up by its particles.<br />\nV.S 5.2.9 Some apparently solid substances like ghee, lac and wax are in reality liquids, as their particles are naturally \u201cheat-conjoined\u201d or disorganized as in water. Other true solid substances such as tin, lead, iron, silver and gold need their atoms to be supplied with external heat to disorder them before they become a fluid.<br />\nV.S 2.1.67 Any body\u2019s mass needs to be wholly explained in terms of its constituent particles.<br />\nV.S 1.1.89 A substance can only emerge from another substance and not on its own eventhough its properties change from one to another.<br />\nV.S 9.1.9 Any fundamental particular entity can be a constituent multiple substances.<br />\nV.S 1.1.22 Any substance comprising of two or more primary particle types requires a chemical reaction to generate the conjoining and break up of preexisting molecules.<br />\nV.S 1.1.23 The \u201cmolecules\u201d are stated as emerging from combinations between the fundamental entities.<br />\nV.S 1.1.25 Forces are necessary to bring about combination and break up of molecules.<br />\nV.S 1.1.28 The combinations of particles to produce molecules result in substances with states very different from those of the original particles.<br />\n<br />\nKanada Muni\u2019s laws:<br />\n<br />\nIn the production or increment of karma (i.e. motion), the root cause is force. In other words, there is incremental or decremental change in motion.<br />\nThis law is a law of the measure of force. According to this, so long mechanical force works, there is change in motion i.e. there is momentum. To find its value, it is calculated how much work it produces in a unit time.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_173MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_173BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_173B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_174B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c466643263114631994\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_174M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_174MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2--<br />\n<br />\nMathematically, the rate of change in momentum i.e. the increment in work in unit time is proportional to the force in action. Also, this change is in the direction of the force. Suppose that the mass of an object is \u2018m\u2019 and in time interval \u2018t\u2019, the velocity of the object changes from \u2018u\u2019 to \u2018v\u2019 due to the force acting on it.<br />\n<br />\nThen, Initial momentum = m*u<br />\nFinal momentum = m*v<br />\nChange in momentum = m(v*u)<br />\nTherefore, the rate of change of momentum = m(v*u)/t<br />\nt = m*a (from Kanada\u2019s first law)<br />\n<br />\nFrom Kandas second law, force is proportional to the rate of change of momentum<br />\nOr, p = k*m*a (where k is a constant)<br />\nIf m=1 and a=1, then<br />\n1 = k*1*1 or k = 1<br />\nOr, p = m*a<br />\n<br />\nTherefore, unit force is the one that produces unit acceleration in an object of unit mass. The VS then goes to say that force is a result of work and is not a physical quantity which is superior to Newtons law that measures it as a physical quantity.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nThe sutras on energy:<br />\n<br />\nVaiseshika defines energy as being a radiant thing(i.e. energy is radiation) and energy is related totemperature and motion of a particle.<br />\n<br />\nVedic Indians understood the process of refraction and absorbtion of energy by \u201cmaterial obstructions\u201d and they understood heat, electricity and magnetism to be forms of energy. It is already understood by the elemental theory that light is also an energy and is composed of discreet units.<br />\n<br />\nThis was of course was not understood in modern times till Max Plank and Einstein in the 20th cetury devised quantum theory after the study of black body radiation and the photoelectric effect.<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_174B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><ol id=\"bc_0_176TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_172B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1348481307020028419\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_172M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. A girl like goddess born to humans. 'There was none on earth to match her loveliness. Gods, anti-gods, and yakshas yearned for such celestial beauty.' (169:45-47, Adi Parva, Mahabharata)<br />\n<br />\nDraupadi\u2019s biological parents were Agni and Swaha . She was adopted by Drupad, King of Panchala, which is why her name was changed from Agni Jyotsna to Princess of Panchala to Drupad Kanya to Draupadi. The sages called her Yajna Seni as she was born from the sacrificial fire.<br />\n<br />\nShe was a fully grown woman, dressed in the best of sSilk, unusually rare jewelry. A dark complexioned maiden, so dark, that when her hair brushed over her face, the black raven like hair, looked golden brown, so dark was her complexion.<br />\n<br />\nVoluptuous with a slender waist. She had a naturally aromatic odor that could be sensed a \u2018yojana\u2019 away (a measurement for distance).<br />\n<br />\nDraupadi as Kundalini has five human chakras she has to cross before she finds refuge in the topmost Sahasrara chakra ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE BASTARD WHITE INVADER MADE DRAUPADI A DAUGHTER (NALAYANI ) OF NALA AND DAMAYANTI IN HER PREVIOUS BIRTH .. WE IN INDIA NEVER HEARD OF NALA AND DAMAYANTI TILL THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA.<br />\n<br />\nRAHU AND KETU WERE WOVEN INTO THE \"BHAKTI MOVEMENT \" BULLSHIT STORY .. ROTHSCHILD GOT THIS FAKE STORY ADAPTED INTO KERALA KATHAKALI..<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHITE BASTARDS WROTE A BULLSHIT BOOK ON COOKERY ( PAKADARPANAM-- WITH BEEF ) AND TOLD THAT NALA , AN EXCELLENT COOK WROTE IT. ROTHSCHILD GOT THE CRYPTO JEW KARALA PRINCE RAVI VARMA TO PAINT NALA AND DAMAYANTI.<br />\n<br />\nTHE BHAKTi MOVEMENT AND ITS HEROES WERE CREATED AND BACKDATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD.. IN HINDUSIM WE HAVE ONLY SHRADDHA \u2013NEVER BHAKTI..<br />\n<br />\nEVERY DASA OF THE BHAKTI MOVEMENT IS FAKE AND BACKDATED<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/kalidasa-did-not-exist-jainism-is.html<br />\n<br />\nIN FUTURE IF ANTI-HINDUS AND JNU COMMIES MAKE FUN OF DRAUPADI--WE SHALL THROW THEM INTO JAIL<br />\n<br />\nENOUGH IS ENOUGH!<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_175B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div>\n<br /></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_174B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8984368294814858237\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_9M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; You have known neither paradise nor hell. Here there is no happiness, no punishment, no family, no enemies. Rise in tranquility. Here words end, like thought. This was your last illusion- the veil of MAYA is now lifted .\u201d<br />\n<br />\nTHE SHALLOW MIND OF THE WHITE MAN CANNOT UNDERSTAND WHAT I WROTE ABOVE<br />\n<br />\nThe philosophy of ancient India is quite diverse and complex in structure. So complex, in fact, that almost all have given up on making sense of this kaleidoscope\u2014till Quantum physics came on the scene.<br />\n<br />\nYet since the advent of quantum physics reveals that Vedanta is beyond the cutting edge of physics, which is only now, discovering the illusory nature of physical reality and the existence of subtler energy and information currents behind all that we see.<br />\n<br />\nVedanta is the very science of consciousness at both human and cosmic levels. It recognises consciousness as the ultimate reality and affirms its presence in all existence.<br />\n<br />\nModern physicists have looked to Vedanta for understanding their proposed unitary field of consciousness behind the universe, to explain the coherence of all cosmic laws and understand the THEORY OF EVERYTHING represented by the divine geometry of Sri Yantra ( the geometry of OM)<br />\n<br />\nVedanta is the unitary philosophy explaining the oneness of the individual soul with the universal consciousness.<br />\n<br />\nSuperluminal communication is a hypothetical process in which information is sent at faster-than-light (FTL) speeds. If wormholes are possible, then ordinary subluminal methods of communication could be sent through them to achieve superluminal transmission speeds<br />\n<br />\nOn the surface Quantum Physics (QP) and Vedanta may look very different. One is part of the scientific tradition and the other in some ways is philosophy soaked in spirituality.<br />\n<br />\nScience is trying to understand the universe \u2018out there\u2019 and Vedanta addressed the universe \u2018inside you\u2019\u201d<br />\n<br />\nOne of the fundamental difference between western philosophy, with that,of Vedanta is that ,the western philosophy believe the universe and everything in the universe belongs to god.<br />\n<br />\nOn the other hand Vedanta philosophy believe that god himself present in each and every atom of this creation ,god is present not only in human, but even in animals ,plants , rocks ,stars planets atom and molecules.<br />\n<br />\nTo a Vedantic every part of this universe is dynamic, it is vibrating, it is listening and can respond according to ones KARMA, It can be by action and can be purely thought. The universe listens to our action as well as thought and gives in return what exactly we want either knowingly or unknowingly, weather it is bad or good.<br />\n<br />\nThe scientific tradition is about Science of object. And Vedanta is called science of consciousness or science of subject. And is not a philosophy<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_9BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_9b+seedEdduD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_6T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_9b+seedEdduD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_6TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_6TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_6TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_9b+seedEdduD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_9b+seedEdduD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_6TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_6TN\"></span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_6TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_9b+seedEdduD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_6B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7603640773661651980\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_6M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_30.html?showComment=1514595060183#c7603640773661651980\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">December 30, 2017 at 6:21 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_6MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nMundaka Upanishad says: \u201cJust as a spider projects its own web and then re-absorbs it into its own body, so also That One Reality projects this variegated universe and then absorbs it back into it.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nSanatana Dharma views the universe as an inseparable web, whose interconnections are dynamic and not static, the cosmic web is alive; it moves and grows and changes continually.<br />\n<br />\nModern physics, too, has come to conceive of the universe as such a web of relations and, like Vedanta, has recognized that this web is intrinsically dynamic. The dynamic aspect of matter arises in quantum theory as a consequence of the wave-nature of subatomic particles.<br />\n<br />\nTalking about the Quantum Physics we stumbled upon the most bizarre result of quantum theory came when Bell\u2019s theorem and subsequent experiments proved the so called entanglements to be right. In such cases, two or more atoms, electrons or photons demonstrate correlated properties even at distances where no communication is possible between them during the given time.<br />\n<br />\nThese developments are the most important developments in the history of physics and perhaps in the whole of science. They give rise to the idea of the interconnected wholeness of the world and non-local interactions in contrast to the separate identities with local interactions.<br />\n<br />\nThe Kerala school of math used math as a spiritual activity \u2013based on which astrology thrived. They used math as a most subtle and rigorous form of thought.<br />\n<br />\nBoth Pythagoras and Plato studied in the Kerala school of Math at Kodungallur university and they introduced this concept to the west without really understanding the depth<br />\n<br />\nEven today, the modern mind has NOT reached the bottom of the ancient Indian sage\u2019s mind.<br />\n<br />\nThe white historian must know that ENTIRE Greek philosophy was stolen from Indian philosophy written 4500 years earlier.<br />\n<br />\nGreeks never really understood the real essence of profound subjects like Epistemology, though Indian sages taught them in their own lands. Pythagoras ( died 495 BC ) and Plato studied in India. Aristotle lifted from Vedanta material taken out of India<br />\n<br />\nPlato ( died 348 BC ) , a homosexual shared his stolen from Kodungallur University spoils with his mentor Socrates ( died 399 BC ) , and fellow homosexual side kick Aristotle ( died 322 BC ) and got himself immortalized as the founder of the Academy in Athens, the first institution of higher learning in the Western world.<br />\n<br />\nAristotle, Socrates and Plato were hardcore homosexuals . Aristotle initiated Alexander the great into homosexuality.<br />\n<br />\nQuantum Teleportation ( mentioned in Vedas ) has been achieved. Scientists from China recently set the record for the farthest quantum teleportation ever, when they beamed a photon in its quantum state into orbit. This brings several quantum mechanical concepts into the equation, including quantum entanglement.<br />\n<br />\nTeleportation is a verification of Quantum Entanglement<br />\n<br />\nAction at a distance implies that a physical object can be moved by non-physical means, so not by touch or physical force. With entanglement, it means that either information is travelling FAR FAR faster than the speed of light ( VEDAS SAYS IT IS INSTANTANEOUS )<br />\n<br />\nWorldview paradigms are changing, yet old scientific dogma ( THANKS TO THE CUNT POPE ) still sticks around and dominates.<br />\n<br />\nQuantum entanglement\u2014 physics at its strangest \u2014 ( written down in Vedas 7000 years ago ) has moved out of this world and into space.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/quantum-entanglement-video-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nA team of Chinese physicists sent eerily intertwined quantum particles from a satellite to ground stations separated by 1200 kilometers, smashing the previous world record.<br />\n<br />\nThe result is a stepping stone to ultrasecure communication networks and, eventually, a space-based quantum internet.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_6MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_6BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_6B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_7B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2849351715198825203\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_7M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_30.html?showComment=1514595161341#c2849351715198825203\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">December 30, 2017 at 6:22 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_7MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2-<br />\n<br />\nEntanglement involves putting objects in the peculiar limbo of quantum superposition, in which an object's quantum properties occupy multiple states at once<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/schrodinger-father-of-quantum-physics.html</span><br />\n<br />\nPhysicists have entangled particles such as electrons and photons, as well as larger objects such as superconducting electric circuits.<br />\n<br />\nTheoretically, even if entangled objects are separated, their precarious quantum states should remain linked until one of them is measured or disturbed. That measurement instantly determines the state of the other object, no matter how far away. The idea is so counterintuitive that IDIOT Albert Einstein mocked it as \"spooky action at a distance.\"<br />\n<br />\nIn 2015, the most sophisticated of these tests, which involved measuring entangled electrons 1.3 kilometers apart, showed once again that spooky action is real.<br />\n<br />\nBeyond the fundamental result, such experiments also point to the possibility of hack-proof communications.<br />\n<br />\nLong strings of entangled photons, shared between distant locations, can be \"quantum keys\" that secure communications. Anyone trying to eavesdrop on a quantum-encrypted message would disrupt the shared key, alerting everyone to a compromised channel.<br />\n<br />\nPSSSSTTT-- BEFORE CHINA INVENTS THE QUANTUM SATELLITE--WE MUST BREAK THE NATION INTO 4 PARTS AND HAVE TIBET AS A NEIGHBOUR<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nEntangled photons degrade rapidly as they pass through the air or optical fibers. So far, the farthest anyone has sent a quantum key is a few hundred kilometers.<br />\n<br />\nOnce you have satellites distributing your quantum signals throughout the globe, you've done it,--You've leapfrogged all the problems you have with losses in fibers.<br />\n<br />\nJian-Wei Pan, a physicist at the University of Science and Technology of China in Shanghai, got the chance to test the idea when the Micius satellite, was launched in August 2016. The satellite is the foundation of the $100 million Quantum Experiments at Space Scale program<br />\n<br />\nBell's theorem is a \"no-go theorem\" that draws an important distinction between quantum mechanics (QM) and the world as described by classical mechanics<br />\n<br />\nIn its simplest form, Bell's theorem states: No physical theory of local hidden variables can ever reproduce all of the predictions of quantum mechanics.<br />\n<br />\nBell's theorem is the most profound discovery of science.and it is lifted straight out of the Vedas<br />\n<br />\nThere is no need for a faster-than-light signal to tell particle A what measurement has been carried out on particle B, because the universe, including particle A, already 'knows' what that measurement, and its outcome, will be.<br />\n<br />\nLOT OF MY DETRACTORS WERE GUFFAWING LIKE DONKEY WHO HAVE SEEN FRESH SHIT WHEN THEY HEARD THAT MY WIFE MATCHED MORE THAN 500 HOROSCOPES FOR MY ELDER SONs BRIDE<br />\n<br />\nBell\u2019s theorem and subsequent experiments proved the so called entanglements to be right. In such cases, two or more atoms, electrons or photons demonstrate correlated properties even at distances where no communication is possible between them during the given time.<br />\n<br />\nThese developments are the most important developments in the history of physics and the whole of science. They agree with Vedanta. They give rise to the idea of the interconnected wholeness of the world and non-local interactions in contrast to the separate identities with local interactions.<br />\n<br />\nIn their first experiment, the Chinese team sent a laser beam into a light-altering crystal on the satellite. The crystal emitted pairs of photons entangled so that their polarization states would be opposite when one was measured.<br />\n<br />\nThe pairs were split, with photons sent to separate receiving stations in Delingha and Lijiang, 1200 kilometers apart. Both stations are in the mountains of Tibet, reducing the amount of air the fragile photons had to traverse., the team reports simultaneously measuring more than 1000 photon pairs.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 4--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_7MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_7BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_7B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_8B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5265314992318285551\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_8M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_30.html?showComment=1514595226017#c5265314992318285551\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">December 30, 2017 at 6:23 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_8MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 3-<br />\n<br />\nThey found the photons had opposite polarizations far more often than would be expected by chance, thus confirming spooky action over a record distance<br />\n<br />\nThe team had to overcome many hurdles, including keeping the beams of photons focused on the ground stations as the satellite hurtled through space at nearly 8 kilometers per second.<br />\n<br />\nPan baby's team recovered only about one photon out of every 6 million sent from the satellite\u2014far better than ground-based experiments but still far too few for practical quantum communication.<br />\n<br />\nPan expects China's National Space Science Center to launch additional satellites with stronger and cleaner beams that could be detected even when the sun is shining. (Micius operates only at night.)<br />\n<br />\nIn the next 5 years we plan to launch some really practical quantum satellites, Pan baby says \u2013and I believe him<br />\n<br />\nIn the meantime, Pan baby plans to use Micius to distribute quantum keys to Chinese ground stations, which will require longer strings of photons and additional steps.<br />\n<br />\nThen he wants to demonstrate intercontinental quantum key distribution between stations in China and Austria, which will require holding one half of an entangled photon pair on board until the Austrian ground station appears within view of the satellite.<br />\nPan baby also plans to teleport a quantum state\u2014a technique for transferring quantum-encoded information without moving an actual object\u2014from a third Tibetan observatory to the satellite.<br />\n<br />\nMY ELDER SONs CODING PARTNER IS A CHINK--HE SAYS IS VERY INTELLIGENT<br />\n<br />\nEuropean and U.S. teams are also proposing putting quantum instruments on the International Space Station. One goal is to test whether entanglement is affected by a changing gravitational field, by comparing a photon that stays in the weaker gravitational environment of orbit with an entangled partner sent to Earth.<br />\n<br />\nThere are not many experiments which test links between gravity and quantum physics.<br />\n<br />\nThe implications go beyond record-setting demonstrations: A network of satellites will soon connect the quantum computers being designed in labs worldwide.<br />\n<br />\nAgain --quantum entanglement, one of the odder aspects of quantum theory, links the properties of particles even when they are separated by large distances. When a property of one of a pair of entangled particles is measured, the other \"immediately\" settles down into a state compatible with that measurement.<br />\n<br />\nSo how fast is \"immediately\"?<br />\n<br />\nAccording to research by Prof. Juan Yin and colleagues at the University of Science and Technology of China in Shanghai, the lower limit to the speed associated with entanglement dynamics \u2013 or \"spooky action at a distance\" \u2013 is at least 10,000 times faster than light.<br />\n<br />\nVedas says INSTANTANEOUSLY<br />\n<br />\nNiels Bohr, one of the prime developers of quantum theory, once said that those who are not shocked when they first encounter quantum theory cannot possibly have understood it. Eighty years later, this is still true, and applies even to those of us who first encountered quantum theory decades ago.<br />\n<br />\nVEDAS SAYS THAT DARK MATTER ( KALI ) HAS SPEED TOO.<br />\n<br />\nDark matter is a constant sea of matter traveling the opposite direction in the timeline, only appearing for a moment, travelling beyond light-speed, exerting gravity.<br />\n<br />\nGravity is the result of an amount of matter pulling itself together, to create compressive force toward the center, which curves all energy paths both directions in the 4th dimension The closer to center-of-gravity, the faster energy moves, hence the inward pull of gravity. The gravity \u201cfield\u201d is the area where spacetime tries to even itself out.<br />\n<br />\nLIGHT FROM QUASARS ( SARASWATI ) IS FASTER THAN LIGHT .<br />\n<br />\nCUNT Isaac Newtons \"isolated systems \" are NOT found in nature. SOULS PARKING AT ONE OF THE SEVEN\nASTRAL LAYERS<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYAMA ( DHARMA ) IN THE FORM OF A DOG JOINS THIS GROUP WE ALL WERE BORN WITH THE\nSTARS .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYOU , YOUR GREAT GRANDFATHER AND YOU WOULD BE GREAT GRANDSON\nWERE ALL BORN AT THE SAME SPLIT SECOND.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nVISHNU AVATARS WERE NOT BORN WITH THE STARS LIKE YOU AND ME\n. THEIR SOULS WERE CREATED AND SENT DOWN FOR A PURPOSE ON EARTH.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAFTER THEIR MISSION ON EARTH WAS OVER , THEIR SOULS MERGED\nBACK TO BRAHMAN ON SEVENTH ASTRA LAYER ( VAIKUNTA ).<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIT IS IMPOSSIBLE FOR CON-MEN TO CLAIM THAT THEY ARE\nDESCENDANTS OF RAMA OR KRISHNA..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nALL MORTALS ON EARTH LIKE YOU AND ME --WERE BORN WITH THE\nSTARS--THE SAME SPLIT SECOND<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHIS MEANS YOUR GREAT GRANDFATHER, YOU AND YOUR GREATGRANSON\nWAS BORN AT THE SAME SPILT SECOND.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWE WERE ALL PART OF THE MOTHER FIELD NAMED BRAHMAN ON THE\nSEVENTH ASTRAL LAYER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHIS IS WHY HINDUS DO NAMASTE\u2014WE HONOUR THE PIECE OF BRAHMAN\nWITHIN THE OTHER PERSON.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE GOD OF SANATANA DHARMA IS A \"MORHOGENETEIC\nCONSCIOUSNESS FIELD- BRAHMAN \" WHICH CANNOT HE PICKED UP BY THE 5\nSENSES--ON MICRO AND MACRO SCALE.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nON MICRO SCALE THIS EMPTY SPACE ( INTELLIGENT FIELD )\nPROVIDES PERPETUAL MOTION WITHIN AN ATOM.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/perpetual-motion-of-orbiting-electrons.html<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nON MACRO SCALE IT IS AKASHA ( ETHER ) WHERE THE ENTIRE\nCOSMOS HOLDS THEIR POSITIONS<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIn Dvaita Hinduism opposite poles Tamas and Rajas are\nconscious of each other. Tamas creates Rajas, and Rajas activates/ excites\nTamas. Sattva preserves and mediates .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n7000 year old Vedas say that the only constant in the cosmos\nis change, everything is in a state of flux, nothing is static-- everything is\nvibratory. This is what guarantees growth and evolution. It is a cosmic\nspiraling dance of separate opposing forces, which sustains this universe<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nOne cannot exist without the other and they are dependant .\nNo phenomenon in this universe is completely devoid of its opposite. They\nconsume each other yet support each other.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIf the restraining balance or equilibrium is lost by the\nmediator ( Vishnu ) , the universe will spiral out of control and end. This is\nwhy Lord Vishnu is called the PRESERVER god. And only Vishnu can have mortal\navatars.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAs for the opposing forces TAMAS/ RAJAS ( Brahma/ Shiva ) it\nreally does NOT matter as who is who, like in AC electricity-where you can plug\ninto the socket both ways.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThese two opposing forces are natural and transform each\nother , in perfect harmony. Harmony can never be stagnant . Lessening of Tamas\nalways results in increase of Rajas and vice versa.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nBalance can never be permanent\u2014 Tamas and Rajas continiously\ndevour each other \u2013 and life flows on. This universe cannot exist without\nvibrations between two poles.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE THIRD TEMPLATE IS SAMKHYA<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED TO 5-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCapt. Ajit VadakayilAugust 13, 2018 at 7:48 AM<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED FROM 4--<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThis is about the male and female joint TEAM effort. This is\nNOT a dance of opposites. In Hinduism we call the MALE- purusha and FEMALE-\nprakriti.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIn the Tantric cosmology, the whole universe is perceived as\nbeing created, penetrated and sustained by two fundamental forces, which are\npermanently in a perfect, indestructible UNION. These forces or universal\naspects are called Shiva ( Purusha ) and Shakti (Prakriti ).<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nEach of the trinity gods are powerless without their\nconsorts.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPurusha and Pragati is expressed as Shiva and Shakti in the\nsame body 50:50 \u2013 this is NOT a she boy or a transgender . It is a\nmindboggling, intelligent concept.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nBoth Shiva and Shakti are Consciousness---- Shiva is the\nchangeless static aspect of Consciousness, and Shakti is the kinetic, active\naspect of the same Consciousness.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThrough uniting with Purusha , Pragati gave form to his\nspirit and created the universe.(we are talking about CREATION OF THE COSMOS\nhere- not street side sex as figured out by small minds)<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWhen the insentient Prakriti comes in contact with the\nsentient Purusha , the universe evolves.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPurusha symbolizes consciousness, the masculine principle.\nPragati symbolizes the feminine principle, the activating energy.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe cosmos in all its manifestations, as an act of love. The\nrelationship between say- Shakti and Shiva is the dance of consciousness and\nenergy<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPrakriti cannot be perceived, not because of its\nnon-existence, but because of its subtlety. It is perceived in its effects.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe eternal and indestructible union between Shiva and\nShakti gives birth to the whole Macrocosm, in its stable, static aspect as well\nas in its dynamic one. Not only is Shakti responsible for creation, it is also\nthe agent of all change<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nShakti is manifested by Shiva only during creation and is\nwithdrawn into himself at the end of creation. This is for the perceptive.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nModern science repeats from our Vedas that matter and energy\nare interchangeable. So does consciousness and energy .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSamkhya as you can see was a masterpiece of modeling the\nways of the inner universe.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe union of Shakti with Shiva by Kundalini rise is the\nliberation of seeker from the cycle of endless birth and death.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nDO YOU THINK IDIOTS LIKE SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR AND SADGURU\nJAGGI VASUDEV CAN EVER UNDERSTAND THIS\u2014THEIR PADMA VIBHUSHAN MINDS ARE TOO\nSMALL AND THINKING PROCESS TOO PETTY<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nREAD ALL 102 PARTS OF THE UNFINISHED POST BELOW-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\ncapt ajit vadakayil<o:p></o:p></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>THIS POST IS NOW CONTINUED TO PART 22, BELOW</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot;
