font-size: x-large;\"><b>THIS POST IS A CONTINUATION OF PART 4 &nbsp;BELOW--</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/04/apollonius-or-jesus-christ-who-is-real_16.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/04/apollonius-or-jesus-christ-who-is-real_16.html</b></span></a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-PLIQ6bq0VJw/Vz6udmgwiKI/AAAAAAABIrQ/bfDxgdAu544xDQJvi4K9TNWYAXotp9CwQCLcB/s1600/a7WW226c8a4d905d5b3def6ae5b101aef979.1000x469x1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-PLIQ6bq0VJw/Vz6udmgwiKI/AAAAAAABIrQ/bfDxgdAu544xDQJvi4K9TNWYAXotp9CwQCLcB/s640/a7WW226c8a4d905d5b3def6ae5b101aef979.1000x469x1.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SORRY JEWS,&nbsp; &nbsp;SORRY\nCHRISTIANS \u2013 &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YOUR LIES OF TWO\nMILLINIUMS IS NOW COMING CRASHING DOWN.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All the contemporary\nauthors of Apollonius&nbsp; mention that the\nFirst Century Essenes, far from being a sect of metaphysical speculators, were,\non the contrary, men of action who put into practice their religious, moral,\nsocial and scientific conceptions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chaeremon of Alexandia\na famous astrologer,&nbsp; grammarian ,\nintellectual par excellence and philospher&nbsp;\nlived in the times of Apollonius .&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\nHe wrote about Essenes \u2013he was an Namboodiri from Kerala.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-OvV0tUlAkfs/Vxm7V1OzMyI/AAAAAAABHvQ/BJBuq97y_JMOcLD-5XYzj3o0-RErS-UhgCLcB/s1600/CHAEREMON.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-OvV0tUlAkfs/Vxm7V1OzMyI/AAAAAAABHvQ/BJBuq97y_JMOcLD-5XYzj3o0-RErS-UhgCLcB/s400/CHAEREMON.png\" width=\"237\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 49 AD Chaeremon was\nsummoned to Rome, with Alexander of Aegae, to become tutor to the young&nbsp; Nero.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nHe was the author of a History of Egypt; of works on Comets, Egyptian\nAstrology, and Hieroglyphics; and of a grammatical treatise on Expletive\nConjunctions.&nbsp; Chaeremon was the chief of\nthe party which explained the Egyptian religious system as a mere allegory of\nthe cosmos like in Hinduism..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chaeremon was the head\nof a branch of the great library of Alexandria that was attached to the Temple\nof Serapis in that city.&nbsp; Now as such a\nranking official at a very important temple: Chaeremon was also a high-ranking\nmember of the priesthood.&nbsp;&nbsp; Thus\nChaeremon's days were spent in and around books as well as&nbsp; tutoring and participation in religious\nrituals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Both the Jews and\nChristians have used Josephus\u2019s name to inject foul LIES all over the place\nabout Chaeremon , &nbsp;as he told the bitter\ntruth about Jew history with respect to CANNIBALISM.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>Whether the Jews accept\nthis or not, this cannibalistic practice has a lot to do with their warped DNA.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Muslims are taught to\ndie rather than eat pig when in extreme hunger to survive. &nbsp; Pakistanis must know that their HERO Mohammad Ali Jinnah ( CRYPTO JEW ) survived almost a decade on pig sandwiches and neat whisky-- both HARAAM..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the books of\nLeviticus and Deuteronomy, there is a positive admonition to engage in cannibalism\nwhen it is required (as opposed to starvation)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tanakh we discover that\ncannibalism is endorsed ( as long as you do NOT eat a fellow Jew )-- in the\nsecond book of Kings, where we are told that:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">'And there was a great\nfamine in Samar'ia, as they besieged it, until a donkey's head was sold for\neighty shekels of silver, and the fourth part of a kab of dove's dung for five\nshekels of silver. &nbsp;Now as the king of\nIsrael was passing by upon the wall, a woman cried out to him, saying, \u201cHelp,\nmy lord, O king!\u201d &nbsp;And he said, \u201cIf the\nLord will not help you, how shall I help you?&nbsp;\n&nbsp;From the threshing floor, or from\nthe wine press?\u201d &nbsp;And the king asked her,\n\u201cWhat is your trouble?\u201d&nbsp; &nbsp;She answered, \u201cThis woman said to me, '&nbsp;&nbsp; Give me your son, that we may eat him today,\nand we will eat my son tomorrow.' &nbsp;&nbsp;So we\nboiled my son, and ate him. &nbsp;&nbsp;And on the\nnext day I said to her, 'Give me your son, that we may eat him'; but she has\nhidden her son.\u201d &nbsp;&nbsp;When the king heard\nthe words of the woman he tore his clothes \u2013 now he was passing by upon the\nwall \u2013 and the people looked, and behold, he had sackcloth beneath upon his\nbody \u2013 and he said, \u201cMay God do so to me, and more also, if the head of Eli'sha\nthe son of Sha'phat remains on his shoulders today.\u201d' </span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I can give dozens of\nsuch examples\u2014one is enough ! &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>AARGGHH &nbsp; &nbsp;PPTTHHOOOOYYY\n!!</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SOMEONE CALLED ME\u2014AUTHENTICATE\nYOURSELF \u2013<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PHIR TOH YEH LEH !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the book of Isaiah:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">'For wickedness burns\nlike a fire, it consumes briers and thorns; it kindles the thickets of the\nforest, and they roll upward in a column of smoke. Through the wrath of the\nLord of hosts the land is burned, and the people are like fuel for the fire; no\nman spares his brother. They snatch on the right, but are still hungry, and\nthey devour on the left, but are not satisfied; each devours his neighbour's\nflesh.' <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">'I will make your\noppressors eat their own flesh, and they shall be drunk with their own blood as\nwith wine. Then all flesh shall know that I am the Lord your Saviour, and your\nRedeemer, the Mighty One of Jacob.'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the book of Jeremiah:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">'And I will make them\neat the flesh of their sons and their daughters, and every one shall eat the flesh\nof his neighbour in the siege and in the the distress, with which their enemies\nad those who seek their life afflict them.' <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the book of\nLamentations :<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">'Look, O Lord, and see!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With whom have you\ndealt thus?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Should women eat their\noffspring, and the children of their tender care?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Should priest and\nprophet be slain in the sanctuary of the Lord' <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">'The hands of\ncompassionate women have boiled their own children; they have become their food\nin the destruction of the daughter of my people.' <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the book of Ezekiel :<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">'Therefore fathers\nshall eat their sons in the midst of you, and sons shall eat their fathers; and\nI will execute judgments on you, and any of you who survive I will scatter to\nall the winds. Wherefore; as I love, says the Lord God, surely, because you\nhave defiled my sanctuary with all your detestable things and with all your\nabominations, therefore I will cut you down; my eye will not spare, and I will\nhave no pity.' <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the book of\nZechariah:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">'So I said, \u201cI will not\nbe your shepherd. What is to die, let it die; what is to be destroyed, let it\nbe destroyed, and let those that are left devour the flesh of each other.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>AUR MAAANGTHA HAI KYA?</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Therapeutae is NOT\na Jewish sect in Alexandria &nbsp;but they\nwere Essenes <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The primary source\nconcerning the Therapeutae is the account De vita contemplativa (\"The\nContemplative Life\"), purportedly by the Pagan philosopher Philo of\nAlexandria (c. 20 BCE \u2013 50 CE).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Philo records that they\nwere \"philosophers\" and speaks specifically about a group that lived\non a low hill by the Lake Mareotis close to Alexandria --&nbsp; that they were \"the best\" of a kind\ngiven to \"perfect goodness\" that \"exists in many places in the\ninhabited world\" <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-jncWYyI4Mh4/VxnegKFr_EI/AAAAAAABHv4/abttsh4C8HshTkUXTk30DBsYd-skLOJ4QCLcB/s1600/downloadd.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"245\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-jncWYyI4Mh4/VxnegKFr_EI/AAAAAAABHv4/abttsh4C8HshTkUXTk30DBsYd-skLOJ4QCLcB/s400/downloadd.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The term therapeutes\napplies to healers of the soul<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They lived chastely\nwith utter simplicity; they \"first of all laid down temperance as a sort\nof foundation for the soul to rest upon, proceed to build up other virtues on\nthis foundation\" (Philo) hey were dedicated to the contemplative life, and\ntheir activities for six days of the week consisted of ascetic practices,\nfasting, solitary prayers and the study of the scriptures in their isolated\ncells, each with its separate holy sanctuary, and enclosed courtyard:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Greek traveler,\nDemetrius, circa 200 B.C., wrote that the Therapeutae who worshipped Imhotep &nbsp;used vowel sounds ( Sanskrit Mantras) in their\nhealing rituals: \u2018In Egypt, when priests sing hymns to the Gods they sing the\nseven vowels in due succession and the sound has such euphony that men listen\nto it instead of the flute and the lyre\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Egyptian priests used a\nsistra ( sitar ) , a type of musical instrument &nbsp;that creates a pleasant jangling sound and\ngenerates large amounts of ultrasound. The sistra has healing properties\nbecause it contains virtually the whole spectrum of audible sound. Human cells,\nimmersed in the sistra\u2019s sound field, absorb the frequencies they need and\nreject what is not needed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The healing chapel at\nDeir el-Bahari, Thebes, was dedicated to Amenhotep-son-of-Hapu, a deified\nhealing saint closely associated with Imhotep\u2014who is largely recognized under\nthe title of \u2018physician.\u2019&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Imhotep\u2019s repute was so great that 1,500 years after\nhis death the Greeks identified him with their healing god Asclepius.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-63QZL91eZy8/VxnYozIex5I/AAAAAAABHvg/tk4TioMgX6EMCUoTqRk-gPMsEoN058aGgCLcB/s1600/Asclepius_ajnnd_hygieia_relief.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-63QZL91eZy8/VxnYozIex5I/AAAAAAABHvg/tk4TioMgX6EMCUoTqRk-gPMsEoN058aGgCLcB/s640/Asclepius_ajnnd_hygieia_relief.jpg\" width=\"526\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/imhotep-patron-saint-of-freemasons-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/imhotep-patron-saint-of-freemasons-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">John Stuart Reid\u2019s\nacoustics research in the pyramids has shown that the Egyptians designed their temples\n&nbsp;and burial chambers to be reverberant in\norder to enhance sonic-based ( BEEJ MANTRA ) ceremonies. Reid underwent a\nsignificant healing of his lower back during his experiments in the King\u2019s\nChamber that he attributes to the resonant properties of the sarcophagus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Iamblichus stated that:\n\u2018Pythagoras considered that sound contributed greatly to health, if used in the\nright way\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;To the accompaniment of Pythagoras\u2019 his\nfollowers would sing in unison certain chants.&nbsp;\nHis disciples employed music as medicine, with certain melodies composed\nto cure the passions of the psyche particularly anger and aggression.\u2019<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/03/beej-mantra-anuswaram-nasal-sound.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/03/beej-mantra-anuswaram-nasal-sound.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just in case someone\nwonders why SNAKES are all around the place , when it comes to gods and healers\u2014read\nthe post below-&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;In Kerala we have the Snake temple tradition .\n&nbsp;&nbsp;On Shiva snake represents raised Kundalini.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/king-cobra-and-snake-temples-of-kerala.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/king-cobra-and-snake-temples-of-kerala.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-zbgZFg4cpA4/VxnZ4nafvII/AAAAAAABHvo/q5fb9wQxgLAdUiNtFxcASl-Zu6oQs8O3ACLcB/s640/12965164_100159v8326599484_1817776158_n.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white invader and\nsuccessive Christian/ Muslim league / Commie govts in Kerala have decimated\nthese snake groves which contained priceless medicinal herbs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8864584842531843605\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Philo described the\nTherapautae in the beginning of the 1st century AD in De vita contemplativa\n(\"On the contemplative life\"), written ca. AD 10. Philo explained the\netymology of their name as meaning either physicians of souls or servants of\nGod.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-P_2ixZrWiI0/VxoMKbg9VJI/AAAAAAABHwM/ZEf1MQW59mceGZt4TTwG97wgzFQZoKNNACLcB/s1600/philoxenitSe4.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-D7kO9s-yPeY/VxoRTCloHfI/AAAAAAABHwk/cp_HUvySczkbCs_Xt-VwQdGj5mlGCczSgCLcB/s1600/Ancient_Egyptian_s.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-D7kO9s-yPeY/VxoRTCloHfI/AAAAAAABHwk/cp_HUvySczkbCs_Xt-VwQdGj5mlGCczSgCLcB/s640/Ancient_Egyptian_s.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Essenes were very\nfond of chanting spiritual verses and were always happy.&nbsp; They were very far removed from the austerity\nand gloom of the later Christian monasteries.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every author &nbsp;praises the melodic beauty of the strange\nverses they chanted , the technical capacities of their musicians, the early\nsunrise prayer cum exercise facing the sun and the plasticity of their\nexercises ( Suryanamaskar ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/surya-namaskar-11000-year-old-vedic-sun.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/surya-namaskar-11000-year-old-vedic-sun.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Essenes lived\naround large water bodies- this is an essential part of Sanatana Dharma, as we\nconsider that water holds memory. Their system of education was likewise\ngreatly esteemed by their contemporaries and is described as\n\"peripatetic,\" walks being taken in common by masters and pupils on the\nshores of the lake..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They were good in\nastronomy, astrology and herbal medicine.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Their leaders guided\ntheir communities less by regulation &nbsp;and\nlaw than by their personal example and individual superiority.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All\nthe authors agree that they had secret traditions, practices and teachings,\nwhich were transmissible only by&nbsp; initiates.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Essenes could cure by hands on method or from a distance which is nothing\nbut modern REIKI.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I have NOT yet seen a\nsingle Reiki book talk about why happens during Reiki, and what it is all\nabout. My wife maintains a library of more than 50 Reiki books- they all\nhappily talk about the practical aspects. I have talked to some reiki masters\ntoo , and they know zilch. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even the founder of\nReiki , Mikao Usui did not know what he was doing-- though all this is written\nin the Vedas..</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reiki energy field cannot be measured as\nthey are scalar. However the field can be photographed with a Kirlean camera.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For skeptics-- holding a small double terminated quartz crystal doubles the\nphotographic portion of the aura. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The aura containes the\n7 chakras. The chakras are connected to each other through etheric channels.\nHoles in the aura occurs due to illness , fear and stress.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The human body\ngenerates scalar waves from the mobius coils ( figure of eight ) of the DNA and\nthe mobius coils of the circulatory system. When the left and right sides of\nthe brain lobes and the circulatory system in front of the lungs, are in\nbalance the human body generates scalar waves.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EVEN A FEELING OF\nGRATITUDE ENLARGENS YOUR AURA .&nbsp; EVERY\nVEDIC SANSKRIT MANTRA HAS GRATITUDE SURCHARGED IN IT.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A HINDU HUGS A HUMPED\nCOW WITH A FEELING OF GRATITUDE . font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reiki\nknows just where to go to seek balance , just like how the universal water\nflows down and finds its level.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our cosmos is self\naware. Every atom, planet and star is self aware with individuality.\nConsciousness is NOT restricted to organic life forms alone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At KOTIYOOR TEMPLE the\nwater &nbsp;follows a MOBIUS pattern at\ncertain times \u2013who ever stands in it gets centred<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/kottiyoor-temple-oldest-temple-and.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/kottiyoor-temple-oldest-temple-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Essenes always\nstressed that to understand their teachings&nbsp;\nit was necessary to live the true life for many years and to change\noneself physically, intellectually and morally.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For this reason they\nhad a three years novitiate before finally accepting anyone among them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The results show that\nthis was an excellent system, as no case of expulsion or disobedience was ever\nnoted in their history.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After seven years of\ninner life they began to initiate candidates into their traditional secrets and\nduring the subsequent years they continued to reveal their teachings until\nthese initiates had &nbsp;ttained the highest\ndegree of comprehension.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Generally they all\nlived to an extremely advanced age: it was very rare for them to die before\ntheir hundredth or hundred and twentieth year and most of them lived still\nlonger.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Josephus tells us the\noath which they asked of every candidate after the three years had expired,\nbefore being admitted to the communal meal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Before the\ncandidate is allowed to touch the common food, he is obliged to take an\noath.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"He will exercise\npiety towards the Diety, and justice towards men.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"He will do no\nharm to anyone, either of his own accord, or by the command of others.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"He will always\nshun the unjust and cleave to the just.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"He will always\nshow a good example to all men.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"He will show\nhimself loyal to his masters since their power comes from God and His\nangels.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"He will never\nforce his personal opinion or authority on others.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"He will at no\ntime wear special or luxurious garments.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"He will love the\ntruth and avoid all that is false.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"He will keep his\nhands clean from all material impurities and his soul free from all unclean\nthoughts.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"He will never\nhave secrets from his brethren and he will never denounce them even at the cost\nof his life.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Moreover he\nswears that he will transmit the traditions he has received.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"He will preserve\nthe sacred Scriptures, books and traditions with the greatest care.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"He will\nscrupulously keep the names and commands of the angels, which he has learned to\nknow.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>Philo compares the\nEssenes with the Indian sages&nbsp;</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Essenes lived on\nterms of perfect equality between men and women, contrary to the customs and\nsocial structure of their period.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The morning baths were\nfollowed by special breathing ( PRANAYAMA ) &nbsp;and gymnastic exercises.( YOGA )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/01/yoga-only-complete-exercise.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/01/yoga-only-complete-exercise.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/01/yoga-only-complete-exercise-part-2-capt.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/01/yoga-only-complete-exercise-part-2-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/pranayama-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: cyan;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/pranayama-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThey get rid of egoism simply by aiding and extending altruism\nand not by violent attacks on egoism.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThey get rid of disease simply by strengthening the vitality\nof the organism and not by attacking the disease\u2014the fundamental of Ayurveda.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThey create a better future by the constructive and\nprogressive amelioration of the present and not by the destruction of the past.\nThey bring about a peaceful inner revolution, an individual rebirth in each\naltruistic, &nbsp;intelligent and active being\nin order to ensure the unlimited progressive evolution of mankind towards an\never better future.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIt is no surprise that there is NOT a single adverse\nsentence about Essenes in any writings from antiquity till now. <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThey were the only sect to be without enemies and to escape\ncriticism at the hands of even the most ironical writers. <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe First Century Essenes gave humanity the greatest figure\nof antiquity:&nbsp; Apollonius.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe Greek philosopher and King\u2019s official historian &nbsp;Dio Chrysostom ( 40 AD to 115 AD ) &nbsp;wrote about Essenes and Apollonius, but not a\nsingle word about Jesus Christ or Christianity. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nHe was so much trusted that his surname Chrysostom comes\nfrom the Greek chrysostomos which means \"golden-mouthed\"-such was his\nETHOS . <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nEmperor Domitian, in a deep sulk due to his writings in\npraise of Apollonius &nbsp;banished him from\nRome. He went to the Oracle of Delphi and was told to wear the clothes of a\nbeggar and continue in Rome.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWhen Domitian was assassinated Dio saw that the Roman army\nwas about to revolt against Nerva who was pronounced Emperor as per the wishes\nof Apollonius, within an hour .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n\u201cUnable to tolerate it, she stripped of his beggar\u2019s attire ,\nleaped on to a high altar, and began his harangue with the verse:<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThen Odysseus of many counsels stripped him of his rags,\n[Odyssey xxii. 1.]<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n--and having said this and thus revealed that he was no\nbeggar, nor what they believed him to be, but Dio the sage, he delivered a\nspirited and energetic indictment of the tyrant; and he convinced the soldiers\nthat they would be wiser if they acted in accordance with the will of the Roman\npeople\u201d<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWhen Nerva became Emperor he told Dio Chrysostom ( below) to come to\nhis palace and meet him.&nbsp;&nbsp; Emperor Nerva\ngave him the ultimate honour in the senate \u2014&nbsp;\nuse of his own royal surname Cocceianus in later life . <br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-pFCoK4QNcec/Vxols8pwICI/AAAAAAABHxM/MexgLR2CGsAFXjAfU7vx-vo1fIwkbCe6wCLcB/s1600/dofwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-pFCoK4QNcec/Vxols8pwICI/AAAAAAABHxM/MexgLR2CGsAFXjAfU7vx-vo1fIwkbCe6wCLcB/s400/dofwnload.jpg\" width=\"337\" /></a></div>\n<br />\nNerva made him write an account of Apollonius,\nas both were very good friends .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Below: Emperor Nerva&nbsp;</b><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Y81vPDdnDgk/VxokIOzHSNI/AAAAAAABHw4/IUfTq88s424XQEaRRX5CdDgBgcNQ700XgCLcB/s1600/7881853-Statue-of-emperor-Nerva-Stock-ePhoto-roman-soldier-bronze.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Y81vPDdnDgk/VxokIOzHSNI/AAAAAAABHw4/IUfTq88s424XQEaRRX5CdDgBgcNQ700XgCLcB/s640/7881853-Statue-of-emperor-Nerva-Stock-ePhoto-roman-soldier-bronze.jpg\" width=\"422\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: large;\"><b>Below: Apollonius had asked the Roman senate to make Nerva the Roman Emperor. &nbsp; &nbsp;The deep rooted mistrust between Emperor and Roman Senate ended as soon a Nerva took charge--he struck a gold coin declaring this change ..</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-tJi5C-N_1b0/Vxokgs3MVWI/AAAAAAABHw8/3xwThLZKvA4NGpyBfQYm2Ky6dtwM_OCDwCLcB/s1600/Nerva_Aureus_Conhcordia.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"298\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-tJi5C-N_1b0/Vxokgs3MVWI/AAAAAAABHw8/3xwThLZKvA4NGpyBfQYm2Ky6dtwM_OCDwCLcB/s640/Nerva_Aureus_Conhcordia.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nNerva's successor, Emperor Trajan ( below) , too honoured him .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-2ZqReOP9gEs/VxomJQaGnRI/AAAAAAABHxQ/p5JE3ra2bQY6v8fAh188IJ70ViVclZjOwCLcB/s1600/trajan-xandten.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-2ZqReOP9gEs/VxomJQaGnRI/AAAAAAABHxQ/p5JE3ra2bQY6v8fAh188IJ70ViVclZjOwCLcB/s400/trajan-xandten.jpg\" width=\"300\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nEmperor Trajan in Rome set him by his side on the golden\nchariot in which the Emperors ride in procession when they celebrate their\ntriumphs in war, and often he would turn to Dio and say: \u201cI do not understand\nwhat you are saying, but I love you as I love myself.\u201d<o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6200902200928222040\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/18192566003832003359\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Slasher</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/04/apollonius-or-jesus-christ-who-is-real_22.html?showComment=1461412216306#c8028103926930531167\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">April 23, 2016 at 5:20 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_54MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nPranams Captain<br />\n<br />\nWould like your explanation of the one line in the Purusha Suktam that touches upon the fact that everything came from the Purusha and in fact the four Varnas as well.<br />\n<br />\nMany hone on making one verse in the \u201cPurusha Sukta\u201d of the Rig Veda, one of the most chanted hymns of the entire Vedic corpus; as an evidence that the Vedas are themselves conceived of a hierarchical and a discriminatory caste system.<br />\n<br />\nFirst, caste refers to jati, not varna. Jatis are the thousands of indigenous social- occupational groups, while varna refers to the four individualized societal functions described in many texts. Understanding this distinction is a necessary first step. The next is exploring whether the Purusha Sukta really sanctions a hierarchical and discriminatory caste system?<br />\n<br />\nCan you please provide your interpretation of that verse? Is it something poison injected by the white Invader or is it just interpreted wrongly?<br />\n<br />\nThanks,<br />\nSlasher</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_54BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/04/apollonius-or-jesus-christ-who-is-real_22.html?showComment=1461416009008#c8576368834873811755\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">April 23, 2016 at 6:23 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_52MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi s,<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U-NHJffUIIo<br />\n<br />\nThe four varnas are thinkers, fighters, skilled labour and unskilled labour. If unskilled labour is feeling ALL BALLS the remedy is to get skills or learn to fight or study and be worthy to be included among intellectuals\u2014not BITCH ABOUT IT ENDLESSLY.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Without 4 varnas society breaks down. &nbsp;A ship will never reach port if suddenly all want to be captain.</span></b><br />\n<br />\nREAD TEMPLATE NO 3 OF THE POST BELOW\u2014 HALF WITS LAY OFF.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nPurusha symbolizes consciousness, the masculine principle. Pragati symbolizes the feminine principle, the activating energy.<br />\n<br />\nThe cosmos in all its manifestations, as an act of love. The relationship between say- Shakti and Shiva is the dance of consciousness and energy experienced within each of us, regardless of gender.<br />\n<br />\nShiva resides in the highest Sahasr\u0101ra Chakra and Shakti in the lowest M\u016bl\u0101dh\u0101ra Chakra. When Prakriti and Purusha unite in the Sahasr\u0101ra Chakra ( raising of Kundalini ) , knowledge, knower and the object of knowledge become one.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">IF SHAKTI THOUGHT LIKE KANCHA ILAIAH SQUEAK, BR AMBEDKAR OR EVR PERIYAR , SHE WOULD BE ENDLESSLY BITCHING WHY SHE HAS TO STAY IN THE ASSHOLE AREA OF MOOLADHARA .</span></b><br />\n<br />\nShakti is manifested by Shiva only during creation and is withdrawn into himself at the end of creation on the MACRO scale. This is for the perceptive.<br />\n<br />\nThere is no Shiva without Shakti, nor Shakti without Shiva.<br />\n<br />\nThe union of Shakti ( pragati ) with Shiva ( purusha ) by Kundalini rise is the liberation of seeker from the cycle of endless birth and death. This is the ultimate aim of every Hindu.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_52MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_52BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_52B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_53B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom-width: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5534995321942764561\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_53M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/04/apollonius-or-jesus-christ-who-is-real_22.html?showComment=1461416040207#c5534995321942764561\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">April 23, 2016 at 6:24 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_53MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nThe word, \u201cDalit,\u201d meaning \u201cdown trodden \u201d was a term invented by Rothschild and propagated through the mouth of 19th century activist Jotirao Govindrao Phule ( died in 1890), Rothschild gave him the title MAHATMA.<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5pLjr8Zp5gs<br />\n<br />\nMano budhyahankara chithaa ninaham,<br />\nNa cha srothra jihwe na cha graana nethrer,<br />\nNa cha vyoma bhoomir na thejo na vayu,<br />\nChidananada Roopa Shivoham, Shivoham.<br />\n<br />\nNeither am I mind, nor intellect,<br />\nNor ego, nor thought,<br />\nNor am I ears or the tongue or the nose or the eyes,<br />\nNor am I earth or sky or air or the light,<br />\nI am Shiva, I am Shiva, the nature of Bliss.<br />\n<br />\nNa cha praana sangno na vai pancha vaayuh,<br />\nNa vaa saptha dhathur na va pancha kosa,<br />\nNa vak pani padam na chopastha payu,<br />\nChidananada Roopa Shivoham, Shivoham.<br />\n<br />\nNeither am I the movement due to life,<br />\nNor am I the five airs, nor am I the seven elements constituting the body (Dhatu),<br />\nNor am I the five sheaths which invest the soul,<br />\nNor am I voice or hands or feet or other organs,<br />\nI am Shiva, I am Shiva, the nature of Bliss.<br />\n<br />\nNa me dwesha raghou na me lobha mohou,<br />\nMadho naiva me naiva matsarya bhava,<br />\nNa dharmo na cha artha na kamo na moksha,<br />\nChidananada Roopa Shivoham, Shivoham.<br />\n<br />\nI am not the state of envy and passion or the emotions of hatred, greed and attachment,<br />\nNeither I am intoxication nor I am the emotion of jealousy,<br />\nAnd I am not even the four Purushartha \u2014 Dharma, Artha, Kama, and Moksha,<br />\nI am Shiva, I am Shiva, the nature of Bliss.<br />\n<br />\nNa punyam na paapam na soukhyam na dukham,<br />\nNa manthro na theertham na veda na yagna,<br />\nAham bhojanam naiva bhojyam na bhoktha,<br />\nChidananada Roopa Shivoham, Shivoham.<br />\n<br />\nI am not a good deed(Punya), or a Sinful deed(Paapa), or well-being/comfort(Saukhya), or Grief(Dukha),<br />\nNeither I am holy chants (Mantra) or holy Shrine (Teertha) nor I am the Veda or the Sacrifice and Oblation,<br />\nI am neither food or the consumer who consumes food,<br />\nI am Shiva, I am Shiva, the nature of Bliss.<br />\n<br />\nNa mruthyur na sankha na me jathi bhedha,<br />\nPitha naiva me naiva matha na janma,<br />\nNa bhandhur na mithram gurur naiva sishyah,<br />\nChidananada Roopa Shivoham, Shivoham.<br />\n<br />\nI do not have death or doubts or distinction of caste,<br />\nI do not have either father or mother or even birth,<br />\nAnd I do not have relations or friends or teacher or students,<br />\nI am Shiva, I am Shiva, the nature of Bliss.<br />\n<br />\nAham nirvi kalpo nirakara roopo,<br />\nVibhuthwascha sarvathra sarvendriyanaam,<br />\nNa chaa sangatham naiva mukthir na meyah<br />\nChidananada Roopa Shivoham, Shivoham.<br />\n<br />\nI am free from changes, and lack all the qualities and form,<br />\nI envelope all forms from all sides and am beyond the sense-organs,<br />\nI am always in the state of equality \u2014 there is no liberation (Mukti) or captivity (Bandha),<br />\nI am Shiva, I am Shiva, the nature of Bliss.<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_54b+seedJMxSD\" class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">The Serapeum of Alexandria was closed in July of 325 AD, on the orders of Roman Emperor Constantine the Great..., the Serapeum was the largest and most magnificent of all temples in the Greek quarter of Alexandria.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Besides the image of the god, the temple precinct housed an offshoot collection of the great Library of of Tyana<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Thousands of followers of Apollonius of Tyna were put to class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Even today Christian In Kerala call each other CHAENS . ( chayyan )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">EVIL CYRIL WAS SAINTED LIKE EVIL MOTHER TERESA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Namboodiri woman mathematician Hypatia would be murdered by a Christian mob in an revenge assault instigated by Cyril, the bishop's nephew and successor.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">With her death, the glory of Alexandria finally was extinguished.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Hypatia was on deputation to the Alexandia school of Math , the wife of a Namboodiri Astronomer / Ayurveda professor, from the Kodungallur University , owned by the Calicut King ( my hometown )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Hypatia&nbsp;&nbsp;was pulled down from her chariot, and dragged naked through the streets. ( IN THE LINK BELOW I HAVE SHOWN THE PAINTING )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/03/st-patrick-genocide-of-druids-pope-leo.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/03/st-patrick-genocide-of-druids-pope-leo.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Her father Theon was a professor in Geometry and Math. The University of Alexandria was headed by a Namboodiri professor named Orestes .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">The great Library of Alexandria had a million books on its shelves containing Pagan knowledge . As a professor at the university, Hypatia and her father Theon were always inside this library.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span Christianity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Cyril was made Pope or Patriarch of Alexandria on 18 October 412<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Hypatia was a beautiful woman who would wear a sari -- the pieces of her body, carried around by the Christian mob through the streets of Alexandria, are finally burned together with her books in a place called Cynaron.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div JETHRO A KERALA NAMBOODIRI WAS A VEGETARIAN..<br />\n<br />\nBULLSHIT BIBLICAL STORIES TALK ABOUT MOUNTAINS IN EGYPT-- SORRY- THERE ARE NO SUCH MOUNTAINS IN EGYPT<br />\n<br />\nJESUS CHRIST NEVER EXISTED--RED SEA NEVER PARTED--ALL THIS IS A FUCKIN' LIE !<br />\n<br />\nJethro, known as Nabi Schweib by the Druze, was a Midianite (Exodus 18:1), a tribe descending from Keturah, a wife of Abraham (Genesis 25:1-2). Genesis (25:6) describes that Abraham sent the sons of Keturah to the East.<br />\n<br />\nRabbi Menashe Ben Israel (Glazerson, 1984) asserts that Abraham sent them to land of OPHIR ( North Kerala ) by ship<br />\n<br />\nIn Exodus (Chapter 18), Jethro brings Zipporah and her two sons to Moses, and Moses bows down and kisses Jethro.<br />\n<br />\nThen Jethro praises the God of the Jews and \"took a burnt-offering and sacrifices for God; and Aaron came, and all the elders of Israel, to eat bread with Moses' father-in-law before God.\"<br />\n<br />\nJethro admonishes Moses for placing himself (Moses) as direct arbitrator for all decisions, great and small. Also, he introduces his remarks by stating: \"Hearken now unto my voice, I will give thee counsel, and God be with thee.\" It sounds like Jethro has quite a bit of authority, granted by God Himself. According to Exodus, \"Moses did all that he [Jethro] had said.\"<br />\n<br />\nBefore returning to Egypt, Moses asks Jethro's permission to embark on the journey (Exodus 4:18).<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE WRITTEN SEVERAL TIMES THAT JETHRO ( BEING AN INDIAN ) WAS SUBSTITUTED BY JEWS. JETHRO WAS SUNK AND BURIED BY WHITE JEWS<br />\n<br />\nThe first sacrifice in Israel was offered up not by Moses but by the Midianite priest Jethro<br />\n<br />\nJethro was the first priest of the Israeli nation-- Hindu Jethro instructed Moses and Aaron in the practices of priesthood<br />\n<br />\nMoses asked Jethro to be his guide<br />\n<br />\nIn The Midrash Rabbah (1977, Vol. 3: Numbers, p. 90) it is stated: \"The east ( OPHIR ) is the source from which light goes forth into the world, and there camped the standard of Judah which bred kings, scholars, and men of pious deeds.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br />\n<br />\nLegends of the Jews (1925, Vol. 5, p. 196) delineates stories of sages who went to India to obtain \"plants of paradise,\" and narrates how Solomon (Vol. 4, p. 149) secured water with special healing powers from India.<br />\n<br />\nAnd in Volume 1, page 11, of The Legends of the Jews, it is written: \"Beyond the inhabited parts to the east is Paradise with its seven divisions, each assigned to the pious of a certain degree.\"<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_106MN\" kind=\"m\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_106BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; the stele was translated by George Nickelsburg to read--<br />\n\u201cAccording to the command of the greatest and Holy God, those who take an oath (proceed) from here.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nHermon was
