<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YOU SHOULD HAVE SEEN\nHIS FACE . &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/YhhLTIN6YgY/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/YhhLTIN6YgY?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MODI &nbsp;WENT ON A NINE DAY FAST FOR THE FAKE NAVRATI\nFESTIVAL IN APRIL CREATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD &nbsp;!&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE REAL NAVRATRI IS IN\nOCTOBER&nbsp; . .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>THIS <span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">APCO BRANDED</span> MAN NARENDRA\nMODI ,&nbsp; HAS PROPAGATED EVERY FALSE GOD\nAND HERO CREATED AND BACK DATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/11/all-animal-sacrifices-in-hindu-temples.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/11/all-animal-sacrifices-in-hindu-temples.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WANNA READ SOME KOSHER\nBULL ?&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HATS OFF TO THESE\nGREEDY LYING &nbsp;JEWS--&nbsp; &nbsp;THEY\nARE NO 1 WHEN IT COMES TO STEALING EVERYTHING IN SIGHT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE:&nbsp; Successive \u201cright teachers\u201d had the role of ensuring\nthat the Esssene community adhered to the true interpretation of the Torah,\nwhile they waited for a prophet similar to Moses and an unprecedented two\nmessiahs. This waiting was to be accompanied by immersion in the Holy\nScriptures and by following an ascetic, celibate way of life. Each year a\ncumulative total of 120 nights was to be spent in prayer and study. Personal\npossessions and income were to be given to the yahad, the community, and in\nturn the community looked after the individual\u2019s needs. Living and eating was\ncommunal, and garments were plain and purely functional. There are many similarities\nin this unselfish way of life to the modern ashrams of America and the\nkibbutzim of modern Israel.:&nbsp; UNQUOTE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>MODERN ASHRAMS OF\nAMERICA AND THE KIBBUTZIM OF ISRAEL !!<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>TEE HEEEEEEEEE !<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JEWS DON\u2019T MIND\nTHROWING SOME FAALTHU CRUMBS FOR CHRISTIANS. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;AFTER\nALL THE OLD TESTAMENT AND MODERN BIBLE HAVE THEM HAND IN HAND.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE\u201d&nbsp; Throughout the sectarian Dead Sea Scrolls\nthat describe the feelings and activities of the Essenes, there are repeated themes\nand motifs that endow these works with a sense of collective purpose: of sons of\nlight fighting sons of darkness, messianic portents, battles with evil, the\nfruits of righteousness. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Their fundamental\nthemes embody persons who are:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Righteous\u2014Zaddikim<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Pious\u2014Hassidim<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Holy\u2014Kedushim<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Meek\u2014Anavim<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Endowed with God\u2019s\nSpirit\u2014Ruachim<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Faithful\u2014Emunim</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The first three are\nrecognizably strongly Jewish; the latter three carry noticeable overtones that\nwould later become strongly applied in Christianity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>AIIYYYYOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO&nbsp; !!!</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PETH &nbsp;NAHI &nbsp;BHARAH ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CHALL &nbsp;AUR &nbsp;LEH\n!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SOME &nbsp;MORE &nbsp;KOSHER &nbsp;BULL\n&nbsp;--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YOU MUST GIVE THE JEWS\nA PRIZE FOR KOSHER IMAGINATION&nbsp;&nbsp; . ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So whom were the\nQumran-Essenes waiting for? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The answer is contained\nin a number of the Dead Sea Scrolls texts that indicate they were waiting for\ntwo, and some scholars read three, messiahs. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These messiahs, one\npriestly and one royal, are given various titles in different scrolls:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Priestly: Interpreter\nof the Law, the Star; the Messiah of Aaron, who was of princely descent.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Royal: Prince of the\nCongregation, the Scepter; the Messiah of Israel; the King Messiah.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In addition, they\nexpected the return of a prophet similar to Moses. Fortunately, there are quite\ndetailed descriptions of these messiahs in a number of their scrolls, so one\nwould assume it should be relatively easy to identify whom they were talking about.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unhappily that is not\nthe case, and conventional scholarship makes little attempt to utilize this\ninformation. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Davidic Messiah? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The idea of the kingly\nmessiah referred to by the Essenes is inevitably taken as being someone\nemerging from the Davidic line of kings, commencing with King David himself. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The tacit assumption by\nmost scholars is that King David was the role model for this returning royal\nmessiah. If King David wasn\u2019t the role-model messiah,ordinary scholarship has\nnowhere else to go.&nbsp;&nbsp; The assumption,\nhowever, is fraught with&nbsp; problems. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;King David (who ruled inapproximately &nbsp;1000 BCE) noticeably failedto live up to the\nrighteous ideals demanded in the books of Jeremiah, Ezekiel, Micah,Kings, and\nChronicles.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>DOUBLE&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;AIIYYYYOOOOOOOOOOO !!!<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Who is this hero of Jews,\nKing David ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was a peeping tom\nand he saw his military officer Uriah\u2019s wife taken an open bath in a tank Kerala\nNamboodiri style. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-dYMZcqyFSUk/VxcNSPJ7oWI/AAAAAAABHr0/mxkhdnY0klQcU4RG0F2jtnzHQxcVxnTxQCLcB/s1600/seder-olam-david-and-bahthsheba.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"384\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-dYMZcqyFSUk/VxcNSPJ7oWI/AAAAAAABHr0/mxkhdnY0klQcU4RG0F2jtnzHQxcVxnTxQCLcB/s640/seder-olam-david-and-bahthsheba.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Propelled by lust he\nmurdered Uriah.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And then arm twisted\nhis young widow to have sex with him .&nbsp; The\noffspring of RAPE was King Solomon. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The story of David's\nseduction of Bathsheba, told in 2 Samuel , is omitted in Chronicles.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bath Sheba was the\ngrand daughter of a Ahitophel a Kerala Namboodiri &nbsp;Professor teaching every possible subject. &nbsp;King David called him MASTER .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">King Solomon traded with\nKerala. &nbsp;&nbsp;His palace has a sandalwood\nstaircase. &nbsp;&nbsp;He built his ships in\nBeypore ( Calicut suburb ) .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Later King Solomon\nmarried a beauty with brains named Sheba from Kerala , a dusky woman with long\nhair (&nbsp; hairy legs &nbsp;which made him LUST ) .&nbsp; &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She visited\nhim with caravan loads of sandalwood, peacocks, tiger cubs, cinnamon, &nbsp;aloe vera, diamonds &nbsp;etc- &nbsp;and they got married.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some black Africans claim Sheba as she is recorded to be dark skinned . So maybe she came to Kerala first to catch some peacocks and tigers . Sorry African women do NOT have long hair till the waist-- their spring curl hair grows upwards . 2900 years ago , we know who the Africans were.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-gz4fDEiBhNs/VxcNwVpIzsI/AAAAAAABHr4/M5ZyX91akSkHuNlNYojlxDLVgDwp7hbvgCLcB/s1600/solomonandsdheba.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"467\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-gz4fDEiBhNs/VxcNwVpIzsI/AAAAAAABHr4/M5ZyX91akSkHuNlNYojlxDLVgDwp7hbvgCLcB/s640/solomonandsdheba.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In the First Council of Nicea in 325 AD, they\nfound it necessary to cook up a name called Melchizedek. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">You will read in Hebrews 6:19-20 that Jesus\nChrist, after His resurrection, is High Priest \"after the order of\nMelchizedek.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Melchizedek is also described in the New\nTestament (Hebrews, 7) as having no human parents: \u201cWithout father, without\nmother, without descent, having neither beginning of days, nor end of life; but\nmade like unto the Son of God...\u201d (Hebrews, 7:3)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u201cAnd your Elohim is Melchizedek, who will\nsave them (those who uphold the covenant) from the hand of Belial.\u201d \u2014 11Q13,\nDead Sea Scrolls.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u201cBelial\u201d is &nbsp;the combined forces of evil, mortal and\nimmortal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Melchizedek is KALKI , Lord Vishnu\u2019s 10<sup>th</sup>\nand final avatar, who leads mankind from Kali Yuga to DWAPARA YUGA (&nbsp;from &nbsp;PISCES\nto AQUARIUS ) \u2014&nbsp; and the dead sea scrolls\nequated Melchizedek with GOD</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Now after the dead sea scrolls were\ndiscovered the Vatican is crying silly -- Melchizedek and Christ are one and\nthe same Person!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>Below: The MIDDLE MAN\nbetween GOD and a Catholic , the Pope who wars funny robes and holds a curved\nstaff , can save you-- if you repent.&nbsp; \\</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>In Hinduism nobody asks you to repent ,&nbsp; &nbsp;Nobody\ncalls you a sinner. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;There is NO priest running after you to sink\nhis hooks &nbsp;into you and bleed you till\nyou die\u2014like a cancer doctor &nbsp;.&nbsp; &nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; In&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px; line-height: 37.3333px;\">Hinduism</span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">&nbsp;WHAT YOU SOWeth &nbsp;YOU SHALL REAPeth . &nbsp;</span></span></span></b></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; tilaka,\nthe mark on the forehead, of the Hindu Brahmins &nbsp;&nbsp;.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-UgIdKxe78ro/Vxd9wtWV6dI/AAAAAAABHsc/0r5VWjKjJIE_g87XUY4Yblr10YIg5pvGwCLcB/s1600/HippovvvlytusStatue.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The various\ndesignations for Essenes are derived from the names of Shiva or Sheba, God of\nseven worlds, seven rivers, seven mountains, after whom the Shabbath, or\nSabbath, the seventh day, was named. Zechariah Sitchin in Lost Realms says that\nElishiva in Canaan meant \"My God is seven ( meaning VAIKUNTA of the 7<sup>th</sup>\nastral layer ) .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Queen of SHEBA was from\nthe land of SHIVA , India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When me and my wife\nwant to have fun, while driving we sing together &nbsp;SAIL THE RIBAH .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The acronym INRI on top of &nbsp;a cross reads &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;I\u0113sus\nNazar\u0113nus, R\u0113x I\u016bdae\u014drum in Latin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The curse:\n\"Let the Nazarenes and the heretics perish as in a moment, let them be\nblotted out of the book of the living and let them not be written with the\nrighteous.\" (quoted in Marcel Simon's Jewish Sects At the Time of Jesus,\nFortress Press, Philadelphia, 1967, page 136.)&nbsp;\nSee Psalm 69: 28.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Qur'an mentions\nonly 25 prophets by name, including a different Zechariah, the father of Indian\nsage John the Baptist.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Z'akharya contains the word Acharya, which in\nSanskrit means one who knows the rules, a holy teacher. Zechariah's name itself\nis testimony to the Hindu (and vegetarian) origins of &nbsp;Essenes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"The visions of my\nhead as I lay in bed were these: I saw, and behold, a tree in the midst of the\nearth; and its height was great.&nbsp; The\ntree grew and became strong, and its top reached to heaven, and it was visible\nto the end of the whole earth.&nbsp; Its\nleaves were fair and its fruit abundant, and it was food for all.&nbsp; The beasts of the field found shade under it,\nand the birds of the air dwelt in its branches, and all flesh was fed from it.\n4: 10-12.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Daniel and Friends are\nclear-headed eating vegetation. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The king's seers,\neating the king's rich food, i.e. flesh, are not.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;\"Then Daniel said to the steward whom\nthe chief of eunuchs had appointed over Daniel, Hanani'ah, Mish a el and\nAzariah, \"Test your servants for ten days; let us be given vegetables to\neat and water to drink.&nbsp; Then let our\nappearance and the appearance of the youths who eat the king's rich food be\nobserved by you, and according to what you see deal with your\nservants.\"&nbsp; So he hearkened to them\nin this matter and tested them for ten days.&nbsp;\nAt the end of ten days it was seen that they were better in appearance\nand fatter in flesh than all the youths who ate the king's rich food.&nbsp; So the steward took away their rich food and\nthe wine they were to drink and gave them vegetables.\"&nbsp; 1: 11-16. The king tests Daniel and his\nvegetarian friends:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"In every matter\nof wisdom and understanding he found them ten times better than all the\nmagicians and enchanters that were in all his kingdom.\"&nbsp; 1: 20. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1937, Edmond\nBordeaux Szekely, Ph.D., professor, traveler and philologist (among many other\nthings) translated a collection of secret ancient Aramaic manuscripts which he\ndiscovered in the secret vaults of the Vatican and in the Royal Archives of the\nHapsburgs (now in possession by the Austrian Government). The \"Essene\nGospel Of Peace,\" which this collection is called was said to have been\nwritten in the 3rd century BCE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While Szekely's claimed\ntranslations of the so-called \"Essene Texts\" have drawn interest from\nfollowers of various faiths, the original manuscripts have never been located,\nand have been considered forgeries by some modern religious scholars because\nthere is NO mention of old testament stuff <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Below is Vatican BULL<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE:&nbsp; The Master (Jesus) teaches us to pray to the\nHeavenly Father in the familiar Christian prayer we know as the \"Our\nFather,\" and also teaches us to pray to the Earthly Mother (nature),\nsustainer of all life with a parallel prayer, the \"Our Mother.\"&nbsp;&nbsp; Jesus spells out a lifestyle which resembles\nthat which today we call \"Natural Hygiene,\" including a raw foods\ndiet, water fasting, clearly a vegetarian diet, and an admonition to do no harm\nto other forms of life. We can see some of the same lifestyle today with the\nSeventh Day Adventists&nbsp; UNQUOTE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HEY, WHAT ABOUT HOLY\nGHOST ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TEE HEEEEE !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cThe MASTER emphasizes\nthat cooking \"takes the life\" out of foods. The plant kingdom abounds\nwith live healing and restorative powers, which we should take use of for\noptimal health\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Apocrypha are works,\nusually written works, that are of unknown authorship, or of doubtful\nauthenticity, or spurious, or not considered to be within a particular canon.\nThe word is properly treated as a plural, but in common usage is often\nsingular. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the context of the\nJewish and Christian Bibles, where most texts are of unknown authorship<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In general use, the\nword \"apocrypha\" came to mean \"false, spurious<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN MODERN PARLANCE APOCRYPHA\nIS \u201cBULLSHIT, WHICH SUITS THE BULLSHITTER \u201c<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During the birth of\nChristianity, some of the Jewish apocrypha that dealt with the coming of the\nMessianic kingdom became popular in the rising Jewish Christian communities.\nOccasionally these writings were changed or added to, but on the whole it was\nfound sufficient to reinterpret them as conforming to a Christian viewpoint.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Christianity eventually gave birth to new apocalyptic works, some of which were\nderived from traditional Jewish sources. Some of the Jewish apocrypha were part\nof the ordinary religious literature of the Early Christians.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This was strange,\nas the large majority of Old Testament references in the New Testament are\ntaken from the Greek Septuagint, which is the source of the deuterocanonical\nbooks as well as most of the other biblical apocrypha.-nay \u2013BULLSHIT .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Septuagint is a\ntranslation of the Hebrew Bible..&nbsp; &nbsp;As the primary Greek translation of the Old\nTestament, it is also called the Greek Old Testament. &nbsp;&nbsp;This translation is quoted a number of times\nin the New Testament.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Septuagint ,\noriginally compiled around 280 B.C., originally included the apocryphal\nwritings<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Septuagint was fed\nwith BULL later by Vatican after the First Council of Nicea in 325 AD.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The earliest extant manuscripts of the\nSeptuagint are all later than 325 A , and suffer greatly from a lack of\nuniformity<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the 16th century,\nthe Protestant reformers challenged the canonicity of the books and\npartial-books found in the surviving Septuagint<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/03/protestant-christianity-created-by-jews.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/03/protestant-christianity-created-by-jews.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Protestantism\nestablished a 66 book canon with the 39 books based on the ancient Hebrew\ncanon, along with the traditional 27 books of the New Testament. Protestants\nrejected the Catholic term \"deuterocanonical\" for these writings,\npreferring to apply the term \"apocryphal\" which was already in use\nfor other early and disputed writings.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">IF I WANT ,&nbsp; I CAN WRITE A 2000 PAGE THESIS ON ALL THIS\nBULLSHIT.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">IT IS BEYOND THE SCOPE OF THE POST AND WILL\nGET MY READERS BORED-&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">I AM SURE THEY DONT WANT BE TO DISSECT RIDICULOUS BULLSHIT - &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THEY ONLY WANT TRUTH TO BE EXHUMED.</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE TERM \u201cEARLY JEWISH\nCHRISTIAN\u201d IS A LIE\u2014&nbsp;&nbsp; JEW ROTHSCHILD\nWANTED TO CARVE OUT ISRAEL, &nbsp;HE DID IT\n--- AND HOW !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The first explicit\nmention of the perpetual virginity of Mary is found in the pseudepigraphical\nInfancy Gospel of James.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This Protoevangelium of\nJames, is an apocryphal Gospel ppropounded to be written about AD 145, which expands\nbackward in time the infancy stories contained in the Gospels of Matthew and\nLuke, and presents a narrative concerning the birth and upbringing of Mary\nherself. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But hey\u2014Jesus and Mary\nwere cooked up only in 325 AD at the First Council of Nicea.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;It is the oldest source to assert the\nBHAARGINITY nay virginity of Mary not only prior to but during (and after) the\nbirth of Jesus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The document starts\nwith a LIE : &nbsp; &nbsp;\"I, James, wrote this history in Jerusalem.\" &nbsp;The\npurported author is thus James, the brother of Jesus.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/04/squint-eye-strabismus-capt-ajit.html?showComment=1461254581698#c1045348127439977248\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">April 21, 2016 at 9:33 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_62MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi ar.<br />\n<br />\nwhy is kerala known as GODS OWN COUNTRY?<br />\n<br />\nthe egyptians pharoahs called muziris the <span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>LAND OF PUNT</b></span><br />\n<br />\nQueen Hatshepsut traded with muziris -- 3500 years ago she personally sailed on ship from bernice to muziris to choose kerala spices and goodies-- cinnamon, aloe vera , diamonds, ebony, tiger cubs, tiger skins , ivory, spices, sandal wood, rose wood, herbal cosmetics, turmeric , pepper, cumin, sesame, herbal medicines, coconut oil, incense , frankincense and myrrh trees.<br />\n<br />\nHATHOR ( goddess bhagawati- shakti , wife of shiva ) was from PUNT and hathor was Hatshepsut's personal deity.<br />\n<br />\nA stele in the mortuary temple of Amenhotep III (18th Dynasty) records a speech delivered by the god Amun, stating:<br />\n<br />\n\"Turning my face to sunrise ( EAST ) I created a wonder for you, I made the lands of Punt come here to you, with all the fragrant flowers of their lands, to beg your peace and breathe the air you give.\"<br />\n<br />\nPeter Von Bohlen (1796- 1840), a German Indologist, in his two volume monumental work Ancient India with special reference to Egypt compared, at length, ancient Egypt with India. He wrote about the trade and cultural connection between bernice and muziris in ancient times. Egypt being at the receiving end<br />\n<br />\nDuring the early years of the 20th century a number of fragments of papyri dating from 250 B.C. to 100 A.D- were discovered at Oxyrhynchus ( bernice) in Egypt.<br />\n<br />\nDr. E. Hultzsch (1857-1927), a noted German Indologist, identified some words of the dialogue in malayalam.<br />\n<br />\nI AM CALLING THE BLUFF THIS HOUR - JEWS , CHRISTIAN AND ISLAMIC HISTORIANS MUST STOP TELLING LIES ABOUT PUNT !<br />\n<br />\nDATE: 21ST APRIL 2016<br />\nTIME: 2132 IST<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">ENOUGH !</span></b><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakatil<br />\n.</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_63b+seedBwUhD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_63b+seedBwUhD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cHippalus, a\nventuresome navigator whose name deserved as much honor in Roman annals as that\nof Columbus in modern history, observed the periodic change of the Indian\nmonsoon doubtless long known to Arab and Hindu), and boldly setting sail at the\nproper season made a successful trading voyage and returned with a cargo of all\nthose things for which Rome was paying so generously: gems and pearls, ebony\nand sandalwood, balms and spices, but especially pepper. The old channels of\ntrade were paralleled but not conquered; so strong was the age-long understanding\nbetween Arab and Hindu, that cinnamon, which had made the fortune of traders to\nEgypt in earlier times, was still found by the Romans only at Malabar and was\nscrupulously kept from their knowledge in the markets of India, where it was\ngathered and distributed; while the leaf of the same tree producing that\nprecious bark was freely offered to the Roman merchants throughout the Malabar\ncoast, and as malabathrum formed the basis of one of their most valued\nointments\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-H92GIxV_Hp4/Vxj6bGp32YI/AAAAAAABHuU/sPNwOPOR3YcMAEEcxgIW5JWfUqVkAIezgCLcB/s1600/RomanIndiaTradbeRoutes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"466\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-H92GIxV_Hp4/Vxj6bGp32YI/AAAAAAABHuU/sPNwOPOR3YcMAEEcxgIW5JWfUqVkAIezgCLcB/s640/RomanIndiaTradbeRoutes.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cPliny' s account of\nthe voyage to India (VI, 26) in which he refers to * 'information on which\nreliance may be placed, here published for the first time,\" refers to the\nPeriplus, then existing merely as a merchant's diary; and Glaser has based much\nof his argument as to the authorship of the Periplus on that passage; but Pliny\ngoes on to describe a voyage different in many waysfrom that of the Periplus,\nand giving quite a different account of the coast of India. At the time Pliny\nwrote, the sea-route to Muziris India had been opened , and he might have had\nthis information from any sea-captain, as indeed he might have had the facts concerning\nArabia Felix which seem to be in such close agreement with the Periplus. The\nargument that Pliny, whose work was dedicated in 77 A. D., borrowed from the\nPeriplus is, then, suggestive and even plausible, but by no means conclusive\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Berenike (Berenice\nTroglodytica) a Graeco-Roman harbor is located on the Red Sea Coast in the far\nsouth of the Egyptian Eastern Desert . It is mentioned in the Periplous of the\nErythraean Sea and in Ptolemy\u2019s Geography . Pliny referred to it several times\nin his Naturalis Historia . Eduxous set sail to Muziris in India from Berenice\nin 118-116 BC. From here, ships sailed to India and to the East by taking\nadvantage of the monsoon (Hippalus) winds in search of spices, precious stones\nand other exotic goods<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dr. Casson gives a\nsummary of some of the trade goods mentioned in the Periplus. According to\nwhich the goods imported from / through Muziris India were: native spices and\ndrugs and aromatics (costus, bdellium, lykion, nard, malabathron, pepper), gems\n(turquoise, lapis lazuli, onyx, diamonds, sapphires, \u201ctransparent gems\u201d),\ntextiles &nbsp;( fine cotton cloth and\ngarments ), ivory, pearls, and tortoise shell.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;GETTING BACK-</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of the most famous writers\nto mention Apollonius was Origen of Alexandria ( 185 to 254 AD ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pagan Origen did NOT\nwrite a single word about Jesus Christ or Christianity.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201c It was not until\nHierocles in the beginning of the fourth century boldly charged upon the\nChristian priesthood their plagiarism of the teachings and works of Apollonius,\nthat the latter found it necessary to set every means at work that could in any\nway help to conceal the great truth that Hierocles proclaimed with such portentous\nforce. It is true that no one now knows exactly what it was that Hierocles\nwrote, for Eusebius, who took upon himself the task of destroying the testimony\nof Hierocles, took precious good care to destroy the work of his formidable\nopponent, and to give his own version of the matter instead. The reply of\nEusebius to Hierocles has come down to us. Why has not Hierocles\u2019 arraignment\nof the Christian priesthood also come down to us? Let that Vatican priesthood\nanswer\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8853576018915582117\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'times new roman', times, freeserif, serif; line-height: 22.4px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_186M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/04/apollonius-or-jesus-christ-who-is-real_16.html?showComment=1461263213006#c8853576018915582117\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">April 21, 2016 at 11:56 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_186MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nSTOP PRESS:</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nJEWS AND CHRISTIANS EAT YOUR HEARTS OUT.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHE CAT IS OUT OF THE BAG.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nGREEKS NOW KNOW THEIR PAGAN ( HINDU ) HERITAGE</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIF THERE IS A SINGLE EVENT EVEN GOING PAST JEW / CHRISTIAN CULTURE AND RELIGION DURING THE OLYMPIC TORCH CEREMONY--LET ME KNOW</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>I WILL EAT CROW !</b></span><br />\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nAfter all the ancient Olympics was banned by Roman Christian Emperor in Theodosius I in 393 AD.
