line-height: 200%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-iiZRMus3MnA/VxB4seRF44I/AAAAAAABHh8/Amr9sorseC8k4PETUT9MwHuxSSffY_oxgCLcB/s1600/PetrieMuseum-WilliamghHildaPetrie.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"381\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-iiZRMus3MnA/VxB4seRF44I/AAAAAAABHh8/Amr9sorseC8k4PETUT9MwHuxSSffY_oxgCLcB/s400/PetrieMuseum-WilliamghHildaPetrie.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\nTHE JEWS WHO RULE ISRAEL DO NOT LOOK LIKE THE PALESTINIAN MUSLIMS WHO HAVE LIVED THERE FOR THOUSANDS OF YEARS.</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\nTHE JEWS WHO RULE ISRAEL DO NOT LOOK LIKE THE PEOPLE OF ALL NEIGHBORING COUNTRIES AROUND THEM .</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\nYET THE WORLD ACCEPTS THAT PALESTINE BELONGS TO JEWS .</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\nYET THE WORLD ACCEPTS THAT HEBREW LANGUAGE , MADE BY DISGRACED \"LEFT HANDED NAMBOODIRIS\" &nbsp; TO BE WRITTEN FROM RIGHT TOWARDS LEFT, &nbsp;BELONGS TO THESE WHITE JEWS.</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b>Below: &nbsp;Petrie baby would strike PAY DIRT wherever he and his wife dug-- &nbsp;he knew where exactly to dig with shovels and how deep. &nbsp; He left TRANSIT BEARING rocks when he buried something &nbsp;.</b></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 200%; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/QwPTcmCb_KA/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/QwPTcmCb_KA?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THIS IS EXACTLY THE WAY JEW ROTHSCHILD\nCREATED AND BACKDATED EMPEROR ASHOKA , WHO KICK BAAAAAD HINDUSIM AND EMBRACED\nGOOOOOOD BUDDHISM , &nbsp;LIKE BR AMBEDKAR AND\nROHIT VEMULAs MOTHER .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">ASHOKA RELICS / ROCK EDICTS POPPED OUT LIKE\nPOPCORN ALL OVER INDIA.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THEY KNEW WHERE TO DIG AND HOW DEEP TO DIG \u2013AND\nHOW TO READ THE LANGUAGE TOO FOR GOOD MEASURE.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Below: It took a white JEW to tell Indians that we had the GREATEST EMPEROR who was SICK AND TIRED of EVIL Hinduism and hence embraced Buddhism.&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-6evoaADrLCo/VxB99yOA_kI/AAAAAAABHiU/hL0YlhvYnXYw_JdZJggVFjyz9Ywclb0SgCLcB/s1600/Ch-13-Fig-41-AshoDka-Edict-Rock.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">TILL THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA, NOBODY\nHEARD OF EMPEROR ASHOKA .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Even today the Buddhists have a roll when\nthey keep repeating DHAMMMMA ( dharma )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/chanakya-taxila-university-professor.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/chanakya-taxila-university-professor.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let me quote\nWikipedia:-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE : The Edicts of\nAshoka are a collection of 33 inscriptions on the Pillars of Ashoka as well as\nboulders and cave walls made by the Emperor Ashoka of the Mauryan Empire during\nhis reign from 269 BCE to 232 BCE.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;These inscriptions were dispersed throughout\nthe areas of modern-day Bangladesh, India, Nepal, Afghanistan and Pakistan and\nrepresent the first tangible evidence of Buddhism&nbsp; : UNQUOTE&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">NOW CHECK OUT THE ROCK\nEDICTS OF PETRIE BABY.</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Seized is the Kanaan\nwith every evil,<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Led away is Askelon,<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Taken is Gezer,<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Yenoam is brought to\nnought,<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The people of Israel is\nlaid waste, \u2014 their crops are not,<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Khor (Palestine) has\nbecome as a widow for Egypt,<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">All lands together \u2014\nthey are in peace.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Every one who roamed\nabout<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Is punished by King\nMerenptah, gifted with life,<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">like the sun every day.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 200%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/--Bd_XNa_7eU/VxB_sQpPSII/AAAAAAABHig/ssWNn3-bzVkdVsArDBMNSdPijfi59erjACLcB/s1600/petrie3-1D99x300.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/--Bd_XNa_7eU/VxB_sQpPSII/AAAAAAABHig/ssWNn3-bzVkdVsArDBMNSdPijfi59erjACLcB/s640/petrie3-1D99x300.jpg\" width=\"424\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">AIIYYYOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO !</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Israeli Prime Minister\nBenjamin Netanyahu says again and again to standing ovations in Zionist Jew\nruled nations <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cThe Jewish people were\nbuilding Jerusalem 3,000 years ago and the Jewish people are building Jerusalem\ntoday.&nbsp; Jerusalem is not a settlement. It\nis our capital.\u201d <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sorry, Benjy\nbaby--&nbsp; there was no invasion of\ngeographical Palestine from Egypt by former slaves in the 1200s BC.&nbsp; &nbsp;The\npyramids had been built much earlier and had not used slave labour.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Egyptians and people\nfrom Kerala &nbsp;never heard of Moses or the\n10 plagues.&nbsp; King Solona\u2019s mother was a\nKerala Namboodiri woman named Bathsheba.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ancient archeology does\nnot show the existence of a Jewish kingdom in the so-called First Temple\nPeriod, or how &nbsp;the Jewish people would\nhave ruled Jerusalem. The only evidence was exhumed by paid employees of Jew\nRothschild&nbsp; who dated artifacts and\ndeciphered them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Assyrians conquered\nJerusalem in 722 BC. The Babylonians took it in 597 BCand ruled it until they\nwere themselves conquered in 539 BC by the Achaemenids of ancient Iran, who\nruled Jerusalem until Alexander the Great took the Levant in the 330s BC.\nAlexander\u2019s descendants, the Ptolemies ruled Jerusalem until 198 BC when\nAlexander\u2019s other descendants, the Seleucids, took the city.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With the Maccabean\nRevolt in 168 BC, the Jewish Hasmonean kingdom did rule Jerusalem until 37 BC,\nthough Antigonus II Mattathias, the last Hasmonean, only took over Jerusalem\nwith the help of the Parthian dynasty in 40 BC. Herod ruled 37 BC until the\nRomans conquered what they called Palestine in 6 AD. The Romans and then the\nEastern Roman Empire of Byzantium ruled Jerusalem from 6 AD until 614 AD when\nthe Iranian Sasanian Empire Conquered it, ruling until 629 AD when the\nByzantines took it back.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Muslims conquered\nJerusalem in 638 AD and ruled it until 1099 AD when the Crusaders conquered it.\nThe Crusaders killed or expelled Jews and Muslims from the city. The Muslims\nunder Saladin took it back in 1187 AD and allowed Jews to return, and Muslims\nruled it until the end of World War I, or altogether for about 1192 years.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/the-yazidis-of-iraq-ethnic-cleansing-by.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/the-yazidis-of-iraq-ethnic-cleansing-by.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The so-called\n\"Proto-Sinaitic inscriptions\" were discovered in the winter of\n1904\u20131905 in Sinai by Hilda and Flinders Petrie\u2014we all know they could decipher\nlanguages VERY FAST, because they themselves invented it and buried it .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 200%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-tjnq7FGrdPU/VxC1th_XR4I/AAAAAAABHkI/Dxyt59J6b4MNMxx_1KZqpnG234XnJHkEgCLcB/s1600/400px-Grantha_VowelCofmp.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"512\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-tjnq7FGrdPU/VxC1th_XR4I/AAAAAAABHkI/Dxyt59J6b4MNMxx_1KZqpnG234XnJHkEgCLcB/s640/400px-Grantha_VowelCofmp.gif\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They got rid of all ancient\nVattezhuthu , Grantha scripts of Malayalam , which was used in the ancient\nspice trade documentation. The Aramic script before Judaism was born was\nderived from Brahmi script which evolved from the Grantha script.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 200%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-277P-6i15yQ/VxC19FiudqI/AAAAAAABHkQ/apUhfJ_fqnMGa6hfEFx6O8J3iRGcDpKdwCLcB/s1600/render_graphcic.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-277P-6i15yQ/VxC19FiudqI/AAAAAAABHkQ/apUhfJ_fqnMGa6hfEFx6O8J3iRGcDpKdwCLcB/s1600/render_graphcic.png\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: Chinese scholars proficient in Malayalam digging for information on Zheng He at Calicut, &nbsp; where he died.</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 200%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-LPsL2yFDOII/VxC4YqoiPKI/AAAAAAABHkg/kl85-hkscdgOJ20kIGciGstK5v2gFaN5QCLcB/s1600/Pictdurffe3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-LPsL2yFDOII/VxC4YqoiPKI/AAAAAAABHkg/kl85-hkscdgOJ20kIGciGstK5v2gFaN5QCLcB/s640/Pictdurffe3.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Zionist Jews established\na FAKE lineage for Jesus to the House of David through Joseph, so that he may\n\"fulfill prophecy. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If that is the\ncase Jesus is a Malayali as David\u2019s wife ( mother of Solomon ) &nbsp;Bathsheba was Malayali.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MATHEW &nbsp;relates that Jesus delivered \"The Sermon\non the Mount\" before \"the multitudes,\" while LUKE says it was a\nprivate pep talk given only to the disciples.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The accounts of his Passion and Resurrection\ndiffer utterly from each other, and no one states how old he was when he died.\nIn addition, in the canonical gospels,&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jesus himself makes many illogical\ncontradictions concerning some of his most important teachings. This is what\nhappens when too many cooks make up the COOKED UP BROTH<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Historian Dr. H.E.\nBarnes, a professor at Columbia University, wrote that \"next to nothing\nexists\" and concludes: that there was no single historical person upon\nwhom the Christian religion was founded, and that \"Jesus Christ\" is a\ncompilation of legends, heroes, gods and godmen.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The scrolls at Qumran\nhave been dated to between 150 BC and 70 AD, and, based on the later scrolls,\nin which the writers never mention Jesus Christ or Christianity, they evidently\ndid not accept the historicity of Jesus, if they had even heard of him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; line-height: 32px;\"><b>PROBABLY THE WRITERS OF THE DEAD SEA SCROLLS KNEW THAT THE PLANET WOULD BE HIJACKED AND TORTURED BY A MAN TITLED POPE FROM VATICAN , &nbsp;AND THEY CAUSED THE TRUTH TO BE REVEALED AFTER TWO&nbsp;MILLENNIUMS.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"line-height: 32px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"line-height: 32px;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The dead sea scrolls\nhave been written in INDIA INK ( dhobie\u2019s ink ).&nbsp;&nbsp; Mashinottam ( India ink drop on betel leaf )\nwas used to divine in ancient days in Kerala .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Inside the dead sea\nscroll jars two India ink pots were found, containing the residue of an\nextremely durable ink of a carbon composition.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white CALICO cotton cloth\nused by Essenes were made in Calicut. &nbsp; I wear this white &nbsp;mundu on functions .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There was an Essene\nnamed Yeshai Beth Halachmee who had a wife named Mary Magdalene who went back to\nIndia by ship.&nbsp; &nbsp;The ancient writing says that he got himself crucified\n( own accord ) and came down \u2013with his wife and confused Roman soldiers watching. &nbsp; And then he came down the cross bleeding but alive &nbsp;.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/l62M6JJKadA/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/l62M6JJKadA?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are people in\nPhillipines who do this every year. &nbsp;&nbsp;Intense\npain in involved in the self flagellation.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Apollonius&nbsp; wrote books on astrology.&nbsp; He could dip from akashik records and talk\nabout the future and the past.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Apollonius had shunned wine.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/XE3js1otCKI/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/XE3js1otCKI?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bible makes Christians believe\nthat there is heaven and hell and that the soul is mortal \u2013 the whole thing is\nabout grabbing FAAALTHU power &nbsp;( unlike\nHinduism ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cAnd the LORD God\nformed man of the dust of the ground, and breathed into his nostrils the breath\nof life; and man became a living soul.\u201d Genesis 2:7 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cAnd God said, Let the\nwaters bring forth abundantly the moving creature that hath life, and fowl that\nmay fly above the earth in the open firmament of heaven. And God created great\nwhales, and every living creature that moveth, which the waters brought forth\nabundantly, after their kind, and every winged fowl after his kind: and God saw\nthat it was good.\u201d Genesis 1:20-21 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A \u201csoul\u201d is clearly not\nsomething absent from the body. Consider the following. According to the Bible\na soul is capable of: <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hunger \u2013 Proverbs 19:15\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Satisfied with food \u2013\nLamentations 1:11-19 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Touching material\nobjects \u2013 Leviticus 5:2 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Of going into the grave\n(!) \u2013 Job 33:22+28 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Of coming out of it \u2013\nPsalm 30:3 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Among the words\nrenderings it is impossible to come to the conclusion that this is talking\nabout an immortal part of the body which floats off to heaven or hell upon the\ndeath of the body. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is rendered \u201csoul\u201d\n530 times, \u201clife\u201d or \u201cliving\u201d 190 times, \u201cperson\u201d 34 times, \u201cbeasts and\ncreeping things\u201d 28 times. Its also rendered \u201ca man\u201d, \u201ca person\u201d, \u201cself\u201d,\n\u201cthey\u201d, \u201cwe\u201d, \u201chim\u201d, \u201canyone\u201d, \u201cbreath\u201d, \u201cheart\u201d, \u201cmind\u201d, \u201cappetite\u201d, \u201cthe\nbody\u201d etc. In no instance does this word support the modern Christian idea that\nthis is something immortal \u2013 always the reverse in fact.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Psalmist declares:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201c\u2026all they that go down\nto the dust shall bow before him: and none can keep alive his own soul.\u201d Psalm\n22:29<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cWhat man is he that\nliveth, and shall not see death? shall he deliver his soul from the hand of the\ngrave\u201d Psalm 89:48<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cHe made a way to his\nanger; he spared not their soul from death, but gave their life over to the\npestilence;\u201d Psalm 78:50<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ezekiel sums up the\nBibles teaching by saying:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cThe soul that sinneth,\nit shall die\u2026\u201d Ezekiel 18:20<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Is the soul immortal?\nThe Bible says no.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THERE IS NO RIDICULOUS NOAHs\nARC CARRYING MALE AND FEMALE CREATURES IN HINDUISM.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE HAVE DNA SEED FROM\nSHIVA LINGAM.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/nasa-dna-building-blocks-in-meteorite.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/nasa-dna-building-blocks-in-meteorite.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Flavius Philostratus had\nwritten clearly that Apollonius is the real messiah and Damisa was the real\nPaul \u2013in the cooked up broth of The First Council of Nicea of 325 AD .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Damius was pretty\nshallow minded and never seemed to comprehend the deeper mysteries that\nApollonius taught.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Damisa wrote that most\nmortals greet a newcomer by asking questions about his life, but the priests of\nIndia greet him instead by telling him about his life.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The notebooks of Damis\nsuggest the psychic and spiritual powers of the Indian sages -they could tell\nthe past and future, see events at a distance, and read the past lives of men.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Nero expelled the\nphilosophers from Rome in 66 AD (the year of St Peter' s martyrdom), Apollonius\nleft and traveled to COROBA Spain. By the 4th century, however, the view of Apollonius\nas a worker of miracles became a matter of acrimonious debate.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Christianity had\nbecome an established religion and the Church Fathers had begun to accord Jesus\nstatus as \"the only Son of God\". Neither Karma or immortality of the\nsoul or reincarnation nor the miracles of Apollonius had any place in their\nphilosophy.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All mortals automatically were sinners and only the grace of the\nCatholic church could save them and give them THE MORTAL SOUL a passage to\nheaven.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The initial crusaders\nhad it in their mission to seek out the book of Philostratus about Apollonius\nand destroy it. The book had been secretly carried to the Near East for safety;\nand for over a thousand years it was preserved among the Arabians, in spite of\nall efforts of the Crusaders - in the interest of the Papacy - to destroy it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cSo well did the\nVatican succeed that, though while after the appearance of Blount's first\nEnglish translation of Philostratus' biography of Apollonius at the\ncommencement of the Nineteenth Century, his name was on every cultured\nEnglishman's tongue; today, over a century later, he is almost completely\nunknown, even in academic circles, mention of him having been omitted from\nhistorical works and from the educational curricula - so that, paradoxical\nthough it may seem, the greatest man of the western world during the past two\nthousand years has been completely removed from the pages of history\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Apollonius\u2019s power can\nbe seen from the fact that he has predicted in writing the date , and hour\nEmperor Domitian would die and that Nerva would be the next Emperor. Nerva was\nproclaimed Emperor solely on the initiative of the Pagan Roman Senate, within a\nhour after the assassination.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Following the accession of Nerva as emperor, the\nSenate passed damnatio memoriae on Domitian: his coins and statues were melted,\nhis arches were torn down and his name was erased from all public records.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The huge\npalace which Domitian had erected on the Palatine Hill, known as the Flavian\nPalace, was renamed the \"House of the People\" .&nbsp; Nerva publicly swore that no senators would\nbe put to death as long as he remained in office.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indian intellectual Palamedes\nwas stoned to death by Odysseus and he did NOT find a place in Homer's Iliad. Odysseus\nheld Palamedes responsible for sending him to the Trojan War. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">King Agamemnon sent Palamedes as a messenger to\nIthaca to retrieve Odysseus, who had promised to defend the marriage of Helen\nand Menelaus. Paris had kidnapped Helen, but Odysseus did not want to honor his\noath.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He pretended to be insane and plowed his fields with salt. Palamedes\nguessed what was happening and put Odysseus' son, Telemachus, in front of the\nplow. Odysseus stopped working and revealed his sanity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Achilles came in a\nvision to Apollonius where he would find the statue of the hero Palamedes on\nthe coast of \u00c6olia. Apollonius accordingly restored the statue, and\nPhilostratus wrote that had seen it with his own eyes on the spot.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indian Palamedes was\none of the heroes before Troy, who invented the Greek letters. Palamedes had a\nreputation for sagacity, and the ancients attributed a number of inventions to\nhim, including the alphabet, numbers, weights and measures, coinage, board\ngames, and the practice of eating at regular intervals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today we can see few\nGreek vases were decorated with the figure of Palamedes. Finally the high peak\nPalamidi with a well-preserved fortress above the &nbsp;town Nauplion in Argolis, was named, after the\nTrojan war &nbsp;hero Palamedes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Sage Apollonius started taking care of the people of Rome and the\nsenators because of a MAD Emperor named Caligula .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Caligula &nbsp;slept with all\nthree of his sisters, treating Drusilla like a wife.&nbsp; His three&nbsp;\nyounger sisters were Agrippina the Younger, Julia Drusilla and Julia\nLivilla. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">When Drussila &nbsp;died in 38 CE, Caligula flipped his lid, &nbsp;-- had her declared a\ngoddess .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">He made his horse a\nsenator.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Caligula forced the wives of the senators into daily orgies to\ngenerate funds for himself. &nbsp;&nbsp;People were\nwilling to pay huge amounts to get a screw from the beautiful wives of the\nsenators.<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 18.6667px; line-height: 37.3333px;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 18.6667px; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 18.6667px; line-height: 37.3333px;\">Caligula made a rule that he had to be called for all weddings and he would deflower the bride ( only if she was worth it )</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">After Caligula was murdered, &nbsp; his successor Claudius was&nbsp; a pansy fat man who would cry for trivial\nreasons .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Caligula took over from Tiberius who he killed . &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Tiberius who started off well-- became mentally\nsick with syphilis of brain and&nbsp; he\nneeded small babies held by naked mothers to suck him off every day. &nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Roman people were sick and tired of the Emperors and they\nneeded Apollonius to provide some stability along with the senate. &nbsp; This is what happens when a nation becomes IMMORAL . &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Apollonius held back TEN emperors .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>Below: I saw this movie CALIGULA in Caracas.</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;
