Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/12/thermal-coal-power-plants-clean-exhaust_18.html?showComment=1460109889179#c7050091019490933568\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">April 8, 2016 at 3:34 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_137MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSTOP PRESS:<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nICE MELT IN THE ARCTIC IS NOT ATMOSPHERIC\u2014IT IS GEOLOGIC, METHANE LEAKS.<br />\n<br />\nThe relentless war on carbon is justified by the false assumption that global temperature is controlled by human production of ONE carbon-bearing greenhouse gas CARBON DIOXIDE.<br />\n<br />\nThe scary forecasts of runaway heating are based on complicated but narrowly-focussed carbon-centric computerised Global Circulation Models built for the UN IPCC.<br />\n<br />\nThese models omit many significant climate factors and rely heavily on doctored and dodgy temperature records and unproven assumptions about harmless Carbon Dioxide \u2013while omitting POTENT greenhouse gas methane emitted by the FRACKING and the BEEF LOBBY.<br />\n<br />\nThe IPCC models also misread the positive and negative temperature feedbacks from water vapour ( a greenhouse gas) and their accounting for natural processes in the carbon cycle is based on very incomplete knowledge and numerous unproven assumptions. Models have been systematically underestimating the amount of liquid in clouds<br />\n<br />\nOceans absorb much of the methane bubbling up from seafloor seeps, More than 12,000 gigatonnes of methane trapped worldwide as a solid beneath the seafloor in the form of methane hydrate.<br />\n<br />\nWith ocean temperatures on the rise, methane hydrates pose a threat far greater than the seeps. Although hydrates also exist on land beneath permafrost, 99.2 % of known reserves are buried beneath the seafloor.<br />\n<br />\nCatastrophic sudden expansion of methane hydrates, can unleash destructive tsunamis. Methane hydrate can expand 10 times its volume when it is transformed to methane, a gas.<br />\n<br />\nIn a methane hydrate, the gas molecule is actually trapped in a \u201ccage\u201d of water molecules. Hydrates look and feel like ice, but are not a frozen gas. They are actually more akin to minerals because they have a geometric architecture rather than a random structure like true ice. Another distinction:<br />\n<br />\nUnlike frozen water, a lump of methane hydrate can be set on fire. The deep sea\u2019s low temperatures and high pressure keep hydrates safely locked away Even a small change in water temperature near the seafloor there could initiate a meltdown. No one is sure how much methane the oceans can absorb before releasing excess gas into the atmosphere.<br />\n<br />\nUS FRACKING METHANE LEAKS ARE CARRIED IN THE NORTHWARDS GULF STREAM OCEAN CURREMTS,WHICH UPSET THE OCEAN STREAM AND UPWELLING BALANCE.<br />\n<br />\nWARM OCEAN CURRENTS MELT HYDRATES.<br />\n<br />\nWhere methane content was highest at the surface, there was also a depletion of carbon dioxide in the water. The release of methane bubbles from the seafloor stimulates uptake of CO2 from the water, which leads to uptake of CO2 from the overlying atmosphere.<br />\n<br />\nas methane bubbles upward, it pumps nutrient-rich deep water to the surface that encourages the algae there to grow. The algae consume carbon dioxide (as plants do), removing carbon dioxide from the ocean, which then absorbs more carbon dioxide from the atmosphere. Bacteria on the seafloor, called methanotrophs, consume some of the gas.<br />\n<br />\nThe Jet Stream is behaving erratic. Climate change is also disrupting flower pollination and pushing fish toward North/South poles, robbing poorer countries at Equator of crucial food resources.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0nWF-ehKBRU/VwrGqosmnrI/AAAAAAABHTA/g5MBQTNc5uw0vgAbWpnQHFVUBmKW1WSFg/s1600/dow44nload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"256\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0nWF-ehKBRU/VwrGqosmnrI/AAAAAAABHTA/g5MBQTNc5uw0vgAbWpnQHFVUBmKW1WSFg/s400/dow44nload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3389430466449120994\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_134M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Less sea ice, therefore, leads to more absorbed heat, and higher temperatures throughout the North Pole region. This stimulates the production of methane by microorganisms in permafrost soils, which also drives the change towards a warmer climate.<br />\n<br />\nMethane is the simplest of the alkanes - CH4. Methane dissolves in water, but does not ionize. Methane is common in nature, resulting from anaerobic digestion of plant and animal matter.<br />\n<br />\nIn USA due to FRACKING methane dissolves in ground water and causes \"water hammer\" in plumbing systems.<br />\n<br />\nArm twisted by the FRACKING lobby , the USS Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) does not regulate the methane content of drinking water, though Methane gives a terrible \u201c swampy\" odor and taste. Methane is not filterable or removable chemically.<br />\n<br />\nMethane is completely dissolved in water at less than 5 deg C, but can be completely released (as a gas) at greater than 14.5 deg C.<br />\n<br />\nIn its natural state, methane is found both below ground and under the sea floor. When it finds its way to the surface and the atmosphere, it is known as atmospheric methane.<br />\n<br />\nMethane breaks down in the atmosphere and creates CH\u20223 with water vapor.<br />\n<br />\nLiquefied natural gas (LNG) is natural gas (predominantly methane, CH4) that has been converted to liquid form for ease of storage or transport. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/12/thermal-coal-power-plants-clean-exhaust_18.html?showComment=1459074048113#c6699355185415005210\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">March 27, 2016 at 3:50 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_124MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSTOP PRESS:<br />\n<br />\nZIONIST JEW CONTROLLED NATIONS ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR TOTAL SILENCE ON METHAN CH4 , DURING THE PARIS COP21 MEET .<br />\n<br />\nTHESE WHITE NATIONS AND THE CRYPTO JEW KING RULED ARAB NATIONS WERE THE CHEER LEADERS FOR PORTRAYING HARMLESS AND GOOD FOR THE PLANET CO2 ( CARBON DIOXIDE ) AS THE ARCH VILLIAN .<br />\n<br />\nGlobal warming potential (GWP) is a relative measure of how much heat a greenhouse gas traps in the atmosphere. It compares the amount of heat trapped by a certain mass of the gas in question to the amount of heat trapped by a similar mass of carbon dioxide.<br />\n<br />\nA GWP is calculated over a specific time interval, commonly 20.<br />\n<br />\nGWP is expressed as a factor of carbon dioxide (whose GWP is standardized to 1).<br />\n<br />\nIn the Fifth Assessment Report of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change, it was written that methane has a global warming potential of 86 over 20 years in response to emissions.<br />\n<br />\nBetween 2002 and 2014, satellite/ ground data the data showed that US methane emissions ( FRACKING ) increased by more than 40 %, accounting for 65% of an enormous spike in methane in the entire planet\u2019s atmosphere.<br />\n<br />\nENORMOUS KOSHER PROPAGANDA WAS DISHED OUT AT PARIS COP21 AGAINST HARMLESS GAS CO2.<br />\n<br />\nNow countries accross the planet are armtwisted to shut down coal-fired power plants. JAVEDEKAR DID NOT DRIVE A HARD BARGIAN .<br />\n<br />\nAPCO MODI ABDICATED BOTH AT PARIS COP21 AND WTO NAIROBI.<br />\n<br />\nBecause of US fracking methane leaks Feb 2016 was the hottest February month ever recorded.<br />\n<br />\nUnprecedented temperatures in the Arctic, averaging an astounding 7.2 degrees C above normal, melted away layers of ice to record-low levels. This has to do with Methane leaks by US fracking Industry and NOT Carbon Dioxide , as all are LYING.<br />\n<br />\nCarbon dioxide has nothing to do with this\u2014the culprit is METHANE causes mainly by FRACKING leaks in USA.<br />\n<br />\nBeef lobby must cut down the Methane emissions due to farting cows.<br />\n<br />\nArctic ice provides a powerful feedback loop for global warming. As the Arctic ice melts, it reflects less of the sun's warming rays back into space. The permafrost releases humongous amounts of Methane. Greenland ice is melting at record levels due to Methane.<br />\n<br />\nWhen permafrost thaws, microbes get active and start decomposing the carbon in the soil to release massive amounts of Methane ( not CO2 ).<br />\n<br />\nIce wedges are formed when groundwater freezes, then \u2014 when the air gets cold enough at minus 17 degrees Celsius or lower \u2014 the ice begins to expand and contract, with more ice filling the cracks.<br />\n<br />\nEventually the wedge gets big enough to reach the surface, where it splits the earth like cracks in a sidewalk. These ice wedges look like giant honeycombs on the frozen landscape.<br />\n<br />\nMelting ice wedges are speeding up the rate at which permafrost is thawing. Most of the northern permafrost has been frozen for thousands of years.<br />\n<br />\nAll over the northern areas giant craters are releasing Methane \u2013this is being kept a secret and the Zionist Jews are trying to cash in on CARBON TAX from CO2 from unsuspecting nations like India.<br />\n<br />\nMethane is a colorless, odorless gas, and it\u2019s also nonpolar \u2014 normally, it behaves like oil in water, stubbornly refusing to mix or blend. But a great deal of Earth\u2019s methane was produced by the long-ago decomposition of vast, ancient beds of plankton buried in the seafloor under the crushing pressures of the deep ocean.<br />\n<br />\nThe sheer pressure means that molecules of methane are physically forced to mingle with water molecules \u2014 hence the name, hydrate. The resultant substance is kept stable in a solid, even crystalline form by the weight of all that water. This is also why we don\u2019t find methane clathrates in shallow seas; the pressures there aren\u2019t enough to keep the methane solid.<br />\n<br />\nBut with the right kind of disturbance, parts of the deep-ocean crystalline hydrate deposits can break off and even explode violently as they transition from solid to gas. Oil workers call these gas explosions \u201c Methane burps of death.\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nCO2 does NOT explode.<br />\n<br />\nPermafrost in the north pole area is thawing and spewing methane. The BIG BROTHER controlled scientists ate LYING when they blame India for releasing CO2 from power plants fired by coal.<br />\n<br />\nWHEN MONSOONS FAIL , WE NEED MORE FOOD GRAIN STOCK\u2014 SCREW WTO WE WERE ARM TWISTED TO SIGN WHILE MODI WAS PRAYING WITH THE JAP PM AT VARANASI GHATS.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCapt Ajit Vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<ol id=\"bc_0_144TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_103B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4065346102718414628\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_103M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. To cause its melting is to remove a MASSIVE regulatory mechanism . This is a snowballing thingy causing more methane to be released prematurely.<br />\n<br />\nPARIS COP21 has fooled he world by ignoring potent greenhouse gas Methane and concentrating on harmless Carbon Dioxide.<br />\n<br />\nMethane is the product of very old decaying matter (plants and trees from long ago) and is trapped predominantly within several meters of the surface in the Arctic Tundra and in the form of frozen methane hydrates on the Arctic sea bed. It is ordinarily locked into permafrost and thus is held in an inert state.<br />\n<br />\nOnly global warming (or an asteroid striking the sea bed) can release what otherwise would be held safely by nature. There are billions of tonnes of methane stored there<br />\n<br />\nMethane is more than 104 times stronger than the same mass of carbon dioxide over a 20-year time frame.<br />\n<br />\nThe Aliso Canyon leak ( Portland Ranch, California ) leak spewed enough methane into the atmosphere to equal the greenhouse gases emitted by more than 620,000 cars in a year.<br />\n<br />\nMethane amplifies warming dramatically in the short term.<br />\n<br />\nThe methane in the permafrost is already leaking. Huge blowholes appear from time to time, occurring when trapped methane melts and then explodes creating a huge crater. More and more of them are appearing, both on land and in the sea. There is a methane pall in the atmosphere around the North Pole moving ever further south.<br />\n<br />\nThe warming has occurred where the methane is and the disappearance of the sea ice (from 2016 onwards) will certainly increase methane melt on the seabed. This is really bad news for humanity for this is indicative of a rapidly destabilizing pole.<br />\n<br />\nVast amounts of methane could be released at any time. Methane releases in the Arctic Tundra (on land) cause regional warmings and a dispersal of greenhouse gas methane throughout the atmosphere.<br />\n<br />\nThis is already happening and methane emissions are spiking.<br />\n<br />\nThere is enough methane in the melting Tundra permafrost alone to end all life here.<br />\n<br />\nControlling CO2 emissions then becomes a pointless exercise, for CO2 is tame (with a time lag between emissions and warming). Methane causes almost instant warming and will push the world into a 5-12 degree Celsius temperature increase (with the extinction level threshold reached at around 4 degrees) Even a sudden release of just 1% of the methane in the Tundra would make humanity extinct<br />\n<br />\nThe Arctic has remained very cold overall for the past 3 million years of long ice ages and brief interglacials.<br />\n<br />\nMETHANE LEAKS AFFECT INDIAs MONSOONS.<br />\n<br />\nPM MODI MUST NOT WAIT FOR USA TO DECLARE A WORLD EMERGENCY\u2014 WE INDIANS MUST DO THIS. &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;Capt Ajit Vadakayil</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_103B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_103MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>At COP21, countries\nagreed to the Paris Agreement. Does that mean the Agreement is now in effect?<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">BALLS !</span><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>No, countries still\nneed to take steps so that it takes effect.&nbsp;\nWhat occurred on December 12 at COP21 was the \u201cadoption\u201d of the Paris\nAgreement by the Conference of the Parties (COP) to the UN Framework Convention\non Climate Change (UNFCCC).&nbsp; Adoption is\nthe formal act that establishes the form and content of an agreement. <o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>In addition to adopting\nthe Paris Agreement, the Parties made a number of key decisions about what\u2019s\nnecessary for the Agreement to enter into force.&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>They also agreed on a process for how\ncountries will finalize their current national climate plans and shift them\nfrom being Intended Nationally Determined Contributions (INDCs) into Nationally\nDetermined Contributions (NDCs).&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Only after at least 55\nParties to the UNFCCC representing at least 55 percent of total global\ngreenhouse gases sign on and indicate their consent to be bound will the\nAgreement \u201center into force,\u201d meaning it will come into effect and be legally\nbinding.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>WE THE PEOPLE OF INDIA\nDO NOT WANT PM NARENDRA MODI TO SIGN THIS .<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>JEW DARLING MODI\u2014 THIS IS\nON RECORD.!<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>JUST TODAY ROBERT VARDA\nHAS WARNED YOU OF A NATIONAL REVOLT&nbsp;\nBECAUSE YOU ARE NOT TAKING CARE OF THE WATAN.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>JEW DARLING MODI\u2014DO NOT\nJUMP THE GUN \u2013WE KNOW YOU ARE NOBEL PRIZE KA BHOOKHA ! .<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>The Agreement will &nbsp;be open for signature for one year, until\nApril 21, 2017.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Can Parties still join\nthe Paris Agreement after April 22, 2017 if they didn\u2019t sign it before then?<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Yes. After the one-year\nsigning period, the Agreement will be open for what is called \u201caccession.\u201d\nAccession is simply the term for when a country becomes a Party to an\ninternational agreement that other countries have already signed.&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Depositing an\ninstrument of accession after April 22, 2017 will have the same legal effect as\nif that country had signed and deposited an instrument of ratification,\nacceptance or approval<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>The Paris Agreement\nwill be in full legal force and effect when at least 55 Parties to the UNFCCC\nthat account for at least 55 percent of the total global greenhouse gas\nemissions have deposited their instruments of ratification, acceptance,\napproval or accession.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; When compared to carbon dioxide (CO2), N2O has 298 times the ability per molecule of gas to trap heat in the atmosphere.[76] N2O is produced naturally in the soil during the microbial processes of nitrification and denitrification.[77] In 2008, agriculture contributed 6.1% of the total U.S. greenhouse gas emissions and cropland contributed nearly 69% of total direct nitrous oxide (N2O) emissions. Additionally, estimated emissions from agricultural soils were 6% higher in 2008 than 1990.[78] A 2008 study by Nobel Laureate Paul Crutzen suggests that the amount of nitrous oxide release attributable to agricultural nitrate fertilizers has been seriously underestimated, most of which would presumably come under soil and oceanic release in the Environmental Protection Agency data.[81] Atmospheric levels have risen by more than 15% since 1750.[82] Nitrous oxide also causes ozone depletion.<span style=\"color: blue;\"> <b>A new study suggests that N2O emission currently is the single most important ozone-depleting substance (ODS) emission and is expected to remain the largest throughout the 21st century</b>.</span>[83][84]<br />\n<br />\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nitrous_oxide<br />\n<br />\nPATHETIC !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8831023030210216788\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_30M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. What is making Europe so warm ?<br />\n<br />\nNitrous oxide, a highly potent greenhouse gas is now being released from a warming Arctic<br />\n<br />\nNitrous oxide emissions have increased from Arctic peatlands following permafrost thaw- caused by Methane release.<br />\n<br />\nIf the GLOBAL WARMING POTENTIAL ( GWP ) is 1 for Carbon Dioxide, it is 302 for Nitrous oxide and 104 for Methane over a 20 year period.<br />\n<br />\nPARIS COP21 KICKED METHANE AND NITROUS OXIDE UNDER THE KOSHER CARPET SO THAT THE JEWS CAN BLAME CO2 AS THE VILLAIN AND MAKE MONEY OUT OF THIN AIR ( CARBON CREDIT- OFFSET ).<br />\n<br />\nAT THE G20 SUMMIT IN HAMBURG 2017- ALL WORLD LEADERS ( INCLUDING MODI ) WERE IN JEW ROTHSCHILDs POCKET EXCEPT DONALD TRUMP.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/04/most-potent-greenhouse-gases-nitrous.html<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK PM MODI\u2014WHAT IS THE USE OF HAVING AN ICE STATION HEMADRI AT ARCTIC? HAVE THE SCIENTISTS GONE THERE TO HAVE BOOZE AND ENJOY ?<br />\n<br />\nMore than 70 billion tons of nitrogen stocks are stored in the upper 3.5 metres of permafrost soil, a vast sum accumulated over thousands of years through the nitrogen cycle<br />\n<br />\nThe permafrost stocks are more than 600 times larger than the annual nitrogen load added as GM fertiliser to soils globally<br />\n<br />\nSome of that nitrogen already exists in the form of \u201cold\u201d nitrous oxide, built up during the permafrost formation, while other mineralized nitrogen interacts with microbes to produce \u201cnew\u201d nitrous oxide.<br />\n<br />\nNitrous oxide that is released into the atmosphere remains in the troposphere for more than a century and then it migrates to the stratosphere, where it depletes the ozone layer. The ozone layer serves as a protective barrier absorbing solar radiation; without it the sun\u2019s ultraviolet rays would severely damage biological organisms, including humans.<br />\n<br />\nAlthough the Montreal Protocol, an international treaty signed in 1987 to protect the ozone layer, Nitrous oxide was ignored. The Zionist Jews concentrated on WEE ozone depleting items ( like refrigerants ) where they can make money out of thin air.<br />\n<br />\nLoss of nitrogen to the atmosphere may also reduce plant biomass, further contributing to climate change.<br />\n<br />\nIf nitrogen is lost to the atmosphere, plant growth won't be able to compensate for carbon being lost from permafrost soils<br />\n<br />\nThe most alarming phenomenon in the Arctic is the loss of the highly reflective snow and ice cover, known as the albedo..<br />\n<br />\nHigh nitrous oxide saturations were recently observed in productive shallow Arctic shelf waters following significant reduction in sea ice cover..<br />\n<br />\nNitrous oxide is produced in the ocean water column and sediments by two pathways. The first is in oxygen-rich conditions in which ammonium is converted to nitrate, creating nitrous oxide as a byproduct. The second occurs in deoxygenated sediments where nitrous oxide is produced in an intermediate stage between the conversion of nitrate to nitrogen gas.<br />\n<br />\nThe loss of sea ice cover in Arctic shelf waters has resulted in increased sunlight absorption, fueling phytoplankton growth. Following phytoplankton death, organic material is remineralized to ammonium, which can be converted to nitrate and ultimately produce nitrous oxide.<br />\n<br />\nWhat happens in the Arctic doesn\u2019t stay in the Arctic ( unlike the Cricket team dressing room politics )<br />\n<br />\nIndians were the first to use BIOCHAR for agriculture . It converts agricultural waste into a soil enhancer that can hold carbon, boost food security, and increase soil biodiversity, and discourage deforestation. The process creates a fine-grained, highly porous charcoal that helps soils retain nutrients and water.<br />\n<br />\nIndia was blessed with HUMUS laden topsoil with healthy microbes and earthworms for millions of years. Just 55 years of desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has decimated our holy topsoil.<br />\n<br />\n90% of our lakes have disappeared.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_140BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 6, 2017 at 9:34 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_138MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nOur hospitals are full die to the effects of NITROSAMINES and EVIL PHARMA is laughing all the way to the bank with \u201cAlice in Wonderland \u201c PM Modi clapping from the sidelines<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/nitrate-water-pollution-chemical.html<br />\n<br />\nRead all 6 pats of the post below--<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/ground-water-resources-of-india-capt.html<br />\n<br />\nWE WANT OUR NCERT TEXT BOOKS TO EXPOUND THE IMPORTANCE OF HAVING HUMUS LADEN TOP SOIL AND BASICS ABOUT GRAOUND WATER .<br />\n<br />\nOrganic soil forms can be further divided into \"recalcitrant carbon\" or resistant to decay, like humus, and \"labile carbon,\" where the carbon is both bioavailable (in the form of easily degraded compounds such as oils, sugars and alcohols) and physically accessible to microbes (not bound up with minerals).<br />\n<br />\nThe organic carbon pool includes both the living bodies and the dead, decomposing bodies of bacteria, fungi, insects and worms, along with plant debris and manure<br />\n<br />\nIndian topsoil was 6 feet deep\u2014unlike other nations of this planet having a few inches deep top soil.<br />\n<br />\nModern, chemically-based GM agriculture depletes soil carbon..<br />\n<br />\nWHAT IS GOOD FOR ISRAEL IS NOT GOOD FOR INDIA\u2014 JEW DARLING PM MODI PLEASE NOTE. WE WONT ALLOW YOUR MANN KE TAMANNA \u201cKOSHER COMPUTER COW\u201d IN INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nSoil building is the product of a self-reinforcing, positive feedback loop. But soil decline is also a self-reinforcing loop that can result in catastrophic soil loss.<br />\n<br />\nNitrogen fertilizers combined with tillage accelerate microbial respiration, burning up soil carbon faster than it is replaced. Due to the loss of organic carbon reservoirs, many soils have become nearly lifeless substrates that must be continually fed with irrigation water, mineral nutrients and pesticides to produce a crop. Although productive in the short term, this practice is not sustainable<br />\n<br />\nThe desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has caused our holy topsoil to lose 80% of their original soil organic carbon (SOC) pool.<br />\n<br />\nWE DON\u2019T WANT COMMIES AND WHITE JEWS TO DRIVE OUR EDUCATION<br />\n<br />\nBiochar serves as an electron buffer for redox reactions and helps bacteria swap electrons among themselves, improving their metabolic efficiency as a microbial community.. With its pores and its electrical charges, biochar is capable of both aBsorption and aDsorption.. The surfaces of biochar, both internal and external, aDsorb materials by electro-chemical bonds, working like an electric sponge.<br />\n<br />\nBiochar surfaces adsorb carbon and retain it in compounds with minerals, supporting at the same time a large microbial community that potentially makes more efficient use of organic debris containing carbon and other nutrients.<br />\nbalanced compost, with the optimum C:N ratio, will contain lots of humus. However, if there is not enough stable carbon (from wood, straw or other lignin sources), then the easily degradable sugars, fats and proteins will be completely consumed by microbes leaving very little substrate behind<br />\n<br />\nBoth biochar and compost increases cation exchange capacity (CEC - the ability to hold onto and transfer nutrient cations: ammonium, calcium, magnesium, and potassium)\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThey supports soil microbial life and biodiversity and helps plants resist diseases and pathogens. They add humus carbon to the soil carbon pool, reducing the atmospheric carbon pool\u2014and increases soil water holding capacity. In coastal areas they help plants grow better in high salt situations.<br />\n<br />\nUnlike biochar, compost is quickly broken down by microbial action in soil over months to at most, decades, depending primarily on climate. Biochar lasts at least ten times longer in most soils.. Biochar is effective at retaining nitrogen in soils and there is NO need for CHEMICAL UREA.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS THE ONLY INTELLIGENT WAY TO PREVENT FARMER SUICIDES.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_138MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_138BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_138B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_139B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8131227607787448028\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_139M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/08/the-thin-red-line-movie-review.html?showComment=1501992304276#c8131227607787448028\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 6, 2017 at 9:35 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_139MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2--<br />\n<br />\nAdding biochar to compost reduced the amount of dissolved organic carbon (labile carbon) in mature compost while increasing the fraction of stable humic materials (stable carbon).<br />\n<br />\nThe desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has left us with a rapidly deteriorating climate, and soils that are dying and eroding. Biochar, as a form of recalcitrant carbon, is the medicine that DELIBERETELY degraded and unproductive Indian top soils need.<br />\n<br />\nRECENTLY OUR LOSER LAWYER TURNED COLLEGIUM JUDGES ( BOTTOM DREGS OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARRE ) BANNED BURNING OF CROP STUBBLE ( WHICH PRODUCES BIOCHAR ) BECAUSE OF DELHI SMOG.<br />\n<br />\nIF THIS IS THE CASE SHIFT THE CAPITAL OF INDIA TO A PLACE WHERE THERE IS NO TEMPERATURE INVERSION..<br />\n<br />\nTall grasses burn quick and hot, however, close to the ground where the roots start, air is excluded so the base of the grasses will pyrolyze and not burn. This kind of natural charcoal is present in the most valuable agricultural soils in the world<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/arctic-ice-melt-and-methane-time-bomb.html<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/06/methane-time-bomb-arctic-ice-meltdown.html<br />\n<br />\nWHITE REVOLUTION and GREEN REVOLUTION has bled Bharatmata with a million cuts\u2014 the deep wound are pus filled sores today .<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/07/nutritious-a1-milk-of-vedic-cows-with.html<br />\n<br />\nTHERE WAS A REASON WHY AGNIHOTRA WAS DONE IN ANCIENT TIMES IN INDIA.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/08/agnihotra-ghee-cow-dung-fuel-capt-ajit.html<br />\n<br />\nPUT THIS COMMENT IN THE WEBSITES OF PMO, PMMODI, EDUCATION MIISTER, HOME MIMISTER, FOOD MINISTER, HEALTH MINISTER, COAL MINISTER, FINANCE MINISTER, ENVIRONMENT MINISTER, LAW MINISTER CHIEF JUSTICE OF INDIA, AND WEBSITES OF DESH BHAKTS<br />\n<br />\nI ASK MY READERS \u2013 SPREAD THIS ON SOCIAL MEDIA. CARBON TAXES WERE COLLECTED BY WHITE JEWS WHO SANG ALL THE WAY TO THE BANK..</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\">IN THE MONTH OF FEB 2018, EUROPE IS CODER THAN THE ARCTIC-- THESE SAME BASTARDS--THE SAME MOTHERFUCKERS ARE RESPONSIBLE..</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\">THE GULF STREAM CURRENT HAS BECOME WARMER DUE TO METHANE IN THE WATER... WE ALL KNOW OF FRACKING IN USA AND DEEPWATER HORIZON OIL SPILL ...</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\">AGAIN--THE BLAME IS ON INDIA-- INDIA MUST MOTH BALL COAL-- AND WE HAVE ROTHSCHILDs APCO BRANDED NARENDRA DAMODARDAS MODI PLAYING BALL..</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\">THIS ILLITERATE KYBER PASS GUJJU NO 2 EVEN WROTE A BOOK ON CLIMATE CHANGE... MAY BE HE DOWNLOADED SUCH FANTASTIC KNOWLEDGE LIKE HOW THE MAHARISHIS DOWNLOADED THE VEDA SRUTIS FROM AKASHA...</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\">SORRY-- WE THE PEOPLE OF INDIA WILL NOT ALLOW COAL TO BE MOTHBALLED IN INDIA--COME WHAT MAY.. WE CHOSE MODI AS PM FOR A FIVE YEAR TERM.. WE THE PEOPLE HAVE NOT SOLD BHARATMATA TO GUJJU NO 2 MODI...</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\">Across the Arctic, temperatures are approximately three degrees Centigratde above normal, and the Arctic Ocean sea ice is at a record low for late February 2018.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\">As frigid air sweeps across Europe, the Arctic itself is seeing an unprecedented warm spell.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\">In northernmost Greenland, it was 6 degrees Celsius above zero yesterday. And it's consistently been above zero for the last fortnight.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\">Over the pole from Europe, nearly a third of the ice covering the Bering Sea to the west of Alaska has also disappeared. But this was no gradual process; the ice retreated over an astonishing eight days in mid-February 2018.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\">Arctic sea ice has been retreating at record rates-- and the blame is falling on CO2 and Indian coal ?</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\">The Gulf Stream, carrying warm Atlantic water, moves north along the Norwegian coast and divides into two main branches, one on either side side of the island archipelago of Svalbard.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\">In the Arctic Ocean, this Atlantic water becomes denser as it cools and therefore sinks. After circulating, the now cold water leaves the Arctic Ocean, mainly through the Fram Strait between Svalbard and Greenland.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\">Shriveling sea ice also has turned the region into something of a new frontier.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\">WHITE JEWS are eyeing the Arctic\u2019s opening sea routes, its strategic position between Eurasia and North America, and its potentially huge reserves of oil and gas, as well as other resources.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\">A new enemy is undermining ice floating on the Arctic Ocean: heat from below.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\">Warm Atlantic waters, delivered by an offshoot of the Gulf Stream, have long been known to prevent ice formation north of Scandinavia, on the western side of the Eurasian basin.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\">CONTINUED TO 2-</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_192BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_192b+seedSVPD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_191T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_192b+seedSVPD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_191TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_191TN\"></span></span></span><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_191TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_192b+seedSVPD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_191TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_191TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_192b+seedSVPD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_191TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_191TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span></span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_191TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_192b+seedSVPD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_191B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3265753235317032373\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_191M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/02/britannia-did-not-rule-waves-and-this.html?showComment=1519818570561#c3265753235317032373\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 28, 2018 at 5:19 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_191MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nSatellite data show that, in general, sea ice is much more prevalent in the eastern side of the basin, north of Siberia. But over the last decade, ice has also begun to disappear here, too. It used to persist through the sunny summers, allowing several years of ice growth to accumulate.<br />\n<br />\nNow, the ice melts in summer, causing the total time without floating ice in the region to jump from less than 1 month per year to more than three.<br />\n<br />\nBetween Norway and Greenland in the western Eurasian basin, Atlantic currents flow into the Arctic at a depth of 200 to 250 meters, about 4\u00b0C warmer than the surface water. In winter, cold air cools surface waters until they fall and mix with the warm waters below.<br />\n<br />\nThat creates an overall warmer, well-mixed ocean over the top 250 meters, and one with little sea ice.<br />\n<br />\nOn the eastern side of the basin, however, the warm Atlantic waters were kept at bay\u2014until recently.<br />\n<br />\nThe currents lurked at a depth of about 150 meters, but they didn\u2019t mix much with surface layers, because of a barrier called the cold halocline layer (CHL)\u2014a boundary between salty deep waters and fresher water on top. Summer ice, as it forms, rejects salt, leading to the creation of dense, salty waters just below the ice.<br />\n<br />\nThose waters are heavier, and as they fall they create a highly stratified ocean.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nThe top of the Atlantic water, according to one mooring, had risen from a depth of 150 meters in the winter of 2003 to a depth of 70 meters just a decade later. Without summer sea ice forming to establish the CHL, he says, the ocean mixes more\u2014and less ice forms.<br />\n<br />\nA positive feedback loop is underway, in which less summer sea ice will lead to warmer winter waters and even less summer ice in subsequent years..<br />\n<br />\nBASTARDS !<br />\n<br />\nMOTHER FUCKERS !<br />\n<br />\nAAARRRGGHH PPTTHHEEOOOYYYYYYYYY !!!<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/04/most-potent-greenhouse-gases-nitrous.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/arctic-ice-melt-and-methane-time-bomb.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/06/methane-time-bomb-arctic-ice-meltdown.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_140b+seedE0TbD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_192b+seedSVPD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></span>\n<br />\n<div>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">On Juy 9th 1962, the U.S. blew up a hydrogen bomb in outer space, some 250 miles above the Pacific Ocean.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">It was a weapons test, but one that created a man-made light show that has never been equaled \u2014 and hopefully never will. This blast was an experiment to prevent Russian incoming missiles from reaching USA.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AMERICA BLAMED CFCs FOR CAUSING THE OZONE LAYER..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Earth is surrounded by belts of high-energy particles \u2014 mainly protons and electrons \u2014 that are held in place by the magnetic fields. Today these radiation belts are called Van Allen belts.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\"Starfish Prime\" literally created an artificial extension of the Van Allen belts that could be seen across the Pacific Ocean, from Hawaii to New Zealand.</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">IN INDIA WE DONT CARE FOR ROTHSCHILDs RATING AGENCIES LIKE FITCH/ S&amp;P / MOODYs ETC ANY MORE..&nbsp; &nbsp; WE DONT NEED THESE KOSHER AGENCIES TO MEASURE INDIAN DICK.. text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_4.html?showComment=1533544271998#c1775047922983490740\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 6, 2018 at 2:01 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_107MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-europe-45070498<br />\n<br />\nI HAD WARNED SEVERAL TIMES --<br />\n<br />\nDO NOT FUCK AROUND WITH THE FLOW OF THE GULF STREAM<br />\n<br />\nUSA IS THE CULPRIT FOR THE MASSIVE HEAT WAVE IN EUROPE<br />\n<br />\nMETHANE LADEN GULF STREAM HAS SLOWED DOWN AND IS NOW 20% WEAKER THAT THE PRE-OIL FRACKING ERA ..<br />\n<br />\nGULF STREAM IS A CRITICAL COMPONENT OF THE AMOC ( Atlantic meridional overturning circulation )..<br />\n<br />\nThe AMOC is an important component of the Earth\u2019s climate system-- and it is dangerous if it slows down further..<br />\n<br />\nthe Atlantic Meridional Overturning Circulation (Amoc), carries warm water northwards towards the north pole. There it cools, becomes denser and sinks, and then flows back southwards.<br />\n<br />\nTHE DEEP STATE ENSURED THAT CARBON DI OXIDE IS THE CULPRIT AT PARIS COP21 --SO THAT THEY CAN MAKE MONEY FROM CARBON TAXES.. THE GANG OF BIG BROTHER KICKED METHANE AND NITROUS OXIDE UNDER THE KOSHER CARPET..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/04/most-potent-greenhouse-gases-nitrous.html</span><br />\n<br />\nARCTIC AND GREENLAND ICE MELTING HAS CAUSED WEAKENING OF AMOC..<br />\n<br />\nThe Atlantic Meridional Overturning Circulation (AMOC) is one part of the larger global thermohaline circulation. The circulation is powered by regional differences in the temperature and salinity of the ocean, with water flowing to try to balance out these difference.<br />\n<br />\nA large addition of cold fresh water from melting Greenland ice sheets to the warm salty surface water typically found in the North Atlantic would cancel out some of these differences, weakening the strength of the circulation.<br />\n<br />\nThe effect of Greenland ice melt has not been widely included in previous studies of the AMOC because ice melt predictions are generally not included in climate models.<br />\n<br />\nScientists don\u2019t fully understand the AMOC itself and how it might respond to not only an influx of fresh water, but also to shifting winds, rising sea levels, and changes in atmospheric and ocean temperatures.</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">A catastrophic collapse of the AMOC can cause a stratification of the ocean with cold water on top and warm water on the bottom. a PARADOX..</span></div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/12/arctic-ice-melt-and-methane-time-bomb.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/06/methane-time-bomb-arctic-ice-meltdown.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE NORTHWARD FLOWING GULF STREAM ( EAST COAST USA ) CONTAINS METHANE DUE TO FRACKING LEAKS..<br />\n<br />\nTHE WARM GULF STREAM HAS SLOWED DOWN..<br />\n<br />\nTHE THERMOHALINE OCEAN CIRCULATION HAS NOW GONE HAYWIRE\u2026<br />\n<br />\nJET STREAM IS JUMPING LIKE A MONKEY AND HAS COME CLOSER TO THE EQUATOR FOR THE FIRST TIME SINCE MAN CAME ON EARTH..<br />\n<br />\nARCTIC WILL LOSE ALMOST ALL SEA ICE SOON, WHILE THE ANTARCTIC ICE IS BUILDING UP\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCONDITIONS ARE RIPE FOR A PLANET AXIS TILT WOBBLE\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThis will trigger massive earthquakes that will destabilize methane hydrates and result in huge amounts of methane abruptly entering the atmosphere-- this was how dinosaurs disappeared..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">AGAIN, THE GULF STREAM CURRENT HAS BECOME WARMER DUE TO METHANE IN THE WATER... WE ALL KNOW OF FRACKING IN USA AND DEEPWATER HORIZON OIL SPILL .</span></b>..<br />\n<br />\nAGAIN--THE BLAME IS ON INDIA-- INDIA MUST MOTH BALL COAL-- AND WE HAVE ROTHSCHILDs APCO BRANDED NARENDRA DAMODARDAS MODI PLAYING BALL..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_107BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_107b+seedGDWD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_106T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_106TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_107b+seedGDWD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_106B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4459411171110684722\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_106M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_4.html?showComment=1533544331021#c4459411171110684722\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 6, 2018 at 2:02 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_106MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nINDIA DID NOT HAVE A VOICE IN PARIS COP 21 -- WE WERE SILENT ABOUT METHANE AND NITROUS OXIDE EMISSIONS BY THE WEST . . CHITPAVAN PRAKASH JAVEDEKAR WAS GRINNING LIKE A CHESHIRE CAT WHENEVER HE SAW A WHITE JEW..<br />\n<br />\nBetween Norway and Greenland in the western Eurasian basin, Atlantic currents flow into the Arctic at a depth of 200 to 250 meters, about 4\u00b0C warmer than the surface water. In winter, cold air cools surface waters until they fall and mix with the warm waters below. ..<br />\n<br />\nThat creates an overall warmer, well-mixed ocean over the top 250 meters, and one with little sea ice\u2026<br />\n<br />\nOn the eastern side of the basin, however, the warm Atlantic waters were kept at bay\u2014until recently. ..<br />\n<br />\nThe currents lurked at a depth of about 150 meters, but they didn\u2019t mix much with surface layers, because of a barrier called the cold halocline layer (CHL)\u2014a boundary between salty deep waters and fresher water on top. Summer ice, as it forms, rejects salt, leading to the creation of dense, salty waters just below the ice. ..<br />\n<br />\nThose waters are heavier, and as they fall they create a highly stratified ocean\u2026<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n</div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_107b+seedGDWD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<ol id=\"bc_0_165TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_164B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4148162574123565247\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_164M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. font-size: large;\">ROTHSCHILDs AGENTS , PM MODI AND JEW MACRON \u2013 BOTH STOOGES OF THE KOSHER DEEP STATE..</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/04/most-potent-greenhouse-gases-nitrous.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..'</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"bc_0_151TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_150B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c9029344449181648309\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_150M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/10/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_20.html?showComment=1540168891995#c9029344449181648309\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 22, 2018 at 6:11 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_150MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSINCE THE PAST TWO YEARS I HAVE BEEN WRITING ABOUT THE GULF STREAM WHICH IS WARMER AND SLOWER THAN EVER BEFORE ( DUE TO FRACKING LEAKS OF METHANE INTO THE SEAWATER) CAUSING CLIMATE CHANGE AND ARCTIC ICE MELT.<br /><br />THE GULF STREAM HAS SHIFTED NORTHWARDS AND THE SURE INDICATION IS LOSS OF MARINE LIFE AT THE EAST COAST OF CANADA.<br /><br />BURNING COAL HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH CLIMATE CHANGE..<br /><br />METHANE AND NITROUS OXIDE ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR CLIMATE CHANGE.... CARBON DI OXIDE IS A LIFE SAVING GAS ....<br /><br />APCO MODI HAS CAPITULATED TO THE BEEF, GM FERTILISER AND NITRO EXPLOSIVES LOBBY...<br /><br />If the GLOBAL WARMING POTENTIAL ( GWP ) is 1 for Carbon Dioxide, it is 302 for Nitrous oxide and 104 for Methane over a 20 year period.<br /><br />The Labrador Current, which brings cold, oxygen-rich water southwards, has faltered, and the Gulf Stream\u2014already warm and less oxygenated\u2014has gained in ground.<br /><br />AMOC IS ON DECLINE.. IT HAS SLOWED WON BY MORE THAN 20% , THE GREATEST EVER.<br /><br />The Atlantic meridional overturning circulation (AMOC) is the zonally-integrated component of surface and deep currents in the Atlantic Ocean.<br /><br />It is characterized by a northward flow of warm, salty water in the upper layers of the Atlantic, and a southward flow of colder, deep waters that are part of the thermohaline circulation.<br /><br />The AMOC is an important component of the Earth\u2019s climate system, and is a result of both atmospheric and thermohaline drivers.<br /><br />AMOC consists of upper and lower cells. The upper cell consists of northward surface flow as well as southward return flow of North Atlantic Deep Water (NADW). The lower cell represents northward flow of dense Antarctic Bottom Water (AABW) - this bathes the abyssal ocean.<br /><br />AMOC carries up to 25% of the northward global atmosphere-ocean heat transport in the northern hemisphere. As well as acting as a heat pump and high-latitude heat sink , AMOC is the largest carbon sink in the Northern Hemisphere..<br /><br />Some of the ground in the Arctic is no longer freezing, even during the winter.. Along with causing other problems, this will become yet another feedback loop in the Arctic, causing yet more greenhouse gasses to be released from permafrost than are already being released and impacting the entire planet.<br /><br />As greater amounts of Arctic summer sea ice melt away, less sunlight is reflected back into space. Hence, more light is absorbed into the ocean, which warms it and causes more ice to melt.<br /><br />The oldest and strongest sea ice in the Arctic had broken up for the first time in history..<br /><br />Temperatures are rising most strongly in the Arctic, with some areas already showing an increase of as much as 6.1 deg C.<br /><br />As Earth rotates, this leads to a wavier jet stream that can carry low latitude warmth up to Alaska and elsewhere in the Arctic, and the southward reach of cold air in the Arctic to lower latitudes. This explains why New Orleans, has recently experienced unusual freezing winter weather.<br /><br />The jet stream, which controls seasonal storms in the midlatitudes, is a result of these three cells, and would disappear in a single weather cell planet, dramatically altering rain patterns and almost certainly heralding an ecosystem catastrophe.<br /><br />The plants that underlie the food chain would be replaced by others that the local animals (insects to apex predators) could not utilize \u2014 in short, an abrupt acceleration of the current Great Anthropocene Extinction event.<br /><br />Changes to the jet stream are causing longer and more intense heat waves to occur across the Arctic, which of course causes the Arctic Ocean to warm further.<br /><br />Capt Ajit vadakayil<br />..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-vU4jBmlAQmY/Vwqlmeu0IPI/AAAAAAABHSs/ldFYtGSFjF4_3RUwHSd4YYaOFFdcPR7uw/s1600/capt%2Bajit%2Bvadakayil1%2B2.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-vU4jBmlAQmY/Vwqlmeu0IPI/AAAAAAABHSs/ldFYtGSFjF4_3RUwHSd4YYaOFFdcPR7uw/s400/capt%2Bajit%2Bvadakayil1%2B2.JPG\" width=\"250\" /></a></div>\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n..</div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><b>IN RELITY , THE DEAD BODY OF CONSTANTINE WAS\nBAPTISED BY EUSEBIUS OF NICOMEDIA ( NEVER DONE ) &nbsp;, THE EMPERORS RELATIVE-- A ROGUE POLITICIAN\nPRETENDING TO BE A PRIEST.</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-_OhH-7PG81o/VwzLUaRNIdI/AAAAAAABHXg/uY_t-oot3qcEumS0Og40r2mByI8PGV1OQCLcB/s1600/imCFFages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-_OhH-7PG81o/VwzLUaRNIdI/AAAAAAABHXg/uY_t-oot3qcEumS0Og40r2mByI8PGV1OQCLcB/s400/imCFFages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<h4 style=\"background: none rgb(255, 255, 255); font-size: 11.9px; padding: 0.2em 0.4em;\">32 / 66</td><td style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(170, 170, 170); font-size: 11.9px; padding: 0.2em 0.4em;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Apostle_(Christian)\" style=\"background: none; color: #0b0080; text-decoration: none;\" title=\"Apostle (Christian)\">Apostle</a>&nbsp;of Jesus from whom he received the keys of the&nbsp;<a class=\"mw-redirect\" href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kingdom_of_God\" style=\"background: none; color: #0b0080; text-decoration: none;\" title=\"Kingdom of God\">Kingdom of Heaven</a>, according to&nbsp;<a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gospel_of_Matthew\" style=\"background: none; color: #0b0080; text-decoration: none;\" title=\"Gospel of Matthew\">Matthew</a>&nbsp;<span class=\"nourlexpansion nowrap\" style=\"white-space: nowrap;\"><a class=\"external text\" href=\"http://www.biblegateway.com/passage/?search=Matthew+16%3A18%E2%80%9319&amp;version=ESV\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"background: linear-gradient(transparent, transparent) 100% 50% no-repeat, url(&quot;data:image/svg+xml,%3C%3Fxml%20version%3D%221.0%22%20encoding%3D%22UTF-8%22%20standalone%3D%22no%22%3F%3E%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20width%3D%2212%22%20height%3D%2212%22%3E%3Cpath%20fill%3D%22%23fff%22%20stroke%3D%22%2306c%22%20d%3D%22M1.5%204.518h5.982V10.5H1.5z%22%2F%3E%3Cpath%20d%3D%22M5.765%201H11v5.39L9.427%207.937l-1.31-1.31L5.393%209.35l-2.69-2.688%202.81-2.808L4.2%202.544z%22%20fill%3D%22%2306f%22%2F%3E%3Cpath%20d%3D%22M9.995%202.004l.022%204.885L8.2%205.07%205.32%207.95%204.09%206.723l2.882-2.88-1.85-1.852z%22%20fill%3D%22%23fff%22%2F%3E%3C%2Fsvg%3E&quot;) 100% 50%; color: #663366; padding-right: 13px; text-decoration: none;\">16:18\u201319</a></span>. Executed by crucifixion upside-down; feast day (<a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Feast_of_Saints_Peter_and_Paul\" style=\"background: none; color: #0b0080; text-decoration: none;\" title=\"Feast of Saints Peter and Paul\">Feast of Saints Peter and Paul</a>) 29 June, (<a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chair_of_Saint_Peter\" style=\"background: none; color: #0b0080; text-decoration: none;\" title=\"Chair of Saint Peter\">Chair of Saint Peter</a>) 22 February. He is recognized by the Catholic Church as the first Bishop of Rome appointed by Christ. Also revered as saint in&nbsp;<a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eastern_Christianity\" style=\"background: none; color: #0b0080; text-decoration: none;\" title=\"Eastern Christianity\">Eastern Christianity</a>, with a feast day of 29 June.<sup class=\"reference\" id=\"cite_ref-EncChrPope_4-0\" style=\"font-size: 9.52px; Feast day of 26 October.</td></tr>\n</tbody></table>\n</div>\n<h4 style=\"background: none rgb(255, 255, 255); border-bottom-style: none; font-family: sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 22.4px; margin: 0.3em 0px 0px; overflow: hidden; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-top: 0.5em;\">\n<span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"2nd_century\">2nd century</span><span class=\"mw-editsection\" style=\"display: inline-block; border: 1px solid rgb(170, 170, 170); padding: 0.2em 0.4em; text-align: center; width: 95.8125px;\"><span style=\"background-color: transparent;\">Pontificate</span></th><th style=\"background-color: #f2f2f2; padding: 0.2em 0.4em;\"><a class=\"image\" href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:15-St.Zephyrinus.jpg\" style=\"background: none; color: #0b0080; text-decoration: none;\"><img alt=\"15-St.Zephyrinus.jpg\" data-file-height=\"300\" data-file-width=\"300\" height=\"80\" kasperskylab_antibanner=\"on\" src=\"https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/53/15-St.Zephyrinus.jpg/80px-15-St.Zephyrinus.jpg\" srcset=\"//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/53/15-St.Zephyrinus.jpg/120px-15-St.Zephyrinus.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/53/15-St.Zephyrinus.jpg/160px-15-St.Zephyrinus.jpg 2x\" style=\"border: none; vertical-align: middle;\" width=\"80\" /></a></td><td style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(170, 170, 170); padding: 0.2em 0.4em;\"><b>St&nbsp;<a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pope_Zephyrinus\" style=\"background: none; color: #0b0080; text-decoration: none;\" title=\"Pope Zephyrinus\">Zephyrinus</a></b><br />\n<small style=\"font-size: 11.9px;\">Papa<b>ZEPHYRINUS</b></small></td><td style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(170, 170, 170); padding: 0.2em 0.4em;\">Zephyrinus</td><td style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(170, 170, 170); font-size: 11.9px; padding: 0.2em 0.4em;\">Rome, Roman Empire</td><td style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(170, 170, 170); font-size: 11.9px; padding: 0.2em 0.4em;\">39 / 57</td><td style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(170, 170, 170); font-size: 11.9px; padding: 0.2em 0.4em;\">Combated against the&nbsp;<a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adoptionism\" style=\"background: none; color: #0b0080; text-decoration: none;\" title=\"Adoptionism\">adoptionist</a>&nbsp;heresies of the followers of Theodotus the Byzantium who were ruled by Theodotus, the Money Changer and Asclepiodotus.<br />\n<div style=\"line-height: inherit; margin-bottom: 0.5em; margin-top: 0.5em;\">\nAlthough not physically martyred, he is called a martyr for the suffering he endured.</div>\n</td></tr>\n</tbody></table>\n</div>\n<h4 style=\"background: none rgb(255, 255, 255); border-bottom-style: none; font-family: sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 22.4px; margin: 0.3em 0px 0px; overflow: hidden; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-top: 0.5em;\">\n<span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"3rd_century\">3rd century</span><span class=\"mw-editsection\" style=\"display: inline-block; font-size: x-small; font-weight: normal; line-height: 1em; margin-left: 1em; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: nowrap;\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\" style=\"color: #555555; margin-right: 0.25em;\">[</span><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=List_of_popes&amp;action=edit&amp;section=5\" style=\"background: none; color: #0b0080; text-decoration: none;\" title=\"Edit section: 3rd century\">edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\" style=\"color: #555555; margin-left: 0.25em;\">]</span></span></h4>\n<div style=\"background-color: white; font-size: 11.9px; padding: 0.2em 0.4em;\">Banished by the emperor&nbsp;<a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maxentius\" style=\"background: none; color: #0b0080; text-decoration: none;\" title=\"Maxentius\">Maxentius</a>, and died in exile.</td></tr>\n<tr style=\"vertical-align: top;\"><td style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(170, 170, 170); padding: 0.2em 0.4em; text-align: center;\">32</td><td style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(170, 170, 170); padding: 0.2em 0.4em;\">2 July 311<br />\n\u2013 10 January 314<br />\n<small style=\"font-size: 11.9px;\">(2&nbsp;years, 192&nbsp;days)</small></td><td style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(170, 170, 170); padding: 0.2em 0.4em;\"><a class=\"image\" href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:32-St.Miltiades.jpg\" style=\"background: none; color: #0b0080; text-decoration: none;\"><img alt=\"32-St.Miltiades.jpg\" data-file-height=\"300\" data-file-width=\"300\" height=\"80\" kasperskylab_antibanner=\"on\" src=\"https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/e/e7/32-St.Miltiades.jpg/80px-32-St.Miltiades.jpg\" srcset=\"//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/e/e7/32-St.Miltiades.jpg/120px-32-St.Miltiades.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/e/e7/32-St.Miltiades.jpg/160px-32-St.Miltiades.jpg 2x\" style=\"border: none; vertical-align: middle;\" width=\"80\" /></a></td><td style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(170, 170, 170); padding: 0.2em 0.4em;\"><b>St&nbsp;<a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pope_Miltiades\" style=\"background: none; color: #0b0080; text-decoration: none;\" title=\"Pope Miltiades\">Miltiades</a></b><br />\n(Melchiades)<br />\n<small style=\"font-size: 11.9px;\">Papa&nbsp;<b>MILTIADES</b></small></td><td style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(170, 170, 170); padding: 0.2em 0.4em;\">Miltiades<br />\n(or Melchiades)</td><td style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(170, 170, 170); font-size: 11.9px; padding: 0.2em 0.4em;\">Africa, Roman Empire</td><td style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(170, 170, 170); font-size: 11.9px; padding: 0.2em 0.4em;\">41 / 44</td><td style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(170, 170, 170); font-size: 11.9px; padding: 0.2em 0.4em;\">First pope after the end of the persecution of Christians through the&nbsp;<a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edict_of_Milan\" style=\"background: none; color: #0b0080; text-decoration: none;\" title=\"Edict of Milan\">Edict of Milan</a>(313 AD) issued by&nbsp;<a class=\"mw-redirect\" href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Constantine_I_(emperor)\" style=\"background: none; color: #0b0080; text-decoration: none;\" title=\"Constantine I (emperor)\">Constantine the Great</a>. Presided over the&nbsp;<a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lateran_council\" style=\"background: none; color: #0b0080; text-decoration: none;\" title=\"Lateran council\">Lateran council</a>&nbsp;of 313.</td></tr>\n<tr style=\"vertical-align: top;\"><td style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(170, 170, 170); padding: 0.2em 0.4em; text-align: center;\">33</td><td style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(170, 170, 170); padding: 0.2em 0.4em;\">31 January 314<br />\n\u2013 31 December 335<br />\n<small style=\"font-size: 11.9px;\">(21&nbsp;years, 334&nbsp;days)</small></td><td style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(170, 170, 170); padding: 0.2em 0.4em;\"><a class=\"image\" href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:33-St.Sylvester_I.jpg\" style=\"background: none; color: #0b0080; text-decoration: none;\"><img alt=\"33-St.Sylvester I.jpg\" data-file-height=\"300\" data-file-width=\"300\" height=\"80\" kasperskylab_antibanner=\"on\" src=\"https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/8a/33-St.Sylvester_I.jpg/80px-33-St.Sylvester_I.jpg\" srcset=\"//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/8a/33-St.Sylvester_I.jpg/120px-33-St.Sylvester_I.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/8a/33-St.Sylvester_I.jpg/160px-33-St.Sylvester_I.jpg 2x\" style=\"border: none; padding: 0.2em 0.4em;\">Silvester</td><td style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(170, 170, 170); font-size: 11.9px; padding: 0.2em 0.4em;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sant%27Angelo_a_Scala\" style=\"background: none;
