old, your taste buds is only 10 days old, your intestine inner lining is 3 days old --</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">YOU CANT GO TO SABARIMALA JUST LIKE THAT.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">IT TAKES 41 DAYS OF PENANCE ( VRAT ) AND ONE OF IT IS NO SEXUAL ORGASM . &nbsp;ONLY AFTER YOU COME OUT OF THE SABARIMALA TEMPLE CAN YOU EVEN OGLE AT A WOMAN.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">IT IS NOT FEASIBLE TO HAVE YOUNG WOMEN ON THE LAST DAY AT THE CROWDED TEMPLE &nbsp;.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/sabarimala-makaravilakku-three-light.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">SABARIMALA IS THIS PLANETS NO 1 PILGRIMAGE-- &nbsp;THRICE THE NUMBER OF PILGRIMS AT KUMBH MELA. &nbsp; PEOPLE ARE NOT IDIOTS. THEY GO THERE TO LOSE VICES .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">IT TAKES 21 DAYS TO BREAK A VICE- SABARIMALA REQUIRES DOUBLE THAT TIME.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">AND AS PER LEGEND , LORD AYYAPA THE 9TH AVATAR OF VISHNU, SWORE NOT TO MARRY--BEFORE HE BANISHED HIMSELF FROM INDIA --&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">HE WENT TO EGYPT AND BECAME MORE POWERFUL THAN THE PHAROAH OR THEIR GODS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/imhotep-patron-saint-of-freemasons-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">..</span></div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_35b+seedYQPmD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_35b+seedYQPmD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">English\ntheologian.&nbsp;&nbsp; Dr Nathaniel Lardner ( born\n1684 )&nbsp; observes&nbsp; \u201c just as there was no mention of Jesus or\nChristianity by Philostratus, so we find a similar silence about Apollonius in\nthe works of early Christian writers, though they mention philosophers of much\nless renown, as Justin, Tatian, Clement of Alexandria, Tertullian , etc.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Of all these we have some remains; they\nlived in the first two centuries and the beginning of the third. This silence\non the part of these authors regarding Apollonius can be accounted for on the\nbasis of only one theory - that it was necessary to utterly ignore Apollonius\nand his philosophical and religious teachings in order that the Christian\nreligion might gain a foothold and usurp the field he had grandly occupied\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The replacement of the\nvegetarian and pacifistic doctrine of Apollonius, who taught harmlessness to\nall living beings, animal as well as human (as was previously taught by gotama\nBuddha), by the non-vegetarian and non-pacifistic religion of Jesus and his\nbride, the Church Militant, has plunged the world into centuries of unceasing\nwars and bloodshed, which have continued to increase with the growth of Christianity.\nOn this point, Tredwell writes; \"Think not that I come to send peace on\nearth,\" said Jesus. \"I come not to send peace but a sword....<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Never did a man utter\nwords so brimful of truth -- melancholy as it is. Never was a prediction whose\ndisastrous fulfillment has unfortunately lasted without intermission from time\ntime of its promulgation to the present. From the very establishment of the\nreligion of Jesus, the sword has remained unsheathed in its service, and more\nvictims have been sacrificed to its manes than to all other causes combined.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lest he should be misunuderstood concerning his mission Jesus reiterates that\nhe came to send fire on earth, and strife to make divided households, fathers\nagainst sons, mothers against daughters, and that under the new regime, \"a\nman's foes shall be those of his own household! Bolingbroke says, \"The\nscene of Christianity has always been a scene of dissension, of hatred, of\npersecution and of blood.\" Erasmus said the church was born in blood; grew\nin blood; succeeded in blood, and will end in blood.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Daniel Melancthon Tredwell (born 1791 AD ) professor at Harward , pointed out\nthat Christianity forced its way forward by mass executions and at the point of\nthe sword.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;It was in this way that the \"Church Militant\" was born and\nwas enabled to develop as a world power. Born in bloodshed (the brutal murder\nof Hypatia by Christian \"monks\" soon after the Council of Nicea, by\norder of Cyril, Bishop of Alexandria, who was subsequently \"sainted,\"\nand the ensuing massacres of the Manicheans), it grew by bloodshed (the deaths\nof tens of millions of true followers of Christ, who refused to accept the\nfalse hypocritical teachings of the church, over three million women having\nbeen put to death in Europe only a few centuries ago as witches), it shall die\nin bloodshed (the aftermath of the recent world carnage which is fruit of\nsixteen centuries of false Christian teachings of peace, carried on with an\nolive branch in one hand and a sword in the other).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All this resulted from\nthe fraudulent replacement of the original religion of Apollonius by the\n\"new\" religion of the Church of Rome which took place at the Council\nof Nicea in the year 325 B.C.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Concerning Apollonius's\nlife in the temple of Aegae, John Clarke Stobart (born 1878 ) writes:\n\"Marvelous cures are attributed to Apollonius, for like his &nbsp;master, Pythagoras, who studied in India, he\nconsidered healing the most important of the divine arts; and, in addition,\nunder his guidance, the temple became also a centre for philosophy and for the\nscience of religion. His aim was to purify the temple worship and to reform the\nancient Greek religion from within, by revising, along Pythagorean lines, the\nunderstanding of the spiritual truths which were at the base of the esoteric\nmysteries.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Apllonius was born in\nthe same year as Jesus \u2013this why they chose that date at the First Council of\nNicea in 325 AD.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Oracle of Delphi\nhas predicted a messiah who would be born with 3 gifts , the gift of\nintelligence, the gift of beauty and the gift of wealth<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the three Magi of\nChaldea were approaching Bethlehem, according to legend on the night when the\nfamous star was supposed to have appeared on the eastern horizon, a child was\nborn in the little town of Tyana, in Cappadocia, who was destined to alter the\ncourse of human history for two thousand years -- even though, as the Delphic\nOracle predicted, after his passing, his name was calumniated, and a fictitious\nsubstitute put in his place. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His father was one of\nthe richest men of the province, so that his entire childhood was spent in\nluxury. The renown of his intelligence and beauty grew so great that the\nphrase, \"Whither goest thou? To see the stripling?\" became proverbial\nin Cappadocia. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cIndian theosophy, a\nnatural science chiefly drawn from Stoic authorities, antiquarian ritualism in\ncertain Greek cults, a great copiousness of moral sentiment, the asceticism\nwhich usually appears at the times when the white corpuscles predominate in the\nbody politic of any civilization -- vegetarianism, teetotalism, etc. -- such\nappear to have been the main ingredients in Apollonius' religion.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Apollonius had come to\nIndia to learn the art of hands on healing ( modern reiki ) and be initiated . &nbsp;By these priests, Apollonius was initiated;\nand it was not long before he excelled his masters. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Concerning Apollonius'\nlife in the temple of Aegae, Mrs St Claire Stobart writes : \"Marvelous\ncures are attributed to Apollonius, for like his great master, Pythagoras, he\nconsidered healing the most important of the divine arts; and, in addition,\nunder his guidance, the temple became also a centre for philosophy and for the\nscience of religion. His aim was to purify the temple worship and to reform the\nancient Greek religion from within, by revising, along Pythagorean lines, the\nunderstanding of the spiritual truths which were at the base of the esoteric\nmysteries.\" at just as the name of Apollonius, in the New Testament, was\nchanged to that of Jesus, so Iarchas became his \"Father,\" while the\nBrahmans dwelling on the heights of the Himalayas became \"angels in\nheaven\"? As a farewell gift, the Brahman sages, on the threshold of their\nvalley of mediation, gave Apollonius and Damis camels on which to cross India\nwestward to the Red Sea, where they continued their journey by water\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Apollonius returned to\nGreece from India to accomplish the same mission that Pythagoras had done\nbefore him, namely, to carry westward the Wisdom of the East.&nbsp; &nbsp;Indicating\nthat on his departure from the Brahmans, Apollonius considered himself as their\nemissary to accomplish in Greece what their last student, Pythagoras, had done\nfive centuries previously<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-tmsODVSo8Yo/VwvnrZcSTQI/AAAAAAABHU0/8qg0m3SH3isy3MvN4KWrKWB_TQv5BwhDw/s1600/templeofFasclepius.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"530\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-tmsODVSo8Yo/VwvnrZcSTQI/AAAAAAABHU0/8qg0m3SH3isy3MvN4KWrKWB_TQv5BwhDw/s640/templeofFasclepius.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As Mrs. St. Clair\nStoddard writes : \"Thus he conceived it to be his mission to restore to\nthe Greeks something of the ancient wisdom of Pythagoras. And at the conclusion\nof these travels he was indeed abundantly endowed with occult [spiritual]\nwisdom which powerfully enforced his own supernormal gifts and on returning to\nGreece he was regarded as a divine person.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Apollonius considered\nhimself as continuing the work that Pythagoras , who studied in India, had\ninitiated five centuries previously is indicated by his statement to the spirit\nof Achilles, in which he referred to Pythagoras as \"my spiritual\nancestor.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On his way home, from India\nApollonius sent the following letter to Iarchas :<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Iarchas and the\nother sages, from Apollonius, greetings : &nbsp;I came to you by land; with your aid I return\nby sea from Muziris , and might have returned even by air -- such is the wisdom\nyou have imparted to me. &nbsp;&nbsp;Even among the\nGreeks I shall not forget these things, and shall still hold commerce with you\n-- or I have indeed vainly drunk of the cup of Tantalus. Farewell, ye best\nphilosophers.\" <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">The followers of\nApollonius were Essenes&nbsp; ( Ishanis ) and the hands on healer sub sect whom he initiated were NAZARENES. &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">In Kerala the NASRANIS are called Jews by Wikipedia and Rothschild historians . &nbsp; Sorry they were Ishani ( Essene ) Hindus .<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">CHECK OUT HOW THE NASRANIS OF KERALA ,\nCONTEND WHO THEY ARE .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">SOME THINK THEY ARE JEWS, SOME THINK THEY ARE\nCHRISTIAN.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">YOU\nHAVE BEEN MISLED BY WIKIPEDIA AND JEW ROTHSCHILD TO THINK THAT YOU ARE\nCHRISTIANS / JEWS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/Anand-is-a-good-boy-says-Yesudas/articleshow/4200745.cms\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/Anand-is-a-good-boy-says-Yesudas/articleshow/4200745.cms</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">BOTH JEWS AND CHRISTAINS HAVE BEEN TRYING TO\nESTABLISH BY LIES THAT ESSENES BELONG TO THEM.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">SORRY APOLLONIANs SECT WAS ESSENE , &nbsp;THEY WERE PAGAN HINDUA VEGETARIANS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In the Dead Sea Scrolls we frequently run\nacross the phrase \"each man according to his rank.\" &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Josephus describes four ranks of the\nEssenes.&nbsp; &nbsp;They were similar to the Indian caste system,\nthere was NO discrimination. &nbsp;&nbsp;The Nazares among the Essenes were the spiritual\nclass.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/untouchables-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/untouchables-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-GAcy2HBlPME/Vwvg13hDhTI/AAAAAAABHUc/OdhSb1CW95UE_orp7VJFGsB7ZN0RTvCww/s1600/hdome3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-GAcy2HBlPME/Vwvg13hDhTI/AAAAAAABHUc/OdhSb1CW95UE_orp7VJFGsB7ZN0RTvCww/s640/hdome3.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Dead Sea Scrolls does\nNOT mention Jesus or Christianity even once.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Dead Sea Scrolls,\nin the narrow sense of Qumran Caves Scrolls, are a collection of some 981\ndifferent texts discovered between 1946 and 1956 in eleven caves in the\nimmediate vicinity of the ancient settlement at Khirbet Qumran in the West\nBank. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The caves are located\nabout two kilometres (1.2 miles) inland from the northwest shore of the Dead\nSea, from which they derive their name.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These Qumran Caves\nScrolls describe 400 years \u2013 300 years BC and &nbsp;68 AD.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nothing, and the last\nof the scrolls have been dated to approximately 100 AD.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bronze coins found at\nthe same sites form a series beginning with John Hyrcanus (135\u2013104 BCE) and\ncontinuing until the First Jewish\u2013Roman War (66\u201373 CE), supporting the\nradiocarbon and paleographic dating of the scrolls.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most of the texts are\nwritten in Aramic, Greek , Nabatean , Hebrew etc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most texts are written\non parchment, some on papyrus and one on copper<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 2000 year old scrolls\nwere discovered in 1948, and the Vatican, suppressed the publication of the\nScrolls for 40 years. Of course the Pope knew that Jesus did NOT exists and\nJesus was form that area.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jesus is supposed to have his LAST SUPPER at the\nEssene quarter of Jerusalem\u2014I have been here.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The only reason why Dead\nSea Scrolls have been suppressed because they undermine Christian doctrine.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-APs2bIKE2nI/VwvlgI4WL3I/AAAAAAABHUo/YmjqWa_vA4sHHeUpB3iaodZRjSi6upwfw/s1600/41gJ3b41fjL._SX258_BOC1%252C204%252C203%252C200_.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-APs2bIKE2nI/VwvlgI4WL3I/AAAAAAABHUo/YmjqWa_vA4sHHeUpB3iaodZRjSi6upwfw/s400/41gJ3b41fjL._SX258_BOC1%252C204%252C203%252C200_.jpg\" width=\"302\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nVatican grape vine says that every reference to Apollonius by name was\ndestroyed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pope Paul III spAke \u201cthere\nwere no valid documents to demonstrate the existence of Christ.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pope Leo X (1513-1521)\nsaid Jesus was a mere legend.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Catholic\nEncyclopedia refers to a widely circulated remark: Qumran, hidey-hole for the\nDead Sea Scrolls, lies twelve miles from Bethlehem. The scroll writers, coeval\nand abutting the holiest of hamlets one jaunty jog eastward, never heard of\nJesus. &nbsp;Christianity still had that\nnew-cult smell in the second century, but Christian presbyter Marcion of Pontus\nin 144 CE denied any virgin birth or childhood for Christ.&nbsp; &nbsp;Marcion claimed that Luke was corrupted;\nChrist self-spawned in omnipresence, esprit sans corps.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One December day in\n1945, far up the Nile Valley, two Egyptian peasants were looking for a local\nvariety of crumbly nitrate rock used as fertilizer. Amid the scree at the foot\nof the cliff bordering the valley, they came across a large jar, about a meter\ntall, hidden by a boulder. Inside they found a collection of ancient\nleather-bound books or codices. The spot where the books were found is within a\nfew miles of the site of an early monastery, established by the founder of\nChristian monasticism in Egypt, Pachomius. Nag Hammadi, a nearby village , has\ngiven this remarkable collection its name.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Nag Hammadi Library\nconsists of fifty-two texts or \"tractates\" written in Coptic on\npapyrus and gathered in thirteen volumes, twelve of which have separate leather\nbindings. Forty of the texts had previously been unknown to modern scholars.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most of the writings are of a Gnostic character. Scraps of paper found in the\nbinding of eight codices bear dates indicating that the books were made in the\nmid-fourth century, and at least one of these clearly appears to have come from\na monastery.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In between Vatican came\nout with a trump card.&nbsp; They came out\nwith The gospel of Thomas --a Coptic manuscript discovered in 1945 at Nag Hammadi\nin Egypt. This manuscript contains 114 sayings attributed to Jesus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IT WAS FOUND TO BE A\nRIDICULOUS FAKE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The gospel of Thomas\nwas not written by Jesus' disciple Thomas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thomas says:\n\"Simon Peter said to them, \u2018Make Mary leave us, for females don\u2019t deserve\nlife.\u2019&nbsp; &nbsp;Jesus said, \u2018Look, I will guide her to make\nher male, so that she too may become a living spirit resembling you males. For\nevery female who makes herself male will enter the kingdom of heaven\u2019\"\n(Thomas 114).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AIYOOOOO &nbsp;\u2014even Christians\ndon\u2019t like this. Must be a Jew\u2019s work.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JEWS HAVE USED THE\nBIBLE TO ESTABLISH THAT THEIR HOMELAND IS PALESTINE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">St. Thomas is prominent\nin the Syriac tradition. He is mentioned in all four Gospels. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>DOUBLE AIYOOOOO !!</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kerala Christian\nhistrorians write \u201c&nbsp; When Thomas\nencountered a group of Brahmans throwing water into the air as part of a\nritual, he asked why the water fell back to Earth if it was pleasing to their\ndeity. My God, Thomas said, would accept such an offering. He then flung a\ngreat spray into the air, and the droplets hung there in the form of glistening\nwhite blossoms. Most onlookers converted on the spot; the rest fled.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>TRIPLE &nbsp;AIYYYOOOOOOOOOOO &nbsp;!!!</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Essenes of Qumran\nwere fond of calling themselves \"sons of light.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">US author spiritual Barbara\nG.Walker says, \"No literate person of his Jesus Christs\u2019s own time\nmentioned him in any known writing\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Flavious Josephus said\nin his History of the Jews: \u201cThese Jews are derived from the Indian\nphilosophers; they are named by the Indians from land of Calani ( Kalari-Kerala\n) \u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Megasthenes, sent to\nIndia by Seleucus Nicator, also said that the Jews were from land called\n\u201cKalani\u201d and that they were an Indian tribe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Clearchus of Soli said:&nbsp;&nbsp; \u201cThe Jews descend from the philosophers of\nIndia. The philosophers are called in India Calanians<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Judaism was founded by\ndisgraced Namboodiris .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PLINY THE YOUNGER-His\nletter to Trajan referred to the Essenes and not to the Christians-The word\nChristians is a forgery.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">POPE GREGORY VII.&nbsp; \u2013 He destroyed the library of the Palatine\nApollo-&nbsp; which contained proof of\nApollonius and NOT a word about Jesus Christ or Christianity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">FLAVIUS JOSEPHUS, a\nJewish Historian.-&nbsp; The reference to\nJesus of Nazareth fraudulently inserted by &nbsp;Vatican . No such person as Jesus of Nazareth\nexisted in the time of Josephus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">COSMAS INDICOPLEUSTES,\nthe great Antiquarian. The symbols or keys of the Christian religion found on\nthe Adulian marble all fake- Fraudulent plates were manufactured&nbsp; and buried by excavators to support the Old\nTestament.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PONTIUS PILATE,\nProcurator of Judea.&nbsp; He is real , but he\nnever heard of Jesus or tried him and washed off his hands.&nbsp;&nbsp; He tried Ben Onanias a robber; &nbsp;and was to get him crucified by the Roman\nsoldiers. He released him when he figured out that he is a whacko.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This man also\nknown as Jesus Ananias went around prophesying \u201cwoe to Jerusalem city \u201c\u2013 and one\nexasperated Roman catapulted a stone on his head and he died on the spot in 62\nAD ( udhar hi lutak gaya !).&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JULIUS FLORUS, a Roman\nHistorian\u2014Did NOT write a word about Jesus or Christianity till his death in\n131 AD\u2014while he wrote about every small incident in Jerusalem. He read books &nbsp;in Cordoba library ad wrote about Apollonius.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">POMPONIUS MELA, a Roman\nGeographer.-&nbsp; Till his death in 47 AD, he\ndid NOT write a single word about Jesus or Christianity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ULPHILAS, a LYING Catholic\nBishop who died in 383 AD Eusebius of Nicomedia used him to cook aup stories\nabout Jesus and Christianity.&nbsp; Ulfilas\ntranslated the Bible from Greek into the Gothic language.&nbsp;&nbsp; The source of the Codex Argenteus-&nbsp; The Brahminical gospels of Apollonius\ntranslated from the Samaritan tongue in the Fourth&nbsp; Century-The names were changed to suit his Vatican\nemployers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ABGARUS, a Grecian\nPriest.-The famous letter to Jesus Christ a ridiculous forgery by Christian\nwriters<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A copy of a letter\nwritten by King Abgarus to Jesus, and sent to him by Ananias, his footman, to\nJerusalem, &nbsp;inviting him to Edessa.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Abgar Ouchama to\nJesus, the Good Physician Who has appeared in the country of Jerusalem,\ngreeting:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">I have heard of\nThee, and of Thy healing; that Thou dost not use medicines or roots, but by Thy\nword openest (the eyes) of the blind, makest the lame to walk, cleansest the\nlepers, makest the deaf to hear; how by Thy word (also) Thou healest (sick)\nspirits and those who are tormented with lunatic demons, and how, again, Thou\nraisest the dead to life. And, learning the wonders that Thou doest, it was\nborne in upon me that (of two things, one): either Thou hast come down from\nheaven, or else Thou art the Son of God, who bringest all these things to pass.\nWherefore I write to Thee, and pray that thou wilt come to me, who adore Thee, and\nheal all the ill that I suffer, according to the faith I have in Thee. I also\nlearn that the Jews murmur against Thee, and persecute Thee, that they seek to\ncrucify Thee, and to destroy Thee. I possess but one small city, but it is\nbeautiful, and large enough for us two to live in peace</span></i>.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Doctrina then\ncontinues:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Jesus had received\nthe letter, in the house of the high priest of the Jews, Jesus replied by letter&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\"'Happy art thou who hast believed in Me, not having seen Me, for it is written\nof Me that those who shall see Me shall not believe in Me, and that those who\nshall not see Me shall believe in Me. As to that which thou hast written, that\nI should come to thee, (behold) all that for which I was sent here below is\nfinished, and I ascend again to My Father who sent Me, and when I shall have\nascended to Him I will send thee one of My disciples, who shall heal all thy\nsufferings, and shall give (thee) health again, and shall convert all who are\nwith thee unto life eternal. And thy city shall be blessed forever, and the\nenemy shall never overcome it</span></i>.'\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(According to Eusebius,\nJesus Christ himself wrote the letter in his own hand )&nbsp; &nbsp;<b>Catholic Encyclopedia 1908<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; OF WW2 , MOST DAMAGED GRAND CATHEDRALS HAD TO BE REBUILT.<br />\n<br />\nALMOST ALL OF THEM HAD PAGAN TEMPLES UNDERNEATH WITH SHIVA LINGAM IN SOME..<br />\n<br />\nSOME OF THESE CATHEDRALS I HAVE VISITED -- THE HAVE A PROBLEM WITH THE PADRE HAVING HIS ASS TOWARDS THE ALTAR.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Versus populum </span><span style=\"color: blue;\">VERSUS</span><span style=\"color: red;\"> Ad orientem</span></b></span><br />\nHAJAAAAR CONFUSIN-- HAJAAAR FIGHTS.<br />\n<br />\nIn the Christian liturgy the expression ad orientem (Latin for \"to the east\") describes the orientation of a priest celebrating Mass.<br />\n<br />\nAd orientem is more often used to mean facing the apse or wall behind the altar, with priest and people looking in the same direction (as opposed to the versus populum orientation, in which the priest faces the congregation), even if they are not facing to the east or even have their backs to the east<br />\n<br />\nThe orientation to the East--ad orientem\u2014held a profoundly mystical significance for early Christians, but it also had roots deep in their PAGAN traditions.<br />\n<br />\ntoday rothschild historians have removed the waord PAGAN ( hindu ) and inserted JEWISH. -- as if the jews populated the world and they had thousands of temples --THE LYING BASTARDS.<br />\n<br />\nThe Early Church ( after 325 AD ) regarded prayer facing the East as an apostolic tradition--BALLS IT IS JUST VAASTU.<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE The placement of the priest behind the altar facing the assembly was supposed to better emphasize the communal character of the Mass as a meal and increase the people\u2019s active participation by reflecting the manner in which Christ himself celebrated the first Mass on Holy Thursday. UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nAIYYOOOO !<br />\n<br />\nToday in the Internet age ( and knowledge of Apolloinus ) Christians know that the directions must be addressed -- and they are fighting for a return to ad orientem on spiritual grounds.<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE: When the priest faced ad orientem, he was, in a sense, an anonymous mediator between God and man. Such an arrangement intrinsically hindered the priest from calling attention to himself. But, when turned versus populum, he became a distinct person with a distinct personality and the sanctuary became a stage, in which the altar turns him into an actor playing a role in the re-enactment of the Last Supper. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Constantine enjoyed the red meats, the flowing wines and\nthe beautiful women of his midnight revels too much to be willing to accept the\nreligion of which Apollonius was the recognized head : a simple and honourable spiritual way of life\nwhich he imported from India.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Apollonius\u2019s hero ORPHEUS was a Indian seer. In\nmany Eastern European nations they say that Orpheus was the real messiah fortold\nby psychics in the Temple of Delphi.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;His masters Pythagoras and Plato studied in\nKodungallur University, Kerala.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Roman Emperor Constantine the great directed\nhis mighty far flung armies to exterminate the descendants of Apollonius'\nEssenian followers, who were known as Manichaeans.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Kerala\nACHAIYANs are the same , who came running back home to Kerala by ship for their\ndear lives. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Today\nbecause their skin is slightly fairer and they have lesser than black eyes they\nthink they are Jews. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">These\npeople have Kerala culture in the genomes and have NOT shed it.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">None\nof these Kerala ACHAYANS went to Israel along with the Bene Israel Jews .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Finding\nthat the religion of Rome was in a state of advanced decay and was daily losing\nhold on the masses, while the cult of Apollonius and the communistic\ncommunities of his Manichaean followers, in spite of the severest persecution,\nkept spreading, threatening the vested interests of Rome, Constantine's\nhenchmen - the pagan priests of the Roman religion - decided to hold a convention\nat Nicaea in the year 325 A.D., for the purpose of establishing a new religion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">They\ndecided to take over the popularity enjoyed by the followers of Apollonius,\nappropriate its essential doctrines (altering them so that they might be\nacceptable to Constantine), and to replace the philosopher Apollonius, whose\nabstemious Pythagoreanism was too well known and too much hated by their\nemperor, by a super-natural Messiah whose teachings would be less radical and\nmore acceptable to him. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">So in\nplace of Apollonius of Tyana, they put their newly created savior, whom they\nnamed \"Jesus Christ,\" who, then and there, was first conceived and\ncreated in the minds of Roman priests who were later known as the Nicaean\nChurch Fathers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">As\nsoon as Jesus was put in the place of Apollonius, the task of the Roman\nchurchmen was to destroy all records concerning Apollonius and his Essenian\nEarly Christian followers during the first three centuries, so that the world\nmight forever be kept in darkness concerning this colossal deception and be\nmade to believe that Jesus and the Christian religion, which they originated at\nthe beginning of the Fourth Century A.D., antedated their creation by three\ncenturies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It was\nfor this reason that the Alexandrian and other ancient libraries ( like Cordoba\n) were burnt, so that all books written during and pertaining to the first\nthree centuries of our Common Era might be destroyed. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Alexandria burning referred to above\noccurred in the year 389 CE during the reign of Emperor Theodosius.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">KODUNGALLUR UNIVERISTY WHERE APOLLONIUS,\nDAMISA, PLATO, PYTHAGORAS ETC STUDIED HAS BEEN MURDERED IN COLD BLOOD.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/03/kodungallur-bharani-festival-capt-ajit.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/03/kodungallur-bharani-festival-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE WHITE INVADER DESTROYED ALL LOCAL RECORDS\n( CARTED AWAY&nbsp; TO GERMANY ) . MY FATHER\nAND MOTHER WORKED IN THE BASEL MISSION FACTORY LATER TAKEN OVER BY ROTHSCHILD.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Malayalam language was deleted and converted\nas a recent language , a tape worm in the stomach of Tamil &nbsp;&nbsp;( Tamil Brahmins were stooges of the white\ninvader and given plum administrative posts in Kerala).&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This\nLIE fell PHUUUTTTT on the face when Angela Merkel declared a few months ago,\nthat in Germany they study on Sanskrit and Malayalam ( the tape worm , remember\n?)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I CAME TO KNOW ABOUT KODUNGALLUR UNIVERISTY\nBY A PILOT FROM MOROCCO.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">IT WAS HE WHO TOLD ME THAT HIS ANCESTRAL HOME IS NEXT TO\nTHE ANCIENT HOME OF IBN BATUTA\u2014AND THAT THE ORIGINAL KORAN ( EDITED IN\nKODUNGALLUR )&nbsp; IS IN SOME FOXHOLE IN\nTIMBUCTOO DESERT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE KING OF CALICUT DROVE AWAY IBN BATUTA (\nTOO MUCH ISLAMIC HARDCORE ) AND PUT HIM IN MALDIVES IN A MOSQUE OWNED BY HIM ,\nTO COOL OFF. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">TO BE FRANK IBN BATUTA WAS TRYING TO DO A GOOD\nTHING\u2014 PREVENT MUSLIM WOMEN WALKING AROUND WITH NAKED TITS SWINGING ON THE\nCROWDED CALICUT STREETS . &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">HE WANTED THAT NORTH &nbsp;KERALA MUSLIM WOMEN SHOULD NOT EVEN EXPOSE\nTHEIR EYES - LEAVE ALONE TITS AND NAVEL. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">REMEMBER SPIKED TOOTH GRAPH CURVE DOES NOT\nWORK AS FAR AS CULTURE IS CONCERNED \u2014IT MUST BE BEVELLED AT BIT .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">MUSLIM CHINESE ADMIRAL ZHENG HE KEPT RECORDS\nIN CHINA TOO.&nbsp; &nbsp;HE DIES IN CALICUT, MY HOMETOWN.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">JUST BECAUSE THIS GREAT HERO WAS A YELLOW\nSKINNED MUSLIM, HE HAS NOT BEEN GRANTED HIS PLACE IN HISTORY. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; Today it is a drinking water source for\nCalicut. &nbsp;&nbsp;The white church spire is CSI church Calicut. &nbsp;The pioneering founders of the CSI Cathedral\nChurch were Hermann Gundert and Reverend Samuel Hebich . &nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>EVEN PAGAN ALEXANDER THE GREAT HAS TO MARRY A HINDU PRINCESS BEFORE THE PASS WAS REVEALED.</b></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;
