font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>WHEN YOUR KARMIC BAGGAGE IS ZERO , YOU GET MOKSHA , YOUR SOUL GETS OFF AT THE SEVENTH ASTRAL LAYER OF VAIKUNTA , AND YOUR SOUL MERGES WITH THE &nbsp;\" MOTHER MORPHOGENETIC CONSCIOUSNESS FIELD \" OR BRAHMAN --AND NOW YOU ARE GOD , NEVER TO BE RE-INDUCTED TO PLANET EARTH AGAIN.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>THE AIM OF EVERY HINDU IS TO REACH THE SEVENTH HEAVEN.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>AFTER DEATH -- THE HUMAN SOUL WITH KARMIC BAGGAGE ASCENDS TO A SUITABLE ASTRAL LAYER. &nbsp; THE BETTER YOU ARE THE HIGHER YOU GO TO ANOY OF THE BOTTOM SIX LAYERS.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE SOUL IS SHOT UP WHEN THE SKULL POPS DURING CREMATION, CREATING A SOLITON WAVE ( TSUNAMI ) .</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>AFTER DEATH IF YOUR BODY IS BURIED IT IS HOPELESSLY TRAPPED ON EARTH , FOREVER , UNHAPPY AND LOST . &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>YOU ARE A HINDU ONLY IF YOU INSIST ON CREMATION AFTER DEATH .</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b>HINDUS SAY \"NAMSASTE\" TO THE SOUL IN THE OTHER MAN, A BALL OF ENERGY .</b></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE OTHER MANS FACE AND FLESH IS SAME AS HIS JEANS AND SHOES .</span></b>.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ONCE YOU BECOME A HUMAN ON EARTH YOUR SOUL WILL NOT BE RE-INDUCTED AS AN ANIMAL. &nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EVEN LIVING THING INCLUDING A PLANT HAS A SOUL.</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO </span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>18.80%--&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nREAD ABOUT A CHOOT NAMED CHARLES DARWIN , BELOW !<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/charles-darwin-and-his-apple-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/charles-darwin-and-his-apple-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Essenes and subsect Nazarines\nwere brown skinned and had black hair and black eyes.&nbsp; They community had few women ( as\nhousekeepers and nurses for women who sought help &nbsp;) &nbsp;and\nhistorians wondered how they procreated. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This community was constantly replenished by people\ncoming by sea from Muziris India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JOHN THE BAPTIST WAS AN\nESSENE WITH BLACK HAIR AND BROWN SKIN- LIKE APOLLONIUS <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">John the Baptist is a prophet\nin Islam as Ya\u1e25y\u0101 ibn Zakar\u012by\u0101 , or \"John, son of Zechariah\". &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">John the Baptist always\ncarried a staff with a cross on top.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-yu67ztDV8B8/Vw5WJQxztzI/AAAAAAABHa8/hdRvk3F-dIkrgPya5x2xCMLDYQ4jv3JTACLcB/s1600/johntdb.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-yu67ztDV8B8/Vw5WJQxztzI/AAAAAAABHa8/hdRvk3F-dIkrgPya5x2xCMLDYQ4jv3JTACLcB/s1600/johntdb.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pliny (l.c.), speaking\nof the Essene community in the neighborhood of the Dead Sea, calls it the\nmarvel of the world, and characterizes it as a race continuing its existence\nfor thousands of centuries without either wives and children, or money for\nsupport, and with only the palm-trees for companions in its retreat from the\nstorms of the world. &nbsp;&nbsp;Philo, &nbsp;calls the Essenes \"the holy ones,\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE NAZARES DID\nSURYA NAMASKAR .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201c the Essenes is\n\"Wati\u1e33im,\" (men of firm principles: Sifre, Num. 92; Sifre, Deut. 13;\nM\u00fcller, \"Masseket Soferim,\" 1878, p. 257, who identifies them with\nthe Essenes). \"The Wati\u1e33im so arranged their morning prayer as to finish\nthe Shema' exactly at the time when the sun came out in radiance\" (Ber.\n9b; comp. Wisdom xvi. 28; II Macc. x. 28)\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Philo repeats again and\nagain that &nbsp;mighty kings have admired and\nvenerated ESSENES &nbsp;and conferred honors\nupon them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">LIKE THE TEACHING OF\nLORD KISHNA IN BHAGAVAT GITA\u2014FORGE THE HINGES OF DESTINTY ON YOUR OWN&nbsp; FREE WILL AND TERMS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Everything is\nforeseen, but free will is given,\" Abot iii. 15)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Josephus wrote\u2014<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201c Essenes ascribe all\nthings to God, that they teach the immortality of the soul, and that the reward\nof righteousness must be fought for\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cEssenes &nbsp;have no special city of their own, but live in\nlarge numbers in different cities, and if any of their followers comes from a\nstrange city everything they have is considered as belonging equally to the\nnewcomer; those who were never known before are received as kindred and\nfriends.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cAt early dawn the\nEssenes &nbsp;rise for devotion and prayer,\nand speak not a word to one another until they have praised God in Sanskrit hymns\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"There are no loud\nnoise and vociferation heard [at their assembly]; they speak gently and allow\nthe discourse to flow with grace and dignity, so that the stillness within\nimpresses outsiders with a sense of mystery. They observe sobriety and\nmoderation in eating and drinking. All pay due attention to the president, and\nwhatever he orders they obey as law. Especial zeal they manifest in offering\nsympathy and succor to those in distress\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE ESSENE VIEW OF THE\nSOUL PARKED IN THE BOTTOM SIX ASTRAL LAYERS GETTING RE-INDUCTED ON PLANET EARTH\nAGAIN , FOR&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">LIGHTENING</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;THE KARMIC BAGGAGE &nbsp;IS MISTAKEN AS RESURRECTION.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS CAN NEVER HAPPEN\nIN THE SAME DEAD BODY.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PATHETIC !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Particularly firm\nis their doctrine of Resurrection; they believe that the flesh will rise again\nand then be immortal like the soul, which, they say, when separated from the\nbody, enters a place of fragrant air and radiant light, there to enjoy rest\u2014a\nplace called by the Greeks who heard [of this doctrine] the 'Isles of the\nBlest.'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE BOTTOM SIX ASTRAL LAYERS\nARE GRADED. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE SOULS WITH MAXIMUM\nKARMIC BAGGAGE ARE AT THE BOTTOM LAYERS&nbsp;&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE SOUL WHO GETS A\nCHANCE FOR MOKSHA IS PARKED AT THE SIXTH LAYER.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The New Testament is\nTOTALLY SILENT about the Essenes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Armenians hold the\nrights to the OLD TESTAMENT<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Essene Armenian inormation\nis found in Cyropaedia (Persian Expedition), an ancient Greek work by Xenophon\n(430 BC \u2013 355 BC). &nbsp;&nbsp;These references\nindicate that several Armenians traveled to India, and they knew the Bolan and\nKhyber passes and also by sea route to Muziris.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Armenian temple (\nNazarene ) at Brabourne Road, Kolkata was converted into a church in 1734 and\nis the oldest Church in Kolkata.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The King of Calicut used\nArabs as middlemen for spices\u2014but Armenians were DIAMOND middlemen.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ESSENE THOMAS OF CANA\nWHO CAME TO KERALA WAS IN THE DIAMOND TRADE .&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">KERALA KNANAYAS PLEASE\nNOTE \u2013HE WAS NOT A CHRISTIAN MAN.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let me quote Wikipedia<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE: &nbsp;<i>Armenians had trading relations with several\nparts of India, and by the 7th century a few Armenian settlements had appeared\nin Kerala, an Indian state located on the Malabar Coast. Armenians controlled a\nlarge part of the international trade of the area, particularly in precious\nstones and quality fabrics. An</i></span><i style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;archive directory\n(published 1956) in Delhi, India states that an Armenian merchant-cum-diplomat,\nnamed Thomas Cana, had reached the Malabar Coast in 780 using the overland\nroute.[2] Seven hundred years thereafter, in the year 1498, Vasco da Gama\nreached the Malabar Coast by sea. Thomas Cana was an affluent merchant dealing\nchiefly in spices and muslins. He was also instrumental in obtaining a decree,\ninscribed on a copperplate, from the rulers of Malabar, which conferred several\ncommercial, social and religious privileges for the Christians of that region.\nIn current local references, Thomas Cana is known as \"Knayi Thomman\"\nor \"Kanaj Tomma\", meaning Thomas the merchant. The Armenians in India\ncan justly be proud of a glorious past but their present and future are not at\nall bright. They have greatly decreased in number. Now there are hardly 100\nArmenians in India, mostly in Kolkata, where the Armenian College still\nfunctions</i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">UNQUOTE</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Armenians_in_India\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Armenians_in_India</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-pgzeoYo1i-g/Vw5pcu0S4sI/AAAAAAABHbU/tiaZ9rrqTM4Wj3ScGOQBMO-41VWhn_A3gCLcB/s1600/old-testament-wCorld-1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"426\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-pgzeoYo1i-g/Vw5pcu0S4sI/AAAAAAABHbU/tiaZ9rrqTM4Wj3ScGOQBMO-41VWhn_A3gCLcB/s640/old-testament-wCorld-1.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CITIES IN THE OLD\nTESTAMENT <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1.\nNineveh, the capital of Assyria.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. Susa, in Elam, the\ncapital of the Persian Empire (Esther 1:2).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. Haran, in\nMesopotamia, Abram's first camping place.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4. Babylon, the capital\nof Chaldea.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5. Ur, on the\nEuphrates, the home of Terah, Abraham's father.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6. Damascus, the\ncapital of Syria and the oldest existing city.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">7. Sidon, in Phoenicia.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">8. Tyre, in Phoenicia,\nand the commercial metropolis of that country.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">9. Jerusalem, the\ncapital of Palestine.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">10. Memphis, the early\ncapital of Egypt.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">\"He\n[i.e., Nimrod] went forth into Assyria and builded Nineveh.\" <b>Gen. 10:11</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; and will make Nineveh a desolation, [and] dry like a wilderness.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">Genesis 10:11 - Out of that land went forth Asshur, and builded Nineveh, and the city Rehoboth, and Calah,&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">2 Kings 19:36 - So Sennacherib king of Assyria departed, and went and returned, and dwelt at Nineveh.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">Isaiah 37:37 - So Sennacherib king of Assyria departed, and went and returned, and dwelt at Nineveh.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">Jonah 3:2 - Arise, go unto Nineveh, that great city, and preach unto it the preaching that I bid thee.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">Jonah 3:5 - So the people of Nineveh believed God, and proclaimed a fast, and put on sackcloth, from the greatest of them even to the least of them.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">Nahum 1:1 - The burden of Nineveh. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Harran,&nbsp; was where Abram remained, after he left Ur of\nthe Chaldees, till his father Terah died (Gen. 11:31, 32), when he continued\nhis journey into the land of Canaan<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Jewish tradition makes Haran to have been cast\ninto Nimrod's furnace for wavering during Abram's fiery trial.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Haran in Naves Topical\nBible 1. Father of Lot and brother of Abraham Ge 11:26-31&nbsp; Also called CHARRAN A place in Mesopotamia to\nwhich Terah and Abraham migrated Ge 11:31; 12:4,5; Ac 7:4 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Haran in the Bible\nEncyclopedia - ISBE ha'-ran (charan; Charhran): The city where Terah settled on\nhis departure from Ur (Gen 11:31 f); whence Abram set out on his pilgrimage of\nfaith to Canaan (Gen 12:1 ff).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is one of the cities named by Rabshakeh as\ndestroyed by the king of Assyria (2 Ki 19:12; Isa 37:12). Ezekiel speaks of the\nmerchants of Haran as trading with Tyre (27:23). Haran&nbsp; shared in the rebellion of Assur (763 BC, the\nyear of the solar eclipse, June 15). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Genesis 11:29 - And\nAbram and Nahor took them wives: the name of Abram's wife [was] Sarai; and the\nname of Nahor's wife, Milcah, the daughter of Haran, the father of Milcah, and\nthe father of Iscah. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Genesis 12:4 - So Abram\ndeparted, as the LORD had spoken unto him; and Lot went with him: and Abram\n[was] seventy and five years old when he departed out of Haran. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Genesis 12:5 - And\nAbram took Sarai his wife, and Lot his brother's son, and all their substance\nthat they had gathered, and the souls that they had gotten in Haran; and they\nwent forth to go into the land of Canaan; and into the land of Canaan they\ncame. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Genesis 11:32 - And the\ndays of Terah were two hundred and five years: and Terah died in Haran. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ezekiel 27:23 - Haran,\nand Canneh, and Eden, the merchants of Sheba, Asshur, [and] Chilmad, [were] thy\nmerchants. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2 Kings 19:12 - Have\nthe gods of the nations delivered them which my fathers have destroyed; [as]\nGozan, and Haran, and Rezeph, and the children of Eden which [were] in\nThelasar? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Isaiah 37:12 - Have the\ngods of the nations delivered them which my fathers have destroyed, [as] Gozan,\nand Haran, and Rezeph, and the children of Eden which [were] in Telassar? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Genesis 11:26 - And\nTerah lived seventy years, and begat Abram, Nahor, and Haran. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Genesis 27:43 - Now\ntherefore, my son, obey my voice; and arise, flee thou to Laban my brother to\nHaran; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1 Chronicles 23:9 - The\nsons of Shimei; Shelomith, and Haziel, and Haran, three. These [were] the chief\nof the fathers of Laadan. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Genesis 11:28 - And\nHaran died before his father Terah in the land of his nativity, in Ur of the\nChaldees. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Genesis 28:10 - And\nJacob went out from Beersheba, and went toward Haran. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Genesis 29:4 - And\nJacob said unto them, My brethren, whence [be] ye? And they said, Of Haran\n[are] we. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Genesis 11:27 - Now\nthese [are] the generations of Terah: Terah begat Abram, Nahor, and Haran; and\nHaran begat Lot. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1 Chronicles 2:46 - And\nEphah, Caleb's concubine, bare Haran, and Moza, and Gazez: and Haran begat Gazez.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Genesis 11:31 - And\nTerah took Abram his son, and Lot the son of Haran his son's son, and Sarai his\ndaughter in law, his son Abram's wife; and they went forth with them from Ur of\nthe Chaldees, to go into the land of Canaan; and they came unto Haran, and\ndwelt there.<span style=\"background: yellow; mso-highlight: yellow;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE JEWS MASSACRED THE &nbsp;ARMENIAN ESSENES, ETHNIC CLEANSING AND DESTRUCTION OF THE OLD TESTAMENT &nbsp;\u2014&nbsp; A LOT OF THEM WERE CONVERTED TO CHRISTIANITY. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE\nMUSLIMS ARE BLAMED BY VATICAN.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/04/lawrence-of-arabia-part-two-capt-ajit.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/04/lawrence-of-arabia-part-two-capt-ajit.html</a></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindus were the first\non the planet to pray to GOD.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prayer was part and\nparcel of the Vedic lifestyle<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Vedas, which went\non oral route for 30 millenniums and written down 7000 years ago , is a large\ncollection of Sanskrit verses, with BRAHMaN ( THE MORPHOGENETIC CONSCIOUSNESS\nFIELD ) inherent in it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brahman, - the all unknowing,\ntrue, infinite and blissful Divine Ground, is the source and being of all\nexistence from which the cosmos springs. This is the essence of the Vedic\nsystem.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Muslims who read the\nKoran know that Koran &nbsp;uses the word\n\u201cNasrani\u201c or \u201cnassara\u201c for the early Essenes .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-VNt2AsYThfU/Vw6M02ibyGI/AAAAAAABHcc/C3x7RfksKEwF697tnm3frlE0UrHl69BgACLcB/s1600/doRwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the dead sea scrolls\nit was NOT the cross , but the fish ( MATSYA AVATAR ) they used as a symbol under\na six pointed star( SHIVA-SHAKTI ) .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nazares lives in\nashrams named VATICA which was lifted for VATICAN<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-hFe69Kjz3aU/Vw6NCKgOkJI/AAAAAAABHck/Z6sfzO-3XsEB9jBbF7rBFcDHEGhMWvcZACLcB/s1600/Stare2001.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Pz188Rs276M/Vw6NHpJBBMI/AAAAAAABHco/qmzQJFLoqn4s_vN5rCSeask5ZkFMeYZ2QCLcB/s1600/Stard001.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
