, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kerala NASRANIS even\ntoday call themselves MARGAVASIS ( same in Malayalam and Sanskrit for FOLLOWERS\nOF THE WAY )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These Qumran sect/\nEssenes / Nazrenes referred themselves as the \u201cfollowers of The Way\u201d. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Moses was NOT a Jew\u2014he was\nEssene . &nbsp;His father in law was a Hindu Namboodiri\nnamed JETHRO<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Moses preserved the\nEssene teachings for the Children of Light (the Essenes became known as the\n\"Children of Light\")<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"And Moses hid the\ninvisible Law within his breast, and kept it for a sign for the Children of\nLight.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When modern scholars\nassert that the Essenes of Qumran were founded about 200 years before the time\nof Jesus, they are correct in regard to that one Essene group at Qumran; but\nthe overall Essene movement is thousands of years more ancient<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Dead Sea Scrolls,\nwonderful as they are, were written by Essenes who were prayerfully preparing\nfor the coming of the Universal Messiah KALKI<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 325 AD, they\nborrowed Essene ( HINDU ) philosophy heavily .&nbsp;\nWe read in The Gospel of the Holy Twelve:&nbsp; \"The soul is purified through many re-births\nand experiences.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In another passage of\nthe same manuscript, Jesus states: <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;\"So through many re-births will ye soul be\nmade perfect.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"As all creatures\ncome from the unseen into this world, so they return to the unseen, and so will\nthey come again till they be purified.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"... and to them\nwill be given space to consider, and amend their lives....\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"The body that ye\nlay in the grave, or that is consumed by fire, is not the body that shall be,\nbut they who come again shall receive other bodies, and as they have sown in\none life, so shall they reap in another.\" ( ESSENE \u2013HINDU LAW OF KARMA )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Blessed are they\nwho suffer many experiences, for they shall be made perfect through suffering:\nthey shall be as the angels of God in heaven and die no more, neither shall\nthey be born anymore, for death and birth have no more dominion over\nthem.\" ( after elevation of soul to seventh astral layer or Vaikunta / MOKSHA\u2014no\nmore re-birth on earth )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALL THIS HEAVEN/ HELL\nBULL IN BIBLE WAS INSERTED BY VATICAN TO GRAB POWER.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">HINDUISM</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;AND ESSENE/\nNAZARENE PHILOSOPHY THERE IS NO HEAVEN HELL.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jesus said :<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Verily I say unto\nyou, they who partake of benefits which are gotten by wronging one of God's\ncreatures, cannot be righteous; nor can they understand holy things, or teach\nthe mysteries of the kingdom, whose hands are stained with blood, or whose\nmouths are defiled with flesh.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"God giveth the\ngrains and the fruits of the earth for food; and for righteous man truly there\nis no other lawful sustenance for the body....\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Wherefore I say\nunto all who desire to be my disciples, keep your hands from bloodshed and let\nno flesh meat enter your mouths; for God is just and bountiful, who ordaineth\nthat man shall live by the fruits and seeds of the earth alone.\"&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In another verse of the\nsame manuscript, Jesus declares: <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"I am come to end\nthe sacrifices and feasts of blood, and if ye cease not offering and eating of\nflesh and blood, the wrath of God shall not cease from you, even as it came to\nyour fathers in the wilderness, who lusted for flesh, and they ate to their\ncontent, and were filled with rottenness, and the plague consumed them\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"And I say unto\nyou, though ye be gathered together in my bosom, if ye keep not my commandments\nI will cast you forth; for, if ye keep not the lesser mysteries, who shall give\nyou the greater?\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"He that is\nfaithful in that which is least is faithful also in much: and he that is unjust\nin the least is unjust also in much.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jesus said:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"For of the fruits\nof the trees and the seeds of the herbs alone do I partake, and these are\nchanged by the Spirit into my flesh and my blood. Of these alone and their like\nshall ye eat who believe in me, and are my disciples, for of these in the Spirit,\ncome life and health and healing unto man.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><b>( THIS IS SAME AS\nESSENE/ NAZARENE/ HINDU WAY )</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">FROM MEAT EATING THE\nWHITE&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">CHRISTIAN</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;METAMORPHOSED TO CANNIBALISM. ( read my&nbsp;previous blog ) . &nbsp;THE POPE ENCOURAGES ABSOLUTE GENOCIDE AND\nCRIMINAL BEHAVIOR TO CONVERT ALL TO&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">CHRISTIANITY</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/03/st-patrick-genocide-of-druids-pope-leo_30.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/03/st-patrick-genocide-of-druids-pope-leo_30.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In \"Holy\nTwelve\", Jesus makes that point very clear:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"God is both male\nand female, not divided, but the Two in One.... In God the masculine is not\nwithout the feminine, nor is the feminine without the masculine: Love is not\nwithout knowledge, Justice is not without Mercy, the Head is not without the\nHeart. In God, the masculine powers and feminine powers are perfectly united as\nONE.\" ( SHIVA-SHAKTI ARDHANISHAVARA CONCEPT )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In his book titled, The\nDead Sea Scrolls: The Essenian Forerunners of Christ, Theodore Heline writes:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"From the\nrecovered portions of the Manual of Discipline we learn that an applicant for Essene\nmembership was placed on a one year's probation. If his conduct proved worthy,\ntwo more years of study and testing followed. Then if favorably passed upon by\nthe priest and the majority of the members he was admitted to full\nmembership.... On attaining full membership, but not until then, individuals\nsurrendered without reservation all personal possessions to the common\nstore.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In The Gospel of the\nHoly Twelve, in regard to the 'Last Supper':<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"And at evening\nthe Master cometh into the house, and there are gathered with him the\nTwelve....And they were all clad in garments of white linen....\u201d (ESSENES AND\nNAZARENES WORE ONLY WHITE LINEN )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Edmond Szekely, in From\nEnoch to the Dead Sea Scrolls, writes:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"The Essenes lived\non the shores of lakes and rivers, away from cities and towns, and practiced a\ncommunal way of life, sharing equally in everything. They were mainly\nagriculturists and arboriculturists, having a vast knowledge of crops, soil and\nclimatic conditions which enabled them to grow a great variety of fruits and\nvegetables in comparatively desert areas and with a minimum of labor.\"<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">( NOW APCO MODI RUNS TO\nISRAEL TO INTERLINK INDIANS RIVERS \u2013WHY NOT, ISRAEL HAS THOUSANDS OF MIGHTY\nRIVERS , RIGHT ?)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"The Essenes had\ngreat agricultural proficiency... producing a large variety of fruits and\nvegetables of the highest quality and in such abundance they periodically had a\nsurplus to distribute to the needy.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In his book The\nMystical Christ, Manly Hall writes:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"There was no\nidleness among the Essenes.... The group was not... financed by the State; it\nwas supported entirely by its own members, whose gain from lawful enterprise\nwas kept in the common purse. The term 'lawful enterprise' was interpreted as\nhonest and honorable work. No activity was considered superior to another. Each\nof those who came bestowed his talents and abilities, but practiced them only\naccording to the convictions of conscience. As many who sought refuge in the\nsettlement had no inclination to continue their previous occupations, they had\nno special skill suitable to their new way of living. These farmed the\nsurrounding area and performed such labor as might be required for the common\ngood. Some apprenticed themselves to craftsmen and learned new trades.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"It is a mistake\nto assume that the Essenes were simply agriculturists and craftsmen. Some had\nbeen scholars or wealthy merchants or successful tradesmen. Each in his own way\nhad found it impossible to continue practices which offended his soul. He had,\ntherefore, divided his goods, bestowed his properties, terminated his worldly\ncareer, and returned to the natural faith of his fathers.\" ( HINDU SANYAS\n)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cThat the intellectual\nlevel of the community was high can be gathered from the historical accounts of\nthe sect. Essenes were selected as teachers of the young and Roman officials\nresiding in Palestine selected these mystics, preferring them to scholars of\nother Jewish sects or tutors sent from Rome. Under the gentle guidance of these\ngodly men, children received not only learning, but also grace and enlightenment.\"<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Some of the\nEssenes practiced herbal medicine and healed the sick .... They were especially\nmindful of the poor, who could not afford to engage physicians. When the\nEssenian doctor attended a patient, he would not only prescribe a remedy, but\nwould also clean the house, do the mending and washing and any other task which\nsickness had interrupted. If some gift was forced upon him by one of the\ngrateful, it was placed in the general storehouse of the sect.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Robert Chaney, writes\nabout healer Essenes in his book, The Essenes and their Ancient Mysteries:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"The Therapeutae,\nconsisted of those Essenes who engaged in the healing art. &nbsp;The word \"Essenes\" in the nearest\nAramaic equivalent means 'healers'.... &nbsp;&nbsp;One\nbranch of the Essenes located near famed Lake Mareotis in Egypt, was known far\nand wide for its accomplishments in the field of healing\u201d</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For millenniums &nbsp;Essenes &nbsp;practiced \"holistic medicine.\" Writes\nDaniel Maziarz, in his The Angelic Way to Love:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Curiously enough,\nthe health practices of the ancient Essenes are making a huge comeback today\nunder the names of holistic health, naturopathy, preventive medicine, Ayurveda,\nand others.... Increasing numbers of people today are adopting the following\nnatural means of empowering their health that were also employed by the ancient\nEssenes:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">nutrition, especially\nthe powerful effect of specific natural foods to prevent and to heal disease<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">deep breathing\nexercises<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">physical yoga culture\nof all forms<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ayurvedic herbs<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">fasting<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">massage ( lymph )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">suntherapy ( ATAPA\nSNANA and SURYA NAMASKAR)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">watertherapy\n(hydrotherapy)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">gardening <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">the use of precious and\nsemi-precious stones. ( divining )\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Three basic\nprinciples were followed by The Essenes in their healing... First, it was\nbelieved that Divinity was expressed in the plant kingdom as an antidote for\nthe illnesses of the human kingdom, that for every illness there existed a\npalliative in a root, leaf or bark of a tree or plant. The Essenes therefore\nwere herbalists in the highest sense of the word.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"A second method\nof healing was to make use of 'healing stones' -- bits of various kinds of rock\nor hardened clay earth.... The power of such stones in influencing magnetic\nfields under the direction of one who is versed in this type of therapy became\ncommon knowledge at a later period. The Essenes also created salves from\nnatural sources. The clay and spittle Jesus used in Bible prescribed for the\nblind man may very well have originated from this source.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"The third method\nof healing in which the Essenes were extremely well versed drew upon the\nhealing powers of the invisible worlds around them. They acquired an\nunparalleled mastery in manipulating these healing powers of the superior\nspheres....\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"The Essenes held\nchildren in special regard.... They trained these young people and were\nattentive to natural abilities and inclinations. When these children reached\nmaturity, they were in no way required to accept the teachings of the sect or\nto become members. They might choose to do so or not, as they pleased.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"The aged were\nheld in the highest esteem, and it was remembered that they had worked\nfaithfully and lovingly as long as their strength had permitted. They were\ngiven... devoted care and protected from want to the end of their lives.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In his &nbsp;book From Enoch to the Dead Sea Scrolls,\nEdmond Bordeaux Szekely writes:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"The Essenes knew\nthere was no escape from this circle of oppression, hatreds and violence, wars\nand revolutions, except through changing the ignorance of the individuals in\nthe world....<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"The solution\nwhich the Essenes offered for economic and social harmony can be applied in\nevery age, the present as well as the past. It contained four factors:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Separating from the\nchaotic conditions of the mass of mankind which refuses to obey natural and\ncosmic law.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Demonstrating a\npractical social system based on natural and cosmic law.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Communicating these\nideas to the outside world through teaching, healing and helping others\naccording to their needs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Attracting to their\ncommunities other individuals who are sufficiently evolved to be willing to\ncooperate with the law.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consider the praise of\ncontemporaries such as Pliny, Josephus and Philo; these men actually knew the\nEssenes and said of them:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"... a race by\nthemselves, more remarkable than any other in all the world.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- Pliny<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"... they show\nmore love for each other than do others, and live a more moral life. Rightly do\nthey deserve to be called an example for the life of other people.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- Josephus<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"They live each\nday in constant and unalterable holiness.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- Philo<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"The Essenes\nresolved to live by the laws of God in a world of men.... By simply permitting\nconsciousness to guide conscience, and conscience to govern conduct, the\nEssenes unfolded the basic plan for human society. The more devoutly they\npracticed these principles, the more obvious it became that the program was\nboth possible and practical.... By loving their fellow men and serving them,\nthe Essenes discovered in their own hearts the God of love and service.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SINCE THE ADVENT OF THE\nSINGLE MESSIAH , SINGLE HOLY BOOK,&nbsp; BURIAL\n&nbsp;RELIGIONS , HAS THIS PLANET KNOWN ANY\nPEACE ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nearly all the Essene\nNazarenes were killed and most of their books (which contained the true\nteachings of Jesus) were burned along with them. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ESSENES AND NAZARENES\nCAME RUNNING BACK HOME TO KERALA BY SHIP.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TODAY THE DESCENDANTS OF THE &nbsp;SAME\nESSENES IN KERALA HAVE CONVERTED TO CHRISTIANITY DURING THE WHITE INVADERS RULE &nbsp;, EAT BEEF AND CURSE THEIR ANCIENT MOTHER\nRELIGION. &nbsp; THEY RIDICULE INDIA ..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MARK MY WORDS-- APOLLONIUS AND ESSENE WAY OF LIFE WILL COME BACK AGAIN ON THIS PLANET , -- &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THEIR DEAD SEA SCROLLS WHERE THEY AWAIT THE KALKI AVATAR CANNOT BE HIJACKED BY JEWS AND CHRISTIANS ANY MORE.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SUCH IS THE POWER OF HUMAN INTENTION.</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-kBdUnq64HCM/Vw6dmltrkjI/AAAAAAABHdE/c93CHnBe7TU691QQEQlukEJxmVJaBc0jgCLcB/s1600/QumXran24.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; line-height: 150%;\">Above:&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The scrolls were hidden\nin jars by the Essenes, to hide them from the approaching Roman troops during the\ngreat revolt (68AD).</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lot of Essenes came running back to Muziris Kerala\nby ship in 69 AD..</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-N6k-FY6vq2w/Vw6e5sSv0MI/AAAAAAABHdM/zc4jp0mx8zQokikgf59XFrSM_OKBzYDxwCLcB/s1600/Qudmran_google.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There was a earthquake at\nQumran in 31 BC, during the times of King Herod the Great, the settlement was\nseverely damaged and deserted. The Essenes returned to rebuild the site in 4BC.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Z2Tqzornk5M/Vw6kmRIxSaI/AAAAAAABHeY/l08-qdc4IQIJeh6nIKa82T94EKcgo3LjACLcB/s1600/a551199c2faca2d6d9711b0cD24f4e572.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;When the Jew revolt was crushed by the Romans\nin 68 AD, the Essenes of Qumran prepared themselves to the worst, and hid their\nprecious treasures (the dead sea scrolls) in the caves.&nbsp; The Romans indeed conquered Qumran (68AD),\ndestroyed it and dispersed the sect.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: &nbsp;I HAVE SEEN ALL THIS - &nbsp;AND I KNEW THE TRUTH, &nbsp; SO I KNEW WHERE EXACTLY TO LOOK -VAASTU WAS EVERYWHERE. &nbsp; &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">SORRY LYING JEWS &nbsp; - &nbsp; I HAVE CALLED YOUR BLUFF. &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">THERE IS A LIMIT TO TELLING KOSHER LIES &nbsp;. .&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/--TRATAS-Jq4/Vw6hv0yoEwI/AAAAAAABHdw/QcN0jOuiz2wkTo-t2coljeQjkWBqYym_gCLcB/s1600/QumFran17s.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/--TRATAS-Jq4/Vw6hv0yoEwI/AAAAAAABHdw/QcN0jOuiz2wkTo-t2coljeQjkWBqYym_gCLcB/s1600/QumFran17s.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to Josephus,\nthe Dead Sea (\"lake Asphaltitis\") was full of bodies from the Jordan\nvalley cities and villages, killed by the Roman troops which were commanded by\nPlacidus (Wars 4 7 6):&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-gfyUq0MTKRs/Vw6jxO4zynI/AAAAAAABHeM/DbmiLgzTx5cel-91rCA5aqVuEIaHJZnNgCLcB/s1600/18e0be4f2376daf840084585ffa70776.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-gfyUq0MTKRs/Vw6jxO4zynI/AAAAAAABHeM/DbmiLgzTx5cel-91rCA5aqVuEIaHJZnNgCLcB/s640/18e0be4f2376daf840084585ffa70776.jpg\" width=\"480\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"And now Placidus, after this good success that he\nhad, fell violently upon the neighboring smaller cities and villages; when he\ntook Abila, and Julias, and Bezemoth, and all those that lay as far as the lake\nAsphaltitis, and put such of the deserters into each of them as he thought\nproper. He then put his soldiers on board the ships, and slew such as had fled\nto the lake...\".<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-uZKoYvhP9ak/Vw6hgk6eySI/AAAAAAABHdo/m-Gub02bjPgN0IdJ6KpX84HkCVRlCsbxQCLcB/s1600/QumrGan_plana.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"490\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-uZKoYvhP9ak/Vw6hgk6eySI/AAAAAAABHdo/m-Gub02bjPgN0IdJ6KpX84HkCVRlCsbxQCLcB/s640/QumrGan_plana.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Years later, during the Bar-Kochba revolt\n(132-135AD) a Roman Garrison was stationed here to control the regional\ntraffic. They left after 20 years, and Qumran was abandoned and left in ruins\nfor 1800 years.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-2dcRxE0gUFk/Vw6hZNTXi0I/AAAAAAABHdk/ACtGhfo249gcdHuzvNxwLV9q741BCWudgCLcB/s1600/QumranF7s.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-2dcRxE0gUFk/Vw6hZNTXi0I/AAAAAAABHdk/ACtGhfo249gcdHuzvNxwLV9q741BCWudgCLcB/s1600/QumranF7s.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1947 Bedouins\nshepherds discovered ancient scrolls in a local cave 1.5KM to the north of\nQumran (\"cave #1\"). The area was excavated and additional scrolls and\nfragments were discovered in 11 caves around Qumran.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-20OXsKgGmTM/Vw6hKS7fREI/AAAAAAABHdc/AVo2Nq2eM6QmH76wbtCPzlYSZJtOe-drACLcB/s1600/Qumran14s.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"422\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-20OXsKgGmTM/Vw6hKS7fREI/AAAAAAABHdc/AVo2Nq2eM6QmH76wbtCPzlYSZJtOe-drACLcB/s640/Qumran14s.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The scrolls were hidden in\njars, and were preserved relatively well due to the dry climate of the Judean\ndesert. From the distribution of the location of the scrolls the archaeologists\ndetermined that Qumran was the nucleus of Essenes activity in the region, a\nsort of learning center for the sect.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-TVLrW3z-nFw/Vw6iDAx1pYI/AAAAAAABHd4/8FcOoRMIfPgxlmK_opB5UsCjnNMbjRLjgCLcB/s1600/QumraGn1s.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-TVLrW3z-nFw/Vw6iDAx1pYI/AAAAAAABHd4/8FcOoRMIfPgxlmK_opB5UsCjnNMbjRLjgCLcB/s1600/QumraGn1s.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The buildings in Qumran included mainly\npublic structures that hosted large public events, workshops and a scriptorium\nwhere the scrolls were written.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-yppzarVCP6w/Vw6gs1spTJI/AAAAAAABHdY/n_EUZOz1b3sDCnJYWS8YVsETE7E_OlhxACLcB/s1600/QGumran34s.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-yppzarVCP6w/Vw6gs1spTJI/AAAAAAABHdY/n_EUZOz1b3sDCnJYWS8YVsETE7E_OlhxACLcB/s1600/QGumran34s.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;\"For their doctrine is this: That bodies\nare corruptible, and that the matter they are made of is not permanent; but\nthat the souls are immortal, and continue for ever; and that they come out of\nthe most subtile air, and are united to their bodies as to prisons, into which\nthey are drawn by a certain natural enticement; but that when they are set free\nfrom the bonds of the flesh, they then, as released from a long bondage,\nrejoice and soul mounts upward on cremation \"....<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-XaJJDOdjX-g/Vw6jJZUTuMI/AAAAAAABHeE/ES7Y7M7hFFU3KfBqcT7FIbhzPIZi8L3nACLcB/s1600/Galidee_to_Judea.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-XaJJDOdjX-g/Vw6jJZUTuMI/AAAAAAABHeE/ES7Y7M7hFFU3KfBqcT7FIbhzPIZi8L3nACLcB/s640/Galidee_to_Judea.gif\" width=\"464\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The oasis at Qumran was\nan old spice trade and medicinal herb &nbsp;outpost ( Muziris by ship ) on the caravan\nroute &nbsp;. It was a watering place for\ncamels and horses. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The king of Calicut , who owned Muziris port , had\nhis customs outpost here like at Mecca. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The aqueduct works of\nQumran were done by Nabatean workers like at Petra and Madein saleh.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/lost-civilization-of-petra-capt-ajit.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/lost-civilization-of-petra-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/02/madain-saleh-destruction-of-ancient.html\" style=\"background-color: cyan;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/02/madain-saleh-destruction-of-ancient.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-olHc72rn8g8/Vw6wgWhVilI/AAAAAAABHeo/9w2zFJZRHkQCfp3VX7YzAlHuiwiT83uaACLcB/s1600/map%2B550%2B-%2Blarger%2BFoxnt%2Blabels%2B-%2Blogo_1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Qr020JwgLrU/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/Qr020JwgLrU?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">Above: The aqueduct of Qumran&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Ck0x6zsfxT4/Vw6yixxPKTI/AAAAAAABHe0/oFVYw4cv64ovpK6ARI1nPyin5ygh6VvBgCKgB/s1600/6989381390_98dc5d6s939_m.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
