text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>Above: Aqueduct of Petra&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE INDIAN CHRISTIANS\nHAVE USURPED ESSENEE JOHN THE BAPTIST.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THEY HAVE A FAKE ARM TO\nPROVE IT. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TEEE HEEE !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Armenian_Church_of_St._John_the_Baptist\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Armenian_Church_of_St._John_the_Baptist</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">John\u2019s father Zechariah\nwas an Essene prophet around 520 BC .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">But hey,&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">Christians</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;have made John baptize Jesus to grab him.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And double hey, the Jews have circumcised\nJohn to grab him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_pKQ9XzAqPI/Vw7f8Qgca8I/AAAAAAABHfE/tWT4tSmxU6cAg7RyEXhvUQySf6Nmz0GdACLcB/s1600/sstjohn.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"452\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_pKQ9XzAqPI/Vw7f8Qgca8I/AAAAAAABHfE/tWT4tSmxU6cAg7RyEXhvUQySf6Nmz0GdACLcB/s640/sstjohn.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<br />And triple hey, they have his bones and even head all over Europe too.</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"https://xenophilius.wordpress.com/2010/08/04/remains-of-st-john-the-baptist-found/\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">https://xenophilius.wordpress.com/2010/08/04/remains-of-st-john-the-baptist-found/</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span><span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b>MERE PAAASS JOHN PAAJI KA HAATH KA TUKDA HAI ! &nbsp; TUMHAARE PAASS KYA HA ?</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b>MERE PAAASS JOHN PAAAJI KA AKKA MUNDI HAI !</b></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-uGvX1PRqkEE/Vw7h7BbpsYI/AAAAAAABHfQ/ZIvFPPx2ADYmWHj08vbyoQ1x4WsyK0NSQCLcB/s1600/Armeniaxn_Church.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-uGvX1PRqkEE/Vw7h7BbpsYI/AAAAAAABHfQ/ZIvFPPx2ADYmWHj08vbyoQ1x4WsyK0NSQCLcB/s640/Armeniaxn_Church.JPG\" width=\"480\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/viBaS0fKPGc/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/viBaS0fKPGc?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chinsurah, Hooghly was\na Dutch Colony during the period 1635-1824. Dutch East India Company BRANCH OF Jew\nRothschild used this place as an Opium hub. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Opium drug runner &nbsp;Jewess Susanna Anna Maria Verkerk has one of\nthe grandest tombs in India.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Her first husband Opium\ndrug runner Pieter Brueys was the Grand Master of Chinsurah Grand Lodge and the\nGovernor of Chinsurah</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-MRS-eaL8dUY/Vw7lqFq1jBI/AAAAAAABHfc/w-2Cz08bGm8OdgbiluYA8DwCggOEh6PUgCLcB/s1600/f1.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"495\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-MRS-eaL8dUY/Vw7lqFq1jBI/AAAAAAABHfc/w-2Cz08bGm8OdgbiluYA8DwCggOEh6PUgCLcB/s640/f1.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She married 7 husbands and killed all of\nthem.&nbsp; &nbsp;Priyanka Chopra acted as this woman.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/7_Khoon_Maaf\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/7_Khoon_Maaf</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why was Muziris such a\ngreat hub. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just an example:&nbsp; &nbsp;In the\nyear 408 AD Alaric the Visigoth demanded &nbsp;from the Pope three thousand kilos of pepper .&nbsp; Human flesh tasted better with marinated pepper.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The King of Muziris / Calicut\n&nbsp;absorbed no less than fifty million gold\nsesterces of the Roman empire's wealth every year, \"sending back\nmerchandise to be sold with us at a hundred times its prime cost.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/tipu-sultan-unmasked-capt-ajit.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/tipu-sultan-unmasked-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Don\u2019t baulk !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cRichard the Lionheart &nbsp;requested pork to eat while camped outside the\nHospitaller fortress of Acre in modern Israel. His attendants cook him up some\nSaracens on the basis that they taste of pork (even though they\u2019re not allowed\nto eat pork \u2013 go figure!). Richard bolts down his food and asks to see the\npig\u2019s head. Needless to say the attendants produce a Saracen\u2019s head and\nRichard, far from being appalled, gets stuck into some more \u201cpork\u201d pointing out\nto his men that they shall never starve as this meat is so plentiful\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even today a NASRANI in\nKerala is called mappila ( respected ). Some of them are still vegan like their\nancestors 2000 years ago.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ACHAEANS in Kerala must\nknow that there was a PAGAN prophet named Mani &nbsp;, from the Iranian &nbsp;area who was the prophet and\nthe founder of Manichaeism. &nbsp;He wrote in Aramic. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most of the dead seas\nscrolls were in Aramic.&nbsp; Never mind the\nJew propaganda . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whatever did NOT suit\nthe Jews / Christians they have hidden away or clipped away.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mani ( follower of Brihaspati ) was &nbsp;flayed alive, by the Zoroaster priests ( followers of Shukracharya) in 274\nAD stuffed and hung up\u2014 after this whoever of his sect survived came running to\nKerala by ship &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>THEY WERE LEAD BY A PAGAN NAMED THOMAS WHO WAS A DISCIPLE OF MANI.&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">LET US BE REMINDED THAT IN 274 AD , CHRISTIANITY WAS NOT YET BORN</span></b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Much later we Hindus\nwould give Zoroaster people shelter in Indian lands\u2014when they were persecuted\nby Muslims</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/shukracharya-is-ahura-mazda-god-of.html\" style=\"font-family: 'times new roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/shukracharya-is-ahura-mazda-god-of.html</a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Roman Emperor Julian is\ncalled &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">the Apostate, because 37 years\nafter Christianity was founded in 325 AD, he tried to shelter the Essenes who\nstill survived and were practicing underground.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Julian called the\nChristians GALILEANS , a derogatory term.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Roman Emperor Julian\nwas the last non-Christian ruler of the Roman Empire, and it was his desire to\nbring the Empire back to its ancient glorious Roman values . &nbsp;He restored destroyed and vandalized pagan\ntemples of Rome.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Julian was wounded in\nbattle by a spear tip into his liver.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-q0dte3mTEik/Vw-a3rcHhdI/AAAAAAABHgE/eA0L-PbOVPcrh9yOh0eB9CjSegVxPqgjACLcB/s1600/tumblr_nlvvprXFCu1tcfoti4zo1_500.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In his younger days\nApollonius lived in the Temple of Aesculapius ( below )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/--9jFEFeVHXg/Vw-eIvopriI/AAAAAAABHgU/5ApjSuIoWjYXr8bal5rDq9Q1y5ZhSO6SQCLcB/s1600/00k31.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"426\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/--9jFEFeVHXg/Vw-eIvopriI/AAAAAAABHgU/5ApjSuIoWjYXr8bal5rDq9Q1y5ZhSO6SQCLcB/s640/00k31.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The rod of Asclepius, a\nsnake-entwined staff, remains a symbol of modern medicine today.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-qytDLZnmZik/Vw-fEmttzWI/AAAAAAABHgk/HHO0P0pUuoYg46FaDaAiJvy8ZbAsCu45QCLcB/s1600/Asklepios_-_Epidgauros.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Very sick people would come from far get healed within hours and go back happy.</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-dWFH1a-CqgY/Vw-fMN08POI/AAAAAAABHgo/0MurVoEw0kk8uX1S5Bx2DKSkWffG2RL3wCLcB/s1600/templeofadsclepius.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"530\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-dWFH1a-CqgY/Vw-fMN08POI/AAAAAAABHgo/0MurVoEw0kk8uX1S5Bx2DKSkWffG2RL3wCLcB/s640/templeofadsclepius.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nOnly CELL TIME REVERSAL can do such a thing<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/time-reversal-of-body-cells-by-scalar.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/time-reversal-of-body-cells-by-scalar.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Apollonius WAS A hero\nbecause he initiated worthy people into his art of healing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was NOT selfish, he\ndid NOT want any rewards or fame. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He passed on wisdom\nwherever he went, whoever came across him had only good things to say . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Apollonius was well over\n100 years old when he suddenly disappeared with healthy physique and a glowing\nface.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The people whom\nApollonius initiated into his art of healing ( modern Reiki ) were called\nApolloniei\u2014they survived after his death for centuries and Emperor Julian took\ncare of them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1st Corinthians\n3:3\u20136 it says,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201c For while one sayeth,\nI am of Apollos, are ye not carnal?&nbsp; Who,\nthen, is Paul, and whom Apollos, but ministers, by whom ye believed, even as\nthe Lord gave to every man?&nbsp; I have\nplanted, Apollos watered; but God gave the increase.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An ancient version of\n1st Corinthians found in a French monastery by a Huguenot soldier entitled the\nCodex Bezae.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The name Apollos is spelled Apollonius! In the\nEncyclopaedia Britannica, the name Apollo in this context is Apollonius. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was Apollonius who brought\nback a new gospel of Krishna ( Christ ) from India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Dead Sea Scroll\nthere is a citation of Isaiah 40:3, which says \"In the wilderness prepare\nthe way of the LORD, make straight in the desert a highway for our God\"\n(NRSV).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We know from the\npreaching of John the Baptist that he expected the Messiah ( Kalki )&nbsp; to baptize with Holy Spirit and with fire,\nushering in the long-awaited judgment day.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In &nbsp;Essene pagansim ( Hinduism\n) &nbsp;Kalki &nbsp;( destroyer of filth and vermin ) is the tenth\nand final incarnation of Vishnu in the current Mahayuga.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He\nis the harbinger of the end time in Hindu eschatology, after which he will\nusher in Satya Yuga.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The original form of\nbaptism was 3 dips in the river Ganges \u2013after the river Saraswati dried up in\n4000 BC&nbsp; &nbsp;facing the rising sun.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/blockchain-bitcoin-big-brother-will.html?showComment=1513185259860#c4671100578196233665\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">December 13, 2017 at 10:44 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_175MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nPhysicists in China and the US have built a 10-qubit superconducting quantum processor that could be scaled up to tackle problems not solvable by classical computers.<br />\n<br />\nQubits are the building blocks of quantum computing, capable of superposition \u2013 being in two states at the same time, rather than the computer bits of today, which are either a 1 or a 0 at any given moment.<br />\n<br />\nEntanglement is where quantum states can't be described independently, but only in relation to the others, making for a more solid system. The team used a measurement technique called quantum tomography to prove that they had indeed entangled their qubits<br />\n<br />\nThe phenomenon of entanglement in quantum physics, which has been observed in many experiments, implies that objects that are far removed in space (even across billions of miles) remain connected even though there is no mediating agency.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/quantum-entanglement-video-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nVedic philosophy tells us about the existence of another type of particle called the atma, the soul, the self, having different properties from those of ordinary particles.This is not unusual in physics, as is the case with antimatter particles.<br />\n<br />\nThe atma does not come into or out of existence, it is always present. It does not decay or degrade, it maintains its individuality always, it\u2019s infinitesimally small and it\u2019s not composed of more elementary particles. It\u2019s unchangeable, which along with the individuality property implies that it does not unite with other particles to create more complex structures, nor does it merge with others.<br />\n<br />\nThe atma does not interact directly with matter, but given that the atma is the source of consciousness and the life force in a living entity, any entity displaying them reveals the presence of an atma in it\u2014whether human, animal, plant, etc.<br />\n<br />\nVedanta wrote 7000 years ago-- The living entities are not made up of atmas; rather, they are these particles and are animating the material bodies that encase them. As soon as the atma leaves one body for another, the old body no longer exhibits consciousness or life symptoms, and begins to degrade.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/daltons-atomic-theory-sage-kashyapa-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nMaharishi Kashyapa is also known as Kanada Muni. He called the atom Anu. He wrote that there are 108 such elements ...<br />\n<br />\nThe basic Vaisheshika concepts of matter, action, attribute, time and space are described. The 8500 year old Nyaya-Vaiseshika Sutra of Kanada Muni consists of 373 Sutras and is composed of 12 chapters.<br />\n<br />\nIt\u2019s main postulates are:--<br />\n<br />\nAll of the universe is composed of the 5 mahabhuttas and the 4 non physicals: that is Fluid, Atomic elements, fields/force, energy, ether and space, time, mind and soul.<br />\n<br />\nExcept ether, all of the physical elements are made of discreet and distinct paramanus or atoms<br />\n<br />\nSpace-time is a frame in which the physical universe exists<br />\n<br />\nThere are seven categories of experience, which are substance, quality, activity, generality, particularity, inherence, and nonexistence.<br />\n<br />\nEnergy and mass are equivalent.<br />\n<br />\nHere are some of the Sutras: ---<br />\n<br />\nForce is that which displaces, holds together or moves things apart.V.S 1.1.20<br />\nIn the absence of a force, a particle of matter experiences no change. V.S 1.1.6<br />\nThe forces to be considered are an external force, gravity, that with causes attraction of particles, that which causes repulsion of particles and the internal movements of them in matter.<br />\n<br />\nV.S 1.1.13 Action is opposed by an equivalent opposite reaction<br />\nV.S 5.1.1618 The diversities of the movement of an arrow are due to the consecutive changes in the components of the acting forces. The stored energy provides the propulsion to the arrow and this causes it move further to a high point. This component keeps reducing while that of gravity increases resulting in its fall.Once the work against gravity ceases then the body reaches an energyless state falling under gravity.<br />\nV.S 1.1.27 The force on a body is the resultant of gravity and the work done against it.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_175BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBBVAD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_173T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBBVAD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_173TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_173TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_173TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBBVAD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBBVAD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_173TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_173TN\"></span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_173TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBBVAD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_173B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5923840167230626705\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_173M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_173MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nV.S 5.1.13 In the absence of all other forces (saMyogabindings) gravity exists.<br />\nV.S 5.1.7 The \u201cguna\u201d of forces (direction) prevents a magnitude from being obtained<br />\nV.S.1.1.20a The nature of physical changes in matter is the terms of work being done on the basic particles that constitute matter.<br />\nV.S 2.1.14 The particular nature of air is suggested by the mixing of gases that occurs on their collision. Despite of being made of atoms and occupying space air fails show orderly movement so its form cannot be perceived<br />\nV.S 4.1.8 Solids occupy space and assume form due to conglomeration of the constituent particles.<br />\nV.S 4.1.6 The (fluid\u2019s) particles possess energy. This causes them to possess the property of fluidity. The heat bearing rays provide the particles with energy to form a gas and rise. The heated particles of air impact the vapor and with this energy it mixes with it. Freezing and melting of a liquid as being a result of heat being taken up or given up by its particles.<br />\nV.S 5.2.9 Some apparently solid substances like ghee, lac and wax are in reality liquids, as their particles are naturally \u201cheat-conjoined\u201d or disorganized as in water. Other true solid substances such as tin, lead, iron, silver and gold need their atoms to be supplied with external heat to disorder them before they become a fluid.<br />\nV.S 2.1.67 Any body\u2019s mass needs to be wholly explained in terms of its constituent particles.<br />\nV.S 1.1.89 A substance can only emerge from another substance and not on its own eventhough its properties change from one to another.<br />\nV.S 9.1.9 Any fundamental particular entity can be a constituent multiple substances.<br />\nV.S 1.1.22 Any substance comprising of two or more primary particle types requires a chemical reaction to generate the conjoining and break up of preexisting molecules.<br />\nV.S 1.1.23 The \u201cmolecules\u201d are stated as emerging from combinations between the fundamental entities.<br />\nV.S 1.1.25 Forces are necessary to bring about combination and break up of molecules.<br />\nV.S 1.1.28 The combinations of particles to produce molecules result in substances with states very different from those of the original particles.<br />\n<br />\nKanada Muni\u2019s laws:<br />\n<br />\nIn the production or increment of karma (i.e. motion), the root cause is force. In other words, there is incremental or decremental change in motion.<br />\nThis law is a law of the measure of force. According to this, so long mechanical force works, there is change in motion i.e. there is momentum. To find its value, it is calculated how much work it produces in a unit time.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_173MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_173BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_173B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_174B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c466643263114631994\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_174M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_174MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2--<br />\n<br />\nMathematically, the rate of change in momentum i.e. the increment in work in unit time is proportional to the force in action. Also, this change is in the direction of the force. Suppose that the mass of an object is \u2018m\u2019 and in time interval \u2018t\u2019, the velocity of the object changes from \u2018u\u2019 to \u2018v\u2019 due to the force acting on it.<br />\n<br />\nThen, Initial momentum = m*u<br />\nFinal momentum = m*v<br />\nChange in momentum = m(v*u)<br />\nTherefore, the rate of change of momentum = m(v*u)/t<br />\nt = m*a (from Kanada\u2019s first law)<br />\n<br />\nFrom Kandas second law, force is proportional to the rate of change of momentum<br />\nOr, p = k*m*a (where k is a constant)<br />\nIf m=1 and a=1, then<br />\n1 = k*1*1 or k = 1<br />\nOr, p = m*a<br />\n<br />\nTherefore, unit force is the one that produces unit acceleration in an object of unit mass. The VS then goes to say that force is a result of work and is not a physical quantity which is superior to Newtons law that measures it as a physical quantity.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nThe sutras on energy:<br />\n<br />\nVaiseshika defines energy as being a radiant thing(i.e. energy is radiation) and energy is related totemperature and motion of a particle.<br />\n<br />\nVedic Indians understood the process of refraction and absorbtion of energy by \u201cmaterial obstructions\u201d and they understood heat, electricity and magnetism to be forms of energy. It is already understood by the elemental theory that light is also an energy and is composed of discreet units.<br />\n<br />\nThis was of course was not understood in modern times till Max Plank and Einstein in the 20th cetury devised quantum theory after the study of black body radiation and the photoelectric effect.<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBBVAD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5636161372682164347\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; WIFE ZIPPORAH ( DAUGHTER OF A PAGAN SAGE JETHRO FROM PUNT ) WITH LONG BLACK HAIR-- AND HIS SON GERSHOM .</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 32px;\">\u201cJethro said to Moses, What you are doing is not good\u2026 Now obey my voice; I will give you advice, and God be with you\u201d\u2026 &nbsp;&nbsp;So Moses listened to the voice of his father-in-law and did all that he had said. (Exodus 18:17, 19, 24)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<br /><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: cambria, serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 37.3333px;\">BIBLE ADMITS THAT MOSES HAD BRAWN BUT NO BRAINS \u2013AND THAT GOD USED JETHRO AS THE MIDDLEMAN.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: cambria, serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: cambria, serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 37.3333px;\">MOSES WOUD KNEEL WHEN JETHRO SPOKE TO HIM.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: cambria, serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: cambria, serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>JETHRO ( UNCIRCUMCISED KERALA NAMBOODIRI ) GAVE MOSES HIS DAUGHTER ZIPPORAH ON THE CONDITION THAT HIS FIRST SON WOULD BE A PAGAN HINDU WITH UNCIRCUMCISED PENIS..&nbsp; &nbsp;MOSES PROMISED HIM THAT ..</b></span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: cambria, serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: cambria, serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 37.3333px;\">PEOPLE ASK WHY WAS JETHRO SO COMMITTED TO THE LAND OF PALESTINE?&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;BECAUSE HE WAS FROM THE LAND OF PUNT, WHO CREATED JUDAISM AND THE LANGUAGE HEBREW.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: cambria, serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">ZIPPORAH WOULD LATER CIRCUMCISE HER SON GERSHOM USING A SHARP FLINT (&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: red;\">WITH COPPER ELEMENT- SECRETS OF AYURVEDA</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp; ) \u2014 THE WAY THE YOUNGER BROTHERS OF KERALA NAMBOODIRIS DID, TO PREVENT INFECTION. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: cambria, serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">SHE THREW THE FORESKIN OF HER SONs PENIS , ON THE FEET OF MOSES IN DISGUST FOR BREAKING HIS PROMISE TO HER FATHER JETHRO.</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br /><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: cambria, serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/11/bar-kokhba-in-fight-to-finish-over.html\" style=\"background-color: lime; color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/11/bar-kokhba-in-fight-to-finish-over.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Usb7oR8XbyM/W1hrzr-_5PI/AAAAAAABdCA/5c_IfCiD4j007ye6-QQZ3b3MjbJsh9rMQCLcBGAs/s1600/KJV_FExodus_4-25.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">SAGES FROM PUNT WERE CALLED MELCHIZEDEK \u2013 AND THEY WERE UNCIRCUMCISED<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">APOLLONIUS OF TYANA WAS A MELCHIZEDEK.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">JESUS CHRIST NEVER EXISTED. &nbsp;&nbsp;JESUS WAS COOKED UP IN 325 AD..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Jesus Christ is &nbsp;identified as a priest forever in the order of Melchizedek quoting from Ps. 110:4.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Melchizedek is Jesus\u2014NAY\u2014Apollonius of Tyana<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">DEAD SEA SCROLLS TELL CLEARLY THAT PAGAN ESSENES WERE UNCIRCUMCISED AND MELCHIZEDEK<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Reference between the messiah and Melchizedek appears in subsequent biblical verses: Genesis 14:18-20; Psalm 110:1-7 Matthew 22:44; 26:26-28 Luke 22:19; Mark 14:22 John 6:53 Acts 2:34 I Corinthians 11:23-25 Hebrews 4:14-15; 5:6; 5:10; 6:19-20; 7:1-21. Revelation 1:6.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Melchizedek is mentioned twice in the Hebrew Bible, the first in Genesis and the second in Psalms.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Genesis 14:18 introduces Melchizedek a \"Priest of the Most High God\" (El Elyon), a term which is re-used in 14:19, 20, 22.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The second and final Hebrew Bible mention of Melchizedek is in Psalm 110:4.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The Lord hath sworn, and will not repent: 'Thou art a priest for ever after the manner of Melchizedek.'. (JPS 1917)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">11Q13 (11QMelch) is a fragment (that can be dated to the end of the 2nd or start of the 1st century BC) of a text about Melchizedek found in Cave 11 at Qumran in the Israeli Dead Sea area and which comprises part of the Dead Sea Scrolls.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">&nbsp;In this eschatological text, Melchizedek is seen as a divine being and Hebrew titles such as Elohim are applied to him. According to this text Melchizedek will proclaim the \"Day of Atonement\" and he will atone for the people who are predestined to him. He also will judge the peoples<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The association or identification of Melchizedek with the Messiah predates Christianity, developing in Jewish messianism of the Second Temple period<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The association or identification of Melchizedek with the Messiah predates Christianity, developing in Jewish messianism of the Second Temple period.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">According to Encyclop\u00e6dia Britannica, Joseph Smith ( MORMON ) &nbsp;\"appointed his male followers to priesthoods, named for the biblical figures Melchizedek and Aaron, that were overseen by the office of High Priest\"</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-kOuSYUNaGWg/W1hyUVavMeI/AAAAAAABdCs/71o_gbhe9nM9tJHhrxjRI02tDBLZoImjgCLcBGAs/s1600/rrMelchiz-Abe.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Just as Melchizedek blessed Abram (and \u201cIt is beyond dispute that the inferior is blessed by the superior\u201d\u2014Heb. 7:7), so also Jethro blesses Moses by helping him judge the people better, thereby demonstrating that Moses is not the savior of the world.</span></div>\n<br /><div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span><br /><div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: arial, sans-serif;\">\u05d5\u05ea\u05e7\u05d7</span>&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: arial, sans-serif;\">\u05e6\u05e4\u05e8\u05d4</span>&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: arial, sans-serif;\">\u05e6\u05e8</span>&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: arial, sans-serif;\">\u05d5\u05ea\u05db\u05e8\u05ea</span>&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: arial, sans-serif;\">\u05d0\u05ea\u05be\u05e2\u05e8\u05dc\u05ea</span>&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: arial, sans-serif;\">\u05d1\u05e0\u05d4</span>&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: arial, sans-serif;\">\u05d5\u05ea\u05d2\u05e2</span>&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: arial, sans-serif;\">\u05dc\u05e8\u05d2\u05dc\u05d9\u05d5</span>&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: arial, sans-serif;\">\u05d5\u05ea\u05d0\u05de\u05e8</span>&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: arial, sans-serif;\">\u05db\u05d9</span>&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: arial, sans-serif;\">\u05d7\u05ea\u05df\u05be\u05d3\u05de\u05d9\u05dd</span>&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: arial, sans-serif;\">\u05d0\u05ea\u05d4</span>&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: arial, sans-serif;\">\u05dc\u05d9\u05c3<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">Then Zipporah took a sharp stone, and cut off the foreskin of her son, and cast it at his feet, and said, \"Surely a bloody husband art thou to me.\"</span><o:p></o:p></span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-WDzp6SbbIcg/W1hyrmIM48I/AAAAAAABdC0/bT2ieyZ-CigJMJbuZqJRr2c9GV6dq1bagCLcBGAs/s1600/jeteehro.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span><br /><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: cambria, serif; line-height: 35.2px;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-size: large;\">IT IS TIME FOR THE ABRAHAMIC RELIGION HISTORIANS --&nbsp; JUDAISM, CHRISTIANITY AND ISLAM TO GO BACK TO THE DRAWING BOARD..</span><span style=\"font-size: 16pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span><br /><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: cambria, serif; line-height: 26.4px;\"><span style=\"font-size: medium;\">The followers of Apollonius of Tyana were Essenes ( Ishanis ) and the hands on healer sub sect whom he initiated were NAZARENES.&nbsp; &nbsp;In Kerala we call them NASRANIS.. They are pagan Hindus.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: cambria, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">COLLOSSEUM OF ROME WAS BUILT ON A DRIED UP LAKE.. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: cambria, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">DURING FLOODING CAUSED BY HEAVY RAINS , THE INSIDES OF THE COLLOSEUM USED TO LOOK LIKE A LAKE.. THIS DOES NOT MEAN THERE WERE SHIPS INSIDE FIGHTING MOCK BATTLES TO ENTERTAIN PUBLIC..</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; color: red; font-size: medium;\">ESSENES AND NAZARINES WERE PAGAN HINDU..&nbsp;</span></b><br /><br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-S_05X4c58YM/W1h3sL5Ri2I/AAAAAAABdDY/3Ps9oNQtQsMLmv56bKkGVGLd3OOXrGugACLcBGAs/s1600/iFFFmage010.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888;
